with some spicy crab seasoned or sriracha flavored potato chips on the side, and a light summer ale or crisp white wine such as pinot grigio, if desired.

name: banana split quinoa oat bars
description: the heart healthy power bars have all the ingredients one might have on a banana split made with quinoa, rolled oats, dried cherries, nuts and honey . plus antioxidants from the cinnamon and chocolate and they taste good too
ner: quinoa, water, quick rolled oats, ground cinnamon, baking soda, fine sea salt, very ripe mashed bananas, large egg, raw honey, virgin coconut oil, vanilla extract, dried cherries, chopped toasted walnuts or pecans, mini semi sweet chocolate chips
ingredients: 1/3 cup quinoa, 1/2 cup water, 2 cups quick rolled oats, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 tsp fine sea salt, 1 1/2 cups very ripe mashed bananas, 1 large egg, 1/4 cup raw honey, 1 tbsp virgin coconut oil, 2 tsp vanilla extract, 1/2 cup dried cherries, 1/3 cup chopped toasted walnuts or pecans, 1/4 cup mini semi sweet chocolate chips
steps: line a 9 x 13 baking pan with 2 pieces of foil or parchment paper, criss crossing over so they fold over the pan spray with non stick cooking spray . preheat the oven to 325degf . combine the quinoa and water in a small saucepan and bring to a boil over medium high heat . reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 10 to 12 minutes or until liquid is barely absorbed . remove from heat . cover and let stand for 5 to 6 minutes, remove lid and fluff with a fork . transfer to a medium bowl and let it cool completely . mix together the oats, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl . add mashed bananas, egg, honey, oil and vanilla to the cooked bowl of quinoa and stir until just blended . add the banana mixture to the oats mixture and stir until just blended . mix in dried cherries, walnuts and chocolate chips . spread the batter evenly over the prepared pan . bake for 30 to 35 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean . transfer to a wire rack and cool completely . for best results, refrigerate 20 minutes before cutting . using the liner, lift the mixture from the pan and transfer to a cutting board . cut into 16 bars and refrigerate or freeze to store.

name: asparagus egg and bacon salad with dijon vinaigrette
description: asparagus egg and bacon salad with dijon vinaigrette is the perfect easy spring salad made with just a few simple ingredients asparagus, hard boiled egg and bacon tossed with a dijon vinaigrette.
ner: large hard boiled egg, chopped asparagus, cooked and crumbled center cut bacon, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper
ingredients: 1 large hard boiled egg, 1 2/3 cups chopped asparagus, 2 slices cooked and crumbled center cut bacon, 1/2 tsp dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil, 1 teaspoon red wine vinegar, pinch salt and pepper
steps: bring a pot of water to a boil, add the asparagus and cook 2 to 3 minutes, until tender yet firm . drain and run under cold water to stop it from cooking further . set aside . in a small bowl mix the dijon, oil, vinegar and a pinch of salt and pepper . arrange the asparagus on a plate, top with egg and bacon and drizzle with the vinaigrette . enjoy

name: grilled greek style pork roast with yogurt sauce
description: lemon, garlic and oregano are the "trinity" of mediterranean island cooking . this culinary triumvirate marries perfectly with pork . if desired, thinly slice leftovers and tuck into pita pocket bread, topped with yogurt sauce . serve roast with italian bread, marinated tomatoes, rice pilaf and roasted asparagus.
ner: pork loin roast, boneless, olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, black pepper, garlic, plain yogurt, cucumber, red onion, garlic, ground coriander, salt, crushed red pepper
ingredients: 3.0 pound pork loin roast, boneless, 0.2 cup olive oil, 0.2 cup lemon juice, 1.0 teaspoon oregano, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 1.0 teaspoon black pepper, 6.0 clove garlic, 1.0 cup plain yogurt, 1.0 cucumber, 0.2 cup red onion, 1.0 clove garlic, 0.5 teaspoon ground coriander, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon crushed red pepper
steps: for pork roast place pork in large self sealing bag . add olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, pepper and 6 garlic cloves to bag seal bag and toss gently to combine thoroughly . refrigerate 8 24 hours . remove pork from marinade discarding marinade . prepare medium hot banked fire in covered kettle style grill . grill pork over indirect heat, away from fire, for 45 minutes 1 hour about 20 minutes per pound, until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees f . remove roast from oven let rest about 10 minutes before slicing to serve with yogurt sauce instructions follow . for yogurt sauce stir together yogurt, cucumber, onion, 1 garlic clove, coriander, salt and red pepper flakes . cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.

name: houston's lightened up kale salad with peanut vinaigrette
description: houston's lightened up kale salad with peanut vinaigrette is satisfying, made with a combo of grilled chicken, kale, cabbage, carrots, peanuts, scallions, cilantro and mint tossed in a light peanut sesame dressing.
ner: peanut oil, toasted sesame oil, unseasoned rice vinegar, reduced sodium soy sauce, raw honey, kosher salt, boneless, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, small bunch kale leaves, finely chopped green cabbage, shredded carrots, chopped fresh mint, chopped fresh cilantro, small scallions, chopped roasted
ingredients: 2 tablespoons peanut oil, 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil, 2 tablespoons unseasoned rice vinegar, 1 teaspoon reduced sodium soy sauce, 2 teaspoons raw honey, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/2 pound boneless, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, 1 small bunch kale leaves, 1 cup finely chopped green cabbage, 1/2 cup shredded carrots, 1/4 cup chopped fresh mint, 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 2 small scallions, 1 1/2 tablespoons chopped roasted
steps: in a small bowl, combine vinaigrette ingredients . whisk to combine and set aside.

name: sweet hawaiian crock pot chicken
description: found on facebook at classic rock 101.1
ner: chicken tenderloin, pineapple juice, brown sugar, soy sauce
ingredients: 2.0 pound chicken tenderloin, 1.0 cup pineapple juice, 0.5 cup brown sugar, 0.3 cup soy sauce
steps: combine all together, cook on low in crock pot 6 8 hours...that's it done serve with brown rice and you have a complete, easy meal

name: bangin' grilled shrimp skewers
description: these bang bang grilled shrimp skewers are the bomb the spicy, salty, sweet combination of the creamy chili sauce is what makes them so good.
ner: light mayonnaise, scallions, thai sweet chili sauce, sriracha, large, fresh cracked pepper, oil spray
ingredients: 2 1/2 tbsp light mayonnaise, 2 tbsp scallions, 1 1/2 tbsp thai sweet chili sauce, 1/2 tsp sriracha, 40 large, fresh cracked pepper, oil spray
steps: combine the mayo, scallions, sweet chili sauce and sriracha sauce in a small bowl . set aside . soak wooden skewers in water at least 20 minutes or use metal ones to avoid this step . season shrimp lightly pepper . place 5 shrimp on 8 skewers . heat a clean, lightly oiled grill to medium heat, when the grill is hot add the shrimp, careful not to burn the skewers . grill on both sides for about 6 8 minutes total cooking time or until the shrimp is opaque and cooked through . set shrimp aside on a platter and quickly brush sauce onto the shrimp serve immediately.

name: aunt bev's vegetarian chopped liver
description: learn to make delicious vegetarian chopped liver with sauteed onions, hard boiled eggs, peas, and walnuts . kosher, parve.
ner: vegetable oil, onion, , chopped walnuts, , peeled hard boiled eggs, , peas, , salt and pepper to taste
ingredients: 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 1 cup onion, , 1 cup chopped walnuts, , 4 peeled hard boiled eggs, , 15 oz peas, , salt and pepper to taste
steps: heat up the oil in a skillet over medium heat until hot enough to fry . saute the chopped onion for several minutes until it softens and caramelizes . in a food processor, combine sauteed onion, toasted walnuts, peeled hard boiled eggs, and peas . pulse, then process until the puree resembles chopped liver . add salt and pepper to taste, and process again to blend . chop up the remaining egg . garnish the vegetarian chopped liver with the last chopped egg and parsley . serve with crackers for spreading, or matzo during passover if you are celebrating sephardic style peas are considered kitniyot . enjoy

name: keto magic coconut macaroons
description: these indulgent seeming chocolate dipped coconut and pecan cookies taste so much like the traditional cookie tray favorite that no one will guess they're made entirely from keto diet friendly ingredients . you can find erythritol sweetener at well stocked grocery stores in the baking aisle . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: coconut oil, low calorie sweetener, large eggs, almond flour, vanilla extract, salt, unsweetened shredded coconut, finely chopped pecans, unsweetened cocoa powder, low calorie sweetener, coconut oil, vanilla extract
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon coconut oil, 0.2 cup low calorie sweetener, 2.0 large eggs, 0.2 cup almond flour, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 1.5 cup unsweetened shredded coconut, 0.5 cup finely chopped pecans, 0.2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1.5 tablespoon low calorie sweetener, 2.0 tablespoon coconut oil, 0.5 teaspoon vanilla extract
steps: preheat oven to 350deg f . line a baking sheet with parchment paper . whisk together coconut oil, erythritol, eggs, almond flour, vanilla extract, and salt in a medium mixing bowl until smooth . stir in coconut and pecans . using a small ice cream scoop and/or clean, dampened hands, divide mixture into 16 rounded mounds, spacing them 1 inch apart on prepared baking sheet . bake cookies on middle rack of oven until light golden brown on top, 13 15 minutes . check to see that cookies are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . let cookies cool on baking sheet on a rack for 15 20 minutes . make chocolate coating whisk together cocoa powder, erythritol, coconut oil, and vanilla in a small bowl until smooth . dip the bottom of each cooled cookie into chocolate mixture and return it to the baking sheet . once all the cookies have been dipped, drizzle remaining chocolate over tops of cookies with a spoon . freeze cookies 10 minutes to set the chocolate . serve cookies, or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator up to 1 week.

name: gegrilde chilipesto karbonaadjes met gegrilde courgette
description: zet de barbecue maar weer klaar deze gegrilde chilipesto karbonaadjes met gegrilde courgette en paprika zijn verrukkelijk door o.a . de bertolli pesto rosso.
ner: karbonades, bertolli pesto rosso, courgette, paprika, ciabattabroodjes, olie
ingredients: 2.0 karbonades, 3.0 tablespoon bertolli pesto rosso, 1.0 courgette, 2.0 paprika, 2.0 ciabattabroodjes, 1.0 tablespoon olie
steps: steek de barbecue aan of zet de grill op de hoogste stand . bestrooi de karbonades aan beide kanten met zout en peper en bestrijk ze met een dun laagje bertolli pesto rosso . was de courgette en paprika's . snijd de courgette in de lengte in vieren . halveer de paprika's, verwijder de zaadlijsten en snijd elke helft in drie stukken . snijd de ciabattabroodjes op en besprenkel de snijvlakken met een beetje olie . leg een groot stuk aluminiumfolie op het grillrooster en vet het in met een beetje olie . leg de karbonaadjes en groenten op het folie en grill alles bruin en gaar in ca . 15 min . geregeld keren en bestrijk zowel de groenten als het vlees tussentijds telkens met een beetje van de pesto . leg op het laatst ook de broodjes op het rooster en laat ze bruin worden . verdeel het gegrilde vlees, de groenten en het brood over 2 borden.

name: roasted strawberry protein smoothie
description: roasted strawberries in this protein packed smoothie brings out their amazing natural flavor, made with creamy cottage cheese and added chia seeds what a great way to start the day
ner: fresh strawberries, raw sugar, reduced fat cottage cheese, fat free milk, crushed ice, chia seeds, drops liquid stevia
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups fresh strawberries, 1/2 tablespoon raw sugar, 1/3 cup reduced fat cottage cheese, 1/2 cup fat free milk, 1 cup crushed ice, 1 tsp chia seeds, 6 to 8 drops liquid stevia
steps: preheat oven to 425degf . in a medium bowl, combine strawberries and sugar . pour the strawberries on a parchment paper lined baking sheet . place in the oven and roast for 12 to 15 minutes until the strawberries start to release their juices but are still firm . carefully pour the roasted strawberries and their juice into a blender along with cottage cheese, milk, ice and chia and blend until smooth . enjoy

name: boerenkool stamppot met rookworst
description: het originele boerenkool recept van unox snel en makkelijk te bereiden.
ner: aardapppels, boerenkool, spekblokjes, uien, melk, natuurazijn, unox gelderse rookworst
ingredients: 1.0 kilogram aardapppels, 1500.0 gram boerenkool, 125.0 gram spekblokjes, 2.0 uien, 1.0 deciliter melk, 1.0 dash natuurazijn, 1.0 unox gelderse rookworst
steps: pel en snipper de uien . schil de aardappels, snijd ze in stukken en kook ze met een beetje zout in ca . 20 min . gaar . kook in een andere pan de boerenkool in 20 min . gaar . volg bij diepvriesboerenkool de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . bak de spekblokjes uit . schep de uisnippers erbij en bak het geheel nog enkele minuten . bereid de rookworst volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . verwarm de melk . giet de aardappels af en stamp ze met de melk tot een smeuige puree . giet ook de boerenkool af en meng deze met de ui, de azijn en het bakvet door de puree . breng de stamppot op smaak met peper en zout . schep de stamppot boerenkool op 4 borden en verdeel de uitgebakken spekblokjes erover . serveer de unox rookworst erbij . eet smakelijk

name: blueberry banana oatmeal smoothie
description: blueberry banana oatmeal smoothie if you're looking for a heart healthy, dairy free breakfast loaded with fiber you can eat on the run, this is it
ner: raw quick oats, water, almond breeze vanilla unsweetened almond milk, blueberries, ripe medium banana, vanilla extract, raw sugar, ice
ingredients: 1/2 cup raw quick oats, 2 cups water, 1/2 cup almond breeze vanilla unsweetened almond milk, 1/2 cup blueberries, 1/2 ripe medium banana, 1/2 tsp vanilla extract, 2 tbsp raw sugar, 1/2 cup ice
steps: cook oats and water in a small pot for about a minute or two, stirring often until it becomes thick and bubbly . remove from heat and let it cool a few minutes . in a blender add almond milk, blueberries, banana, cooled oats, vanillas, sugar and ice . blend on high until very smooth . pour in a glass over ice . enjoy

name: poached apple ny strip steak
description: poached apple ny strip steak with apples, wine, orange juice, honey, cinnamon sticks, vanilla bean, salt, new york strip steaks, ground coffee, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, vanilla bean, salt, butter, olive oil, baby arugula
ner: apples, wine, orange juice, honey, cinnamon sticks, vanilla bean, salt, new york strip steaks, ground coffee, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, vanilla bean, salt, butter, olive oil, baby arugula
ingredients: 4.0 apples, 750.0 milliliter wine, 1.0 cup orange juice, 0.5 cup honey, 3.0 cinnamon sticks, 1.0 vanilla bean, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 4.0 new york strip steaks, 0.2 cup ground coffee, 2.0 teaspoon ground cumin, 0.2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1.0 vanilla bean, 1.5 teaspoon salt, 1.0 tablespoon butter, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 6.0 ounce baby arugula
steps: place a kitchenaid 8.0 quart stockpot with lid just large enough for all four apples to sit flat on the bottom but not larger over high heat . pour the wine, orange juice and honey in the pot . using a small knife, split the vanilla bean in half length wise, and scrape the seed paste out . add the empty vanilla bean pod, vanilla bean seed paste, cinnamon sticks and salt to the pot . bring to a boil . peel the apples . once the wine is boiling, carefully submerge the apples into the wine, and lower the heat to medium so the wine doesn't boil over . simmer the apples for 17 20 minutes, until soft and red . check with a toothpick after 17 minutes . if the toothpick can be inserted into the apple easily, remove from heat . meanwhile, mix the coffee rub for the steaks . place the ground coffee, spices, and salt in a small bowl . split a second vanilla bean and scrape the seed paste into the coffee rub . throw the vanilla bean pod into the simmering wine pot . use your fingers to mix the vanilla bean paste into the coffee rub . rub all four steaks with the coffee rub on all sides . heat a kitchenaid 10'' skillet to high heat . add the butter and oil to the skillet . once it's hot, add the steaks to the skillet . sear them for 3 4 minutes per side . remove the steaks and let them rest for at least 5 minutes . to plate, pile a mound of baby arugula on four plates . top each plate with a steak, then use a large slotted spoon to carefully lift a poached apple out of the wine and onto the top of each steak . serve warm.

name: brussels sprouts and sausage parsnip spiralized pasta
description: spiralized parsnips make a wonderful pasta replacement in this satisfying, spicy autumn dish made with brussels sprouts and spicy chicken sausage.
ner: links spicy chicken italian sausage, brussels sprouts, olive oil, 1 large parsnip, peeled, spiralized, trimmed 6 inches long, chopped shallots, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, kosher salt, black pepper, low sodium chicken broth, grated parmesan cheese
ingredients: 2 links spicy chicken italian sausage, 5 oz brussels sprouts, 2 tsp olive oil, 6 1/2 oz 1 large parsnip, peeled, spiralized, trimmed 6 inches long, 1/4 cup chopped shallots, 2 cloves garlic, 1/4 tsp crushed red pepper flakes, 1/4 tsp kosher salt, black pepper, 1/2 cup low sodium chicken broth, 1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese
steps: place a large nonstick skillet over medium heat . when hot, add the sausage and cook, breaking up with a wooden spoon 6 to 8 minutes, until browned . transfer to a plate . add the oil to the skillet, brussels sprouts, shallots and garlic and cook on medium high until golden on the edges, 4 5 minutes . set aside with the sausage . add the parsnip noodles to the skillet over medium heat with the broth and red pepper flakes and cook until the noodles are al dente, about 5 minutes . return the sausage and brussels to the skillet, add the cheese and stir to combine.

name: skirt steak, baby bok choy and zucchini stir fry
description: this quick stir fry has some of my favorite foods skirt steak, baby bok choy and zucchini plus carrots, scallions, garlic and ginger finished with a delicious sauce that has the perfect balance of savory, sweet, sour and spicy.
ner: ponzu, low sodium soy sauce, oyster sauce, water, cornstarch, skirt steak, kosher salt and pepper to taste, chili sesame oil, garlic clove, minced ginger, scallions, small carrot, water chestnuts, red bell pepper, small, head baby bok choy
ingredients: 1 tbsp ponzu, 1/2 tbsp low sodium soy sauce, 1/2 tbsp oyster sauce, 1/2 tbsp water, 1/2 tsp cornstarch, 1/2 lb skirt steak, 1/8 tsp kosher salt and pepper to taste, 1/2 tsp chili sesame oil, 1 garlic clove, 1/2 tbsp minced ginger, 2 scallions, 1 small carrot, 1/2 cup water chestnuts, 1/2 red bell pepper, 1 small, 1 head baby bok choy
steps: whisk together ponzu, soy sauce, oyster sauce and cornstarch and set aside . pat steak dry and season with salt and pepper . heat wok or large skillet over very high heat . when hot, add half of the steak so the meat gets a good sear and cook, tossing occasionally until browned on all sides, about 2 minutes total . transfer to a plate, repeat with the remaining meat set aside . reduce the heat to medium high, add the oil, scallion whites, garlic, ginger, carrots, water chestnuts, and red pepper to the wok and toss frequently until beginning to soften, about 2 minutes . add baby bok choy and zucchini and cook for an additional 2 minutes until the leaves turn bright green . return the steak back to wok and pour the sauce mixture . bring to a boil and allow to cook through and reduce, about 1 to 2 minutes more . garnish with scallion greens and serve.

name: shrimp, peas and rice
description: i love this quick and easy shrimp, peas and rice dish, which can be made with white or brown rice.
ner: unsalted butter, low sodium chicken broth, frozen peas, uncooked converted brown rice, olive oil, peeled and deveined shrimp, grated pecorino romano cheese, chopped parsley
ingredients: 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, 2 cups low sodium chicken broth, 1/2 cup frozen peas, 1 cup uncooked converted brown rice, 4 teaspoons olive oil, 1 1/4 pounds peeled and deveined shrimp, 2 tbsp grated pecorino romano cheese, 1 tbsp chopped parsley
steps: in a large heavy skillet melt the butter over medium heat . add the rice and saute about 2 3 minutes . add the chicken broth and peas and bring to a boil . when just about all the liquid is absorbed just skimming the top of the rice, cover and reduce heat to low . cook, covered on low heat 20 minutes, until rice is cooked through . shut off and let stand covered 5 minutes . meanwhile, in second large skillet, heat 2 teaspoons of the olive oil over medium heat until hot . season shrimp with salt and pepper and add to hot skillet . cook about 2 3 minutes, until the shrimp is opaque and cooked through . remove shrimp from pan and set aside . add the 2 remaining teaspoons of olive oil to the skillet on high heat and add the cooked rice, shrimp, grated cheese and parsley and saute another minute or two to slightly crisp, mixing well.

name: houston's couscous
description: this easy and fresh couscous is so easy and tasty, and it goes with just about everything . you can serve it with fish, chicken, beef, lamb, or pork, or you can serve it as a meat free and light main dish.
ner: reduced sodium chicken or vegetable broth, dry whole wheat couscous, roughly chopped radishes, scallions, chopped fresh italian parsley, raisins, grape tomatoes, sliced almonds, chopped fresh mint, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups reduced sodium chicken or vegetable broth, 1 cup dry whole wheat couscous, 3/4 cup roughly chopped radishes, 2 scallions, 3 tablespoons chopped fresh italian parsley, 1/2 cup raisins, 12 grape tomatoes, 1/3 cup sliced almonds, 3 tablespoons chopped fresh mint, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper
steps: in a small saucepan, bring chicken broth to a simmer . add the couscous and cook gently until the broth is absorbed, approximately 3 minutes . remove from heat, fluff with a fork and transfer to large bowl . to the bowl, add the radishes, scallions, parsley, raisins, tomatoes, almonds, mint, lemon juice and olive oil and toss to coat . season with salt and pepper, gently toss again, taste and adjust the flavorings and seasonings as desired, and serve.

name: bacon roasted brussels sprouts
description: anyone who isn't a fan of brussels sprouts simply hasn't tried them roasted with bacon dare we say this side dish is better than french fries the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: brussels sprouts, olive oil, garlic powder, salt, black pepper, bacon
ingredients: 1.5 pound brussels sprouts, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 0.2 teaspoon garlic powder, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon black pepper, 3.0 strip bacon
steps: preheat the oven to 375degf . line a large baking sheet with parchment paper . trim the ends from the brussels sprouts, cut in half, and place in a large mixing bowl . drizzle with olive oil and season with salt, garlic powder, and black pepper, to taste . dice the bacon into 1/4 inch pieces and place in a large skillet . set the skillet over medium high heat . fry the bacon, stirring frequently with a rubber spatula, just until it begins to render some fat, about 2 3 minutes . the bacon should still be very undercooked . transfer the bacon and fat to the bowl of brussels sprouts . toss the brussels sprouts and bacon until the oil is evenly distributed . transfer to the parchment lined baking sheet . roast the brussels sprouts and bacon on the middle rack of oven for 15 minutes . open the oven and stir with a rubber spatula . continue roasting until the brussels sprouts are tender and slightly charred, and the bacon is browned and crisp, 10 15 minutes . check to see that dish is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . serve immediately.

name: shawarma spice blend
description: shawarma spice blend with coriander seed, mccormick allspice, ground, mccormick cinnamon, ground, mccormick cumin ground, mccormick ginger, turmeric, mccormick black pepper

steps: mix all spices until well blended . store in tightly covered jar in cool, dry place.

steps: kodet skaeres fri for sener og skaeres i mundvenlige stykker . grontsagerne renses og skaeres ogsa i mundvenlige stykker, sa de er klar til at komme i gryden, nar det er tid . kom lidt fedtstof i en gryde og brun bacon ganske let . kom derefter morbradkodet i og steg til det lige er brunet . kom hakkede tomater i sammen med salt, peber, tomatpure og gulerodder . mens retten simrer ved lav varme steges champignongerne . nar de er faerdigstegt kommes de i gryden sammen med det andet . nar retten har simret i 30 40 minutter kommes floden i . retten jaevnes hvorefter cocktailpolser tilsaettes . lad retten komme op og koge inden den serveres.

name: caramelized spiced citrus turkey
description: caramelized spiced citrus turkey with honeysuckle white fresh frozen young turkey, onion, kosher salt, ground black pepper, butter, apple, orange, lemon, onion, fresh sage, figs, baking apples, oranges, orange juice, cinnamon, salt, brown sugar, butter
ner: honeysuckle white fresh frozen young turkey, onion, kosher salt, ground black pepper, butter, apple, orange, lemon, onion, fresh sage, figs, baking apples, oranges, orange juice, cinnamon, salt, brown sugar, butter
ingredients: 1.0 honeysuckle white fresh frozen young turkey, 1.0 onion, 2.0 tablespoon kosher salt, 1.0 tablespoon ground black pepper, 3.0 tablespoon butter, 1.0 apple, 1.0 orange, 1.0 lemon, 1.0 onion, 6.0 sprig fresh sage, 4.0 figs, 3.0 baking apples, 3.0 oranges, 0.3 cup orange juice, 0.5 teaspoon cinnamon, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.2 cup brown sugar, 2.0 tablespoon butter
steps: preheat oven to 325 f . cooking time will vary by size of bird, so check roasting times here . remove the turkey from the bag . remove giblet package underneath the neck skin area as well as the neck from the body cavity . place turkey, breast side up, in a shallow roasting pan . pat the outside and inside of the turkey dry with paper towels . combine salt and black pepper in a small bowl . season the inside of the turkey with about 1/3 of the salt mixture . fold wing tips under the bird . place the apple, orange and lemon slices, onion, and 2 sprigs of each sage in the main turkey cavity for aromatics and garnish only . tie the legs together to hold the shape of the turkey . melt butter in small saucepan over medium heat until the edges begin to turn golden, about 2 minutes . brush outside of the turkey completely with the melted butter . season with remaining 2/3 of the salt mixture and place in oven for the recommended roasting time . if the turkey becomes golden brown before it is fully cooked, cover with a loose tent of aluminum foil to prevent over browning . cut a hole in the foil to view the pop up timer . for an optimal eating experience, turkey is done when the pop up timer has popped and a meat thermometer registers at 170degf, in the deepest part of the breast and thickest part of the inner thigh . remove the turkey from the oven and allow to rest for 20 30 minutes before slicing . garnish serving dish with caramelized apples and oranges, sage sprigs and fig slices . caramelized apples and oranges heat oven to 375 f . in a large bowl, toss together the apples, oranges, orange juice, cinnamon, salt, and brown sugar . mound the apple mixture in baking pan or casserole and scatter the butter over the top . bake for 30 minutes, then take out and toss with a large spoon to coat and place back in the oven for another 30 minutes . after taking it out of the oven, carefully stir and let dish rest roughly 10 minutes before serving . garnish your turkey serving dish with this appetizing side or serve in a separate dish.

name: pumpkin chai holiday cupcakes
description: pumpkin chai holiday cupcakes with boiling water, tea bags, all purpose flour, dark brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, ground cinnamon, kosher salt, unsalted butter, large eggs, pumpkin puree, plain nonfat greek yogurt, vanilla extract, egg whites, granulated sugar, unsalted butter, chinese five spice powder, ground ginger, ground black pepper, pumpkins, vermicelli
ner: boiling water, tea bags, all purpose flour, dark brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, ground cinnamon, kosher salt, unsalted butter, large eggs, pumpkin puree, plain nonfat greek yogurt, vanilla extract, egg whites, granulated sugar, unsalted butter, chinese five spice powder, ground ginger, ground black pepper, pumpkins, vermicelli
ingredients: 1.0 cup boiling water, 2.0 tea bags, 2.5 cup all purpose flour, 1.5 cup dark brown sugar, 4.0 teaspoon baking powder, 2.0 teaspoon baking soda, 1.0 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 0.5 teaspoon kosher salt, 12.0 tablespoon unsalted butter, 2.0 large eggs, 1.5 cup pumpkin puree, 0.5 cup plain nonfat greek yogurt, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 3.0 egg whites, 1.0 cup granulated sugar, 1.0 cup unsalted butter, 0.5 teaspoon chinese five spice powder, 0.5 teaspoon ground ginger, 0.2 teaspoon ground black pepper, pumpkins, vermicelli
steps: place the water in a kitchenaid pro line series electric kettle, and bring to a boil . pour the boiling water over the tea bags, and allow them to steep for at least 10 minutes, or as long as overnight . lightly mist a kitchenaid professional grade nonstick muffin pan with non stick spray, and preheat the oven to 350 degrees f . place the flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in the bowl of the kitchenaid stand mixer, and mix on low speed to combine . add in the butter, and stir on low speed until the mixture resembles damp sand . stir in the eggs one at a time, scraping the bottom and sides of the bowl with a silicone spatula after each addition . add the brewed tea, pumpkin puree, greek yogurt, and vanillla, and mix until incorporated . scrape the bottom and sides of the bowl with a silicone spatula, and mix for about 90 seconds more, to aerate the batter and develop the cake's structure . fill the kitchenaid muffin pan no more than 2/3 full and bake for 15 minutes, or until a bamboo skewer inserted in the thickest part of the cake comes out clean . cool completely, then frost and decorate . for chai buttercream place the egg whites and sugar in the bowl of the kitchenaid stand mixer . place over a pot of simmering water . cook, whisking occasionally, until the mixture no longer feels gritty when rubbed between the thumb and forefinger . remove the egg white mixture from the heat, and whip on medium high speed using the whip attachment until there is no hint of warmth remaining, and the meringue holds stiff peaks . add the butter, a tablespoon at a time, while continuing to whip on medium high speed . stir in the five spice powder, ginger, and black pepper until completely incorporated . if the buttercream seems runny, place the bowl in the refrigerator for 10 20 minutes, then whip again until fluffy and stiff.

name: almond ricotta pound cake with strawberry rhubarb compote
description: a lovely springtime dessert delicate almond scented ricotta pound cake with strawberry rhubarb compote from heather christo's generous table.
ner: blanched skinless slivered almonds, butter, softened, ricotta cheese, sugar, almond extract, eggs, all purpose flour, baking soda, salt, nonstick cooking oil spray, lightly sweetened freshly whipped cream, fresh mint sprigs for garnish, unsalted butter, rhubarb sliced into 1/2 inch pieces, strawberries, stemmed and thinly sliced, sugar
ingredients: 1/2 cup blanched skinless slivered almonds, 3/4 cup butter, softened, 1 cup ricotta cheese, 1 1/2 cups sugar, 2 tsp almond extract, 3 large eggs, 1 1/2 cups all purpose flour, 1 tsp baking soda, 1/2 tsp salt, nonstick cooking oil spray, lightly sweetened freshly whipped cream, fresh mint sprigs for garnish, 2 tbsp unsalted butter, 1 cup rhubarb sliced into 1/2 inch pieces, 2 cups strawberries, stemmed and thinly sliced, 1/2 cup sugar
steps: preheat oven to 325 degrees f . spray a 9x5 inch loaf pan with nonstick cooking oil spray . put the almonds into the bowl of a food processor and pulse till ground to a coarse flour . set aside . use a hand mixer or standing mixer to cream together the butter, ricotta and sugar until fluffy . add the almond extract and eggs . mix till well combined, scraping the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula as needed . in a separate bowl sift together the flour, ground almonds, baking soda and salt . some grains of almond might be too big too sift... stir those into the sifted mixture with a fork or spoon . add dry ingredients to the wet and beat with the mixer until well combined . pour batter into the greased loaf pan and bake for 1 hour 15 minutes until the top is golden and the center is set test with a toothpick for doneness . start checking the top of the cake periodically after 30 minutes if it is browning faster than it's baking, tent it with foil until it's finished baking.remove the cake from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack until you can comfortably turn the cake out onto a platter or cutting board . slice the cake and serve warm with strawberry rhubarb compote and lightly sweetened, freshly whipped cream . garnish with a sprig of mint if desired.

name: lime seared skirt steak with avo pico
description: lime seared skirt steak with avo pico with, , , , , , , ,
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: heat grill to high heat season one side of skirt steak with kosher salt place seasoned side down on the grill pan and cook for 1 minute squeeze half lime juice on upper side of steak and cook for one minute rotate steak 90 degrees squeeze another half lime over top side and cook for another minute turn steak and repeat prepare avo pico by by combining all remaining ingredients

name: simple new york style cheesecake
description: here's fluffy, light, and perfect cheesecake, done the new york way . plan ahead for this one for best results, this cheesecake needs at least 6 hours to chill after baking . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: butter, honey graham crackers, light brown sugar, cinnamon, salt, unsalted butter, brick style cream cheese, granulated sugar, sour cream, vanilla extract, salt, eggs
ingredients: butter, 8.0 ounce honey graham crackers, 0.2 cup light brown sugar, 0.2 teaspoon cinnamon, 0.1 teaspoon salt, 0.5 cup unsalted butter, 2.0 pound brick style cream cheese, 1.1 cup granulated sugar, 0.5 cup sour cream, 1.0 tablespoon vanilla extract, 0.1 teaspoon salt, 4.0 eggs
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . lightly grease the sides of a 9 inch spring form pan with softened butter . cut a circle of parchment paper to fit the bottom of the pan . lay the circle on the bottom of the spring form pan . create four sheets of aluminum foil approximately 18 inches long each . lay one sheet of foil over another to create a cross . make another foil cross with the remaining two sheets, and position it at an angle over the first cross, creating a jagged circle . place the spring form pan in the center of the foil circle . pull the edges of the foil up the sides of the pan and tightly secure on the top edges of the pan . pack the foil closely against the sides of the pan . place the graham crackers in the bowl of a food processor or high powered blender . pulse into fine crumbs . add the brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt to the graham cracker crumbs . pulse the mixture a few more times to combine . transfer the crumb mixture to a mixing bowl . place the butter in a microwave safe bowl . microwave on high until melted, 45 60 seconds . pour the melted butter over the graham cracker crumbs . use a large fork to mix until the crumbs are evenly moistened and hold together when pinched . carefully turn the graham cracker crumb mixture into the spring form pan . using a tamper or the bottom of a heavy glass, tightly pack the crumbs into the base of the pan, creating an even crust . bake the crust on the middle rack of oven until the edges just begin to brown, 9 11 minutes . when the crust is done, remove from the oven and set aside to cool . reduce the oven temperature to 350degf . place the cream cheese and sugar into a stand mixer bowl or large bowl . beat with on medium high speed, scraping down the sides of the bowl periodically, for 5 minutes, until the mixture is completely smooth and no lumps remain . add the sour cream, vanilla extract, and salt to the bowl . continue to beat on medium high speed until the sour cream is fully incorporated into the cream cheese, 1 2 minutes . use a rubber spatula to scrape down the sides of the bowl . add the eggs one at a time, mixing on the lowest speed just until no yellow streaks remain . the batter should be ivory colored and the consistency of yogurt . pour the batter into the cooled graham cracker crust . lightly tap the spring form pan on a counter top 4 5 times to release any air bubbles . place the spring form pan inside a large roasting pan . carefully fill the roasting pan with water until it reaches about 3/4 inch up the sides of the spring form pan . bake the cheesecake on middle rack of oven until the edges are firm, and the center is still slightly wobbly when shaken, 75 90 minutes . do not open the oven door while it bakes . check to see that the cheesecake is done . add time as needed, and when done, turn off the oven and crack the door open 1 2 inches . allow the cheesecake to rest in the oven for 1 hour . refrigerate the cheesecake for a minimum of 6 hours, preferably overnight . to unmold the cheesecake, carefully run a butter knife around the inside edges of the pan . undo the clasp and slowly remove the sides in an upward motion . slice and serve . leftover cheesecake can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for 3 days, or frozen for up to 2 months.

name: thanksgiving roasted turkey with stuffing
description: a classic roasted turkey filled with savory homemade bread stuffing . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: turkey, salt, black pepper, butter, olive oil, day old bread, onion, celery, garlic, butter, dried thyme, dried rosemary, dried sage, salt, black pepper, egg white, chicken broth, chicken broth
ingredients: 1.0 whole turkey, 1.5 tablespoon salt, black pepper, 0.2 cup butter, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, 6.0 ounce day old bread, 0.5 onion, 1.0 stalk celery, 2.0 clove garlic, 2.0 tablespoon butter, 1.0 teaspoon dried thyme, 1.0 teaspoon dried rosemary, 1.0 teaspoon dried sage, 0.5 teaspoon salt, black pepper, 1.0 egg white, 1.2 cup chicken broth, 2.0 cup chicken broth
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . adjust a rack to the lowest position in the oven . line a roasting pan with aluminum foil and position a roasting rack inside of it . liberally season the turkey with salt and black pepper, taking care to season the outside as well as the internal cavity . set the turkey breast side up onto the roasting rack and tuck the wing tips underneath the body . in a small bowl, stir softened butter and olive oil together until mostly combined . it is okay if some pieces of butter are still visible . with clean hands, rub the butter and olive oil all over the surface of the turkey, and under the breast skin . cut the bread into 1/2 inch cubes and place in a large mixing bowl . finely dice the onion and celery . mince the garlic cloves . set a large skillet over medium heat and melt the butter . add the onion and celery and saute, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are soft and translucent, 5 7 minutes . add the garlic and dried herbs to the skillet and saute until fragrant, about 30 seconds longer . transfer the cooked vegetables to the bowl of bread cubes . season with salt and black pepper . in a large mixing bowl, whisk together the egg white and chicken broth . pour the broth over the bread cubes . fold with a rubber spatula until the bread is evenly moistened and holds together slightly when pinched . using a spoon and clean hands, fill the cavity of the turkey with stuffing, taking care to not pack it too tightly . there may be some stuffing left unused . pro tip avoid over stuffing your turkey this will allow for the stuffing to be properly cooked, as well as give it room to expand in the turkey's internal cavity . add chicken broth to the roasting pan, then loosely cover the turkey breast with foil to retain moisture and prevent skin from burning . roast the turkey on lowest rack of oven until the thickest part of the breast or leg reaches an internal temperature of 165degf, 2 1/2 4 hours, depending on its weight . rotate the pan halfway through the cook time, and remove the foil from the turkey after 2 hours . check to see that turkey is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the turkey to rest on the roasting rack for 30 minutes . transfer the turkey to a cutting board . carve as desired, and serve.

name: homemade vanilla bean marshmallows
description: what can be better than warming up to a hot cup of cocoa on a chilly night topped with homemade vanilla bean marshmallows cut out in the shape of a snowflake
ner: packets unflavored gelatin, cold water, granulated sugar, light agave syrup, kosher salt, vanilla extract, vanilla bean, confectioners' sugar
ingredients: 3 packets unflavored gelatin, 1 cup cold water, 1 1/2 cups granulated sugar, 1 cup light agave syrup, 1/4 tsp kosher salt, 1 tbsp vanilla extract, 1 vanilla bean, 2 tbsp confectioners' sugar
steps: combine the gelatin and 1/2 cup of cold water in a small bowl let it sit while you make the syrup . meanwhile, combine the sugar, agave, salt, and 1/2 cup water in a medium sized saucepan and cook over medium heat until the sugar dissolves . raise the heat to high and, using caution not to boil over, cook until the syrup reaches 240 degrees on a candy thermometer careful it doesn't boil over, this will be hot . remove from the heat . add the gelatin mixture and scraped vanilla bean into the bowl of your stand mixer . with the mixer on low speed, slowly pour the hot sugar syrup into the dissolved gelatin . please be careful not to burn yourself with the hot syrup, do not let the kids do this, you can get third degree burns if the hot syrup touches your skin . set the mixer to high speed and whip until the mixture expands and is very thick, about 17 minutes . this can be messy so if you have the protective lid attachment that came with your kitchenaid, you might want to use that . add the vanilla extract towards the end of the mixing . with a sieve, generously dust the bottom of a 12 x 17 jelly roll pan or large glass baking dish with confectioners' sugar . this is probably the most important step, skipping this step, the marshmallows will stick to the pan and never come off . pour the marshmallow mixture into the pan, smooth and dust with more confectioners' sugar . let the marshmallows sit uncovered overnight until they dry out . use a cookie cutter to make pretty marshmallow shapes or turn the marshmallows onto a board sprinkled with confectioners' sugar and cut them into squares . dust with more confectioners' sugar to prevent sticking.

name: noten carbonara met raddichio
description: noten carbonara met raddichio with penne, walnoten, raddichio, melk, room, knorr mix voor macaroni carbonara
ner: penne, walnoten, raddichio, melk, room, knorr mix voor macaroni carbonara
ingredients: 300.0 gram penne, 75.0 gram walnoten, 0.5 raddichio, 400.0 milliliter melk, 100.0 milliliter room, 1.0 bag knorr mix voor macaroni carbonara
steps: kook de penne zoals aangegeven op de verpakking . hak de walnoten grof en snijd de raddichio in reepjes . giet de melk en de room in een pan en voeg de inhoud van het zakje knorr mix toe . breng de saus al roerend aan de kook met de walnoten en raddichio en laat alles 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken . serveer de pasta met de saus.

name: swiss chard frittata
description: light swiss chard frittata at first bite you'll love the sweet caramelized onions, in combination with the savory flavors from the swiss chard, eggs and cheese.
ner: large eggs, large egg whites, grated swiss cheese, bunch, large white onion, light butter, salt and fresh pepper to taste
ingredients: 4 large eggs, 4 large egg whites, 1/4 cup grated swiss cheese, 1/2 bunch, 1 large white onion, 2 tsp light butter, salt and fresh pepper to taste
steps: preheat oven to 400deg . in a medium bowl combine eggs, egg whites, cheese and a pinch of salt and pepper . set aside . separate the stems from the leaves of the chard . dice the stem into small pieces . roll the leaves up and slice into thin ribbons, about an 1/8 inch thick . heat a 10 inch skillet on low heat melt half of the butter and add the onions with a pinch of salt and pepper . slowly cook the onions, stirring occasionally until the onions become translucent, about 8 10 minutes . bring the heat up to medium and cook until the onions caramelize . set the onions aside . increase the heat to medium high, add remaining butter and add the chard stems . cook about 3 4 minutes . add the chard leaves to the pan and cook until wilted, about 2 3 minutes . season with salt and pepper . reduce heat to low pour egg mixture into the skillet and add caramelized onions, salt and pepper and mix well to blend . reduce heat to low and cook until the edges set, about 6 8 minutes . once the bottom and edges set, place in the oven and bake until completely set through, about 4 5 minutes . remove from the oven and place a dish over the pan flip onto the plate . cut into wedges and serve.

name: chickpea kale and fire roasted tomato soup
description: one pot meal recipe for healthy, hearty soup with garbanzo beans, kale, fire roasted tomatoes, fennel and leeks.
ner: extra virgin olive oil, onion, fennel, leek, salt, chickpeas, fire roasted, diced tomatoes, water, vegetable stock, smoked paprika, granulated garlic, turmeric, dried oregano, crushed red pepper, black pepper, kale
ingredients: 2 tsbp extra virgin olive oil, 1 large onion, 1 bulb fennel, 1 leek leek, 1 1/2 tsp salt, 3 1/2 cups chickpeas, 1 3/4 cups fire roasted, diced tomatoes, 1 1/4 cups water, 2 cups vegetable stock, 4 tsp smoked paprika, 2 tsp granulated garlic, 2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp dried oregano, 1/2 tsp crushed red pepper, 1/4 tsp black pepper, 1 bunch kale
steps: heat the olive oil in a large saucepot over medium high heat . add the onion, fennel, leek and salt . cook until soft and translucent . add remaining ingredients, except for the kale . bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer and let cook for 15 20 minutes, uncovered, until soup reduces and thickens and the flavor is more pronounced . stir in kale . once it is wilted and warm the soup is ready to serve . taste and adjust seasonings as desired more red pepper for heat, and more salt if desired.

name: hutspot met notenkorstje en rosbieflapjes
description: hutspot met notenkorstje en rosbieflapjes with ongezouten gemengde noten, aardappelen, vloeibare margarine, groenten, kerriepoeder, knorr bouillonketeltje kip, paneermeel, bieflapjes, rundvlees
ner: ongezouten gemengde noten, aardappelen, vloeibare margarine, groenten, kerriepoeder, knorr bouillonketeltje kip, paneermeel, bieflapjes, rundvlees
ingredients: 120.0 gram ongezouten gemengde noten, 1.0 kilogram aardappelen, 7.0 tablespoon vloeibare margarine, 750.0 gram groenten, 2.0 tablespoon kerriepoeder, 2.0 deciliter knorr bouillonketeltje kip, 2.0 tablespoon paneermeel, 500.0 gram bieflapjes, 1.0 bag rundvlees
steps: hak de noten fijn . schil de aardappelen en snijd ze in stukken . verhit 2 kneepjes vloeibare margarine in een pan . wacht tot de grote bellen verdwenen zijn en bak dan de hutspotgroenten met de kerrie op laag vuur tot de uien lichtbruin en zacht zijn . voeg de knorr bouillonketeltje kip toe en laat de groenten afgedekt ongeveer 20 minuten zachtjes stoven . kook intussen de aardappelen gaar in water met zout . verwarm de oven voor tot 250 degc heteluchtoven 230 degc . vet een ovenschaal in . giet de aardappelen af en stamp ze met de hutspotgroenten en bouillon tot een smeuige hutspot . schep deze in de ovenschaal . meng de noten met het paneermeel, strooi dit over de hutspot en verdeel er wat vloeibare margarine over . zet de schotel ongeveer 10 minuten in de oven, tot de hutspot een goudbruin korstje heeft . bereid de jus volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . verwarm, terwijl de hutspot in de oven staat, 3 eetlepels vloeibare margarine in een pan en bak hierin de rosbieflapjes kort 30 seconden aan beide kanten . schep de hutspot op borden . leg op elk bord 2 rosbieflapjes en schenk de knorr authentieke rundvleesjus erover.

name: bottom of the box crushed cracker pork
description: bottom of the box crushed cracker pork with pork tenderloin, egg, steak sauce, garlic powder, cheese crackers, vegetable oil
ner: pork tenderloin, egg, steak sauce, garlic powder, cheese crackers, vegetable oil
ingredients: 1.0 pound pork tenderloin, 1.0 egg, 1.0 tablespoon steak sauce, 1.0 teaspoon garlic powder, 1.0 cup cheese crackers, 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil
steps: combine egg, steak sauce and garlic powder in a shallow dish . place crushed crackers in another shallow dish . cut tenderloin crosswise into 1/2 inch thick slices . pound or flatten slices with the heal of your hand to 1/4 inch thickness . dip each slice first into egg mixture, then cracker crumbs, turning to coat . heat one tablespoon of oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat until hot . add half of pork slices and cook 4 to 5 minutes per side or until browned . repeat with remaining oil and pork slices or use 2 skillets at one time .

name: mediterranean cod packets
description: food network magazine
ner: yukon gold potatoes, onion, garlic, evoo, red pepper flakes, kosher salt, cod fillets, lemon juice, freshly ground pepper, chopped fresh thyme, pitted kalamata olives, cherry tomatoes, unsalted butter, chopped fresh chives
ingredients: 1.0 pound yukon gold potatoes, 1.0 onion, 1.0 clove garlic, 3.0 tablespoon evoo, 0.2 teaspoon red pepper flakes, kosher salt, 4.0 cod fillets, 2.0 tablespoon lemon juice, freshly ground pepper, 1.0 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme, 0.2 cup pitted kalamata olives, 15.0 ounce cherry tomatoes, 2.0 tablespoon unsalted butter, 1.0 tablespoon chopped fresh chives
steps: toss the potatoes, onion, and garlic with 1 tbsp evoo, red pepper flakes, and 1/4 tsp salt in a bowl . put the cod on a plate drizzle with lemon juice and season with salt, pepper and thyme . preheat oven to 425f . tear off four 16" sheets of parchment paper . make the packets arrange about 1/4 potato mixture on one sheet of parchment top with cod fillet and about 1/4 each olives and tomatoes drizzle with some liquid from the can . drizzle with 1/2 tbsp oil . seal as directed . repeat to make 3 more packets divide between 2 baking sheets . transfer to oven and bake until parchment puffs and the liquid is bubbling, about 25 minutes . let rest 5 minutes before opening . meanwhile, mix the butter, chives, lemon zest and a pinch of salt in a small bowl . carefully open packets top with the chive butter.

name: mary poppins chocolate zodiac cake
description: a recipe for chocolate zodiac cake from a little known cookbook written by p.l . travers mary poppins in the kitchen a cookbook with a story.
ner: semi sweet chocolate, egg, all purpose flour, milk, sugar, ground nuts, butter, baking powder, vanilla extract, salt, silver sprinkles optional, powdered sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, butter, room temperature, cream cheese, room temperature, milk, vanilla extract, salt
ingredients: 2 squares semi sweet chocolate, 1 large egg, 1 1/2 cups all purpose flour, 3/4 cup milk, 3/4 cup sugar, 1/2 cup ground nuts, 4 tbsp butter, 2 tsp baking powder, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1/4 tsp salt, silver sprinkles optional, 2 1/2 cups powdered sugar, 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 5 tbsp butter, room temperature, 4 oz cream cheese, room temperature, 3 1/2 4 tbsp milk, 1 tsp vanilla extract, pinch salt
steps: preheat the oven to 375 degrees f . grease the cake pan with butter and flour it . shake out the excess flour . you can also use non stick cooking spray if you'd prefer.melt the chocolate in a small bowl standing in hot water . this can also be done in the microwave by heating the chocolate in 15 second intervals, stirring in between . sift together the flour, baking powder and salt and set aside . in a stand mixer fit with the paddle attachment, beat together the butter and sugar till well combined.add the egg yolk and beat harder . add the melted chocolate and ground nuts and mix until just combined.stir the vanilla into the milk . add some of the flour mixture to the chocolate mixture . pour in some of the milk mixture, a little more flour and then some more milk, till both have been used up . beat very thoroughly . beat very thoroughly . in a separate mixing bowl, beat the egg white till stiff . fold gently into the batter . pour batter into prepared pan . bake for 25 30 minutes, or until a cake tester inserted into the center comes out clean . do not overbake or it will become dry . to make chocolate frosting in a medium bowl, sift together the confectioners' sugar and cocoa, set aside . in a standing mixer fit with the paddle attachment, cream butter until smooth, then beat in the cream cheese . blend in vanilla . gradually beat in sugar mixture alternately with milk, starting with 3 1/2 tbsp of milk . beat until light, fluffy and spreadable . if necessary, adjust consistency with more milk or sugar i usually use about 4 tbsp milk .once your cake has had time to cool, you can frost it . start by placing the frosting onto the center of the cake and spreading evenly outward using a spatula or butter knife . once your cake has been frosted, it's time to decorate mary poppins decorates this cake with silver stars . i did this by using a star cookie cutter and some silver sprinkles . set the cookie cutter onto the frosting, wherever you'd like . then fill in by spooning in the sprinkles with a small measuring spoon . gently lift the cookie cutter away and you'll be left with a perfect silver star shape . decorate your cake with as many stars as you'd like.

name: chicken and chorizo gumbo
description: chicken and chorizo gumbo with boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, bertolli classico olive oil, sweet italian sausage links, cut into, onion, green bell pepper, celery, crushed red pepper flakes, bertolli vidalia onion with roasted garlic sauce, chicken broth
ner: boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, bertolli classico olive oil, sweet italian sausage links, cut into, onion, green bell pepper, celery, crushed red pepper flakes, bertolli vidalia onion with roasted garlic sauce, chicken broth
ingredients: 1.0 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, 1.0 tablespoon bertolli classico olive oil, 0.5 pound sweet italian sausage links, cut into, 1.0 cup onion, 1.0 green bell pepper, 1.0 celery, 0.2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 1.0 jar bertolli vidalia onion with roasted garlic sauce, 0.2 cup chicken broth
steps: season chicken, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper . heat olive oil in 12 inch nonstick skillet over medium high heat and brown chicken and sausage, stirring occasionally, 6 minutes . remove chicken mixture from skillet and set aside . cook onion, green pepper, celery and red pepper flakes in same skillet, stirring occasionally, 6 minutes or until vegetables are tender . stir in sauce and broth . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low, then return chicken mixture to skillet . simmer covered, stirring occasionally, 4 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked and sausage is done . serve, if desired, over hot cooked pasta or rice.

name: chili
description: chili with ground turkey, black beans, pinto beans, crushed tomatoes, corn, onion soup mix, chili, minced garlic, chicken broth
ner: ground turkey, black beans, pinto beans, crushed tomatoes, corn, onion soup mix, chili, minced garlic, chicken broth
ingredients: 1.0 ground turkey, 1.0 can black beans, 1.0 can pinto beans, 1.0 can crushed tomatoes, 1.0 can corn, 1.0 packet onion soup mix, 1.0 packet chili, 1.0 tablespoon minced garlic, 0.5 cup chicken broth
steps: brown ground turkey on stove . throw everything in the crock pot and cook on high for 4 hrs.

name: freezer peach pie kit
description: a peach pie you can freeze until ready to make.
ner: peach, lemon juice, sugar, flour, cinnamon, allspice, all purpose flour, vegetable shortening, sugar, salt, vinegar, eggs, water
ingredients: 8.0 cup peach, 1.0 tablespoon lemon juice, 0.8 cup sugar, 2.0 tablespoon flour, 1.0 teaspoon cinnamon, 0.5 teaspoon allspice, 5.0 pound all purpose flour, 3.0 pound vegetable shortening, 4.0 tablespoon sugar, 2.0 tablespoon salt, 4.0 tablespoon vinegar, 4.0 eggs, 2.0 cup water
steps: combine all the ingredients in a large bowl . divide the peaches among the number of indicated freezer bags . label and freeze . in a large bowl, combine the flour don't forget to hold back 2 cups, sugar and salt . with a fork or pastry cutter, combine the shortening with the flour mixture . in a separate bowl i use the empty shortening container to minimize dirty dishes, beat vinegar, eggs and water . add the liquid mixture to the flour mixture and blend with a fork until all ingredients are moistened . continue to blend using hands and fold dough into a ball . cover and chill at least 15 minutes . divide dough into about 20 balls . each ball should be enough to make a crust . to freeze, wrap dough balls in plastic wrap, then store in a freezer bag indefinitely . serving day directions drain a majority of the excess water from the thawed peaches . place in a prepared pie crust or in a 13x9 pan with cobbler topping . bake according to favorite pie recipe.

name: aspergeschotel uit de oven
description: aspergeschotel uit de oven with knorr saus voor asperges, bieslook, asperges, schouderham, eieren, paneermeel, kaas, boter, bieslook
ner: knorr saus voor asperges, bieslook, asperges, schouderham, eieren, paneermeel, kaas, boter, bieslook
ingredients: 1.0 bag knorr saus voor asperges, 0.5 bunch bieslook, 1.0 kilogram asperges, 200.0 gram schouderham, 3.0 eieren, 75.0 gram paneermeel, 75.0 gram kaas, 100.0 gram boter, bieslook
steps: verwarm de oven voor op 200oc . maak de aspergesaus volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . snij of hak de bieslook fijn . kook de asperges 10 minuten in water met een klein beetje zout en giet ze daarna af . snijd de hardgekookte eieren in blokjes . wikkel de ham om de asperges en leg ze in een ovenschaal . roer de bieslook door de saus, verdeel deze over de asperges en strooi hier de eiblokjes over . meng paneermeel met kaas en strooi dit mengsel over de asperges . snij de overgebleven boter in kleine blokjes en verdeel deze over de schaal . bak de aspergeschotel 15 20 min . boven in de hete oven goudbruin . garneer met wat bieslook.

name: easy microwave salmon
description: i got this recipe from http //savorysweetlife.com/, you might wanna check out the website.
ner: salmon filet, salt, pepper, mayonnaise, sriracha sauce, lemon slices, parsley
ingredients: 1.0 salmon filet, salt, pepper, 2.0 tablespoon mayonnaise, 2.0 tablespoon sriracha sauce, 3.0 lemon slices, 1.0 tablespoon parsley
steps: rinse salmon filet with cold water and pat dry . place the salmon skin side down in a microwave save container season the salmon with salt and pepper . set aside . in a small bowl, combine mayonnaise and sriracha sauce generously spread the mayonnaise mixture on top of the fillet . add lemon slices and parsley . cover the dish tightly with microwave safe plastic wrap . microwave the fish for 3.5 minutes . check the center of the filet for doneness with a fork . if there is any uncooked fish, microwave for another 30 45 seconds . garnish with additional parsley and lemon wedges.

name: gua bao taiwanese braised pork in sliced buns
description: gua bao taiwanese braised pork in sliced buns with water, white sugar, salt, olive oil, high gluten flour, powdered milk, baking powder, active dry yeast, pork belly, garlic, spring onions, fresh ginger, red chili peppers, chinese spice, rice wine, soy sauce, water, brown sugar, hard boiled eggs, buns, pork belly, peanut powder, mustard greens, fresh coriander
ner: water, white sugar, salt, olive oil, high gluten flour, powdered milk, baking powder, active dry yeast, pork belly, garlic, spring onions, fresh ginger, red chili peppers, chinese spice, rice wine, soy sauce, water, brown sugar, hard boiled eggs, buns, pork belly, peanut powder, mustard greens, fresh coriander
ingredients: 1.0 cup water, 40.0 gram white sugar, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 500.0 gram high gluten flour, 1.0 tablespoon powdered milk, 1.0 teaspoon baking powder, 2.5 teaspoon active dry yeast, 600.0 gram pork belly, 3.0 clove garlic, 1.0 bunch spring onions, 5.0 slice fresh ginger, 2.0 red chili peppers, 1.0 chinese spice, 50.0 rice wine, 0.8 cup soy sauce, 4.0 cup water, 0.3 cup brown sugar, hard boiled eggs, buns, pork belly, peanut powder, mustard greens, fresh coriander
steps: 1. for bread machine place all ingredients in the listed order into your bread machine . set the mode to "knead and rise" this took around 1 hour and 20 minutes on my bread machine . 2. if kneading by hand, you can also place all ingredients in the listed order into a big bowl and knead for 15 20 minutes until the dough forms a smooth ball . put the dough in a bowl, cover and let rise in a warm place for 1 hour, or until doubled in size . 3. remove the dough and separate it into 50 gram pieces around 14 . 4. form the dough into a ball and with a rolling pin, roll it out into a long oval shape . 5. lightly brush one surface with vegetable oil and fold the dough in half . place the dough on cut out baking paper or a cheesecloth to prevent sticking . let it rise for another 30 minutes, covered, in a warm place . 6. when the dough has risen after 30 minutes, place them inside the metal or bamboo cooking steamers that you are using . make sure they do not touch, about 1 inch away from each other . 7. turn on the stove to high heat until the water starts boiling . 8. once the water has boiled, turn down to medium heat and steam for 10 minutes . 1. to help the pork maintain its shape during braising, pan sear the sliced pork in a saucepan on medium heat, for about 1 minute on each side . i pan seared the pork without adding any oil, but you can add about 1 tablespoon of olive oil if you'd like . 2. in a medium pot, make the braising sauce by adding garlic, onions/spring onions, ginger, chili peppers, chinese spice bag, rice wine, soy sauce, water, and brown sugar . add in the pork belly and eggs optional and bring to a boil over high heat . 3. once it starts boiling, turn down to low heat and let it simmer and braise for 1.5 2 hours . feel free to adjust the sauce to your liking but remember that the sauce will thicken as it cooks so don't go too crazy with the seasoning

name: guacamole, a fan favorite for every gathering
description: guacamole is a favorite dip for almost any gathering . it's a flexible recipe that can be made with spices and flavors your crowd enjoys.
ner: avocados, fresh tomatoes
ingredients: 4.0 avocados, 3.0 fresh tomatoes
steps: place the cut up avocado into a ziploc baggie

name: edamame with parmesan cheese
description: edamame is used as an appetizer in the asian cuisine often . but have you every tried edamame with parmesan cheese this recipe is packed with flavor and still provides the essential nutrients need to get your body through the day . you will love this edamame with parmesan cheese recipe . let us know about your experience in the comments below or give this edamame with parmesan cheese recipe a star rating so others can see.
ner: edamame, olive oil, parmesan cheese, salt, ground black pepper
ingredients: 16.0 ounce edamame, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 0.2 cup parmesan cheese, salt, ground black pepper
steps: preheat the oven to 200 degrees celsius . add the edamame beans to a bowl . add the oil and toss well . sprinkle the cheese on top and season with salt and black pepper . place the edamame on a large baking sheet which has been previously sprayed with oil . place the baking sheet into the oven and bake the edamame for 15 minutes . stir every 5 minutes . remove the edamame from the oven and serve immediately.

name: anne of green gables raspberry cordial
description: make traditional raspberry cordial from the anne of green gables book series by l.m . montgomery . recipe and step by step tutorial . non alcoholic.
ner: raspberries, fresh or frozen, fresh lemon juice, sugar, water
ingredients: 48 oz raspberries, fresh or frozen, 1/3 cup fresh lemon juice, 3 cups sugar, 12 cups water
steps: clean and rinse the raspberries, then place them in a very large bowl . pour the lemon juice over the berries . use a large spoon to stir the juice into the berries . on the stovetop, heat 12 cups of water and 3 cups of sugar to a boil . stir till the sugar dissolves . remove from heat . pour the boiling water over the raspberries . allow the water to cool for 1 2 hours to room temperature.cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a towel that you don't mind staining . place in the refrigerator to steep for 24 hours . pour the cordial through a fine mesh sieve to strain . push gently on the solids with the back of a spoon, if you wish, to extract more juice . this will produce a slightly cloudy effect in the cordial, which will settle at the bottom of the storage bottle, but it won't change the flavor . if you'd prefer a clearer cordial, do not press down on the solids just strain them . once you've strained the juice from the berries, you will find that the leftover berries are mushy and quite sweet . save them in the fridge, they are terrific served as a topping for ice cream . this recipe makes a large batch of cordial, which will store very well in the refrigerator if you use a clean gallon jug . you can easily halve the recipe if you don't need quite so much cordial . to serve, mix 1 part cordial with 1 part water or seltzer water . if you prefer a less sweet drink, dilute the cordial to taste . serve cold.

name: philadelphia new york cheesecake
description: our philadelphia new york cheesecake is a classic for a reason easy to make and lovely to look at, it's a guaranteed win in the dessert category.
ner: oreo cookies, butter, philadelphia cream cheese, sugar, flour, vanilla, knudsen sour cream, eggs, cherry pie filling
ingredients: 20.0 oreo cookies, 3.0 tablespoon butter, 5.0 package philadelphia cream cheese, 1.0 cup sugar, 3.0 tablespoon flour, 1.0 tablespoon vanilla, 1.0 cup knudsen sour cream, 4.0 eggs, 21.0 ounce cherry pie filling
steps: heat oven to 325of . line 13x9 inch pan with foil, with ends of foil extending over sides . mix crumbs and butter press onto bottom of pan . beat cream cheese, sugar, flour and vanilla with mixer until well blended . add sour cream mix well . add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each just until blended . pour over crust . bake 40 min . or until center is almost set . cool completely . refrigerate 4 hours . top with pie filling . use foil handles to lift cheesecake from pan before cutting to serve.

name: sweet and spicy maple sriracha baked chicken wings
description: partly sweet, partly spicy, these oven baked chicken wings are tossed in a glaze of maple syrup, brown sugar, and sriracha sauce that makes them simply addicting . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: chicken wings, nonstick cooking spray, salt, maple syrup, light brown sugar, sriracha style hot sauce
ingredients: 2.0 pound chicken wings, nonstick cooking spray, 1.5 teaspoon salt, 0.2 cup maple syrup, 0.2 cup light brown sugar, 2.0 tablespoon sriracha style hot sauce
steps: preheat the oven to 425degf . line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil and place a wire rack on top . cover the rack with another sheet of foil and spray with nonstick cooking spray . use a knife to poke holes all over the foil . pat the chicken wings dry with paper towels . season the chicken wings on both sides with salt . place the maple syrup, brown sugar, and sriracha in a large mixing bowl . whisk to combine . place the chicken wings in the bowl . using a rubber spatula, toss the wings to coat in the maple sriracha glaze . arrange the chicken wings on the foil covered wire rack . spoon any remaining maple sriracha glaze over the chicken wings . bake the chicken wings on middle rack of oven until browned and crisp, 45 50 minutes . check to see that chicken wings are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the chicken wings to cool on the roasting rack for 3 minutes . transfer to a plate and serve immediately.

name: tex mex turkey chili with black beans, corn and butternut squash
description: tex mex turkey chili with black beans, corn and butternut squash with butternut squash, mazola corn oil, ground turkey, diced onion, minced garlic, spice islands chili powder, spice islands ground cumin, mazola chicken flavor bouillon powder, black beans, mexi corn, crushed tomatoes, water, ketchup, avocado
ner: butternut squash, mazola corn oil, ground turkey, diced onion, minced garlic, spice islands chili powder, spice islands ground cumin, mazola chicken flavor bouillon powder, black beans, mexi corn, crushed tomatoes, water, ketchup, avocado
ingredients: 12.0 ounce butternut squash, 0.2 cup mazola corn oil, 1.0 pound ground turkey, 1.0 cup diced onion, 1.0 teaspoon minced garlic, 2.0 tablespoon spice islands chili powder, 1.0 tablespoon spice islands ground cumin, 1.0 tablespoon mazola chicken flavor bouillon powder, 15.0 ounce black beans, 11.0 ounce mexi corn, 28.0 ounce crushed tomatoes, 1.0 cup water, 0.3 cup ketchup, avocado
steps: microwave squash for 3 to 4 minutes, set aside . heat oil in large 4 to 6 quart saucepan over medium heat and add turkey . brown turkey for 5 to 7 minutes, breaking apart . add onions, garlic, chili powder, cumin and bouillon powder and cook for 3 to 5 minutes or until onions soften . stir in black beans, mexi corn, butternut squash, tomatoes, water and ketchup . bring to a boil reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes, or until squash is tender . to serve, ladle into bowls and top with desired garnishes.

name: crisp and salty fox nuts/lotus seeds
description: easy, crisp and low fat lotus seed snack
ner: rock salt, mango powder
ingredients: rock salt, 0.5 teaspoon mango powder
steps: heat ghee or oil in a pan . add lotus seeds and roast on low heat and keep stirring . roast for about 10 12 minutes till they become crisp . press a roasted seed to check, if it is roasted well then it will break into pieces, and if it still feel soft and chewy then roast for some more times . when roasted then add the spices and 1 tsp of ghee and mix well . let it cool down completely . store in air tight jar . serving suggestions serve as a snack with tea, coffee or any beverage

name: mid summer dream salad
description: mid summer dream salad with salad, strawberries, torn romaine lettuce leaves, carrots, finely chopped pecans, carrot, chopped pecans, edible flowers
ner: salad, strawberries, torn romaine lettuce leaves, carrots, finely chopped pecans, carrot, chopped pecans, edible flowers
ingredients: 40.0 spray salad, 1.0 cup strawberries, 4.0 cup torn romaine lettuce leaves, 2.0 carrots, 2.0 finely chopped pecans, 1.0 cup carrot, 1.0 cup chopped pecans, 1.0 cup edible flowers
steps: combine lettuce, kiwis, strawberries, cucumbers and carrot in large bowl . spritz with wish bone salad spritzers raspberry bliss vinaigrette dressing and toss to coat . top with pecans and flowers.

name: skinny pumpkin spice latte
description: for the pumpkin obsessed, a low fat, low calorie skinny pumpkin spice latte you can make yourself . october is my birthday month and one of my favorite treats this time of year is starbucks' pumpkin spiced latte . what a great way to start your morning
ner: fat free milk, pumpkin butter, vanilla extract, pumpkin pie spice, sugar or sugar substitute, of espresso, fat free whipped topping, pumpkin pie spice for topping
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups fat free milk, 2 tbsp pumpkin butter, 2 tsp vanilla extract, 1/2 tsp pumpkin pie spice, 2 tsp sugar or sugar substitute, 1/4 cup of espresso, fat free whipped topping, pumpkin pie spice for topping
steps: in a small pan combine milk, pumpkin butter and sugar and cook on medium heat, stirring, until boiling . remove from heat, stir in vanilla . using an immersion blender, blend until smooth or whisk well with a wire whisk pour into two mugs, add the hot espresso and top with fat free whipped cream and a dash of pumpkin pie spice on top.

name: homemade sushi bowl
description: this is the ultimate "sushi" for beginners we put it in quotes because, technically, this is sushi deconstructed and piled into a bowl . that means that if you're a sushi lover without a lot of kitchen skills, this is an excellent introduction making it at home . it has all the flavors and components of a classic sushi roll, without the tricky technique . that means you don't need a bamboo mat or a special rice cooker all you need is a saucepan and a few key ingredients to make a homemade sushi bowl . key ingredients even though you don't need a bamboo sushi mat for this kind of sushi making, there are some specialty items you may not be able to find at a regular grocery store most notably, nori sheets . nori is just a dried seaweed sheet the green wrapper that holds the raw fish and sticky rice together in a sushi roll . some grocery stores stock them, but if your store doesn't, you can find them at japanese markets and most other asian markets along with sushi rice, sushi grade fish, and other ingredients like sesame seeds to make your own sushi . mixing up flavors of course, not everyone likes the same types of sushi . you can make sushi bowls using ingredients in this recipe or ones that make up your favorite sushi rolls california roll one of the most popular rolls at japanese restaurants, a california roll includes cucumber, crab meat, and avocado . philadelphia roll a philly roll is made with smoked salmon, cream cheese, and cucumber . spicy tuna roll a spicy tuna roll comes with fresh tuna in the center, topped with spicy mayo . dragon roll a dragon roll is made with shrimp tempura, cucumber, and avocado . avocado roll an avocado roll is one of the most popular vegetarian rolls . it usually contains avocado, cucumber, and carrots . ready to roll when you have all your ingredients laid out, all you do is layer the sticky, flavored short grain rice with nori seaweed and then top it with a combination of sliced avocado, sliced cucumber, fresh raw fish, sauteed mushrooms, garlic, and tofu . seasoned with a sweet and salty rice vinegar sauce, this makes a filling yet light meal . whether you want an easy weeknight meal, or you're looking for a fun dinner for your self care sunday, this recipe is a fast and easy way to get your sushi fix in the comfort of your own home.
ner: short grain rice, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, olive oil, mushrooms, shrimp, garlic clove, tofu, fish, avocado, cucumber, seaweed, soy sauce, ground ginger, sesame seeds
ingredients: 1.0 cup short grain rice, 8.0 tablespoon rice vinegar, 4.0 tablespoon sugar, 2.0 tablespoon salt, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 6.0 mushrooms, 6.0 shrimp, 1.0 garlic clove, 3.0 ounce tofu, 7.0 ounce fish, 1.0 avocado, 0.5 cucumber, 1.0 seaweed, 1.0 teaspoon soy sauce, ground ginger, sesame seeds
steps: place the rice in a bowl with water and stir occasionally for 2 minutes . strain the rice, put the rice back into the bowl with fresh water, and repeat the process 7 times . place the rinsed, drained rice in a saucepan with 1 1/2 cups water . cover and cook for 5 minutes over medium heat . reduce the heat to low and cook for 10 minutes . remove the pan from the heat and let the rice sit in the covered pan for 15 minutes . mix the rice vinegar, sugar, and salt in a small saucepan and heat it on low heat until the sugar and salt have dissolved . remove from heat and let cool . spread the rice out in a shallow baking dish . add half the rice vinegar sauce, and stir . once mixed, fan air over the rice so it cools off and obtains a sticky texture . heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat . when the oil starts to shimmer, add the mushrooms, garlic, tofu, and shrimp, and cook until they turn a golden brown color . cut the fish, avocado, and cucumber into thin slices . place rice at the bottom of 2 bowls, add nori seaweed on top, cover it with more rice, and add the tofu mixture, fish, cucumber, avocado, soy sauce, and ginger, and serve with the remaining rice vinegar sauce.

name: sea bass baked in salt
description: enjoy fish with a salty, spicy kick to it . using a mixture of olive oil, fried garlic, and cayenne peppers, this recipe is sure to please your special someone . the only thing that you need to do with the fish is to clean it, pack it in salt, and bake.
ner: sea bass, egg white, coarse salt, olive oil, garlic, cayenne peppers
ingredients: 1.0 kilogram sea bass, 1.0 egg white, 2.0 kilogram coarse salt, olive oil, garlic, cayenne peppers
steps: preheat the oven to 220c . clean the sea bass, but leave the scales and head on . mix the egg white and the salt, this way removing the salt crust at the end will be easier . place a layer of salt on a baking pan, then place the sea bass on top . cover with salt and press down, but leave a thick layer on top . bake for 20 22 minutes . remove the crust and serve adding a drizzle of olive oil and fried garlic slices with a touch of cayenne peppers.

name: quick baked cod and cornbread
description: when cooking potatoes, it pays to boil them first to give them a head start before sauteeing, so the inside is nice and fluffy and the outside gets wonderfully crispy . here the potatoes are sauteed after being boiled along with cod until golden, and then transferred to a baking dish, sprinkled with breadcrumbs made from cornbread, and then baked to produce a crunchy topping . serve immediately accompanied by a mixed green salad.
ner: potatoes, cod, olive oil, garlic cloves, cornbread, dried parsley, paprika, salt
ingredients: 550.0 gram potatoes, 2.0 slice cod, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 2.0 garlic cloves, 1.0 slice cornbread, 1.0 tablespoon dried parsley, 1.0 teaspoon paprika, salt
