steps: scald milk add butter and water . cool to lukewarm . place 2 cups flour, sugar, salt, and yeast in mixer bowl . attach bowl and dough hook to mixer . turn to speed 2 and mix 15 seconds . gradually add warm liquid to bowl, mixing 1 minute . add egg and mix 1 minute longer . continuing on speed 2, add remaining flour, 1/2 cup at a time, until dough clings to hook and cleans sides of bowl . knead on speed 2 for 2 minutes longer . place in greased bowl, turning to grease top . cover let rise in warm place, free from draft, until doubled in bulk, about 1 hour . punch down dough and divide in half . roll each half to 9 inch circle . place one circle in bottom of greased 9 inch springform pan . cinnamon crumb filling mix all ingredients with fork until crumbly . 1 cup sugar, 3/4 cup all purpose flour, 2 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon and 6 tablespoons butter . sprinkle one quarter of cinnamon crumb filling over dough . arrange half the apple slices on filling sprinkle another quarter filling over apples . place remaining dough circle in pan and repeat layers with remaining apples and crumb mixture . cover let rise in warm place, free from draft, until doubled in bulk, about 1 hour . bake at 375degf for 45 to 50 minutes . remove sides of springform pan immediately and cool on wire rack.

name: zalmfilet met knoflook kappertjesmayonaise
description: de lekkerste zalmfilet met knoflook kappertjesmayonaise maak je zelf met dit zalige recept . de verrukkelijke mayonaise met knoflook en kappertjes komt ook uit eigen keuken.
ner: kappertjes, bieslook, citroen, zalmfilets, bertolli voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, knoflook, eidooier, mosterd, gin
ingredients: 3.0 tablespoon kappertjes, 2.0 tablespoon bieslook, 1.0 citroen, 500.0 gram zalmfilets, 3.0 tablespoon bertolli voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, 2.0 clove knoflook, 1.0 eidooier, 2.0 teaspoon mosterd, 250.0 milliliter gin
steps: hak de kappertjes en de bieslook fijn . pers de citroen uit . wrijf de zalmfilets in met zout en peper . verwarm op laag vuur 3 eetlepels olijfolie in een koekenpan . leg de zalmfilets erin en besprenkel ze met 2 eetlepels citroensap . leg een deksel op de pan en laat de zalm op matig hoog vuur in 8 tot 10 minuten bijna gaar worden . pers ondertussen de tenen knoflook boven een kom uit . voeg de eidooier, 1 eetlepel citroensap, de mosterd en wat zout en peper toe en klop alles met de handmixer op de middelste stand door elkaar . voeg dan al kloppend 250 ml extra vergine olijfolie toe, eerst druppelsgewijs, later in een dun straaltje . blijf kloppen tot een dikke mayonaise ontstaat . breng de mayonaise op smaak met zout en peper en roer de kappertjes en bieslook erdoor . leg de stukken zalm op vier borden en maal er wat peper boven . schep er 2 3 eetlepels mayonaise naast en serveer direct.

name: tim love's texas potato salad
description: tim love's texas potato salad with hellmann's mayonnaise dressing with olive oil, jalapeno chilies, sweet pickle, mustard, chives, baked potato, salt, pumpkin seeds
ner: hellmann's mayonnaise dressing with olive oil, jalapeno chilies, sweet pickle, mustard, chives, baked potato, salt, pumpkin seeds
ingredients: 0.5 cup hellmann's mayonnaise dressing with olive oil, 0.5 cup jalapeno chilies, 0.5 cup sweet pickle, 0.2 cup mustard, 0.5 cup chives, 4.0 baked potato, salt, 0.2 cup pumpkin seeds
steps: mix hellmann's mayonnaise dressing with olive oil, jalapenos, sweet pickles, mustard, and chives in large bowl . burst the potatoes and crumble apart . add them to the mayonnaise mixture . mix well and season with salt and pepper . top with the toasted pepitas and serve.

name: provencal twists with sundried tomato pesto
description: if you start your dinner off right with an appetizer or bread that everyone will love, then you are guaranteed to have a wonderful evening with loved ones . this recipe for provencal twists with sundried tomato pesto is rich, flavorful and decadent . the secret ingredient in this recipe is the aromatic and hearty spice mix called herbs de provence . those herbs with the sundried tomatoes are a match made in heaven.
ner: flour, parmesan cheese, herbs de provence, dry yeast, warm water, sundried tomato pesto, tomato paste, olive oil
ingredients: 250.0 gram flour, 20.0 gram parmesan cheese, 1.0 teaspoon herbs de provence, 5.0 gram dry yeast, warm water, 40.0 gram sundried tomato pesto, 10.0 gram tomato paste, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil
steps: with an electric mixer, combine all ingredients and knead for 3/4 minutes until smooth . cover and set aside for 30 minutes . roll out the dough to a thickness of 4 mm . sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese and tap with the rolling pin to make it stick to the dough . if the dough is too soft, put it in the freezer for 10 minutes to harden . cut into strips 10cm long and 0.5cm wide and twist them . place them on a baking sheet lined with parchement paper . cover and set aside for 1 hour . preheat oven to 430f . bake for 5 7 minutes, until golden.

name: eenhapspizzaatjes genovese met rode paprika
description: zalige mini pizzaatjes die in een hap weg zijn voor de liefhebber . de eenhapspizzaatjes met pesto genovese van bertolli smaken het best met rode paprika.
ner: boterhammen, paprika, salami, basilicum, bertolli pesto alla genovese, kaas, olijfolie
ingredients: 12.0 boterhammen, 1.0 paprika, 50.0 gram salami, 4.0 sprig basilicum, 4.0 tablespoon bertolli pesto alla genovese, 2.0 tablespoon kaas, 2.0 tablespoon olijfolie
steps: snijd met bijv . een glaasje kleine rondjes van ca . 4 cm o uit de witte boterhammen . maak de paprika schoon . snijd de paprika in kleine smalle repen . snijd de salami in kleine blokjes . bewaar de kleine blaadjes van de basilicum en snijd de grote in smalle repen . rooster de broodrondjes in een hete droge koeken pan aan een kant goudbruin . keer ze om, besmeer de gebakken kant van de boterhamrondjes royaal met bertolli pesto alla genovese en beleg ze met de reepjes paprika en de blokjes salami . bestrooi ze met wat kaas . bak tot de onderkant bruin en knapperig en de kaas gesmolten is . leg de pizzaatjes op een schaal, besprenkel ze met wat olijfolie en bestrooi met versgemalen peper en de reepjes en blaadjes basilicum.

name: pesto parmesan baked tomatoes
description: juicy, delicious roasted tomatoes topped with pesto and shredded parmesan cheese . so easy to make, only 3 ingredients
ner: medium tomatoes, basil pesto, shredded parmesan cheese
ingredients: 4 medium tomatoes, 4 teaspoons basil pesto, 5 tbsp shredded parmesan cheese
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . arrange the tomatoes on a baking tray and top each with 1/2 teaspoon pesto and 1/2 tablespoon of parmesan cheese . roast the tomatoes until the parmesan cheese is slightly browned and melted, about 18 20 minutes . remove from the oven and serve immediately.

name: mashed potato
description: mashed potato with potatoes, onion, butter, cheese
ner: potatoes, onion, butter, cheese
ingredients: potatoes, onion, 2.0 tablespoon butter, cheese
steps: boil your potatoes mash with 2 tbsp of butter then mix in onion and cheese optional

name: caramel apple filling
description: how to make caramel apple filling for cookies and pastries . this aromatic creamy and fruity filling is delectable . sweetened with dulce de leche . perfect for hamantaschen purim cookies, kolache, or any pastry.
ner: granny smith apples, sugar, dulce de leche click for recipe, salt to taste
ingredients: 1 1/2 lbs granny smith apples, 3/4 cup sugar, 1/3 cup dulce de leche click for recipe, salt to taste
steps: before you begin this recipe, you'll need to make a batch of dulce de leche click for recipe . the process is very easy, but it takes about 90 minutes . to save time, you can make it ahead and store it in the refrigerator till you're ready to begin . peel and core the apples . shred them into fine shreds using a hand grater or food processor shredding attachment . in a medium saucepan, combine the sugar and 3/4 cup of water . bring to a boil . add the shredded apples to the boiling water and return to a boil . reduce heat to medium and let the mixture simmer for 25 35 minutes, stirring occasionally, till most of the liquid evaporates and the mixture resembles a very thick applesauce . when the mixture is ready, it will start to sizzle lightly in the pan and clump together when you stir it . don't let the mixture burn, but do let it get quite thick . stir in the dulce de leche add salt to taste . the salt adds depth and gives the flavor of a salted caramel . it also offsets the sweetness a bit . note that the filling is quite sweet on its own it may initially taste "too sweet", but it bakes to perfection when used for filling hamantaschen . let the mixture cool . refrigerate mixture for at least 1 hour before using it to fill hamantaschen this will thicken it and make it easier to manage when filling.use filling with your favorite hamantaschen dough . use about 1 tsp of filling per cookie . for dough recipe suggestions, see blog above.

name: roasted brussels sprouts and cauliflower soup
description: creamy, dairy free and dee lish thanks to roasting the vegetables which adds so much flavor and depth topped with more roasted vegetables for texture, it's both filling yet light.
ner: canola cooking spray, cauliflower florets, brussels sprouts, olive oil, butter, chopped shallots, vegetable broth, kosher salt, black pepper
ingredients: canola cooking spray, 16 oz cauliflower florets, 16 oz brussels sprouts, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 teaspoon butter, 1/2 cup chopped shallots, 3 1/2 cups vegetable broth, 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt, black pepper
steps: preheat oven to 450f . line a large baking sheet with foil and spray with oil . place the cauliflower and the brussels cut side down on the baking sheet, drizzle with oil and roast on the bottom third of the oven 25 minutes, tossing half way until slightly browned . meanwhile, melt the butter in a large sauce pan over low heat and add shallots . cook until translucent, about 5 minutes . add the salt and broth and simmer for 5 minutes . shut the oven off, reserve about 1 generous cup of the roasted vegetables and keep warm on the baking sheet . transfer the rest to the pot and simmer 2 minutes . transfer in two batches to the blender and blend until smooth . serve in 4 bowls topped with the roasted vegetables and fresh black pepper, to taste . serve immediately.

name: sweet and spicy pecans
description: warning these nuts are highly addictive and may be consumed in excess . be sure to tuck some away so you have them for salads as well as for snacking and serving to guests . the nuts keep in the pantry for about three weeks or can be frozen for a few months . cayenne gives the nuts a feisty kick, so add more or less as you like . the recipe is a yummly original created by david bonom https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/david bonom .
ner: egg white, water, pecan halves, sugar, ground cumin, chili powder, cayenne, ground cinnamon, salt
ingredients: 1.0 egg white, 1.0 tablespoon water, 1.0 pound pecan halves, 0.7 cup sugar, 1.0 teaspoon ground cumin, 1.0 teaspoon chili powder, 0.5 teaspoon cayenne, 0.2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1.0 teaspoon salt
steps: preheat oven to 275degf . whisk egg white and water in a large bowl until frothy . add pecans and toss to coat . whisk together sugar, cumin, chili powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, and salt in a second large bowl . add pecans and toss well to coat with spice mixture . transfer to a sheet pan and spread nuts in an even layer . bake pecans 15 minutes . stir nuts and smooth them back into a single layer . reduce oven temperature to 250degf . continue to bake until spice mixture is no longer tacky, 1 hour, stirring nuts every 15 minutes . check to see that pecans are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . let pecans cool completely before serving . they'll crisp up as they cool.

name: baked cauliflower "mac" and cheese
description: cheesy baked cauliflower "mac" and cheese is perfect when you're craving macaroni and cheese without the pasta it's lower in carbs and each bowl has a healthy amount of vegetables and protein
ner: chopped cauliflower florets, real california butter, olive oil, minced onion, flour, fat free real california milk, freshly grated real california sharp cheddar, salt
ingredients: 8 cups chopped cauliflower florets, 1 tbsp real california butter, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1/4 cup minced onion, 3 tbsp flour, 2 cups fat free real california milk, 7 ounces freshly grated real california sharp cheddar, 1/2 teaspoons salt
steps: preheat the oven to 400of . place 1 inch of water in a large pot with 1 teaspoon salt and bring to a boil . add the cauliflower and cook until tender crisp, 6 to 7 minutes . drain and set aside in a large bowl . heat butter and oil in a large saucepan over medium heat . add onions and cook about 2 minutes . stir in flour . reduce heat to low and cook, stirring continually 3 4 minutes, to cook out the flour . add the milk and continue whisking, raising heat to medium high until it comes to a boil and becomes smooth and thick, about 2 minutes stirring season with 1/2 teaspoon salt and black pepper . once it becomes thick, remove from heat completely onto another burner if possible . add the cheddar cheese, 1/4 cup at a time mixing well until cheese is all melted . stir in cooked cauliflower, then pour into a baking dish and bake until bubbly and golden, about 15 to 20 minutes . then broil 2 minutes, or until the top is slightly browned.

name: mama's best ever spaghetti and meatballs
description: mama's best ever spaghetti and meatballs with lean ground beef, italian seasoned dry bread crumbs, eggs, , spaghetti
ner: lean ground beef, italian seasoned dry bread crumbs, eggs, none, spaghetti
ingredients: 1.5 pound lean ground beef, 0.5 cup italian seasoned dry bread crumbs, 2.0 eggs, 1.0 jar none, 12.0 ounce spaghetti
steps: combine ground beef, bread crumbs, eggs and 1/2 cup pasta sauce in medium bowl shape into 18 meatballs . bring remaining pasta sauce to a boil over medium high heat in 12 inch skillet . gently stir in uncooked meatballs . reduce heat to low and simmer covered, stirring occasionally, 20 minutes or until meatballs are done . serve over hot spaghetti.

name: baked buffalo chicken tenders
description: these juicy buffalo chicken tenders are a spicy baked dish that people of any age can enjoy with homemade ranch dressing https //www.yummly.com/recipe/homemade ranch dressing 2650397, these super easy baked chicken dippers make a great main dish for a weeknight dinner or tailgating party for finger foods with a healthy slant.
ner: all purpose flour, cayenne pepper, paprika, garlic powder, salt, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, hot sauce
ingredients: 0.7 cup all purpose flour, 0.5 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 0.5 teaspoon paprika, 0.5 teaspoon garlic powder, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 3.0 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 0.5 cup butter, 0.5 cup hot sauce
steps: line baking dish or cookie sheet with aluminum foil, and spray it lightly with cooking spray . coat chicken tenders thoroughly in a mixture of the flour or panko breadcrumbs, cayenne, paprika, garlic powder, and salt . shake off excess flour or panko breadcrumbs . place chicken strips onto the prepared baking sheet . refrigerate for at least one hour . preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit 200 degrees celsius . whisk together the melted butter and hot sauce in a small bowl . dip the chicken tenders into the butter mixture and place them back on the baking sheet . bake chicken tenders until they are no longer pink in the center, and golden brown on the outside . it should take about 45 minutes . turn the chicken tenders over halfway during cooking so they cook evenly . serve immediately.

name: baked falafel
description: baked falafel with onion, garbanzo beans, parsley, garlic, ground cumin, ground coriander, salt, baking soda, flour, egg, olive oil
ner: onion, garbanzo beans, parsley, garlic, ground cumin, ground coriander, salt, baking soda, flour, egg, olive oil
ingredients: 0.2 cup onion, 15.0 ounce garbanzo beans, 0.2 cup parsley, 3.0 clove garlic, 1.0 teaspoon ground cumin, 0.2 teaspoon ground coriander, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon baking soda, 1.0 tablespoon flour, 1.0 egg, 2.0 teaspoon olive oil
steps: wrap onion in cloth and squeeze out as much moisture as possible place garbanzo beans, parsley, garlic, cumin, coriander, salt, and baking soda in food processor . process until mixture is coarsely pureed mix garbanzo bean mixture and onions . add in flour and egg . preheat oven to 400 shape into 8 small patties . heat oil in skillet, and place patties on skillet . cook each side about 3 minutes, until golden brown transfer skillet to oven, bake for 15 20 minutes

name: weeknight falafel
description: bhg
ner: garbanzo beans, shallot, garlic, flat leaf parsley, chili powder, kosher salt, ground black pepper, all purpose flour, lemon, plain yogurt, sliced cucumber, olive oil
ingredients: 30.0 ounce garbanzo beans, 1.0 shallot, 6.0 clove garlic, 1.0 cup flat leaf parsley, 2.0 teaspoon chili powder, 0.5 teaspoon kosher salt, 0.2 teaspoon ground black pepper, 0.3 cup all purpose flour, 1.0 lemon, 6.0 ounce plain yogurt, 0.5 cup sliced cucumber, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil
steps: in a food processor combine the beans, shallot, garlic, parsley, chili powder, salt, and pepper . cover and pulse until finely chopped . add flour cover and process until mixture just holds together . divide mixture into 12 equal sized balls . flatten each slightly . place on a plate cover and chill at least 30 minutes or overnight . meanwhile, remove 1 teaspoon zest from lemon . juice half of the lemon . cut remaining half into wedges . in a small bowl stir together the zest, juice, yogurt and cucumber . cover and chill until serving time . wrap and chill lemon wedges until serving time . heat oil in a very large skillet over medium heat . add chilled patties . cook for 8 minutes or until golden and heated through, turning once . serve with yogurt sauce and lemon wedges . from the test kitchen serve with toasted pita bread wedges and baby greens.

name: roasted beet salad with mint
description: salad made with roasted beets, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, cumin, sugar, salt and fresh chopped mint . healthy, vegan, gluten free, kosher
ner: roasted beets, skins removed learn how to roast beets here, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, sugar, cumin, salt or more to taste, fresh chopped mint
ingredients: 2 lbs roasted beets, skins removed learn how to roast beets here, 3 tbsp balsamic vinegar, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp sugar, 1/4 tsp cumin, 1/4 tsp salt or more to taste, 1/4 cup fresh chopped mint
steps: chop roasted beets into bite sized pieces and place them in a salad bowl . in a small bowl, whisk together vinegar, oil, sugar, cumin and salt . pour dressing over the beets, then add 3 tbsp minced mint . toss salad gently till beets are coated in the dressing and mint . sprinkle the last tablespoon of mint over the top of the salad . serve . this salad can be made ahead, but the mint must be added right before serving, otherwise the beet juices will turn the mint red . gluten free note if you are preparing this salad gluten free, make sure you use a gf balsamic vinegar most are but check the label to be safe .

name: tim love's grilled asparagus with citrus gremolata
description: tim love's grilled asparagus with citrus gremolata with hellmann's or best foods mayonnaise dressing with olive oil, olive oil, finely chopped garlic, shallot, lemon, white wine, lemon juice, bread crumbs, asparagus spears, peanut oil, kosher salt, cracked black pepper
ner: hellmann's or best foods mayonnaise dressing with olive oil, olive oil, finely chopped garlic, shallot, lemon, white wine, lemon juice, bread crumbs, asparagus spears, peanut oil, kosher salt, cracked black pepper
ingredients: 0.5 cup hellmann's or best foods mayonnaise dressing with olive oil, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 teaspoon finely chopped garlic, 2.0 tablespoon shallot, 1.0 lemon, 0.2 cup white wine, 0.2 cup lemon juice, 1.0 cup bread crumbs, 12.0 asparagus spears, 2.0 tablespoon peanut oil, kosher salt, cracked black pepper
steps: preheat grill to 450deg . heat olive oil in a small saute pan on the grill . just before the oil smokes add garlic, shallot, and lemon peel . saute slightly . add white wine and lemon juice and simmer for 1 minute . add bread crumbs and hellmann's or best foods mayonnaise dressing with olive oil and saute until golden brown . mix asparagus, peanut oil, salt and pepper . grill for 3 minutes, turning fairly frequently . place asparagus on a serving platter . sprinkle bread crumb mixture over the grilled asparagus and serve.

name: chili met kikkererwten
description: chili met kikkererwten with hamlappen, kipfilet, paprika, ui, knoflook, kikkererwten, margarine, knorr mix voor chili con carne, oregano, tomatenblokjes, uitjes
ner: hamlappen, kipfilet, paprika, ui, knoflook, kikkererwten, margarine, knorr mix voor chili con carne, oregano, tomatenblokjes, uitjes
ingredients: 150.0 gram hamlappen, 150.0 gram kipfilet, 1.0 paprika, 1.0 ui, 2.0 clove knoflook, 2.0 can kikkererwten, 25.0 gram margarine, 1.0 bag knorr mix voor chili con carne, 3.0 teaspoon oregano, 1.0 can tomatenblokjes, 2.0 uitjes
steps: snijd de hamlappen en de kipfilet in reepjes . verwijder de zaden van de paprika . snijd de paprika in reepjes, snipper de ui en hak de knoflook fijn . laat de kikkererwten uitlekken en spoel ze na met water . verhit de margarine en bak de varkensreepjes en de kipfilet goudbruin . bak al omscheppend de paprika, de ui en de knoflook mee . voeg 350 ml water, de inhoud van het zakje knorr mix en de oregano toe . breng de saus al roerend aan de kook . schep om met de tomatenblokjes en de kikkererwten . zet het vuur laag en laat alles 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken . strooi de lente ui over het gerecht.

name: apple cinnamon coffee cake
description: warm spiced apple studded coffee cake is an ideal autumn breakfast and brunch treat.
ner: nonstick cooking spray, unsalted butter, light brown sugar, vanilla extract, large eggs, sour cream, milk, cake flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, salt, granny smith apples, all purpose flour, light brown sugar, granulated sugar, cinnamon, salt, unsalted butter
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 0.5 cup unsalted butter, 0.8 cup light brown sugar, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.0 large eggs, 0.5 cup sour cream, 0.2 cup milk, 1.8 cup cake flour, 1.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 1.5 teaspoon cinnamon, 0.5 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 0.1 teaspoon ground cloves, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 2.0 granny smith apples, 1.0 cup all purpose flour, 0.5 cup light brown sugar, 2.0 tablespoon granulated sugar, 1.5 teaspoon cinnamon, 0.1 teaspoon salt, 0.3 cup unsalted butter
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray a 9 inch square pan liberally with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . place the butter, brown sugar, and vanilla in a large mixing bowl . use a hand mixer to cream the ingredients together on medium high speed until smooth, 1 2 minutes . add the eggs, sour cream, and milk, and continue beating until the mixture is light and fluffy, about 1 minute . sift the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, and salt into the bowl . mix on low speed, scraping down the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula as needed, until a smooth, thick batter forms . fold in the diced apples . pour the batter into the prepared pan and smooth it into an even layer . place the flour, brown sugar, granulated sugar, cinnamon, and salt in a large mixing bowl . stir with a fork to combine . drizzle the melted butter over the mixture and mix until large crumbs form . sprinkle the crumble evenly over the cake batter . bake the coffee cake on middle rack of oven until the topping is golden and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 35 45 minutes . check to see that the coffee cake is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the cake to cool in the pan for 15 20 minutes before serving . to store, cover tightly with aluminum foil or plastic wrap and keep at room temperature for 1 2 days, refrigerate for up to a week, or freeze for up to 2 3 months.

name: classic hummus
description: uses kitchenaid k150 blender https //www.kitchenaid.com/countertop appliances/blenders/blender products/p.k150 3 speed ice crushing blender.ksb1325pa.html .
ner: extra virgin olive oil, chickpeas, tahini, fresh lemon juice, minced garlic, sea salt, ground cumin
ingredients: 0.3 cup extra virgin olive oil, 1.0 can chickpeas, 3.0 tablespoon tahini, 3.0 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1.0 teaspoon minced garlic, 1.0 teaspoon sea salt, 0.2 teaspoon ground cumin
steps: throw the ingredients into your kitchenaid blender in the order listed . secure the lid, remove the center lid cap, and insert the tamper . blend on high for 30 to 60 seconds using the tamper to guide the ingredients through the blades until smooth and creamy . you may need to stop the machine and scrape down the sides of the container so that you don't get bits of chickpea and other ingredients in the hummus when you scrape the mixture out of the container . garnish with a drizzle of olive oil, and serve with chips, crackers, veggie sticks, or slathered on sandwiches or wraps.

name: oven beef barbacoa
description: this oven braised barbacoa has often been described as better than any restaurant's . try it for yourself to judge the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: yellow onion, garlic, lime, vegetable oil, boneless beef chuck roast, salt, ground black pepper, beef broth, hatch mild diced green chiles, chipotle peppers in adobo, light brown sugar, ground cumin, dried oregano, cinnamon
ingredients: 1.0 yellow onion, 4.0 clove garlic, 1.0 lime, 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1.0 boneless beef chuck roast, 2.0 tablespoon salt, 2.0 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1.0 cup beef broth, 1.0 can hatch mild diced green chiles, 3.0 chipotle peppers in adobo, 1.0 tablespoon light brown sugar, 2.0 teaspoon ground cumin, 1.0 teaspoon dried oregano, 0.1 teaspoon cinnamon
steps: preheat the oven to 275degf . cut the onion into 1 inch thick wedges . remove the garlic cloves from their skins and roughly chop . cut the lime in half . set a large dutch oven or oven safe pot over high heat and add the vegetable oil . pat the beef dry with paper towels, then place it on a large plate and coat on all sides with salt and pepper . add the beef to the pot . sear, without moving, until browned, 2 minutes . flip the beef and sear an additional 2 minutes on the opposite side . remove the roast from the pan and transfer to a large plate . squeeze the juice from the lime halves into the pot to deglaze the bottom . add the onions and garlic to the pot . pour the beef broth over the onions, and add the green chilis, chipotle peppers, brown sugar, cumin, oregano, and cinnamon . stir gently to distribute the spices in the broth . return the roast to the pan . remove the pot from the heat and cover . roast on middle rack of oven until the meat is extremely tender and easily shredded with a fork, and the internal temperature reaches 145degf, 3 1/2 4 hours . check to see that pot roast is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . transfer the pot roast to a large serving dish . shred the meat with two forks, and serve immediately.

name: pumpkin pie dip
description: everything you love about pumpkin pie, made into a light and fluffy dip . perfect for dipping apple wedges, graham crackers or gingersnaps.
ner: pumpkin puree, brown sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, 0 greek yogurt, truwhip, cut up apples
ingredients: 15 oz can pumpkin puree, 3/4 cup brown sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/8 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/8 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 6 oz 0 greek yogurt, 8 oz truwhip, cut up apples
steps: mix pumpkin with brown sugar, vanilla and spices, blend well . mix in yogurt . fold in truwhip and chill in refrigerator until ready to eat . to serve transfer to a serving dish or hollowed out pumpkin.

name: thai basil and pork pad kra pao moo phadkraephaahmuu s1 e1
description: thai basil and pork is probably one of my favorite thai dishes . there are just as many variations on the spelling of this dish kra pao, gra pao, krapow, grapow as there are on the dish itself . i have eaten this dish everywhere from upscale restaurants to the quick and messy street food hawkers found throughout thailand . but seriously, both siri and i have eaten this dish too many times to count . one of my joseph favorite experiences with pad kra pao moo was in 2003 at a tiny street food vendor nestled up against lumpinee boxing stadium in bangkok, thailand . the ground pork was slightly crispy on the outside yet soft and moist on the inside, the scent of fresh basil put an instant smile on my face, and the heat from the spicy thai peppers quickly turned that smile into into tears . siri has been recreating that version of pad kra pao moo for me ever since.
ner: cooking oil, fish sauce, oyster sauce, soy sauce, sugar, garlic cloves, red peppers, string beans, ground pork, basil, salt
ingredients: 3.0 teaspoon cooking oil, 2.0 teaspoon fish sauce, 2.0 teaspoon oyster sauce, 2.0 teaspoon soy sauce, 1.0 teaspoon sugar, 3.0 garlic cloves, 4.0 red peppers, 6.0 string beans, 1.0 pound ground pork, 1.0 handful basil, 1.0 pinch salt
steps: start this dish by adding oil to the pan and heating it until it is nice and hot . once the oil is hot, add the crushed garlic and hot peppers . stir them around constantly until the garlic just starts to change colors . if your oil is hot enough, this should not take long, only about 20 30 seconds or so . once your garlic has started changing color, add the ground pork and stir constantly until the ground pork has browned . be prepared to add the next series of ingredients quickly as everything comes together at this stage . add the cut green beans, soy sauce, fish sauce, oyster sauce, salt and sugar, and stir constantly mixing them all together . do not add the basil here, it will be added at the end, as overcooked basil will lose its wonderful flavor and smell . stir until everything is well mixed and the ground pork has started to caramelize . this should not take long at all . add the last ingredient, basil stir it in for about 30 seconds or so, until the leafs are soft, but not shriveled . pad kra pao moo is served on a bed of rice, usually jasmine rice or white rice, but use whatever type of rice, or alternate to rice that you enjoy the most . this dish is traditionally served with a fried egg.

name: blood orange, beet and hazelnut winter salad
description: blood orange, beet and hazelnut winter salad with salad greens, blood orange, beets, hazelnuts, goat cheese, blood orange zest, blood orange juice, extra virgin olive oil, shallots, dijon mustard, kosher salt, pepper
ner: salad greens, blood orange, beets, hazelnuts, goat cheese, blood orange zest, blood orange juice, extra virgin olive oil, shallots, dijon mustard, kosher salt, pepper
ingredients: 5.0 ounce salad greens, 1.0 blood orange, 1.0 cup beets, 0.5 cup hazelnuts, 0.5 ounce goat cheese, 0.5 teaspoon blood orange zest, 0.5 cup blood orange juice, 0.5 cup extra virgin olive oil, 2.0 tablespoon shallots, 1.0 tablespoon dijon mustard, kosher salt, pepper
steps: preheat oven to 350degf . spread the hazelnuts onto a kitchenaid professional grade nonstick half sheet pan in a single layer . toast for 10 15 minutes, until lightly colored . allow to cool . while the hazelnuts are toasting, add the vinaigrette ingredients to the blender cup . using the kitchenaid 2 speed hand blender, blend ingredients until emulsified . toss the salad greens with a 1/4 cup of the blood orange vinaigrette and top with the sliced blood oranges, beets, hazelnuts and goat cheese . plate and serve with additional vinaigrette as desired . for a vegan salad, omit the goat cheese.

name: easy shrimp scampi
description: easy shrimp scampi with herb, large shrimp, olive oil, fresh parsley
ner: herb, large shrimp, olive oil, fresh parsley
ingredients: 0.5 cup herb, 1.0 pound large shrimp, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 2.0 tablespoon fresh parsley
steps: pour 1/4 cup of the marinade over shrimp in large resealable plastic bag or glass dish turn to coat well . refrigerate 15 minutes . remove shrimp from marinade . discard any remaining marinade . heat oil in large skillet on medium high heat . add shrimp cook and stir 4 minutes or just until shrimp turn pink . add remaining 1/4 cup marinade cook and stir 1 minute . sprinkle with parsley.

name: roasted herbed vegetables and pasta
description: roasted herbed vegetables and pasta with promise buttery spread, loosely packed fresh basil leaves, vegetables, farfalle, salt
ner: promise buttery spread, loosely packed fresh basil leaves, vegetables, farfalle, salt
ingredients: 0.3 cup promise buttery spread, 2.0 tablespoon loosely packed fresh basil leaves, 6.0 cup vegetables, 8.0 ounce farfalle, salt
steps: preheat oven to 450deg . blend 1/4 cup promise buttery spread with herbs in small bowl reserve . toss vegetables with remaining spread . arrange vegetables in broiler pan without the rack . roast, stirring once, 20 minutes or until vegetables are tender . toss vegetables with hot pasta and reserved spread mixture . season with salt and pepper . sprinkle, if desired, with grated parmesan cheese.

name: spinach and feta stuffed chicken breasts
description: these spinach and feta stuffed chicken breasts are an easy dinner chicken cutlets stuffed with spinach, feta, ricotta then breaded and baked to perfection
ner: cooking spray or oil mister, olive oil, medium onion, garlic, chopped scallions, package frozen chopped spinach, chopped parsley, fresh dill, 2.5 oz crumbled feta cheese, fat free ricotta, kosher salt and pepper, thin skinless chicken breast cutlets, large egg, water, whole wheat seasoned breadcrumbs
ingredients: cooking spray or oil mister, 1 tsp olive oil, 1/2 medium onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup chopped scallions, 10 oz package frozen chopped spinach, 1/4 cup chopped parsley, 1 tbsp fresh dill, 1/2 cup 2.5 oz crumbled feta cheese, 1/3 cup fat free ricotta, 1/4 tsp kosher salt and pepper, 8 thin skinless chicken breast cutlets, 1 large egg, 1 tbsp water, 1/2 cup whole wheat seasoned breadcrumbs
steps: preheat oven to 350degf . spray a large baking sheet with spray . heat the oil a medium skillet . add onions, garlic and scallions and saute about 1 minute, until fragrant . add spinach, parsley, dill, 1/4 tsp kosher salt and pepper and cook another minute or until heated through . remove from heat and mix in the feta and ricotta cheese . season chicken lightly with more kosher salt and pepper to taste . place about 1/4 cup of spinach mixture in the center of the chicken and roll, then lay the chicken seam side down on a platter or piece of wax paper . repeat with the remaining chicken . whisk the egg and water together in a small bowl with a pinch of salt . place the breadcrumbs in another bowl . dip the chicken rolls into the egg mixture, then into the breadcrumbs and place seam side down on the baking sheet . repeat with the remainder then lightly spray to top of the chicken with cooking spray . bake about 25 minutes or until cooked through.

name: crepes suzette met slagroomijs
description: een frans gerecht met grand marnier en cognac . dit recept flensjes in combinatie met het slagroom ijs laat het toetje op je tong smelten.
ner: sinaasappels, grand marnier, suiker, citroen, sinaasappelsap, cognac, flensjes, hertog romig slagroomijs
ingredients: 1.0 sinaasappels, grand marnier, 4.0 tablespoon suiker, 5.0 citroen, 250.0 milliliter sinaasappelsap, 1.0 dash cognac, 8.0 flensjes, 1.0 container hertog romig slagroomijs
steps: zet voordat je begint alles afgewogen, afgemeten en uitgeperst klaar . schil de sinaasappels, snijd ze in partjes en ontvel deze . laat al roerend de suiker op hoog vuur karamelliseren in een koekenpan . zet het vuur lager wanneer de suiker goed heet is en voeg het citroensap toe . blijf alles goed roeren en losmaken van de bodem . schenk er tenslotte het sinaasappelsap bij . zet het vuur weer hoog en roer tot de saus goed gemengd is . doe de flensjes erin en laat deze op temperatuur komen . zet het vuur weer wat lager en schenk de grand manier en de cognac erbij . schep als laatste de sinaasappelpartjes in de pan . flambeer met behulp van het gasvuur en draai daarna het vuur onder de pan uit . laat het gerecht iets afkoelen . leg steeds twee flensjes op een bord, schep er een bol hertog romig slagroomijs bij en garneer met wat saus . serveer direct.

name: pan roasted rib chops served on a bed of arugula with a cherry tomato salad
description: there are many do ahead tips that make this delightful entree easy to prepare . the dressing can be made one day ahead . remember to zest the lemon before making the dressing so you have zest ready to rub on the chops the chops can be coated with the flour, egg, and panko mixture up to 2 hours before serving . cover the prepared chops loosely with plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to cook . for the busy cook, a prepared, bottled vinaigrette can be used in place of making a homemade dressing.
ner: bone in ribeye rib pork chops, lemon, garlic, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, flour, large egg whites, panko breadcrumbs, olive oil, dijon mustard, kosher salt, black pepper, garlic, lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, italian parsley, arugula
ingredients: 4.0 bone in ribeye rib pork chops, 1.0 lemon, 2.0 clove garlic, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, 0.3 cup flour, 3.0 large egg whites, 1.5 cup panko breadcrumbs, 1.5 tablespoon olive oil, 0.5 teaspoon dijon mustard, 0.2 teaspoon kosher salt, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 clove garlic, 1.0 tablespoon lemon juice, 3.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 1.0 pint cherry tomatoes, 1.5 tablespoon italian parsley, 2.0 ounce arugula
steps: rub chops on each side with a little lemon zest and 2 cloves minced garlic . season with salt and pepper . arrange 3 dinner plates in a row . place flour on first plate, beaten egg whites on middle plate, and panko on third plate . have baking sheet next to panko . dredge pork chop in flour, shaking off excess . then coat with egg white, letting excess run off then place chop right into panko, coating all sides evenly . transfer to baking sheet . repeat with remaining chops . heat large, heavy non stick skillet over medium heat . add 1 1/2 tbs olive oil and swirl to coat pan . add chops to pan and brown on both sides until golden and cooked through, about 4 minutes per side . test for doneness using instant read thermometer meat is done when it registers 145 degrees fahrenheit, followed by a 3 minute rest time . while pork is cooking, make dressing . in small bowl, mix together mustard, salt, pepper, and 1 clove minced garlic to form paste . add lemon juice and 3 tbs olive oil and blend until combined . toss cherry tomatoes with dressing . add parsley and toss to combine . set aside . to serve, divide arugula among 4 dinner plates, set a chop on top of greens on each plate . give tomatoes another toss and divide among plates, scattering tomatoes over pork and greens . serve immediately.

name: honey balsamic grilled chicken and vegetables
description: grilled chicken breast, zucchini, red peppers and asparagus topped with a honey balsamic dressing this is so good, i know you'll be making this all summer and nothing beats an easy summer dish made entirely on the grill so you don't have to heat up your kitchen
ner: boneless, homemade pesto, crushed garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, juice from 1/2 lime, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, raw honey, kosher salt, asparagus, medium zucchini, red bell pepper, olive oil cooking spray
ingredients: 1 1/2 lbs boneless, 3 tbsp homemade pesto, 1 clove crushed garlic, 1/4 tsp crushed red pepper flakes, juice from 1/2 lime, 2 tbsp olive oil, 3 tbsp balsamic vinegar, 1 tbsp raw honey, kosher salt, 1 lb asparagus, 2 medium zucchini, 1 red bell pepper, olive oil cooking spray
steps: marinate chicken with pesto, garlic, red pepper flakes, lime juice and 1/2 teaspoon salt at least 1 hour, or overnight for best results . mix oil, balsamic vinegar, honey and 1/4 tsp salt in a small bowl . heat a grill over medium high, be sure grates are clean and well oiled to prevent sticking . put veggies on 1 large grill tray or 2 smaller trays or cook in batches, spray with olive oil, season with salt and pepper and cook, turning constantly until the edges are browned, about 6 to 8 minutes . set aside on a dish . cook the chicken about 4 to 5 minutes on each side, until grill marks appear and the chicken is cooked though, transfer to a platter, too with the veggies and pour the balsamic dressing over everything.

name: poppy seed filling for cookies, pastries and hamantaschen
description: scrumptious recipe for mohn poppy seed filling . can be used to fill hamantaschen, cookies, pastries, kolaches and more . thick, rich filling . kosher.
ner: whole unground poppy seeds, unsalted butter, milk, sugar, honey, salt, eggs, beaten
ingredients: 8 oz whole unground poppy seeds, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1 cup milk, 3/4 cup sugar, 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 tsp salt, 2 large eggs, beaten
steps: grind the poppy seeds in a coffee grinder in batches for about 15 20 seconds per batch, until they are ground soft and powdery . melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat . whisk in the milk, sugar, honey and salt read the salt note at the end of this recipe before adding . bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, till the sugar dissolves and the honey melts . pour about 1 cup of the hot liquid into a cup . immediately but gradually being drizzling the hot liquid into the beaten eggs . whisk briskly and constantly till all of the hot liquid is integrated into the eggs . do not pour too quickly, or you'll scramble your eggs . it should take about a minute to drizzle all of the liquid.slowly pour the heated, tempered egg mixture back into the hot liquid in the saucepan, whisking constantly . continue to whisk and cook for 3 5 more minutes over medium heat till the mixture thickens and turns light yellow . it is ready when it thickly coats the back of a spoon . remove the saucepan from heat . whisk the ground poppy seeds into the buttery liquid and stir well to blend all ingredients . allow filling to cool to room temperature before using . store in a tightly covered container in the refrigerator for 4 5 days . to make this filling parve dairy free, you will need to use a substitute for the milk and the butter . for the milk, i like sodelicious coconut creamer, which gives it a creamy, very faint coconut taste vegan, but produced on dairy equipment for those who are strictly kosher . you can also use regular coconut milk, rice milk, almond milk or soy milk as a sub.

name: french onion soup
description: french onion soup with promis activ butteri spread, onions, salt, ground black pepper, beef broth, madeira wine, french bread, gruyere cheese
ner: promis activ butteri spread, onions, salt, ground black pepper, beef broth, madeira wine, french bread, gruyere cheese
ingredients: 10.0 tablespoon promis activ butteri spread, 4.0 onions, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon ground black pepper, 58.0 ounce beef broth, 0.2 cup madeira wine, 10.0 ounce french bread, 10.0 tablespoon gruyere cheese
steps: in dutch oven or 6 quart saucepot, melt 8 tablespoons 1/2 cup promise activ buttery spread over medium heat and cook onions, salt and pepper, stirring occasionally, 35 minutes or until onions are very soft and golden . add broth and wine . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, 10 minutes . meanwhile, evenly spread bread slices with remaining 2 tablespoons spread, then top with cheese . toast until cheese is melted . to serve, ladle soup into serving bowls, then top with cheese toasts.

name: hot southern apple pie spice
description: hot southern apple pie spice with water, apple pie spice, sugar, coffee concentrate, creamer
ner: water, apple pie spice, sugar, coffee concentrate, creamer
ingredients: 0.8 cup water, 2.0 teaspoon apple pie spice, 1.0 teaspoon sugar, 0.3 cup coffee concentrate, 0.5 cup creamer
steps: in a small sauce pan over medium heat, add the water, apple pie spice, sugar and coffee . stir well to dissolve sugar and apple pie spice . bring to a boil for 2 3 min . remove from heat, add creamer, pour into a mug and serve.

name: quick chicken and broccoli stir fry
description: perfect for a modern cook stir fry is an ancient chinese cooking technique that is perfectly suited to a modern, over packed schedule . one of many great things about stir fries is their adaptability you can do wonders with odds and ends of ingredients, some asian and some not . and once you get the hang of the technique, you can improvise your own stir fries . cook time is key stir frying is a rapid cooking method that relies on high heat to sear and lock in flavor . this quick chicken and broccoli stir fry recipe is a great way to get started learning an exciting new way to cook . from here, you can create any number of short cuts . it's so easy that you'll want to include it on your permanent go to list of dinner recipes . chicken stir fry is fast, easy, and infinitely adaptable . what you'll need and what you don't woks are great, but don't let your lack of one stop you . you can conjure up a good pan asian stir fry in a large skillet . however, if you do find yourself making stir fries a regular part of your week in cooking, there are some real advantages to having a nice wok . the vessel's high, round sides allow you to toss your ingredients as they sizzle in the oil or are steamed to perfection . rice or noodles if you're really in a hurry, noodles can be cooked much more quickly than rice and folded into the stir fry, as they are here . most asian noodles such as brown rice noodles or soba noodles cook much faster than italian pasta, saving your time . your stir fry tool box stir fry is like jazz you make a lot of it up as you go along, but you know that there are certain phrases on which you can always rely . soy sauce, sesame oil as well as sesame seeds and other asian flavors enable you add many colors to your favorite ingredients . as for cooking oil, you'll want to use a vegetable oil with a high smoke point, such as canola, peanut if no one's allergic or grapeseed . olive oil even works here . chicken broth is useful for increasing flavor . fresh ginger and garlic can add zing to just about any stir fry, and a little bit of lemon or orange zest will also kick it into another dimension . what vegetables are good in stir fry broccoli is a winner, yes, but so is bell pepper, spicy red peppers, and green onions . for the sauce mixture, you can take the basic version here and add in hoisin sauce for sticky sweet flavor, rice vinegar for tang or oyster sauce for an umami kick . the art of stir fry there are two basic modes to stir fry . the first is high heat, a decent amount of oil and small batches . if you're using an iron cooking vessel, pre heat for at least 2 minutes on high heat to ensure the oil is hot enough to sear in the flavors . some stir fries might require that you cook ingredients separately and return them all to the pan at the end for final warming . a cautionary note when stir fry became popular in the 1970s, along with the fear of communism there was also a since revoked general paranoia about fat . because of this, many people got the idea that three drops of oil dripped around the rim of a wok is all you need . not true use as much oil as the recipe dictates which is not that much, really .
ner: boneless skinless chicken breasts, broccoli florets, garlic, brown rice noodles, soy sauce, sesame oil
ingredients: 1.0 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 2.0 cup broccoli florets, 2.0 clove garlic, 4.0 ounce brown rice noodles, 3.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 1.0 tablespoon sesame oil
steps: cook the brown rice noodles according to the directions on the packet . crush the garlic . thinly slice the chicken . pour the sesame oil into a non stick pan, and turn the stove on top medium heat . add the crushed garlic to the pan, and cook until golden brown . add the chicken to the pan, and brown all over . toss the broccoli florets into the pan . stir fry for a minute or so, then add the soy sauce . stir fry for another 2 3 minutes . add the brown rice noodles to the pan . fold the chicken and broccoli into the noodles . continue to cook the stir fry and noodles until all the ingredients are warmed through.

name: watermelon a la mode
description: watermelon a la mode with watermelon, pie, caramel ice cream topping, mini marshmallows
ner: watermelon, pie, caramel ice cream topping, mini marshmallows
ingredients: 4.0 wedge watermelon, 2.0 cup pie, 0.2 cup caramel ice cream topping, 0.2 cup mini marshmallows
steps: microwave caramel ice cream topping with marshmallows in microwave safe bowl at high 20 seconds stir until smooth . set aside . arrange watermelon on 4 dessert plates . evenly top with breyers grasshopper pie ice cream, then drizzle with marshmallow mixture . garnish, if desired, with blueberries and/or whipped cream.

name: puerto rican shrimp with creole sauce camarones a la criolla
description: creole sauce is a richly flavorful tomato based sauce that was introduced to puerto rican cuisine by the spanish . in this version, the sauce comes together easily with the help of fresh puerto rican sofrito https //www.yummly.com/recipe/puerto rican sofrito 9295226 and pantry staples . add some shrimp, and you have yourself a quick and delicious weeknight meal . for a fancier presentation, you could split and butterfly the shrimp before cooking, but that's totally optional . you could also substitute bite size chunks of firm fish such as cod or snapper for the shrimp . traditionally, creole sauce is served on top of mofongo, a garlicky fried mashed green plantain dish . but we also enjoy it with white rice and fried ripe plantains . the recipe is a yummly original created by reina gascon lopez https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/reina gascon lopez .
ner: extra virgin olive oil, sofrito, yellow onion, capers, kosher salt, black pepper, bay leaf, dried oregano, garlic powder, smoked paprika, crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, tomato paste, sazon seasoning, vegetable broth, cornstarch, cold water, large peeled and deveined raw shrimp, sugar, thinly sliced green onions, lime wedges, steamed rice, plantains
ingredients: 3.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 3.0 tablespoon sofrito, 1.0 yellow onion, 2.0 teaspoon capers, 1.0 teaspoon kosher salt, 1.0 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 bay leaf, 1.0 teaspoon dried oregano, 2.0 teaspoon garlic powder, 2.0 teaspoon smoked paprika, 1.0 can crushed tomatoes, 1.0 can tomato sauce, 2.0 tablespoon tomato paste, 1.0 tablespoon sazon seasoning, 3.0 cup vegetable broth, 1.0 tablespoon cornstarch, 0.2 cup cold water, 1.0 pound large peeled and deveined raw shrimp, 1.0 pinch sugar, thinly sliced green onions, lime wedges, steamed rice, plantains
steps: preheat a large pot such as a dutch oven over medium heat and add the olive oil . saute the sofrito until it's fragrant and toasty, 3 to 5 minutes . then add the sliced onion and capers and stir well . season with salt, black pepper, bay leaf, oregano, garlic powder, and smoked paprika . cook, stirring often and scraping the bottom of the pan, until the onion is slightly translucent, 5 to 7 minutes . then add the crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, and tomato paste and stir to blend . add the sazon and vegetable broth . bring the sauce to a boil then reduce heat to medium to medium low and cook at a low boil for about 15 minutes, stirring often . in a small bowl, combine the cornstarch and water . stir into the sauce to thicken it and cook, stirring, another 2 minutes . it should be the consistency of a gravy . fold in the shrimp and reduce the heat low . once the shrimp are no longer translucent and are pink and slightly firm, about 2 minutes, they're ready . taste and add some sugar if the creole sauce is a little acidic this will depend on the tomatoes themselves and personal preference . sprinkle the dish with green onions . serve immediately with lime wedges, steamed white rice, and fried plantains if you like.

name: spinach dip
description: spinach dip with mayonnaise, sour cream, frozen chopped spinach, mccormick dill weed, mccormick onion powder
ner: mayonnaise, sour cream, frozen chopped spinach, mccormick dill weed, mccormick onion powder
ingredients: 1.0 cup mayonnaise, 1.0 cup sour cream, 10.0 ounce frozen chopped spinach, 1.0 teaspoon mccormick dill weed, 0.1 teaspoon mccormick onion powder
steps: mix all ingredients in medium bowl until well blended . cover . refrigerate at least 1 hour to blend flavors . serve as a dip with assorted cut up vegetables or crackers.

name: chocolate macaroon bundt cake
description: chocolate macaroon bundt cake with cake, chocolate cake mix, instant chocolate pudding, eggs, egg yolks, water, canola oil, mayonnaise, macaroon, sweetened flaked coconut, egg whites, white sugar, all purpose flour, vanilla extract
ner: cake, chocolate cake mix, instant chocolate pudding, eggs, egg yolks, water, canola oil, mayonnaise, macaroon, sweetened flaked coconut, egg whites, white sugar, all purpose flour, vanilla extract
ingredients: cake, 1.0 package chocolate cake mix, 1.0 box instant chocolate pudding, 2.0 whole eggs, 2.0 egg yolks, 1.2 cup water, 0.3 cup canola oil, 1.0 tablespoon mayonnaise, macaroon, 2.0 sweetened flaked coconut, 2.0 egg whites, 0.5 cup white sugar, 2.0 tablespoon all purpose flour, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract
steps: 1. preheat oven to 350 degrees . grease and flour bundt cake pan . 2. beat egg whites until peaks form, gradually beat in sugar until stiff peaks form . fold in flour, coconut and vanilla . set aside . 3. combine cake mix, egg yolks, whole eggs, water, oil and mayonnaise in large bowl . beat with electric mixer on medium speed for 2 minutes . pour 1/3 of the batter in pan . spoon in coconut mixture and top with remaining batter . 4. bake for 45 50 minutes . let cool on wire rack for 15 minutes before removing from pan . 5. after cake is completely cooled, drizzle with cream cheese frosting . prep time 15 minutes cook time 45 50 minutes

name: mascarponecake met pruimensaus
description: de lekkerste mascarponecake met pruimensaus maak je met dit recept en bertolli koken, bakken en roerbakken zelf . een verrukkelijke vloeibare margarine met de milde smaak van olijfolie . deze feestelijk dessert is vol van smaak door mascarpone, een verse roomkaas met een lichtzure smaak . en is hierdoor erg populair als basis voor desserts.
ner: amandelen, citroen, ei, bruine basterdsuiker, eieren, bloem, slagroom, mascarpone, kaneel, pruimen, jonagold appel, water, calvados
ingredients: 200.0 gram amandelen, 1.0 citroen, 250.0 gram ei, 250.0 gram bruine basterdsuiker, 5.0 eieren, 250.0 gram bloem, 200.0 milliliter slagroom, 400.0 gram mascarpone, 1.0 teaspoon kaneel, 5.0 pruimen, 1.0 jonagold appel, 100.0 milliliter water, 50.0 milliliter calvados
steps: verwarm de oven voor tot 200oc . rooster de geschaafde amandelen in een droge koekenpan rondom bruin . rasp van de citroen een eetlepel schil af alleen het gele deel, het witte eronder is bitter van smaak . roer de bertolli vloeibaar met de basterdsuiker in een beslagkom glad . voeg al roerend een voor een de eieren toe en meng er vervolgens met een spatel de bloem door . roer tot slot de geroosterde amandelen en de citroenrasp door het beslag en stort het in een beboterde taart of cakevorm . bak de cake gedurende 60 minuten in de oven . stort de cake na het bakken op een rooster om af te koelen . klop de slagroom stijf en meng er de mascarpone en de kaneel door . zet het mengsel in de koelkast . snijd de cake, als deze voldoende is afgekoeld, horizontaal door . bestrijk het onderste gedeelte van de cake met het mascarponemengsel en leg vervolgens de andere helft van de cake er weer bovenop . halveer de pruimen, haal de pit eruit en schil de appel . snijd het vruchtvlees in stukjes . doe het fruit in een pannetje met het water en de calvados en laat het 15 minuten zachtjes pruttelen tot het een mooie saus is . serveer de taart op bordjes met een lepel pruimensaus ernaast.

name: easy slow cooker pot roast with mushroom gravy
description: this slow cooker pot roast is so easy to make . the mushroom gravy is perfect on the beef and over noodles or potatoes . your family will love it.
ner: pot roast, cream of mushroom soup, sliced mushrooms, onion, olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, salt
ingredients: 6.0 pound pot roast, 1.0 can cream of mushroom soup, 1.0 cup sliced mushrooms, 0.5 onion, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 tablespoon garlic powder, 1.0 tablespoon onion powder, 0.5 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 teaspoon salt
steps: mix spices together and rub on roast . heat olive oil in a pan until almost smoking . sear each side of the roast . place the roast in a slow cooker and top with the cream of mushroom soup . in the same pan you seared the roast, saute the onion till soft . add the mushroom and saute another minute or two . place the onion/mushroom mixture on top of the cream of mushroom soup . place the lid on the slow cooker and cook for 6 8 hours at low . the roast is done when the meat easily falls apart . if you use a larger roast, you can use two cans of cream of mushroom soup

name: hot sandwiches mit raclette kase
description: einfache und schnell vorbereitete hot sandwiches die sehr fein schmecken.
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: die weggli aufschneiden und mit butter und etwas senf bestreichen . acht weggli mit einer scheibe schinken und einer scheibe raclette kase belegen . die weggli in alufolie einpacken . die anderen acht weggli mit einer scheibe fleischkase und einer scheibe raclette kase belegen und ebenfalls in alufolie einpacken . die alufolie der mit fleischkase belegten weggli mit einem doppelten umschlag kennzeichnen . die weggli 20 minuten vor dem servieren in den auf 180degc vorgewarmten backofen geben und solange heiss werden lassen, bis der kase flussig ist . sofort heiss servieren.

name: honey preserved kumquats
description: honey preserved kumquats garrett mccord shares a naturally sweetened kosher for passover treat recipe.
ner: kumquats, honey, sugar, water, a vanilla bean, seeded
ingredients: 1 lb kumquats, 1 cup honey, 1/3 cup sugar, 1 1/4 cups water, 1/2 a vanilla bean, seeded
steps: cut the stems off of the kumquats and slice in half discarding any easily accessible seeds . the seeds are edible and any you don't catch will soften during cooking . place the kumquats and the rest of the ingredients into a small saucepan and place over high heat . bring to a boil . turn down to low heat and simmer for 25 minutes . remove from heat and allow to cool . store in a sterile jar in the fridge for up to two months.

name: turkey lasagna tin cupcakes
description: turkey lasagna tin cupcakes with, , , , , , , , ,
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: preparation steps 1. cook turkey, garlic, onion, coconut oil and spices until done 2. drain meat 3. add sauce to meat 4. spray cupcake pan with non stick coconut oil spray 5. put 2 won ton wraps on bottom of cup holder corners overlapping each other making a cup like . 6. add sauce 7. cheese 1 pinch 8. lay another wrap on top center like and start over with meat and cheese 2 pinch 9. cook in oven for 20 25 mins until wrap tips are crispy like.

name: bangin good shrimp
description: bangin good shrimp a healthier, slimmed down copycat recipe of bonefish grill's very popular bang bang shrimp recipe.
ner: light mayonnaise, thai sweet chili sauce, sriracha, large shrimp, cornstarch, canola oil, shredded iceberg lettuce, shredded purple cabbage, scallions
ingredients: 5 tbsp light mayonnaise, 3 tbsp thai sweet chili sauce, 1 tsp sriracha, 1 lb large shrimp, 2 tsp cornstarch, 1 tsp canola oil, 3 cups shredded iceberg lettuce, 1 cup shredded purple cabbage, 4 tbsp scallions
steps: in a medium bowl, combine mayonnaise, thai sweet chili sauce and sriracha . set aside . combine lettuce and cabbage and divide between four plates . set aside . coat shrimp with cornstarch, mixing well with your hands . heat a large skillet or wok on high heat, when hot add oil . when oil is hot add the shrimp to hot pan and cook tossing a few times until cooked through, about 3 minutes . remove from pan and combine with the sauce coating well . place shrimp on lettuce and top with scallions.

name: peppered pork roast
description: complete this basic roast with mashed potatoes with pork gravy and buttered corn.
ner: pork loin roast, pepper
ingredients: 4.0 pound pork loin roast, 6.0 tablespoon pepper
steps: rub all surfaces of roast s with seasoned pepper . place pork in shallow roasting pan and roast in 350 degrees f . oven for 40 minutes to 1 1/2 hours, until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees f . remove roast from oven let rest about 10 minutes . slice and serve.

name: basic roasted chicken
description: classic roasted chicken cooks perfectly in your oven with no frills and little hassle . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: roasting chicken, garlic, salt, black pepper, butter, olive oil, onion, fresh parsley, fresh thyme, lemon
ingredients: 1.0 whole roasting chicken, 6.0 clove garlic, 2.0 teaspoon salt, black pepper, 1.0 tablespoon butter, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 0.2 onion, 1.0 handful fresh parsley, 3.0 sprig fresh thyme, 0.5 lemon
steps: preheat the oven to 425degf . line a rimmed baking sheet with aluminum foil and position a roasting rack in the pan . remove and discard the giblets from the cavity of the chicken . crush the garlic cloves with the side of a knife and discard the papery skins . take one garlic clove and rub it firmly over the entire surface of the chicken . place all of the crushed garlic in the cavity of the chicken . liberally season the chicken inside and out with salt and black pepper . stir the softened butter and olive oil together in a small bowl until mostly combined . with clean hands, rub the mixture all over the chicken and under the breast skin . place the chicken on the roasting rack breast side up . tie the legs together with kitchen twine, and tuck the wing tips beneath the body of the chicken . separate the onion into two parts and place into the cavity of the chicken, along with the parsley, thyme, and lemon half . roast the chicken on middle rack of oven until the thickest part of the chicken breast reaches an internal temperature of 160degf, 60 80 minutes . check to see that chicken is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow chicken to rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving . leftovers may be refrigerated for 3 4 days or frozen for up to 2 months.

name: ovenschotel van venkel, aardappelplakjes en kabeljauw
description: italiaanse ovenschotel van venkel, aardappelplakjes en kabeljauw . een verrukkelijke kleurige en geurig ovenschotel uit italie . maak het eenvoudig zelf met dit recept in minder dan een uur tijd . er is genoeg vis en gebakken aardappelplakjes voor 4 personen.
ner: venkelknollen, citroen, peterselie, basilicum, eiwit, knoflook, kaas, aardappelschijfjes, gin, halfvolle creme fraiche, broodkruimels, maizena, kabeljauwfilets
ingredients: 2.0 venkelknollen, 1.0 citroen, 30.0 gram peterselie, 30.0 gram basilicum, 1.0 eiwit, 3.0 clove knoflook, 6.0 tablespoon kaas, 600.0 gram aardappelschijfjes, 6.0 tablespoon gin, 2.0 tablespoon halfvolle creme fraiche, 6.0 tablespoon broodkruimels, 2.0 tablespoon maizena, 4.0 kabeljauwfilets
steps: verwarm de oven voor op 180degc . snijd van de venkelknollen het bladgroen en de uitstekende dunne stengels af . snijd van de onderkant een kapje af . verwijder de harde kern, snijd de venkel in kwarten en schaaf deze vervolgens met behulp van een keukenmachine in dunne plakjes . snijd de citroen in partjes, hak de peterselie en de basilicum fijn en klop het eiwit los in een kommetje . pel de tenen knoflook.snijd er twee in dunne plakjes en pers de derde teen uit . rasp de parmezaanse kaas . schep de aardappel, venkel en plakjes knoflook met 4 eetlepels olijfolie in een ovenschaal even goed om . breng het op smaak met peper en zout . verdeel het mengsel gelijkmatig over de bodem van de schaal, dek deze af met aluminiumfolie en zet het gerecht ongeveer 25 minuten in de oven tot alles net beetgaar is . meng voor de kruidenkorst in een kom de creme fraiche met de broodkruimels, parmezaanse kaas, maizena, 2 eetlepels extra vergine olijfolie en de uitgeperste teen knoflook . haal de aardappel venkelschotel uit de oven, verwijder de folie en smeer er de helft van het creme fraichemengsel over . leg de kabeljauwfilets hier bovenop, besmeer ze met het losgeklopte eiwit en bestrooi ze met wat peper en zout . bedek de vis vervolgens met de andere helft van het creme fraichemengsel en strooi tot slot de peterselie en basilicum erover . zet de schotel terug in de oven gedurende een minuut of vijftien . de vis moet mooi wit van kleur zijn en gemakkelijk uit elkaar vallen als je er even met een vork in prikt . serveer met de citroenpartjes erop . dit gerecht is lekker in combinatie met een frisse tomatensalade met veel verse tuinkruiden.

name: daigaku imo caramelised sweet potato
description: daigaku imo caramelised sweet potato with sweet potatoes, canola, sesame, sugar, water
ner: sweet potatoes, canola, sesame, sugar, water
ingredients: 2.0 sweet potatoes, 500.0 milliliter canola, 2.0 teaspoon sesame, 4.0 tablespoon sugar, 50.0 milliliter water
steps: i have made this with parsnips and that worked very well as well . wash and pat dry the potatoes, and cut them into ice cube size . place the potatoes in a large pan, pour the oil in and put the heat on . deep fry the potatoes until golden brown and place them on the kitchen towel to rid the excess oil . while you are at it, put sugar and water into a small pan and bring the mixture to a boil till it becomes a beautiful caramel . put the potatoes and caramel together and gently toss, and finally sprinkle sesame.

name: pbandj blondies
description: pbandj blondies with crisco original no stick cooking spray, butter, firmly packed brown sugar, jif creamy peanut butter, eggs, vanilla extract, pillsbury best all purpose flour, baking powder, smucker's seedless strawberry jam, dry roasted peanuts
ner: crisco original no stick cooking spray, butter, firmly packed brown sugar, jif creamy peanut butter, eggs, vanilla extract, pillsbury best all purpose flour, baking powder, smucker's seedless strawberry jam, dry roasted peanuts
ingredients: crisco original no stick cooking spray, 0.5 cup butter, 1.2 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 0.5 cup jif creamy peanut butter, 2.0 eggs, 1.0 tablespoon vanilla extract, 1.5 cup pillsbury best all purpose flour, 1.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.3 cup smucker's seedless strawberry jam, 0.2 cup dry roasted peanuts
steps: heat oven to 350degf . line 13 x 9 inch baking pan with foil, extending foil over edges of pan . coat with no stick cooking spray . beat butter and brown sugar in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until blended . add peanut butter, eggs and vanilla . beat until smooth . stir in flour and baking powder until blended . spread evenly in prepared pan . dollop with jam . sprinkle evenly with peanuts . bake 30 to 32 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean . cool completely on wire rack.

name: parmesan crusted baked pork chops
description: tender bone in pork chops baked in the oven with a thick and crispy parmesan panko crust . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: bone in pork chops, salt, black pepper, panko bread crumbs, grated parmesan cheese, garlic powder, black pepper, salted butter
ingredients: 4.0 bone in pork chops, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.5 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 ounce panko bread crumbs, 1.5 ounce grated parmesan cheese, 1.0 teaspoon garlic powder, black pepper, 2.0 tablespoon salted butter
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . line a large baking sheet with parchment paper . season the pork chops on both sides with salt and black pepper . place the panko, grated parmesan, garlic powder, and black pepper in a medium mixing bowl . stir with a fork to combine . pour in the melted butter, and stir until the crumbs are thoroughly moistened . divide an equal amount of the parmesan mixture over each pork chop . using clean hands or a spoon, pat the mixture into an even layer, covering the surface of each pork chop . bake the pork chops on middle rack of oven until the crust is golden and the meat reaches an internal temperature of 140degf, 25 30 minutes . check to see that pork chops are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the pork chops to rest for 3 minutes on the baking sheet . plate and serve immediately.

name: black cow cupcakes chocolate and root beer
description: moist chocolate cake kisses with a touch of root beer . topped with root beer frosting
ner: flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, baking powder, milk, water, egg, vegetable oil, extract, powdered sugar, extract, water, shortening
ingredients: 1.0 cup flour, 1.0 cup sugar, 0.3 cup cocoa, 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 cup milk, 0.5 cup water, 1.0 egg, 0.2 cup vegetable oil, 1.0 teaspoon extract, 2.0 cup powdered sugar, 1.0 teaspoon extract, 1.0 tablespoon water, 0.2 cup shortening
steps: add flour, cocoa, sugar, baking powder, baking soda in a large mixing bowl . whisk to mix . in a separate bowl, whisk together milk, water, oil, egg and root beer extract . pour wet mixture into dry mix . beat for 3 minutes on medium speed . adding air lightens the batter . divide into 12 cupcake liners . bake at 350 for approximately 10 12 minutes . while cake cools whip together powdered sugar, root beer extract, water, shortening

name: hot and sour shredded pork rice bowl
description: hot and sour shredded pork rice bowl with vegetable oil, pork, red bell pepper, sliced, green peas, ground ginger, garlic, water, knorr hot and sour recipe mix, firmly packed brown sugar, chili powder, regular or converted rice, sliced green onions
ner: vegetable oil, pork, red bell pepper, sliced, green peas, ground ginger, garlic, water, knorr hot and sour recipe mix, firmly packed brown sugar, chili powder, regular or converted rice, sliced green onions
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1.0 pound pork, 1.0 red bell pepper, sliced, 6.0 ounce green peas, 1.0 tablespoon ground ginger, 1.0 clove garlic, 3.0 cup water, 1.0 package knorr hot and sour recipe mix, 1.0 tablespoon firmly packed brown sugar, 0.2 teaspoon chili powder, 2.0 cup regular or converted rice, 1.0 sliced green onions
steps: bring a little zen to your life... heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over high heat and brown pork and red pepper, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes . stir in snow peas, ginger and garlic and cook 1 minute . stir in water, and next 3 ingredients and bring to a boil . reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, until pork is done, about 4 minutes . to serve, arrange rice in bowl and top with mixture . sprinkle with green onion.

name: shrimp creole
description: this southern louisiana shrimp creole dish is cooked with tomatoes, onions, peppers and celery . adjust the spice to your preference, but don't be scared of a little heat
ner: olive oil, medium onion, green bell pepper, celery, of garlic, can of diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, of cayenne pepper, cajun seasoning such as slap your mama, bay leaf, of all purpose flour, water, of large shrimp, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, medium scallion, fresh parsley, salt to taste
ingredients: 2 tsp olive oil, 1 medium onion, 1/2 cup green bell pepper, 1/2 cup celery, 2 cloves of garlic, 14 ounce can of diced tomatoes, 8 oz tomato sauce, 1/4 teaspoon of cayenne pepper, 1/4 tsp cajun seasoning such as slap your mama, 1 bay leaf, 1 tbsp of all purpose flour, 2 tbsp water, 1 lb of large shrimp, 2 tsp worcestershire sauce, 2 tsp hot sauce, 1 medium scallion, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, salt to taste
steps: in a large skillet heat the olive oil over medium heat . add the chopped onion, green bell pepper, garlic and celery and saute until tender . add tomatoes and tomato sauce, cayenne pepper, cajun spice, bay leaf and bring to a boil . cover and reduce heat to low and simmer 20 30 minutes . make a slurry of the flour and water and stir into the tomato mixture . continue cooking for another 5 minutes . lightly season the shrimp with the cajun seasoning and add immediately to the tomato mixture . add worcestershire sauce and hot sauce stir together . cook for another 5 to 6 minutes, or until shrimp is opaque and cooked through, adjust salt if needed . add chopped green onion and parsley and serve.

name: butterscotch flavor powder recipe . i like the flavor of butterscotch a lot, and after some experimenting i figured out how to make a butterscotch flavor powder that i could add to other things, such as oatmeal, cakes, or yogurt . the following recipe is
description: butterscotch flavor powder recipe . when using this powder to add to foods, also add some vanilla flavor or extract.
ner: dark brown sugar, butter, salt, blackstrap molasses, water
ingredients: 60.0 gram dark brown sugar, 30.0 gram butter, 0.1 teaspoon salt, 0.5 tablespoon blackstrap molasses, 2.0 teaspoon water
steps: mix the ingredients together in a pan, adding just enough water to wet down the other ingredients, set a stovetop burner in the medium heat range, and cook slowly until the temperature of the mixture is a carefully measured 310 degrees f . cooking slowly is important for giving the maillard reaction time to take place . the maillard reaction is what develops the butterscotch flavor . for measuring the temperature, i use an infrared surface temperature thermometer . there are many brands of these infrared thermometers on amazon . when the mixture is cooked, pour it immediately not letting it harden onto a flat surface that has been covered with a sheet of parchment paper, and let the mixture cool for, say, 20 minutes, until it is rock solid . then crack it up with your food gloved hands, transfer it to a blade type coffee grinder, and grind it into a fine powder . this may require several "transfer grind" operations . store the powder in a refrigerator, and use it as desired.

name: classic pecan pie
description: classic pecan pie with classic crisco pie crust, large eggs, light corn syrup, sugar, butter, vanilla extract, salt, pecan halves
ner: classic crisco pie crust, large eggs, light corn syrup, sugar, butter, vanilla extract, salt, pecan halves
ingredients: classic crisco pie crust, 3.0 large eggs, 1.0 cup light corn syrup, 1.0 cup sugar, 0.2 cup butter, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 1.0 cup pecan halves
steps: heat oven to 350degf . prepare recipe for single pie crust . roll out and place in 9 inch pie plate . press to fit without stretching dough . trim even with pie plate . flute edges . beat eggs in medium bowl . beat in corn syrup, sugar, butter, vanilla and salt until blended . stir in pecans . pour into unbaked pie crust . bake 50 to 55 minutes or until set . cover edge of pie with foil, if necessary, to prevent overbrowning . place on wire rack to cool completely.

name: aspara enoki ume roll
description: aspara enoki ume roll with asparagus, enokitake, pork, bacon, shiso
ner: asparagus, enokitake, pork, bacon, shiso
ingredients: asparagus, enokitake, pork, bacon, shiso
steps: 1. cut aspara and enoki to roughly the same length as the pork slice 2. pan fry aspara till 90 cooked 3. smash ume shiso and smear it generously on one end of the pork slice 4. top it up with aspara and enoki and roll it all 5. pan fry the rolls 6. voila

name: lobster cobb salad
description: a classic cobb salad with a light summer twist . if you live on the coast like me and have access to fresh lobster, this salad is a must if you're worried about cooking a live lobster, many seafood stores will steam it for you . crab or shrimp would also make an excellent substitution.
ner: cooked, baby greens, avocado, hard boiled eggs, center cut bacon, quartered grape tomatoes, cooked corn kernels, dijon mustard, olive oil, plus 1 tsp red wine vinegar, kosher salt, chopped red onion
ingredients: 10 oz cooked, 2 cups baby greens, 2 ounces avocado, 2 hard boiled eggs, 4 slices center cut bacon, 1/2 cup quartered grape tomatoes, 1/2 cup cooked corn kernels, 1 tsp dijon mustard, 4 tsp olive oil, 2 tbsp plus 1 tsp red wine vinegar, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 2 tablespoons chopped red onion
steps: combine the first 4 ingredients for the vinaigrette in a small bowl and whisk well, add onions and set aside . cut the lobster into large chunks . place 1 cup greens in each bowl and top with lobster, avocado, eggs, bacon, tomatoes and corn . drizzle 2 1/2 tbsp vinaigrette over each salad and enjoy.

name: summer squash and chive pancakes
description: none
ner: cooked shredded squash, egg, egg white, flour, baking powder, garlic, parmesan cheese, fresh chopped chives, kosher salt, fresh cracked pepper, olive oil spray
ingredients: 2 cups cooked shredded squash, 1 egg, 1 egg white, 2/3 cup flour, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 1 clove garlic, 1/3 cup parmesan cheese, 3 tbsp fresh chopped chives, 1/2 tsp kosher salt, pinch fresh cracked pepper, olive oil spray
steps: add squash to a medium pot and cover with water . bring to a boil and cover cook until soft . when soft, drain add to food processor and pulse a few times until chopped . add 2 cups of squash to a medium bowl . combine squash with remaining ingredients except oil and mix well . heat a large skillet on medium heat, when hot spray lightly with oil and reduce heat to medium low . drop 1/4 cupfuls of batter, slightly flattening them with the back of a spoon and cook a few minutes or until golden . turn and cook the other side until golden . set aside and repeat with the remaining batter.

name: lemon and black pepper roasted potatoes
description: crisp and browned on the outside and creamy inside, these roasted potatoes are the perfect accompaniment to a big holiday bird, and to just about any other poultry, meat, or fish . the bright lemon flavor and gentle pepper kick put them a big step above plain potatoes, but they're easy to make . and they reheat well if you want to make them ahead . the recipe is a yummly original created by david bonom https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/david bonom .
ner: lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, nonstick cooking spray, russet potatoes, olive oil, salt, coarsely ground black pepper, salt, coarsely ground black pepper
ingredients: 2.0 teaspoon lemon zest, 1.0 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, nonstick cooking spray, 3.0 pound russet potatoes, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, 0.8 teaspoon salt, 0.8 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper, salt, coarsely ground black pepper
