ner: 85 lean ground beef, ground veal, ground pork, eggs, panko bread crumbs, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, dried oregano, salt, black pepper, bacon, ketchup
ingredients: 1.0 pound 85 lean ground beef, 0.5 pound ground veal, 0.5 pound ground pork, 2.0 eggs, 0.8 cup panko bread crumbs, 0.2 cup ketchup, 1.0 tablespoon worcestershire sauce, 2.0 teaspoon dijon mustard, 1.0 teaspoon garlic powder, 0.5 teaspoon onion powder, 0.5 teaspoon dried oregano, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.8 teaspoon black pepper, 8.0 strip bacon, ketchup
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . line a baking sheet with parchment paper . place the ground meats, eggs, breadcrumbs, ketchup, worcestershire, dijon, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, salt, and pepper in a large mixing bowl . using clean hands, work the ingredients together until combined into a uniform mixture . divide the mixture into 8 baseball sized balls roughly 5 oz . each, and shape into small loaves . arrange the loaves on the baking sheet . wrap a strip of bacon around each individual meatloaf, making sure the ends are on the underside of the loaf . return the meatloaves to the baking sheet . bake the meatloaves on middle rack of oven until the bacon is browned and crisp, and the meat is cooked through, 30 35 minutes . check to see that meatloaves are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . plate the meatloaves and serve immediately . serve with ketchup, if desired.

name: cheesy gluten free chicken and rice casserole
description: a super easy, extra cheesy chicken and rice casserole safe for those following a gluten free diet.
ner: cooked rice, cooked chicken, scallions, grated parmesan cheese, shredded cheddar cheese, evaporated milk, sour cream, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, shredded cheddar cheese
ingredients: 4.0 cup cooked rice, 3.0 cup cooked chicken, 2.0 scallions, 0.5 cup grated parmesan cheese, 0.5 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1.0 can evaporated milk, 1.0 cup sour cream, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper, 1.5 teaspoon garlic powder, 1.5 cup shredded cheddar cheese
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray a 9x13 inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . combine the rice, chicken, scallions, parmesan cheese, cheddar cheese, evaporated milk, sour cream, salt, black pepper, and garlic powder in a large mixing bowl . mix with a wooden spoon until well combined . transfer the mixture to the baking dish and smooth it into an even layer . sprinkle the shredded cheddar cheese evenly over the top . bake the casserole on middle rack of oven until the cheese is golden brown and the dish is gently bubbling at the edges, 40 45 minutes . check to see that casserole is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the casserole to rest for 15 minutes before serving.

name: miss kay roberson's banana pudding
description: miss kay roberson's banana pudding with butter, sugar, flour, salt, evaporated milk, large egg yolks, vanilla extract, vanilla wafer cookies, bananas, lemon juice, whipped topping
ner: butter, sugar, flour, salt, evaporated milk, large egg yolks, vanilla extract, vanilla wafer cookies, bananas, lemon juice, whipped topping
ingredients: 2.0 stick butter, 2.0 cup sugar, 0.7 cup flour, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 12.0 ounce evaporated milk, 6.0 large egg yolks, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 40.0 vanilla wafer cookies, 3.0 bananas, lemon juice, whipped topping
steps: in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, melt the butter . whisk in the sugar, flour, and salt . add the milks and stir continuously until the mixture thickens . this may take 30 40 minutes . once it's thickened, stir in the egg yolks a little . this will temper the yolks and keep them from cooking too fast . stir the tempered egg yolks into the mixture on the double broiler and cook, stirring until when you pull out the spoon, the mixture does not drip . remove the top from the double boiler and stir in the vanilla . spread a little of the pudding in the bottom of the casserole . top with the vanilla wafers . slice the bananas in rounds, dip them lightly in lemon juice to preserve their freshness and place in the wafers . pour the remaining pudding on top . if you like, add more vanilla wafers to the top of the pudding and add spoonfuls of whipped topping . layer the pudding, bananas, and vanilla wafers in nice drinking glasses and add a little whipped topping.

name: ice mocha frappe
description: i will be the first to admit that i drink way too much coffee . it's my favorite drink . sometimes i'll sneak it into my food, like in the broth with a roast . ice frappes are a yummy treat for me though . with minutes you can blend your own yummy frappe . i like my coffee sweet, so if you don't like them quite as sweet, start with half the sugar and add more if needed.
ner: ground coffee, boiling water, coffee, milk, sugar, chocolate syrup, ice, whipped cream
ingredients: 0.5 cup ground coffee, 28.0 ounce boiling water, 1.5 cup coffee, 0.5 cup milk, 4.0 tablespoon sugar, 2.0 tablespoon chocolate syrup, 3.0 cup ice, whipped cream
steps: i start off with 1/2 cup coarse ground coffee in my french press . i add 28oz boiling water, stir, put the lid on don't press the plunger, and set the timer for 4 minutes . every minute just give it a stir . after 4 minutes, push the plunger down . strain and cool the coffee you plan to use for the frappe . drink the rest . in a blender, puree coffee, milk, sugar, and ice . for a thicker consistency, add more ice and blend . for mocha frappe, add chocolate sauce while blending . pour into 2 glasses, and top with whipped cream and chocolate sauce if desired . serve immediately.

name: crock pot picante chicken and black bean soup
description: spicy black bean and chicken soup with tomatoes, chiles, peppers and spices is delicious served with cool avocado and a touch of sour cream . top it with cilantro for freshness and your taste buds will want to do a mariachi dance.
ner: 15 oz cans black beans, rinsed and drained, low sodium chicken broth, 10 oz cans rotel tomatoes with green chilies, red bell pepper, can diced green chiles, ground cumin, ancho chile powder, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, 2 skinless chicken breast, chopped cilantro, medium scallions, cut limes, medium haas avocado, sour cream
ingredients: 2 15 oz cans black beans, rinsed and drained, 3 1/2 cups low sodium chicken broth, 2 10 oz cans rotel tomatoes with green chilies, 1 red bell pepper, 4 oz can diced green chiles, 1 tbsp ground cumin, 1 tsp ancho chile powder, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 1/4 tsp oregano, 16 oz 2 skinless chicken breast, 1/2 cup chopped cilantro, 2 medium scallions, cut limes, 1 medium haas avocado, sour cream
steps: take one can of beans and place in the blender along with 2 cups of the chicken broth puree then add to your slow cooker . add the remainder of the beans and chicken broth into the slow cooker along with tomatoes, bell pepper, diced green chiles, cumin, chile powder, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, chicken breast, and 1/4 cup of the cilantro . set slow cooker to high 4 hours or low 6 to 8 hours . after it's done, remove chicken and shred with 2 forks . place back into the slow cooker and add fresh scallions, remainder cilantro and adjust salt and cumin, to taste . serve hot with lime wedges, avocados, and sour cream if desired . makes about 10 1/2 cups.

name: sausage and summer veggie hash with fried eggs
description: sausage and summer veggie hash with fried eggs with olive oil, baby red potatoes, chicken sausage, asparagus, red pepper, medium zucchini, onion powder, garlic powder, chopped parsley, salt, pepper, large eggs, butter
ner: olive oil, baby red potatoes, chicken sausage, asparagus, red pepper, medium zucchini, onion powder, garlic powder, chopped parsley, salt, pepper, large eggs, butter
ingredients: 3.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 pound baby red potatoes, 3.0 chicken sausage, 1.0 cup asparagus, 1.0 red pepper, 1.0 medium zucchini, 0.5 teaspoon onion powder, 0.5 teaspoon garlic powder, 2.0 tablespoon chopped parsley, salt, pepper, 4.0 large eggs, 2.0 tablespoon butter
steps: heat 2 tablespoons olive oil on medium heat in a large frying pan . add potatoes and cook for about 10 minutes . reduce heat to low and cook with a lid on for about another 15 minutes, stirring the potatoes occasionally to prevent them from sticking . place the potatoes aside in a large bowl . add the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil to the skillet and saute the sausage on medium heat for about 15 minutes . remove the sausage from the pan and slice into bite size pieces . put the sausage back into the pan along with the asparagus and red pepper . cook on medium heat for about 10 minutes or until veggies start to wilt . add zucchini and cook for another 5 minutes . add the cooked potatoes to the pan . sprinkle the pan with onion powder, garlic powder and parsley . stir well and cook on low until everything is totally cooked . add salt and pepper to taste . in the final minutes of cooking the hash skillet, heat the kitchenaid freestanding double oven range with even heat convection on medium high heat . add half the butter to the griddle . break the eggs and cook two at a time on the griddle . finish cooking on low heat for a few minutes each or until desired doneness . flip over if desired . serve the eggs on top of the hash and garnish with chopped parsley.

name: fruit, ice cream and granola parfaits
description: fruit, ice cream and granola parfaits with low fat granola cereal, mixed berries, breyers smooth and dreamy 1/2 the fat creamy vanilla ice cream, honey
ner: low fat granola cereal, mixed berries, breyers smooth and dreamy 1/2 the fat creamy vanilla ice cream, honey
ingredients: 1.0 cup low fat granola cereal, 2.0 cup mixed berries, 1.0 cup breyers smooth and dreamy 1/2 the fat creamy vanilla ice cream, 2.0 tablespoon honey
steps: sprinkle 1/2 of the granola into 2 parfait glasses . top with 1/2 of the fruit, then breyers smooth and dreamy 1/2 the fat creamy vanilla ice cream . top with remaining granola and fruit, then drizzle with honey.

name: cranberry pork chops
description: cranberry pork chops with boneless pork chops, butter, oil, onion, carrots, chicken broth, sugar, red wine vinegar, fresh cranberries
ner: boneless pork chops, butter, oil, onion, carrots, chicken broth, sugar, red wine vinegar, fresh cranberries
ingredients: 6.0 boneless pork chops, 1.0 teaspoon butter, 1.0 teaspoon oil, 1.0 cup onion, 0.3 cup carrots, 1.2 cup chicken broth, 2.0 tablespoon sugar, 2.0 tablespoon red wine vinegar, 0.5 cup fresh cranberries
steps: heat butter and oil in large nonstick skillet over medium high heat . brown chops on both sides 2 3 minutes per side remove from skillet and set aside . saute onions and carrots until brown and tender, about 8 minutes . return chops to skillet . add chicken broth cover and simmer 6 8 minutes or until pork is tender . remove chops and keep warm . add sugar, vinegar and cranberries to skillet cook until cranberries pop . heat chops in sauce before serving.

name: sous vide pork belly buns with pork braise mayonnaise and quick pickled cucumbers
description: modification of http //www.seriouseats.com/recipes/2013/10/sous vide pork belly bun pork braise mayonnaise quick pickled cucumbers recipe.html beta asian
ner: garlic, ginger, scallions, pork belly, granulated sugar, soy sauce, mirin, fish sauce, kosher salt, sugar, rice wine vinegar, water, english cucumbers, mayonnaise, buns, bibb lettuce
ingredients: 3.0 clove garlic, 1.0 chunk ginger, 2.0 whole scallions, 2.5 pound pork belly, 0.5 cup granulated sugar, 0.5 cup soy sauce, 0.5 cup mirin, 2.0 tablespoon fish sauce, 1.0 tablespoon kosher salt, 0.8 cup sugar, 1.0 cup rice wine vinegar, 1.0 cup water, 4.0 cup english cucumbers, 0.7 cup mayonnaise, 24.0 buns, 1.0 head bibb lettuce
steps: preheat a sous vide style water bath to 170degf 77degc . combine soy sauce, mirin, sugar, fish sauce, scallions, garlic, and ginger in the bowl of a food processor . process until vegetables are roughly pureed . transfer to a heavy duty gallon sized freezer bag and seal by slowly submerging into a pot full of water, sealing the top just before it goes underwater to remove all air . transfer to sous vide cooker and cook until completely tender, about 10 hours . remove bag from cooker and chill thoroughly . pork belly can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks after cooking if the bag remains sealed . when ready to serve, open sous vide bag and remove pork belly . discard solid chunks of fat . warm congealed liquids in a small saucepan, then strain through a fine mesh strainer . return to saucepan and simmer until reduced to 2 tablespoons, making sure that the syrup doesn't reduce too far and burn, about 15 minutes . super hard to reduce, make one with normal mayo and compare to one with less mayo, don't think there needs to be that much mayo, just less reduction to make up for lack of mayo volume combine vinegar, water, sugar, and salt in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil over high heat . remove from heat . add cucumber slices and stir . cover with a clean kitchen towel or a double layer of heavy duty paper towels, pressing down until towel is saturated with liquid and in direct contact with the cucumbers . let rest 10 minutes, then transfer cucumbers to a sealable container . top up with liquid and discard the rest . store in the refrigerator for up to 1 month . transfer reduced cooking liquid to a medium bowl . add mayonnaise and whisk to combine . preheat broiler to high . cut pork belly into 1 1/2 inch wide strips, then slice into 1/2 to 1/3 inch slices . transfer to a foil lined broiler pan . broil pork belly until crisp and charred on one side, about 3 minutes . try broiling skin up as a whole to serve steam buns in a bamboo steamer or in the microwave on a large plate under a damp towel . spread mayonnaise onto each bun, then stuff with lettuce leaf, slices of pork belly, and pickles . serve immediately.

name: leftover bolognese baked bolognese in a courgette with parmesan recipe
description: a quick and healthy dish what you can have ready with your leftovers in a while . it is satisfying and healthy since you do not have any carbs as a side dish . i recommend to start with a soup or salad to make it and sufficient meal . you will need
ner: grated cheese, courgette
ingredients: grated cheese, courgette
steps: heat up your oven on 220 c celsius . place your courgette on a cutting board and cut it horizontally in 2 pieces . with a spoon remove the flesh from the courgette . you can cut your leftover flesh thinly and add to your bolognese for added texture and taste . since my bolognese came from frozen i defroze it first and cooked it with the courgette flesh for few minutes . you do not need to do so if your sauce is only cold since it will heat up in the oven and the courgette will have enough time to cook there . now is the time to fill your courgette with as much sauce desired or possible . after add a healthy portion of your favourite cheese on top . place in the oven on a tray and bake for 15 20 minutes until golden . your meal is ready . enjoy.

name: caramelized apple onion soup
description: this soup tastes like fall in a bowl apples and caramelized onions are simmered with cider and broth, and blended with a touch of cream . the flavor is the perfect balance of savory and sweet.
ner: sweet yellow onions, olive oil, unsalted butter, granny smith apples, apple cider, vegetable broth, garlic, light cream, kosher salt and white pepper, optional garnish a drizzle of light cream
ingredients: 2 pounds sweet yellow onions, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, 4 granny smith apples, 2 1/2 cups apple cider, 1 quart vegetable broth, 2 cloves garlic, 1/2 cup light cream, 3/4 tsp kosher salt and white pepper, optional garnish a drizzle of light cream
steps: in a dutch oven, or heavy stock pot, melt the butter and oil over medium heat, then add the onions and saute until the onions caramelize and become golden in color, stirring occasionally, about 55 minutes, depending on your pan and the flame . you may want to reduce the heat to medium low half way through to prevent them from burning . while the onions are cooking, peel, core and chop the apples . when the onions are ready add the apples and cook 2 to 3 minutes . add the apple cider to deglaze the pan, scraping up any brown bits on the bottom of the pan . increase heat and bring to a boil, cook until the cider reduces, about 5 minutes . add the garlic and vegetable broth . bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover and simmer gently 30 minutes . add cream and simmer low 10 minutes . puree in a blender in batches or using an immersion blender . adjust seasoning with salt and white pepper.

name: crock pot santa fe chicken
description: slow cooker shredded chicken with corn, tomatoes and black beans . prep this the night before and turn your crock pot on in the morning for an easy weeknight meal.
ner: 1 1/2 lbs chicken breast, can diced tomatoes with mild green chilies, can black beans, frozen corn, chopped fresh cilantro, can fat free chicken broth, scallions, garlic powder, onion powder, cumin, cayenne pepper, salt to taste
ingredients: 24 oz 1 1/2 lbs chicken breast, 14.4 oz can diced tomatoes with mild green chilies, 15 oz can black beans, 8 oz frozen corn, 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 14.4 oz can fat free chicken broth, 3 scallions, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, salt to taste
steps: combine chicken broth, beans drained, corn, tomatoes, cilantro, scallions, garlic powder, onion powder, cumin, cayenne pepper and salt in the crock pot . season chicken breast with salt and lay on top . cook on low for 8 10 hours or on high for 4 to 6 hours . thirty minutes before serving, remove chicken and shred . return chicken to slow cooker and stir in . adjust salt and seasoning to taste . serve over rice or tortillas and with your favorite toppings.

name: volkorenmacaroni met kruidige pastasaus en gehakt
description: deze macaroni met kruidige pastasaus, gehakt en champignons is een zalige pasta met volkoren macaroni en de kruidige pastasaus van bertolli.
ner: macaroni, champignons, bertolli vloeibaar voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, rundergehakt, bertolli pastasaus kruidig, basilicum
ingredients: 400.0 gram macaroni, 250.0 gram champignons, 3.0 tablespoon bertolli vloeibaar voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, 300.0 gram rundergehakt, 1.0 bag bertolli pastasaus kruidig, 3.0 sprig basilicum
steps: kook de volkoren macaroni volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . giet de macaroni af . maak de champignons schoon en snijd ze in vieren . verhit bertolli vloeibaar in een ruime koekenpan of wok . bak hierin het rundergehakt 5 min . al roerende met een vork of spatel, zodat het gehakt in stukjes wordt verdeeld . bestrooi het gehakt met wat zout en peper . voeg de champignons toe en bak ze 3 min . mee . roer de bertolli pastasaus kruidig erdoor en verwarm de saus 5 min . haal de blaadjes basilicum los van de steeltjes . hak de steeltjes fijn en roer ze door de saus . meng de macaroni met de saus . verdeel de macaroni over 4 warme borden en strooi de blaadjes basilicum erover.

name: penne rosa noodles and co
description: this is a semi homemade recipe and doesn't require lots of skill or a pantry full of special spices or ingredients . it is a solid, basic, make any day of the week meal that i promise will please your tummy http //ohsodelicioso.com/penne rosa noodles company copycat 2/
ner: parmesan cheese, olive oil, marinara sauce, garlic, chicken broth, crushed red pepper flakes, heavy cream, sliced mushrooms, small tomatoes, baby spinach, penne pasta
ingredients: 0.5 cup parmesan cheese, 3.0 tablespoon olive oil, 24.0 ounce marinara sauce, 2.0 clove garlic, 0.2 cup chicken broth, 0.2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 0.5 cup heavy cream, 4.0 ounce sliced mushrooms, 3.0 small tomatoes, 2.0 cup baby spinach, 16.0 ounce penne pasta
steps: prepare penne pasta per package instructions . meanwhile, combine bread crumbs and parmesan cheese in a small bowl . add 2 tbsp of oil to the skillet and cook garlic until fragrant . add in diced tomatoes and chicken broth . cook for 1 minutes add marinara sauce and crushed red pepper . simmer 10 minutes . stir in cream . add mushrooms, spinach . cook until heated through . toss with penne.

name: green tea macarons
description: green tea macarons with powdered sugar, almond flour, matcha green tea powder, egg whites, granulated sugar, icing, matcha green tea powder
ner: powdered sugar, almond flour, matcha green tea powder, egg whites, granulated sugar, icing, matcha green tea powder
ingredients: 2.0 cup powdered sugar, 1.0 cup almond flour, 2.0 teaspoon matcha green tea powder, 135.0 milliliter egg whites, 1.0 tablespoon granulated sugar, 0.8 cup icing, 1.0 teaspoon matcha green tea powder
steps: preheat oven to 400degf or 375degf for convection oven .combine powdered sugar, almond flour and 2 teaspoons green tea powder in medium bowl set aside . add egg whites and granulated sugar to bowl of kitchenaid artisan mini stand mixer . attach bowl and wire whip to mixer . gradually turn to speed 10and whip until egg whites form stiff peaks . remove wire whip and replace with flat beater . add almond mixture . turn to speed 1 and mix until combined . transfer mixture to piping bag fitted with medium round tip . line baking sheets with parchment paper or silicone mats . pipe batter onto sheets in 1/2 inch diameter circles, 1 inch apart . batter should yield about 60 cookies . let stand 10 minutes before baking . bake 8 to 10 minutes or until crisp and lightly browned . cool completely on wire rack . add icing and 1 teaspoon green tea powder to mixer bowl . attach bowl and flat beater to mixer . turn to speed 2 and mix 2 minutes or until well blended . assemble macaroons using about 1 teaspoon filling for each cookie sandwich . press together gently.

name: black sesame ahi tuna with wasabi citrus aioli
description: black sesame ahi tuna with wasabi citrus aioli with loin, sesame oil, sesame seed, coarse grind black pepper, kosher salt, cucumber, olive oil, mayonnaise, smoked paprika, wasabi powder, grated lemon peel, grated lime peel, fresh lemon juice, fresh lime juice, garlic
ner: loin, sesame oil, sesame seed, coarse grind black pepper, kosher salt, cucumber, olive oil, mayonnaise, smoked paprika, wasabi powder, grated lemon peel, grated lime peel, fresh lemon juice, fresh lime juice, garlic
ingredients: 1.0 pound loin, 0.5 cup sesame oil, 1.0 bottle sesame seed, 2.0 teaspoon coarse grind black pepper, 2.0 teaspoon kosher salt, 1.0 cucumber, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 cup mayonnaise, 1.5 tablespoon smoked paprika, 1.5 teaspoon wasabi powder, 0.5 teaspoon grated lemon peel, 0.5 teaspoon grated lime peel, 1.5 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, 1.5 teaspoon fresh lime juice, 1.0 clove garlic
steps: cut tuna into quarters lengthwise . pour sesame oil over tuna turn to coat evenly . refrigerate 30 minutes . mix black sesame seed, pepper and salt on large plate . coat tuna with black sesame seed mixture, pressing firmly so mixture adheres to the tuna heat oil in large skillet on high heat . add tuna sear 2 minutes per side . remove from skillet set aside to cool for the wasabi citrus aioli, mix mayonnaise, paprika, lemon and lime peels and juices and garlic in medium bowl with wire whisk until well blended . cover slice tuna into 1/8 inch thick slices . place 1 slice of tuna on each cucumber slice . top each with a small dollop of wasabi citrus aioli

name: faux nutella matzo sandwiches
description: this simple nut free nutella recipe from weelicious is great for kids with nut allergies or nut free schools . kosher for sephardic passover.
ner: chocolate chips, sunflower seed butter, matzo sheets
ingredients: 1/2 cup chocolate chips, 1/2 cup sunflower seed butter, 4 matzo sheets
steps: place the chocolate chips in a microwave safe bowl and microwave for 30 60 seconds, until melted, stirring halfway through . add the sunflower seed butter to the bowl, and stir until thoroughly combined . gently break matzah sheets into 4 pieces each, spread with the faux nutella mixture and sandwich together . note this recipe is kosher for sephardic passover, but not for ashkenazi passover . sunflower seeds are considered kitniyot . if you're avoiding kitniyot during passover, wait until after the holiday to enjoy this delicious spread.

name: snelle burrito's met kip en paprika
description: snelle burrito's met kip en paprika with knorr wereldgerecht mexicaanse burritos, blue band vloeibaar, kipfilet, water, blue band finesse voor verrijken, kaas, paprika
ner: knorr wereldgerecht mexicaanse burritos, blue band vloeibaar, kipfilet, water, blue band finesse voor verrijken, kaas, paprika
ingredients: 1.0 packet knorr wereldgerecht mexicaanse burritos, 3.0 tablespoon blue band vloeibaar, 350.0 gram kipfilet, 1.0 deciliter water, 1.2 deciliter blue band finesse voor verrijken, 100.0 gram kaas, 1.0 paprika
steps: verwarm de oven voor op 220oc heteluchtoven 200oc . meng in een kommetje de sausmix uit het pakket met de finesse voor verrijken . snijd de kipfilet in kleine dunne reepjes . maak de paprika schoon en snijd deze in kleine stukjes . bak de kipfilet op hoog vuur rondom aan in een beetje vloeibare margarine . voeg de gesneden paprika toe en roerbak dit gaar . voeg 1 deciliter water en de kruidenmix uit het pakket toe en breng dit aan de kook . laat het 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken . haal ondertussen de tortilla's uit de verpakkking en verwarm ze in de magnetron in 20 seconden op op 600 watt of in de oven, verpakt in aluminiumfolie gedurende 3 minuten . smeer de warme tortilla's dun in met een deel van de saus, schep er in het midden het kipmengsel op en vouw ze dicht . leg de gevouwen tortilla's in een ingevette ovenschaal en bestrooi ze met geraspte kaas . gratineer ze gedurende 8 minuten in de oven . serveer de burritos en geef de rest van de saus er apart bij.

name: fan favorite broccoli salad
description: fan favorite broccoli salad with broccoli, bacon, raisins, red onion, hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, sugar, white vinegar, chopped walnuts
ner: broccoli, bacon, raisins, red onion, hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, sugar, white vinegar, chopped walnuts
ingredients: 3.0 head broccoli, 0.5 pound bacon, 0.7 cup raisins, 0.5 cup red onion, 1.0 cup hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, 0.5 cup sugar, 2.0 tablespoon white vinegar, 1.0 cup chopped walnuts
steps: combine broccoli, bacon, raisins and red onion in large bowl set aside . combine hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar toss into broccoli mixture . chill at least 2 hours . just before serving, gently toss in walnuts.

name: toasted walnut and pesto pasta
description: toasted walnut and pesto pasta with chopped walnuts, garlic, loosely packed fresh basil leaves, finely chopped fresh parsley, promise buttery spread, boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, zucchini, red bell pepper, sliced, penne pasta, cooked and drained
ner: chopped walnuts, garlic, loosely packed fresh basil leaves, finely chopped fresh parsley, promise buttery spread, boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, zucchini, red bell pepper, sliced, penne pasta, cooked and drained
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon chopped walnuts, 1.0 clove garlic, 0.5 cup loosely packed fresh basil leaves, 0.2 cup finely chopped fresh parsley, 3.0 tablespoon promise buttery spread, 0.5 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, 1.0 cup zucchini, 1.0 red bell pepper, sliced, 0.5 pound penne pasta, cooked and drained
steps: in blender or food processor, process walnuts and garlic until finely chopped . add basil, parsley and 2 tablespoons promise buttery spread and process just until blended . meanwhile, in 10 inch nonstick skillet, melt remaining 1 tablespoon spread and cook chicken, stirring occasionally, 3 minutes or until browned remove chicken from skillet . in same skillet, add zucchini and red pepper and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, 4 minutes or until tender . return chicken and any juices to skillet and cook 1 minute or until chicken is thoroughly cooked . toss hot penne with chicken, pesto and reserved pasta water.

name: slow cooker banh mi rice bowls
description: if you've ever had the classic vietnamese banh mi sandwich, you probably know the bread can easily overpower the pork, pickled carrots and all the wonderful flavors, so i scrapped the bread and put all the goodies in a bowl over brown rice it's great over any grain in my slim remake which is easy to make any night of the week
ner: pork tenderloin, kosher salt, freshly ground pepper, crushed garlic, jalapeno, reduced sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, distilled white vinegar, sugar, kosher salt, shredded carrots, radishes, cooked brown rice, shredded red cabbage, thinly sliced english cucumbers, small jalapeno, cilantro leaves
ingredients: 1 pound pork tenderloin, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/8 teaspoon freshly ground pepper, 3 cloves crushed garlic, 1 jalapeno, 1/4 cup reduced sodium soy sauce, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 6 tablespoons distilled white vinegar, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 cup shredded carrots, 2 radishes, 3 cups cooked brown rice, 1 cup shredded red cabbage, 1 cup thinly sliced english cucumbers, 1 small jalapeno, 1/4 cup cilantro leaves
steps: season the pork with salt and pepper and place into the slow cooker . combine the garlic, jalapeno, soy sauce and brown sugar and stir to dissolve, pour over the pork . note if your slow cooker runs hot, add 1/4 cup water . cover and cook on low for 6 hours until the pork is very tender, turning once half way through if desired . when the pork is ready, shred the meat . reserve the sauce . meanwhile, while the pork is cooking, make the pickled carrots and radish in a medium glass bowl, combine the vinegar, sugar and salt and stir until dissolved . add the carrots and radish and let it sit for about 30 minutes . drain well and refrigerate until ready to use . to assemble the bowls, place 3/4 cup rice in each bowl, top each with about 2 1/2 oz pork, drizzle with 2 tablespoons of the reserved sauce then top with the 1/4 cup shredded cabbage, 1/4 cup pickled carrots, 1/4 cup cucumber, sliced jalapenos and cilantro.

name: kip met mango
description: kip met mango with rijst, kipfilet, mango, margarine, knorr mix voor kip kerrie, bladselderij
ner: rijst, kipfilet, mango, margarine, knorr mix voor kip kerrie, bladselderij
ingredients: 350.0 gram rijst, 300.0 gram kipfilet, 1.0 mango, 25.0 gram margarine, 1.0 bag knorr mix voor kip kerrie, 2.0 tablespoon bladselderij
steps: kook de rijst zoals aangegeven op de verpakking . snijd de kipfilet in reepjes . schil en snijd de mango in plakken . verhit de margarine en bak de kipfilet goudbruin en gaar . voeg 500 ml water, de inhoud van het zakje knorr mix en de mango toe . breng het geheel al roerend aan de kook, zet het vuur laag en laat de saus 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken . strooi de bladselderij erover en serveer met de rijst.

name: my dry version of zha jiang mian
description: my dry version of zha jiang mian with noodles, oil, minced garlic, minced ginger, chilli flakes, pork, shaoxing wine, yellow bean paste, dark soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, ground black pepper, cucumber
ner: noodles, oil, minced garlic, minced ginger, chilli flakes, pork, shaoxing wine, yellow bean paste, dark soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, ground black pepper, cucumber
ingredients: 1.0 bowl noodles, 3.0 tablespoon oil, 1.0 tablespoon minced garlic, 1.0 teaspoon minced ginger, 1.0 teaspoon chilli flakes, 1.0 bowl pork, 3.0 tablespoon shaoxing wine, 1.0 tablespoon yellow bean paste, 1.0 teaspoon dark soy sauce, 1.0 pinch sugar, 3.0 drop sesame oil, ground black pepper, cucumber
steps: 1. cook the noodles according to the instructions on the packing . drained . add a tbsp of oil and toss . keep warm . 2. heat wok with remaining of oil . add garlic, saute a few seconds before adding ginger . continue stir fry until the colour turns a little brownish . add chilli flakes and stir fry until fragrant . 3. add pork/chicken . stir for 1 min before adding shaoxing wine/beer . stir well, then add bean paste as well as sugar . keep stirring until the meat is cooked . 4. sprint some black pepper and sesame oil for a better aroma . 5. spoon the mixture on top of noodles and garnish with some shredded cucumber before serving hot.

name: oven roasted root vegetables
description: healthy and delicious oven roasted root vegetables . easy and colorful vegetable side dish . vegan, gluten free, parve, kosher.
ner: yams, red potatoes, beets, large carrots, parsnip, red onion, whole garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, fresh thyme leaves, fresh rosemary, ground cumin, kosher salt, black pepper
ingredients: 1 lb yams, 3/4 lb red potatoes, 1/2 lb beets, 1/2 lb large carrots, 1 parsnip, 1/2 red onion, 6 whole garlic cloves, 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, 2 tbsp fresh thyme leaves, 5 sprigs fresh rosemary, 1 tsp ground cumin, 1 tsp kosher salt, 1/4 tsp black pepper
steps: place a rack in the bottom of your oven and preheat oven to 400 degrees f . slice all vegetables into chunks roughly 1 1/2 inches wide . the more similar the size of the vegetable pieces, the more evenly they will roast.place cut vegetables into a large mixing bowl . add 3 tbsp olive oil, fresh thyme leaves, ground cumin, kosher salt, and black pepper . stir until all vegetables are evenly coated with oil, spice and herbs . brush large rimmed baking sheet with remaining 1 tbsp olive oil . spread the vegetables out evenly on the baking sheet . place the rosemary sprigs on top of the vegetables, evenly spaces across the sheet.roast the vegetables in the oven for 15 minutes . stir the vegetables, bringing the chunks from the outside towards the center and the chunks in the center out towards the edges . return baking sheet to oven and continue to roast until the largest chunks are tender and the edges are starting to turn golden/dark, another 15 25 minutes . remove the roasted rosemary sprigs and stir the vegetables some leaves of rosemary will remain, this is good . season with additional salt and pepper to taste, if desired . vegetables can be served warm or at room temperature.

name: not so pulled pulled pork
description: read more on http //bit.ly/1beiqh4
ner: cumin, ground pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, chili powder, cayenne pepper, salt, paprika, brown sugar
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon cumin, 1.0 tablespoon ground pepper, 1.0 tablespoon garlic powder, 1.0 tablespoon onion powder, 1.0 tablespoon chili powder, 1.0 tablespoon cayenne pepper, 1.0 tablespoon salt, 1.0 tablespoon paprika, 0.5 cup brown sugar
steps: read more on http //bit.ly/1beiqh4

name: chicken soup with matzo balls
description: chicken soup with matzo balls with chicken wings, turnips, large eggs
ner: chicken wings, turnips, large eggs
ingredients: 1.0 pound chicken wings, turnips, 6.0 large eggs
steps: bring 3 1/2 qts . of water to a boil in a large stockpot . add chicken, chicken parts, carrots, celery, parsnips, onions, turnips and parsley . simmer gently for 4 hrs . skimming occasionally . strain chicken broth into large saucepan and let cool completely . reserve 1/4 of carrots and parsnips for garnish . whole chicken can be reserved for other use . cut carrots and parsnips into 1/4 inch dice . cover and refrigerate broth and begs separately overnight or for 2 days . discard fat from chicken broth . warm over moderate heat and season w salt and pepper . add matzo balls and reserved diced vegetables, add shredded chicken if desired . rewarm soup . matzo balls whisk rendered chicken fat or oil with eggs just until combined . medium bowl toss matzo meal with salt . wisk dry ingredients into eggs, stir in seltzer and parsley . cover and refrigerate for 15 min . in large pot, bring chicken stock to a boil . divide sought into 12 pieces and roll each piece into a ball . drop matzo balls into boiling stock, cover and simmer gently over low heat until cooked through, about 1 hr . discard liquid . matzo balls can be refrigerated over night, covered.

name: chicken and shrimp with pineapple rice
description: chicken and shrimp with pineapple rice with olive oil, boneless, skinless chicken thighs, onion, red bell pepper, garlic, pineapple chunks in natural juice, drained, regular or converted rice, water, uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, sliced green onions, chopped cilantro, ragu old world style pasta sauce, salt, ground black pepper
ner: olive oil, boneless, skinless chicken thighs, onion, red bell pepper, garlic, pineapple chunks in natural juice, drained, regular or converted rice, water, uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, sliced green onions, chopped cilantro, ragu old world style pasta sauce, salt, ground black pepper
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, 8.0 ounce boneless, skinless chicken thighs, 1.0 onion, 1.0 red bell pepper, 2.0 clove garlic, 1.0 cup pineapple chunks in natural juice, drained, 1.2 cup regular or converted rice, 1.2 cup water, 0.5 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, 0.5 cup sliced green onions, 0.5 cup chopped cilantro, 2.0 cup ragu old world style pasta sauce, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon ground black pepper
steps: heat olive oil in deep 12 inch nonstick skillet over medium high heat and brown chicken . remove chicken from skillet and set aside . cook onion, red pepper and garlic in same skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, 3 minutes . stir in pasta sauce, water, rice and pineapple . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer covered 20 minutes . return chicken to skillet, then stir in shrimp . simmer covered 5 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked and shrimp turn pink . season, if desired, with hot pepper sauce . garnish with green onions and cilantro . season chicken with salt and pepper, set aside.

name: easy ground beef bulgogi
description: easy ground beef bulgogi with lean ground beef, beef broth, reduced sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, sesame seed, ginger, mccormick red pepper, crushed
ner: lean ground beef, beef broth, reduced sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, sesame seed, ginger, mccormick red pepper, crushed
ingredients: 1.0 pound lean ground beef, 1.0 cup beef broth, 0.2 cup reduced sodium soy sauce, 2.0 tablespoon brown sugar, 4.0 clove garlic, 1.0 tablespoon sesame seed, 0.8 teaspoon ginger, 0.2 teaspoon mccormick red pepper, crushed
steps: mix all ingredients in large bowl . pour into large skillet . cook and stir on medium high heat until meat is browned . reduce heat to medium and continue cooking for about 5 minutes or until meat is cooked through, stirring frequently . serve over lettuce leaves with sliced green onions, rice and kimchi, if desired.

name: barbecue pork skillet
description: barbecue pork skillet with new york pork chops, vegetable oil, italian salad dressing, barbecue sauce
ner: new york pork chops, vegetable oil, italian salad dressing, barbecue sauce
ingredients: 4.0 new york pork chops, 1.0 teaspoon vegetable oil, 0.2 cup italian salad dressing, 0.2 cup barbecue sauce
steps: heat oil in large skillet over medium high heat and brown chops about 1 minute on each side . add remaining ingredients to pan, stirring to blend . cover and simmer for 5 8 minutes until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees fahrenheit, followed by a 3 minute rest time . serves 4.

name: kip curry
description: kip curry with eieren, aardappelblokjes, kipfilet, margarine, room, knorr mix voor kip kerrie, tauge, peterselie, gebakken uitjes
ner: eieren, aardappelblokjes, kipfilet, margarine, room, knorr mix voor kip kerrie, tauge, peterselie, gebakken uitjes
ingredients: 4.0 eieren, 300.0 gram aardappelblokjes, 300.0 gram kipfilet, 25.0 gram margarine, 100.0 milliliter room, 1.0 bag knorr mix voor kip kerrie, 75.0 gram tauge, 2.0 tablespoon peterselie, 2.0 tablespoon gebakken uitjes
steps: kook de eieren hard en de aardappelblokjes beetgaar . snijd de kipfilet in reepjes . pel de eieren en snijd ze in parten . verhit de margarine en bak de kipfilet in reepjes goudbruin en gaar . voeg 400 ml water, de room en de inhoud van het zakje knorr mix toe . breng het geheel al roerend aan de kook en laat de saus 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken met de aardappelblokjes . serveer met de parten ei en de tauge, en strooi de peterselie en gebakken uitjes erover.

name: pbandj oatmeal
description: pbandj oatmeal with skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread, sugar, quick cooking oats
ner: skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread, sugar, quick cooking oats
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread, 1.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 cup quick cooking oats
steps: stir skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread and welch's reduced sugar concord grape jelly into hot oatmeal . top, if desired, with raisins or sliced fresh fruit.

name: roasted beets and carrots
description: a touch of honey brings out the natural sweetness in these roasted beets and carrots, creating a colorful side dish you'll want to eat all winter long.
ner: beets, carrots, extra virgin olive oil, honey, salt, black pepper
ingredients: 1.0 pound beets, 1.0 pound carrots, 2.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 2.0 tablespoon honey, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . line a large baking sheet with parchment paper . set aside . peel the beets and chop them into 3/4 inch cubes . chop the carrots into 1/2 inch thick slices . arrange in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet . drizzle the beets and carrots with the olive oil and honey . sprinkle with the salt and black pepper . use a rubber spatula to toss beets and carrots until evenly coated . roast the beets and carrots on middle rack of oven, stirring once during cook time, until they are fork tender and slightly caramelized, 60 75 minutes . check to see that beets and carrots are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . serve beets and carrots immediately.

name: fresh pear and fig danish braid
description: fresh pear and fig danish braid with fresh yeast, whole milk, sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground cardamom, vanilla extract, large eggs, apple cider, all purpose flour, salt, unsalted butter, flour, cream cheese, butter, sugar, vanilla, eggs, pastry dough, cream cheese, figs, pears, egg whites
ner: fresh yeast, whole milk, sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground cardamom, vanilla extract, large eggs, apple cider, all purpose flour, salt, unsalted butter, flour, cream cheese, butter, sugar, vanilla, eggs, pastry dough, cream cheese, figs, pears, egg whites
ingredients: 1.0 ounce fresh yeast, 0.5 cup whole milk, 0.3 cup sugar, 0.5 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1.0 teaspoon ground ginger, 0.8 teaspoon ground cardamom, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.0 large eggs, 0.2 cup apple cider, 3.2 cup all purpose flour, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.5 pound unsalted butter, 0.2 cup flour, 8.0 ounce cream cheese, 4.0 tablespoon butter, 0.2 cup sugar, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla, 1.0 eggs, 1.0 pastry dough, 1.0 cream cheese, 5.0 figs, 4.0 pears, 1.0 egg whites
steps: combine yeast and milk in the bowl of a kitchenaid stand mixer fit with the flat beater attachment and mix on low speed . allow to rest for 10 minutes . slowly add sugar, spices, vanilla extract, eggs, and apple cider . mix well . change from the flat beater attachment to the dough hook and add the salt with the flour, 1 cup at a time, increasing speed to medium as the flour is incorporated . knead the dough for about 5 minutes, or until smooth . if dough is sticky, add a bit more flour . transfer dough to a lightly floured baking sheet and cover tightly with plastic wrap . refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to one hour . to make the butter block combine butter and flour in the bowl of a kitchenaid stand mixer fit with a flat beater attachment and beat on medium speed for 1 minute . scrape down the sides of the bowl and the flat beater and continue to beat for 1 minute more, or until very smooth . set aside . do not refrigerate . after the pastry dough has chilled at least 30 minutes, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface . roll the dough into a rectangle approximately 18 x 14 inches and 1/4 inch thick . the dough may be sticky, so keep dusting it lightly with flour . spread the butter block evenly over the center and right thirds of the dough . fold the left edge of the dough to the right, covering half of the butter . fold the right third of the rectangle over the center third . the first turn has now been completed . mark the dough by poking it with your finger to keep track of your turns, or choose another way to keep track of your turns . place the dough on a baking sheet, wrap tightly in plastic wrap, and refrigerate for 30 minutes . after chilling, place the dough lengthwise on a floured work surface . the open ends should be to your right and left . roll the dough into another approximately 14 x 18 inch, 1/4 inch thick rectangle . again, fold the left third of the rectangle over the center third and the right third over the center third . the second turn has now been completed . refrigerate the dough for another 30 minutes . roll out, turn, and refrigerate the dough two more times, for a total of four single turns . refrigerate the dough after the final turn for at least 5 hours or overnight . the dough is now ready to be used . if you will not be using the dough within 24 hours, freeze it . to do this, roll the dough out to about 1 inch in thickness, wrap tightly in plastic wrap, and freeze . defrost the dough slowly in the refrigerator for easiest handling . danish dough will keep in the freezer for up to 1 month . to make the cream cheese filling in a medium mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and butter until smooth . add sugar and continue to beat for 2 minutes . add egg and vanilla, once again beating until smooth . set aside until ready for use . to prepare the danish line a baking sheet with a silicone mat or parchment paper . on a lightly floured surface, roll the danish dough into a 15 x 20 inch rectangle, 1/4 inch thick . if the dough seems elastic and shrinks back when rolled, let it rest for a few minutes, then roll again . place the dough on the baking sheet . along one long side of the pastry make parallel, 5 inch long cuts with a knife or rolling pastry wheel, each about 1/2 inch apart . repeat on the opposite side, making sure to line up the cuts with those you've already made . spoon the filling down the center of the rectangle, then top with pears and figs . starting with the top and bottom "flaps", fold the top flap down over the filling to cover . next, fold the bottom "flap" up to cover filling . this helps keep the braid neat and helps to hold in the filling . now begin folding the cut side strips of dough over the filling, alternating first left, then right, left, right, until finished . trim any excess dough and tuck in the ends.egg wash/whisk the egg white in a bowl and with a pastry brush, lightly coat the braid.

name: irish pork stew
description: hearty and flavorful, this stew's flavor changes depending on what type of beer or stout you choose . serve with samples of imported beers and a loaf of irish soda bread.
ner: boneless blade pork roast, flour, salt, pepper, vegetable oil, red potato, carrots, onions, garlic, parsley, caraway seeds, bay leaf, chicken broth, stout, red wine vinegar, brown sugar
ingredients: 2.0 pound boneless blade pork roast, 0.3 cup flour, 1.5 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon pepper, 1.0 teaspoon vegetable oil, 8.0 red potato, 4.0 carrots, 4.0 onions, 1.0 clove garlic, 0.2 cup parsley, 1.0 teaspoon caraway seeds, 1.0 bay leaf, 10.5 ounce chicken broth, 12.0 ounce stout, 2.0 tablespoon red wine vinegar, 1.0 tablespoon brown sugar
steps: in a bowl combine flour, salt and pepper . coat pork cubes . heat oil in dutch oven brown meat over medium high heat . add onions and garlic . cook and stir 5 minutes . stir in remaining ingredients . bring to a boil . cover medium low heat for 1 to 1 1/4 hours or until meat is very tender . stir occasionally.

name: fusilli mit lauch und pilzen
description: ein einfaches aber sehr leckeres pastagericht aus italien.
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: 2 stangen lauch waschen, putzen und in ringe schneiden . 500 g champignons ebenfalls putzen und in dunne scheiben schneiden . 400 g fusilli nach packungsangabe in reichlich kochendem salzwasser al dente garen . beim abgiessen etwas nudelwasser auffangen . 2 essloffel olivenol in einer pfanne erhitzen . den lauch und die pilze darin bei grosser hitze ca . 5 minuten braten . mit 100 ml weisswein abloschen und diesen fast vollstandig einkochen lassen . 200 g mascarpone einruhren, dann etwas vom aufgefangenen nudelwasser zugeben, bis die gewunschte konsistenz erreicht ist . die fusilli in die sauce geben und alles gut vermengen . mit parmesanspanen, salz und pfeffer abschmecken, sofort servieren.

name: 10 minute magic cilantro, lime, and chili vinaigrette
description: "magic" because it takes so little time but has a big pop of flavor, this bright, mildly spicy dressing is gorgeous on all types of salads, especially hearty ones such as bean, potato, or pasta types . but keep it in mind for meat and fish, too . if you want to amp up the heat level, double the amount of jalapeno . the recipe, which makes 1 1/4 cups, is a yummly original created by martha holmberg https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/martha holmberg .
ner: finely grated lime zest, jalapeno chili, garlic, salt, sugar, fresh cilantro, fresh lime juice, extra virgin olive oil
ingredients: 0.5 teaspoon finely grated lime zest, 0.5 jalapeno chili, 1.0 clove garlic, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.5 teaspoon sugar, 1.0 cup fresh cilantro, 0.2 cup fresh lime juice, 0.8 cup extra virgin olive oil
steps: put lime zest, chili, garlic, and salt and sugar in a food processor or blender . pulse until chili is finely chopped . if you're using a blender, stop to stir ingredients a few times if needed . add cilantro and pulse until finely chopped . scrape down sides of processor or blender with a rubber spatula . add lime juice . with processor or blender running, slowly pour in olive oil . process until dressing is creamy . adjust seasoning, adding more salt or sugar to taste if you like . serve vinaigrette on mixed green salads, roasted vegetable salads, tomato salads, steamed new potatoes, white beans, grilled or baked fish, grilled chicken breasts, and sliced grilled steak . dressing keeps in refrigerator up to 1 week.

name: light and tangy chicken salad
description: light and tangy chicken salad with hellmann's or best foods low fat mayonnaise dressing, mango chutney, cooked chicken, red grapes, celery, red onion
ner: hellmann's or best foods low fat mayonnaise dressing, mango chutney, cooked chicken, red grapes, celery, red onion
ingredients: 0.2 cup hellmann's or best foods low fat mayonnaise dressing, 0.2 cup mango chutney, 2.0 cup cooked chicken, 0.5 cup red grapes, 0.5 cup celery, 2.0 tablespoon red onion
steps: in medium bowl, combine hellmann's or best foods low fat mayonnaise dressing with mango chutney . add remaining ingredients . season, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper . serve, if desired, on lettuce and garnish with toasted sliced almonds . chill, if desired.

name: cod on a bed of hummus with pippin apple
description: these fresh cod pastries make a refreshing lunch or dinner option any time throughout the year, regardless of season . sauteed with lemon, garlic, and lime, the cod is then baked in a pastry bowl with goat cheese and fresh parsley until melty and crisp . served over a bed of chopped apples tossed with vinegar and homemade or storebought hummus, this cod entree boasts a host of fresh and unique flavors, slightly sweet and just the right amount of savory.
ner: cod, puff pastries, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, lime zest, salt, ground black pepper, goat cheese, parsley, pippin apple, cider vinegar, hummus
ingredients: 2.0 slice cod, 2.0 puff pastries, 0.5 onion, 2.0 garlic cloves, olive oil, 1.0 lime zest, salt, ground black pepper, 0.3 goat cheese, parsley, 0.5 pippin apple, cider vinegar, hummus
steps: preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius . bake the cod for about 4 minutes, remove the bones and the skin . saute with the onion, garlic, a drizzle of olive oil, and lime zest . season with salt and pepper to taste . after braising, brush two glass oven proof pans with olive oil, and line them with the pastry . add the cod, and sprinkle the goat cheese and parsley on top . bake for 25 minutes . serve with 1/2 pippin apple cut into small pieces, and mixed with a few drops of cider vinegar, on a bed of hummus different recipe, as pictured.

name: southwest spiced roast pork tenderloin
description: southwest spiced roast pork tenderloin with pork tenderloin, paprika, salt, brown sugar, sugar, chili powder, ground cumin, black pepper
ner: pork tenderloin, paprika, salt, brown sugar, sugar, chili powder, ground cumin, black pepper
ingredients: 1.0 pork tenderloin, 1.0 tablespoon paprika, 1.5 teaspoon salt, 1.5 teaspoon brown sugar, 1.5 teaspoon sugar, 1.5 teaspoon chili powder, 1.5 teaspoon ground cumin, 1.5 teaspoon black pepper
steps: in small bowl, stir together paprika, salt, brown sugar, sugar, chili powder, ground cumin and black pepper until thoroughly blended . makes 1/4 cup . heat oven to 425 degrees f . season tenderloin with 2 tablespoons rub . place tenderloin in shallow pan and roast for 20 27 minutes, until internal temperature reads 145f . remove pork from oven and let rest 5 minutes . slice tenderloin to serve.

name: pork green chili
description: this recipe is courtesy of foodie with family https //www.foodiewithfamily.com/ . hearty and delicious pork green chili hits the spot on a cold winter night . with plenty of flavor from roasted hatch chiles, this pork green chili recipe will have everyone at your table coming back for seconds.
ner: boneless country rib pork, all purpose flour, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, granulated garlic, sunflower oil, yellow onion, garlic, cumin, green chile, salsa verde, chicken stock, chicken base, diced potatoes, small white beans
ingredients: 1.5 pound boneless country rib pork, 0.2 cup all purpose flour, 0.5 teaspoon kosher salt, 0.5 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 0.5 teaspoon granulated garlic, 2.0 tablespoon sunflower oil, 0.5 yellow onion, 6.0 clove garlic, cumin, 0.8 cup green chile, 3.5 cup salsa verde, 4.0 cup chicken stock, 1.0 tablespoon chicken base, 4.0 cup diced potatoes, 1.0 can small white beans
steps: add the pork cubes, flour, salt, black pepper, and granulated garlic to a gallon sized zipper top bag, seal the bag, and shake to evenly coat the pork . to make pork green chili on the stove top drizzle 1 tablespoon of the oil into a heavy bottomed stockpot or soup pot over medium heat . add the pork cubes and brown them on all sides . transfer the pork to a plate . add the remaining oil to the pan along with the diced onion . stir and sautee until the onion is semi translucent, lowering the heat if needed to avoid scorching the onion, about 3 minutes . stir in the garlic and cumin and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute . stir in the browned pork, diced green chile, salsa verde, chicken stock, chicken base, and potatoes . cover and simmer on low for 45 minutes, or until the pork and potatoes are tender . stir in the beans and cook just until heated through . to make pork green chili in a slow cooker drizzle 1 tablespoon of the oil into a heavy bottomed skillet over medium heat . add the pork cubes and brown them on all sides . transfer the pork to your slow cooker . add the remaining oil to the pan along with the diced onion . stir and sautee until the onion is semi translucent, lowering the heat if needed to avoid scorching the onion, about 3 minutes . stir in the garlic and cumin and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute . scrape this into the slow cooker . stir in the browned pork, diced green chile, salsa verde, chicken stock, chicken base, and potatoes . cover and simmer on low for 6 hours or as long as 8 hours if you need to be away from the slow cooker, or until the pork and potatoes are tender . stir in the beans and cook just until heated through . to make pork green chili in an instant pot/countertop pressure cooker drizzle 1 tablespoon of the oil into the pan of your instant pot set to sautee . add the pork cubes and brown them on all sides . transfer the pork to a plate . add the remaining oil to the pan along with the diced onion . stir and sautee until the onion is semi translucent, lowering the heat if needed to avoid scorching the onion, about 3 minutes . stir in the garlic and cumin and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute . stir in the browned pork, diced green chile, salsa verde, chicken stock, chicken base, and potatoes . cover and cook on high pressure for 30 minutes, or until the pork and potatoes are tender . carefully release the pressure, then stir in the beans and cook just until heated through.

name: spicy thai beef and jasmine rice
description: i love a good rice dish, and i love spicy beef so this recipe sounded like something i would enjoy.
ner: 95 lean ground beef, onion, medium green onions, garlic, crushed red pepper, medium carrots thinly sliced, red bell pepper, jasmine rice, soy sauce, asian fish sauce, fresh chopped cilantro
ingredients: 3/4 lb 95 lean ground beef, 1/2 onion, 6 medium green onions, 2 cloves garlic, 1/2 tsp crushed red pepper, 3 medium carrots thinly sliced, 1/2 red bell pepper, 1 cup jasmine rice, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp asian fish sauce, 1/3 cup fresh chopped cilantro
steps: heat a heavy medium pot over high heat . add beef and saute until browned . add onion, scallions, garlic, crushed red pepper and 1 tbsp soy sauce . saute another 2 minutes . add carrots, red pepper, rice, 2 cups water, fish sauce and remaining soy sauce . reduce to low heat, when the water is almost evaporated, cover . simmer on low about 20 minutes . add cilantro and mix well and keep covered for 10 more minutes.

name: challah bruschetta with lemon ricotta and honey
description: recipe for challah bruschetta with fresh lemon ricotta, olive oil, honey, lemon zest and salt . appetizer, kosher, dairy.
ner: fresh lemons, high quality whole milk ricotta cheese, medium challah loaf, quality extra virgin olive oil i prefer organic, garlic, peeled, sea salt or kosher salt, light colored honey
ingredients: 2 fresh lemons, 2 cups high quality whole milk ricotta cheese, 1/2 medium challah loaf, quality extra virgin olive oil i prefer organic, 1 clove garlic, peeled, sea salt or kosher salt, light colored honey
steps: before you begin, zest the yellow part of the peel from the two lemons using a fine microplane grater . reserve the zest.juice both of the lemons . stir the fresh lemon juice into the ricotta cheese with a fork . reserve the ricotta . slice the halved challah loaf lengthwise to create two long, thinner loaves . slice each loaf into slices that are about 3/4 inch thick.to char the bread, you can grill it or broil it . if grilling, make sure your grill or grill pan is preheated before you start . brush both sides of each challah slice lightly with olive oil . put the bread to the grill or griddle, and cook until slightly charred on each side, about 2 minutes per side . alternatively, broil the bread slices about 3 inches from the heating element, flipping them after about a minute and watching them closely to make sure they don't get overly cooked/burnt . when the bread is charred to your liking, remove it . cut the peeled garlic clove in half . rub the toasted side of each slice lightly with the cut side of the garlic clove . to the side you've rubbed with garlic, add a generous smear of ricotta best to leave it kind of messy and rustic looking . drizzle slices with more olive oil and sprinkle with salt . drizzle a bit of honey over each bruschetta.sprinkle each slice with a generous amount of lemon zest . serve immediately while the bread is still toasty warm . be prepared to make another batch it's addictive.

name: the greenie
description: a nutritious, yummy smoothie tonic made with kale or spinach, apple, pear, grapes, fresh mint, lime juice and cinnamon . healthy, vegan, kosher.
ner: water, organic ripe green apple cut into chunks, core discarded, organic ripe green pear cut into chunks, core discarded, organic roughly chopped fresh kale or spinach, organic roughly chopped fresh mint, chilled green or moscato grapes, ice cubes, cinnamon, stevia or 1 tbsp agave nectar, or more to taste, lime
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups water, 1 organic ripe green apple cut into chunks, core discarded, 1 organic ripe green pear cut into chunks, core discarded, 2 cups organic roughly chopped fresh kale or spinach, 1/2 cup organic roughly chopped fresh mint, 20 chilled green or moscato grapes, 12 ice cubes, 3/4 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp stevia or 1 tbsp agave nectar, or more to taste, 1 lime
steps: pour 1 1/2 cups cold water into the blender . add one small handful of the apple and pear chunks . blend till the mixture is thoroughly liquid . continue adding the apple and pear chunks in small handfuls, blending each handful one at a time, till all of the fruit chunks are blended in . add the greens and mint, one handful at a time, and blend in batches till all of the greens have been blended in . add the grapes, ice cubes, cinnamon, agave or stevia and lime juice . blend till the ice cubes are thoroughly crushed and the mixture is smooth . i blend it for at least 1 minute to make sure all of the greens are totally pulverized . serve . though it's enough for 3 medium servings, my husband and i divide this recipe between 2 large mugs . there is always a little left over after we fill our glasses, which we usually polish off between the two of us . this recipe is the best health tonic ever . each time we drink it we feel refreshed, energized and ready to take on the day . note make sure you follow the steps in the order suggested . if you simply cram all the ingredients into the blender at once, they won't blend properly.

name: air fryer shishito peppers
description: air fried shishito peppers come out charred and blistered with the air fryer, which uses much less oil a squeeze of lemon juice and they are delicious
ner: shishito peppers, extra virgin olive oil spray, kosher salt, lemon
ingredients: 8 ounces shishito peppers, extra virgin olive oil spray, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 lemon
steps: spritz the shishito peppers all over with olive oil . preheat the air fryer 400f 3 minutes . transfer to the air fryer and cook in one batch 400f 8 minutes, shaking the basket halfway until soft and slightly charred and blistered sprinkle with salt and squeeze with lemon wedges, serve warm.

name: zucchini boats with ground beef
description: zucchini is a savory and sweet vegetable that can be added to many dishes . this recipe for zucchini boats with ground beef will not only tantalize the taste buds, it also will be a fun dish for the kids . this dish takes only 35 minutes to prepare so it is perfect for a weeknight dinner option . ingredients include zucchini or squash, onions, ground beef, paprika, pasta sauce, ground basil, and shredded mozzarella cheese.
ner: squashes, onion, cooking spray, ground beef, paprika, pasta sauce, basil, mozzarella
ingredients: 3.0 squashes, 0.3 cup onion, cooking spray, 200.0 gram ground beef, 1.0 teaspoon paprika, 0.8 cup pasta sauce, 0.5 teaspoon basil, 0.8 cup mozzarella
steps: cut the zucchinis in half and remove the flesh with a small knife . place on a microwave safe plate and cover with plastic wrap . poke a few holes into the plastic wrap and microwave for 2 minutes on high . check to see if tender, repeating until done . spritz a skillet with cooking spray and saute the ground beef and paprika, stirring until the meat is cooked through and separated into small pieces . add the pasta sauce and the basil and cook for 5 minutes before removing from heat . set aside . scoop the meat filling into the zucchini shells, sprinkle with cheese, and microwave for 1 minute.

name: homemade lo mein noodles and steak
description: the easiest, most delicious lo mein you will make it's quick, healthy and best of all, it's kid approved this delicious homemade lo mein noodles and steak is perfect for a busy night dinner it really is the best lo mein recipe
ner: noodles, evoo, cabbage, carrots, mushrooms, onions, stir fry sauce, soy sauce, sugar, pepper, strip steak
ingredients: noodles, evoo, 0.5 cup cabbage, 0.2 cup carrots, 0.1 cup mushrooms, 0.1 cup onions, 3.0 tablespoon stir fry sauce, 2.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 0.5 teaspoon sugar, 1.0 pinch pepper, strip steak
steps: 1cook noodles to al dente and set aside in a skillet heave evoo, add vegetables and cook until slightly softened add noodles to skillet and toss stir in soy sauce mixture remove noodles and vegetables from skillet and set aside but keeping warm in the same skillet sear a strip steak on both sides, remove and slice into strips, return to pan and cook all of the way through add steak to noodles

name: savory lo mein
description: savory lo mein with vegetable oil, clove garlic, finely chopped, bok choy, lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, water, sherry, soy sauce, ground ginger, linguine
ner: vegetable oil, clove garlic, finely chopped, bok choy, lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, water, sherry, soy sauce, ground ginger, linguine
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1.0 clove garlic, finely chopped, 1.0 head bok choy, 1.0 envelope lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, 1.0 cup water, 2.0 tablespoon sherry, 1.0 teaspoon soy sauce, 0.2 teaspoon ground ginger, 8.0 ounce linguine
steps: heat oil in 12 inch skillet over medium heat and cook garlic and bok choy, stirring frequently, 10 minutes or until crisp tender . stir in lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix blended with water, sherry, soy sauce and ginger . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes . toss with hot linguine . sprinkle, if desired, with toasted sesame seeds.

name: chateaubriand steaks with mushroom red wine sauce
description: gorgeous rare beef tenderloin portioned into steaks and served with a mushroom red wine cream sauce . a restaurant quality meal made at home
ner: beef tenderloin, salt, black pepper, olive oil, butter, cremini mushrooms, shallot, salt, black pepper, garlic, dry red wine, beef broth, fresh thyme, heavy cream
ingredients: 1.5 pound beef tenderloin, salt, black pepper, 1.5 teaspoon olive oil, 2.0 tablespoon butter, 8.0 ounce cremini mushrooms, 1.0 shallot, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 clove garlic, 0.5 cup dry red wine, 0.5 cup beef broth, 3.0 sprig fresh thyme, 0.3 cup heavy cream
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . season the beef tenderloin liberally with salt and black pepper on all sides . drizzle with olive oil . transfer the tenderloin to a baking dish and allow it to stand at room temperature for 15 minutes . roast the tenderloin on middle rack of oven until it reaches 130degf, 35 45 minutes . in the last 10 minutes of the roasting time, prepare the mushroom red wine sauce . check to see that tenderloin is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . tent with aluminum foil and allow to rest for 10 minutes . heat the butter in a large skillet over medium high heat . add the mushrooms and shallots, and season with salt and pepper . saute until the mushrooms are shrunken and browned, and the shallots are translucent, 5 6 minutes . add the garlic and continue cooking until fragrant, about 30 seconds . pour the red wine into the skillet to deglaze the pan, scraping up the browned bits on the bottom with a spatula . add the beef broth and thyme sprigs . allow the mixture to simmer until the liquid is reduced by half, 5 7 minutes . stir in the heavy cream and continue simmering until heated through, 1 2 minutes . slice the tenderloin into 2 to 3 inch thick slices and arrange on a serving platter . remove the thyme sprigs from the skillet and discard . spoon the mushroom red wine sauce over the tenderloin slices, and serve immediately.

name: refreshing vanilla and orange milkshakes
description: refreshing vanilla and orange milkshakes with ice cubes, orange juice, 2 milk, breyers natural vanilla ice cream
ner: ice cubes, orange juice, 2 milk, breyers natural vanilla ice cream
ingredients: 1.0 cup ice cubes, 1.0 cup orange juice, 0.5 cup 2 milk, 2.0 cup breyers natural vanilla ice cream
steps: process all ingredients in blender until smooth.

name: overnight oats
description: overnight oats in a mason jar no cooking required a hearty healthy breakfast packed with fiber, vitamins, and nutrients.
ner: quick oats, unsweetened almond breeze original almond milk, medium banana, chia seeds, blueberries, nunaturals liquid vanilla stevia, cinnamon, chopped pecans
ingredients: 1/4 cup quick oats, 1/2 cup unsweetened almond breeze original almond milk, 1/4 medium banana, 1/2 tbsp chia seeds, 1/2 cup blueberries, 4 5 drops nunaturals liquid vanilla stevia, pinch cinnamon, 1 tbsp chopped pecans
steps: place all the ingredient in a jar, shake, cover and refrigerate overnight . the next morning, add your favorite crunchy toppings such as nuts, granola, etc and enjoy

name: pumpkin spice no bake cheesecake
description: pumpkin spice no bake cheesecake is an easy, light cheesecake made with pumpkin puree and spices . under 10 minutes to make, if you use ready made crust.
ner: 1/3 less fat philadelphia cream cheese, pureed pumpkin, vanilla, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, brown sugar, truwhip, reduced fat graham cracker crust
ingredients: 8 oz 1/3 less fat philadelphia cream cheese, 1/2 cup pureed pumpkin, 1 tsp vanilla, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp pumpkin pie spice, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 4 oz truwhip, 9 inch reduced fat graham cracker crust
steps: in a large bowl whip cream cheese, pumpkin, vanilla, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, and brown sugar for a few minutes until fluffy . a hand mixer or spatula both work fine . add truwhip and whip until smooth . spoon mixture into pie crust and chill for a few hours, until firm.

name: baked rice and peas
description: this simple baked rice and peas dish uses pantry and freezer staples, a great side dish to go along with grilled shrimp or chicken.
ner: uncooked long grain rice, can chicken or vegetable broth, butter, parmesan cheese, 1/2 package frozen peas
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked long grain rice, 14.5 oz can chicken or vegetable broth, 1 teaspoon butter, 2 tbsp parmesan cheese, 5 oz 1/2 package frozen peas
steps: preheat oven to 350degf . combine all ingredients in a oven safe baking dish with a lid . place a piece of tin foil between the lid and the dish to ensure no steam escapes . bake 45 minutes do not open, do not peek, do not stir to rice . when 45 minutes is up, remove from oven and let it sit for 10 more minutes to allow the steam to finish cooking the rice, do not open, do not peek, do not stir to rice . after 10 minutes, remove lid and fluff with a fork.

name: uiensoep met tosti van geitenkaas
description: heerlijke franse uiensoep met gekaramelliseerde uitjes . geserveerd met een tosti van geitenkaas . een snelle, lekkere lunch
ner: unox franse uiensoep, brood, geitenkaas, halvarine
ingredients: 1.0 bag unox franse uiensoep, 4.0 slice brood, 75.0 gram geitenkaas, halvarine
steps: verwarm de franse uiensoep volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . snijd de kaas in plakken en smeer de halvarine op de boterhammen . beleg twee boterhammen met kaas, leg de andere boterhammen erop en bak de tosti's in een tosti apparaat of op de grill . schep de unox soep in de soepkommen en serveer met de geitenkaas tosti's . eet smakelijk

name: latin style pork belly bao bun
description: latin style pork belly bao bun with pork belly, salt, sugar, cumin, coriander, guajillo chili peppers, garlic, poblano chiles, cumin, coriander, allspice, cider vinegar, salt
ner: pork belly, salt, sugar, cumin, coriander, guajillo chili peppers, garlic, poblano chiles, cumin, coriander, allspice, cider vinegar, salt
ingredients: 1.0 pork belly, salt, sugar, cumin, coriander, 8.0 guajillo chili peppers, 8.0 clove garlic, 2.0 poblano chiles, 2.0 teaspoon cumin, 2.0 teaspoon coriander, 2.0 teaspoon allspice, 1.0 cup cider vinegar, salt
steps: 1. pork belly rub pork belly with salt, sugar, cumin and coriander on the meat side of pork belly only 2. chill for two days in roasting pan 3. fill roasting pan with water until it is half the belly's height 4. roast at 275degf for 3 hours 5.turn up heat to 450degf for 5 minutes then decrease to 375degf and cook until skin is crisp, but not burnt 5. portion for service

name: mussels in basil cream sauce
description: none
ner: butter, shallots, garlic, garlic set aside, live mussels, white wine, fat free half and half, fresh basil, olive oil, parmesan, salt and fresh pepper
ingredients: 2 tsp butter, 1 shallots, 1 cloves garlic, 2 cloves garlic set aside, 2 lbs live mussels, 1/2 cup white wine, 1/2 cup fat free half and half, 1/2 cup fresh basil, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1/4 cup parmesan, salt and fresh pepper
steps: scrub and de beard mussels in cold water . discard any cracked or unopened shells . in a large pot melt butter . add shallots and 1 clove chopped garlic and saute about 3 minutes . add wine and bring to a boil . add mussels and cover until mussels open, about 4 to 6 minutes . when mussels are cooked, scoop them out with a slotted spoon . discard any mussels that didn't open . add 1/4 cup of ff half and half to the wine and simmer about 4 minutes . in a blender, puree basil, parmesan cheese, olive oil, remaining half and half and garlic . add to cream, season with salt and pepper and simmer another few minutes . pour over mussels.

name: autumn sweet potato soup
description: warm and creamy autumn soup can be made vegan and gluten free . yams, zucchini, tomatoes, spices, peanut butter . vegan, gluten free, contains nuts.
ner: extra virgin olive oil, large yellow onion, peeled and diced, garlic, crushed, orange sweet potatoes yams, peeled and cubed, zucchini, sliced, yellow vegetable stock, fresh thyme leaves, cumin, ground ginger, cayenne pepper, medium tomatoes, peeled and diced, creamy peanut butter, , salt and pepper, , chopped roasted peanuts or fresh thyme leaves for garnish
ingredients: 1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, 1 large yellow onion, peeled and diced, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 2 1/2 lbs orange sweet potatoes yams, peeled and cubed, 1 lb zucchini, sliced, 2 quarts yellow vegetable stock, 1 tbsp fresh thyme leaves, 1 tsp cumin, 1/2 tsp ground ginger, pinch cayenne pepper, 3 medium tomatoes, peeled and diced, 1/3 cup creamy peanut butter, , salt and pepper, , chopped roasted peanuts or fresh thyme leaves for garnish
steps: heat olive oil over medium till hot not smoking . saute onion in the oil until it begins to soften and turn golden, about 10 minutes . add garlic and continue to saute for 3 minutes more . add sweet potatoes, zucchini, vegetable stock, thyme leaves, cumin, ginger, and cayenne to the pot . i like to use 1/4 tsp of cayenne, which gives a nice spicy kick to the soup . if you're sensitive to spice, start with 1/8 tsp . bring mixture to a boil, then reduce to a light simmer for 20 minutes . add diced tomatoes to the pot learn how to peel tomatoes here . simmer for 5 10 minutes more until all the vegetables are tender . stir 1/3 cup peanut butter into the broth until it dissolves . remove from heat . season with salt and pepper to taste . add more cayenne for heat, if desired . add additional peanut butter to taste . some like it with just a hint of peanut flavor . i typically use a few more tablespoons around 1/2 cup total because i love peanut butter . adjust until the flavor is to your liking . soup may be served as is chunky with texture, or you can puree the soup with an immersion blender until smooth . serve garnished with chopped roasted peanuts or fresh thyme leaves.

name: strawberry topping
description: how to make a fresh strawberry topping for ice cream, blintzes, cheesecake, waffles, anything kosher, pareve, gluten free, dairy free.
ner: chopped fresh strawberries, sugar, water, vanilla, cornstarch or potato starch for passover, use potato starch
ingredients: 2 cups chopped fresh strawberries, 1/3 cup sugar, 1/3 cup water, 1 tsp vanilla, 1 tbsp cornstarch or potato starch for passover, use potato starch
steps: put chopped strawberries and sugar into a small saucepan . add 1/3 cup water to cover, stir to blend . heat mixture over medium high heat until it boils . stir, then reduce heat to medium . mix cornstarch with 2 tbsp of cold or room temperature water until a thick liquid forms . pour the liquid into the pan, stirring continuously, and continue to stir until well blended . cook the strawberry mixture over medium for 3 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until it becomes thick and syrupy . remove from heat and stir in the vanilla . you can serve the topping as is with a chunky texture, or puree it smooth with an immersion blender . you can also puree it halfway, so that it's almost smooth but still has some texture . use for anything that requires a sweet strawberry topping cheesecake, ice cream sundaes, waffles, or cheese blintzes

name: pizza burgers
description: pizza burgers with ragu old world style pasta sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese, english muffins, hamburger
ner: ragu old world style pasta sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese, english muffins, hamburger
ingredients: 1.5 cup ragu old world style pasta sauce, 1.0 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 6.0 english muffins, 6.0 hamburger
steps: grill or broil hamburgers until done . arrange on muffin halves, then top with pasta sauce, cheese and muffin halves.

name: courgettesoep met gorgonzola
description: courgettesoep met gorgonzola is een heerlijke soep uit de italiaanse keuken . extra lekker en verantwoord door bertolli vloeibaar . serveer het als voorgerecht, als opkikker, met ciabatta en bij tapas . er is genoeg voor 4 personen.
ner: courgettes, ei, kippenbouillon, eieren, peterselie, basilicum, gorgonzola
ingredients: 4.0 courgettes, 2.0 tablespoon ei, 750.0 milliliter kippenbouillon, 4.0 eieren, 1.0 tablespoon peterselie, 1.0 tablespoon basilicum, 150.0 gram gorgonzola
steps: snijd de courgettes in kleine stukjes . verwarm de bertolli vloeibaar in een soeppan . fruit hierin de stukjes courgette glazig . schenk vervolgens de kippenbouillon erbij en breng het aan de kook . laat de soep in een afgedekte pan in 20 minuten zachtjes gaarkoken . klop de eieren los en roer er de peterselie en basilicum door . haal de soep van het vuur en klop het eimengsel er doorheen . breng de soep op smaak met zout en peper . verbrokkel de gorgonzola in de kommen en schep de soep erop.

name: spring sesame shrimp and sugar snap pea stir fry
description: spring sesame shrimp and sugar snap pea stir fry with sugar snap peas, shrimp shells, oil, rice vinegar, oyster sauce, soy sauce, water, olive oil, onion, garlic, salt, cracked black pepper, sesame seeds, fresh cilantro
ner: sugar snap peas, shrimp shells, oil, rice vinegar, oyster sauce, soy sauce, water, olive oil, onion, garlic, salt, cracked black pepper, sesame seeds, fresh cilantro
