ingredients: 1.0 pound sugar snap peas, 0.5 pound shrimp shells, 1.0 teaspoon oil, 1.0 tablespoon rice vinegar, 0.5 teaspoon oyster sauce, 0.8 teaspoon soy sauce, 1.0 tablespoon water, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 onion, 2.0 clove garlic, salt, cracked black pepper, sesame seeds, fresh cilantro
steps: in a bowl, combine the sesame seed oil, rice vinegar, oyster sauce, soy sauce and water . set aside . heat a large skillet from your kitchenaid tri ply copper 10 piece cookware set over medium high heat on your kitchenaid 30" 5 burner gas cooktop . add olive oil, onions and garlic . cook until soft, about 1 minute . increase heat to high, add shrimp and sear until it turns pink . add the sugar snap peas and cook until the peas are tender, about 1 minute . add the sauce mixture and stir the mixture until everything is combined and cooked through . add additional salt and pepper if needed, to taste . top with sesame seeds and chopped cilantro . serve as a side dish or with rice.

name: blood orange salad with gorgonzola, pecans and baby greens
description: none
ner: blood oranges, blood orange, baby greens like arugula or baby spinach, gorgonzola cheese, pecans, shallots, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt and fresh ground pepper
ingredients: 3 blood oranges, 2 blood orange, 5 cups baby greens like arugula or baby spinach, 4 oz gorgonzola cheese, 1/2 cup pecans, 2 tbsp shallots, 2 tbsp balsamic vinegar, 4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, salt and fresh ground pepper
steps: for the vinaigrette, combine about 1/3 cup orange juice, olive oil, shallots, balsamic, salt and pepper in a small glass jar and shake vigorously . place baby greens and gorgonzola in a large salad bowl and toss with just enough vinaigrette to coat . divide greens on 6 individual salad plates and top with oranges and sprinkle chopped nuts . drizzle with a little more vinaigrette and serve immediately.

name: old bay maryland crab soup
description: old bay maryland crab soup with tomatoes, water, beef broth, frozen lima beans, baby carrots, sweet corn, mccormick onions, chopped, old bay seasoning, lump crabmeat
ner: tomatoes, water, beef broth, frozen lima beans, baby carrots, sweet corn, mccormick onions, chopped, old bay seasoning, lump crabmeat
ingredients: 28.0 ounce tomatoes, 3.0 cup water, 2.0 cup beef broth, 1.0 cup frozen lima beans, 1.0 cup baby carrots, 1.0 cup sweet corn, 2.0 tablespoon mccormick onions, chopped, 1.0 tablespoon old bay seasoning, 1.0 pound lump crabmeat
steps: place all ingredients, except crabmeat, in 4 quart saucepan . bring to boil on medium heat . reduce heat to low cover and simmer 5 minutes . stir in crabmeat cover and simmer 10 minutes.

name: mashed potato gnocchi with thanksgiving trimmings
description: thanksgiving is a time for giving thanks, taking a moment to reflect on good fortune and good people in our lives . it's also an opportunity to guiltlessly gorge, allow marshmallows on the dinner table, and to test the limit of those elastic waist pants . after the gorge, most of us leave a lot of food on the table, don't let those delicious dishes go to waste . transform your leftover mashed potatoes into pillowy little gnocchis and then smother them in this hearty stew made of thanksgiving trimmings . don't settle for a thanksgiving dinner rerun when it comes to your leftovers, get creative and have fun with them.
ner: leftover gravy, leftover mashed potatoes, freshly grated nutmeg, flour, leftover turkey, leftover squash, fresh herbs, grated parmesan cheese, salt, eggs, flour, olive oil
ingredients: 0.5 cup leftover gravy, 2.0 cup leftover mashed potatoes, freshly grated nutmeg, 2.0 cup flour, 1.0 cup leftover turkey, 1.0 cup leftover squash, 1.0 handful fresh herbs, grated parmesan cheese, salt, 2.0 eggs, flour, olive oil
steps: equipment small pot for gravy, large pan for sauce, medium pot for gnocchi, microplane . start by placing leftover gravy in a small pot over medium heat to warm . now add hot water to your medium pot and salt heavily . bring salted water to a boil . place your leftover mashed potatoes into a bowl . crack your eggs into the mashed potatoes and sprinkle with salt . stir the potato mixture well . grate nutmeg into the potatoes, about 30 strokes on the microplane, don't be shy . add flour and mix really well to form a dough . dump the dough out onto a lightly floured work surface . knead the dough, adding a bit more flour if it's too moist . only work it to the point where it stops sticking, don't overdo it . divide the dough into 4 equal pieces . for each piece, roll the dough into a log approximately 2 inches in diameter . now cut the log into pillows, about every 2 inches, to form your gnocchi . if you're feeling fancy, and have some time, check out the gnocchi tip below . once your water is boiling you can gently lower your gnocchi into the water . add the leftover turkey and squash to your hot pan . drizzle pan with olive oil and toss . now pour your warm, leftover gravy to the pan with the turkey and squash, along with a ladle full of starchy gnocchi water . for a pop of freshness, add your fresh herbs to the pan, whatever herbs you've chosen . after the gnocchi has been cooking for about 3 4 minutes, it should be done . remove gnocchi from the pot, placing them directly into your pan with the trimmings, and toss to combine . plate your gnocchi with trimmings sauce and top it with a heavy grate of parmesan cheese and a quick, light drizzle of olive oil.

name: baked chicken quesadilla
description: this healthy baked chicken quesadilla recipe is a delicious and easy mexican dinner for your family . get the recipe at http //www.cookingwithvinyl.com/duet chicken quesadilla/
ner: cooking oil, chicken breast, taco seasoning, red bell pepper, onion, jalapeno, fresh cilantro, lime, shredded cheddar cheese, flour tortillas, butter
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon cooking oil, 1.0 chicken breast, 2.0 tablespoon taco seasoning, 1.0 red bell pepper, 1.0 onion, 1.0 jalapeno, 1.0 tablespoon fresh cilantro, 1.0 lime, 1.0 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 8.0 flour tortillas, 1.0 tablespoon butter
steps: preheat oven to 350 degrees . in large skilled, heat oil over medium high heat . cook chicken breast until browned and shred using two forks . add seasoning . add pepper, onion, and jalapeno . cook until softened . add lime juice and cilantro stir . on greased baking sheets, lay out half of the tortillas . top the tortillas with half of the cheese . add the chicken and vegetable mixture and then top with remaining cheese . place remaining tortillas on top and spray or brush the tops with a light coating of butter . bake for 10 minutes, carefully flipping after 5 minutes and lightly coating the other side with butter . serve topped with cilantro garnish and sour cream, if desired.

name: chickpeas with eel
description: you do not have to spend a ton of money to have a five star dinner . try this recipe for chickpeas with eel . this rich and flavorful appetizer combines a hearty meal on a budget . be sure to plan ahead, because these decadent hand held treats need to be refrigerated for at least an hour before serving . we hope you and your loved ones enjoy this dish as much as we do.
ner: chickpeas, smoked eel, spinach, onion, leek, bay leaf, quail eggs, bread, salt, extra virgin olive oil
ingredients: 400.0 gram chickpeas, 100.0 gram smoked eel, 200.0 gram spinach, 1.0 onion, 1.0 leek, 1.0 bay leaf, 5.0 quail eggs, 1.0 piece bread, salt, extra virgin olive oil
steps: soak chickpeas and eel overnight in separate bowls of water . heat chickpeas, leek, onion, and bay leaf in a pot of water and bring to a boil . for the traditional cooking method, simmer the chickpeas for two hours . for the pressure cooker method, cook the chickpeas for 20 minutes . tip the traditional way tastes better and allows more control over doneness . drain eel and chop . when chickpeas are cooked, remove onion and leek, add chopped eel and continue cooking for 15 minutes . heat oil in a small saucepan and fry a slice of bread in oil . grind fried bread with the leek and onion . mix the bread mixture with chickpeas . boil quail eggs . when the chickpeas are done, stir in spinach and cook for 2 additional minutes . to serve, garnish each plate with a quail egg.

name: croissants for all tastes
description: croissants for all tastes with puff pastry, cooking chocolate, cheese slices, ham slices, sesame seeds, egg yolk
ner: puff pastry, cooking chocolate, cheese slices, ham slices, sesame seeds, egg yolk
ingredients: 1.0 puff pastry, 4.0 square cooking chocolate, 2.0 cheese slices, 2.0 ham slices, sesame seeds, 1.0 egg yolk
steps: roll out the dough and cut it like a pizza . at the widest part of each slice put the filling . for the chocolate croissants place 2 squares, and in the savoury ones place the slice of ham rolled inside the cheese slice . wrap the croissants starting at the widest part . place on the baking tray . brush them with the stirred egg yolk . leave some simple croissants for those who want to put jam inside them . on top of the cheese and ham, and chocolate croissants, sprinkle sesame seeds . bake in a hot oven 420 f for 15 minutes.

name: spaghetti met aubergine in tomaten saus met knoflook
description: maak nu zelf zo'n overheerlijke spaghetti gerecht met aubergine . door de bertolli knoflook pastasaus te gebruiken als basis is zelf tomatensaus niet nodig en staat het gerecht in 20 minuten op tafel . van zo'n lekkere italiaanse pasta zullen de kinderen ook smikkelen.
ner: spaghetti, bertolli pastasaus knoflook, aubergine, rode ui, bertolli voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, pijnboompitten, basilicum
ingredients: 350.0 gram spaghetti, 1.0 bag bertolli pastasaus knoflook, 1.0 aubergine, 1.0 rode ui, 1.0 tablespoon bertolli voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, 50.0 gram pijnboompitten, 6.0 leaf basilicum
steps: kook de spaghetti volgens de bereidingswijze op de verpakking . pel en snipper de ui . snijd de aubergine in stukjes en hak de basilicum fijn . verwarm de bertolli vloeibaar in een hapjespan . fruit hierin eerst de ui, voeg vervolgens de aubergine toe en schep dit even om . doe nu de pastasaus erbij en laat de saus 8 a 10 minuten zachtjes stoven . roer tot slot de pijnboompitjes en de basilicum door de saus, verdeel de spaghetti over de borden en schep de saus erop.

name: cauliflower gnocchi
description: this delicious cauliflower gnocchi is made with cauliflower instead of traditional potatoes . no need for a trader joe's run make them from scratch with just three ingredients
ner: cauliflower florets, white whole wheat flour, kosher salt, olive oil spray, marinara sauce, grated parmesan cheese for topping, basil
ingredients: 3 pounds cauliflower florets, 1 cup white whole wheat flour, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, olive oil spray, 2 cups marinara sauce, grated parmesan cheese for topping, basil
steps: place the cauliflower in a large pot, cover with water make sure veggies are submerged, and bring to a boil . reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 22 minutes, until the cauliflower is very soft . drain and set aside to cool . once cooled, in batches put 1/3 to 1/2 of the cauliflower in a dish towel and squeeze out as much excess water as possible then place in a large bowl . repeat with the remaining cauliflower until all of it is well drained and squeezed of all liquid so the dough isn't too sticky . add the flour and salt into the bowl with the mashed cauliflower and mix with a fork at first, then using your hands to fold and squeeze everything together into a dough . dust a work surface with flour, then separate the dough into 8 equal pieces, about 2 1/2 ounces each . one at a time, roll each ball into a 1/2 inch thick rope 10 inches long and set aside . continue until all the dough is used up . next, cut each rope into 13 equal sized gnocchi like pieces, slightly nudging the pieces apart so they're not touching . you should get about 108 pieces total . if at any point the dough becomes too sticky to work with, add flour to your hands . in two batches, liberally mist a large a skillet with nonstick oil spray and warm over medium heat . place half of the gnocchi on the hot skillet if the pieces stick together just slice them apart in the skillet using the spatula . do not overcrowd the pan you'll need to cook the gnocchi in two batches . let the gnocchi sit in the hot pan undisturbed for 2 minutes, then gently flip using a spoon or tongs, being careful not to squish them . sprinkle salt over the tops and continue to cook for another 2 to 4 minutes or until desired doneness . set aside and repeat with remaining gnocchi, then add everything back to the skillet and pour the marinara over everything, give a stir and serve topped with optional grated cheese.

name: easiest pasta and broccoli recipe
description: the easiest pasta and broccoli recipe that my whole family loves, including my kids . only 5 ingredients and one pot, ready in under 15 minutes
ner: uncooked pasta, fresh broccoli florets, garlic, grated parmesan or romano, olive oil, kosher salt and fresh cracked pepper
ingredients: 12 oz uncooked pasta, 6 1/2 cups fresh broccoli florets, 5 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup grated parmesan or romano, 2 tbsp olive oil, kosher salt and fresh cracked pepper
steps: bring a large pot of salted water to a boil . when water boils, add pasta and broccoli at the same time and cook according to pasta instructions for al dente . when pasta is almost done cooking, reserve about 1 cup of the pasta water and set aside . drain pasta and broccoli . return the pot to the stove and set heat to high add 1 tbsp olive oil, when hot, add garlic . cook until golden, reduce flame to low and add pasta back to the pot . mix well, add remaining olive oil, grated cheese, salt and pepper to taste mixing well and smashing any large pieces of broccoli to break up . add 1/2 cup of reserved pasta water and mix well adding more if needed . serve in pasta bowls with additional grated cheese on the side.

name: tudor dynasty rice pudding
description: learn what the upper classes of tudor england ate during the reign of henry viii and try a historically inspired recipe for rice pudding.
ner: dry rice, unsalted butter, milk, heavy cream, egg yolks, sugar, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, raisins black or golden, currants, butter or cooking spray for greasing dish, cinnamon sticks for garnish
ingredients: 2 cups dry rice, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1 1/2 cups milk, 1 1/4 cups heavy cream, 3 large egg yolks, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 1/4 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp ginger, 1/2 tsp nutmeg, 3/4 cup raisins black or golden, 3/4 cup currants, butter or cooking spray for greasing dish, cinnamon sticks for garnish
steps: preheat oven to 350 degrees f . steam rice until tender according to package instructions . while rice is cooking, place raisins and currants into a small pot and cover with hot water . bring just to a boil on the stovetop, then remove from heat . let fruit soak in the hot water to plump . after rice has cooked, stir in the butter till melted . in a mixing bowl, whisk together milk, cream, egg yolks, sugar, cinnamon, ginger and nutmeg . pour mixture into the rice and stir till combined . drain the raisins and currants, then fold them into the rice mixture . grease a 9x9 inch baking dish with butter or cooking spray . pour rice mixture into the dish . place in the oven and bake uncovered for about 45 minutes until the top of the pudding turns golden brown . serve garnished with a cinnamon stick, if desired . serve warm.

name: cioppino
description: cioppino with seafood stock, clams, well scrubbed, mussels, well scrubbed, bertolli classico olive oil, fennel, bertolli vineyard premium collections marinara with burgundy wine sauce, vermouth, dry white wine, uncooked large shrimp, cod
ner: seafood stock, clams, well scrubbed, mussels, well scrubbed, bertolli classico olive oil, fennel, bertolli vineyard premium collections marinara with burgundy wine sauce, vermouth, dry white wine, uncooked large shrimp, cod
ingredients: 2.0 cup seafood stock, 24.0 clams, well scrubbed, 24.0 mussels, well scrubbed, 2.0 tablespoon bertolli classico olive oil, 1.0 cup fennel, 1.0 jar bertolli vineyard premium collections marinara with burgundy wine sauce, 0.2 cup vermouth, 1.0 cup dry white wine, 0.5 pound uncooked large shrimp, 2.0 pound cod
steps: bring wine to a boil over high heat in 8 quart stockpot . stir in clams and cook covered 5 minutes . add mussels and cook covered 5 minutes or until shells open . remove clams and mussels strain liquid . discard any unopened shells . set aside clams, mussels and reserve liquid . heat olive oil in same stockpot over medium high heat and cook fennel, stirring occasionally, 3 minutes . stir in vermouth and cook 1 minute . stir in reserved liquid, stock and bertolli vineyard premium collections marinara with burgundy wine sauce . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered, stirring occasionally, 30 minutes . stir in shrimp and cook 3 minutes . stir in snapper and cook 1 minute or until shrimp turn pink and snapper flakes with a fork . return mussels and clams to stockpot heat through . serve, if desired, with bruschetta or crusty italian bread.

name: sesame orange broccoli
description: none
ner: kosher salt, broccoli, corn starch, fresh orange juice, orange zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, grated ginger, garlic clove, sesame oil, scallion, sesame seeds, red pepper flakes
ingredients: kosher salt, 12 oz broccoli, 1/2 tablespoon corn starch, 1/4 cup fresh orange juice, 1/4 teaspoon orange zest, 2 tbsp reduced sodium soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoon grated ginger, 1 garlic clove, 1/2 teaspoon sesame oil, 1 scallion, 1/2 teaspoon sesame seeds, red pepper flakes
steps: bring a large pot of salted water to a rolling boil . add broccoli and boil for 1 minutes . drain and immediately place broccoli in a large bowl of ice water to stop it from cooking . in a small bowl add orange juice, soy sauce, orange zest and cornstarch, whisking until cornstarch is dissolved . heat a non stick wok or large deep skillet over high heat . add sesame oil, scallions, garlic and ginger and saute for 30 seconds . add the sauce and broccoli and saute 1 to 2 minutes, until the broccoli is crisp tender . sprinkle with sesame seeds and red pepper flakes if using . serve immediately.

name: zuurkool in de wok bereid met augurken, gebakken uitjes en bieslook
description: heerlijk recept voor een snelle zuurkool variatie . bereid in de wok met gebakken uitjes, fijngeknipte bieslook en augurken . fris en lekker het hele jaar door
ner: uien, zuurkool, unox gelderse rookworst, augurkjes, vloeibare margarine, aardappelblokjes, paprikapoeder, peper, gebakken uitjes, bieslook
ingredients: 2.0 uien, 500.0 gram zuurkool, 1.0 unox gelderse rookworst, 10.0 augurkjes, 4.0 tablespoon vloeibare margarine, 1.0 kilogram aardappelblokjes, 5.0 tablespoon paprikapoeder, peper, 20.0 gram gebakken uitjes, 2.0 teaspoon bieslook
steps: pel en snijd de uien in dunne ringen . spoel de zuurkool als u hem te zuur vindt af onder koud stromend water en laat hem uitlekken . snijd de unox rookworst en de augurken in plakjes . verhit de vloeibare margarine in een ruime wok en fruit de uiringen al omscheppend in 5 minuten goudgeel en glazig . voeg de aardappelblokjes toe en bak ze al omscheppend in 10 minuten bruin . schep de zuurkool, de rookworst en paprikapoeder en peper en zout naar smaak erdoor en bak alles totdat het gerecht door en door warm is . schep vlak voor het serveren de augurken door het gerecht . garneer met de gebakken uitjes en bieslook . serveer de zuurkool met rookworst direct . eet smakelijk

name: pbandj pita
description: pbandj pita with skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread, strawberry jelly, whole wheat pita bread, apple
ner: skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread, strawberry jelly, whole wheat pita bread, apple
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread, 2.0 tablespoon strawberry jelly, 1.0 whole wheat pita bread, 0.5 cup apple
steps: evenly spread skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread and welch's reduced sugar strawberry jelly on pita bread . top with apple.

name: pecanbrownies met vanille ijs
description: chocolade maken voor een brownie met vanille ijs zelf brownies bakken van bittere chocola en cacao is niet zo moeilijk . ze zijn binnen een uur klaar.
ner: ongezouten pecannoten, margarine, extra bittere chocolade, eieren, bruine basterdsuiker, bloem, cacaopoeder, hertog romige vanille
ingredients: 100.0 gram ongezouten pecannoten, 125.0 gram margarine, 125.0 gram extra bittere chocolade, 2.0 eieren, 150.0 gram bruine basterdsuiker, 50.0 gram bloem, 65.0 gram cacaopoeder, 1.0 container hertog romige vanille
steps: verwarm de oven voor tot 180 degc . hak de pecannoten grof, houd wat noten achter voor garnering . smelt de margarine met de stukken chocolade in een pan . mix de eieren met de suiker tot een lichte romige massa . meng het margarinemengsel erdoor . zeef de bloem met de cacaopoeder en het mespuntje zout en schep het door het beslag . spatel de gehakte noten erdoor . schep het beslag in een met bakpapier beklede vierkante vorm . garneer met de achtergehouden noten en bak 30 35 minuten in de oven . snijd de iets afgekoelde brownie in stukken . leg op elk bord een brownie en schep hierop een royale bol hertog romige vanille ijs . serveer direct.

name: orange creamsicle
description: recipe for an easy citrus cocktail with vanilla infused vodka . tastes just like an orange popsicle with creamy vanilla ice cream inside
ner: orange juice, vanilla infused vodka, ice, fresh orange rounds for garnish, blender
ingredients: 4 oz orange juice, 2 oz vanilla infused vodka, ice, fresh orange rounds for garnish, blender
steps: fill a tall glass with ice . pour in vanilla infused vodka, top with orange juice . stir . serve with fresh orange rounds for garnish . optionally, you may blend the ingredients with ice to make a slushy/daiquiri type drink note if you want this cocktail to be kosher, use kosher certified liquors . use gf vodka made from potatoes to keep it gluten free.

name: roasted pork tenderloin with oregano coriander rub
description: roasted pork tenderloin with oregano coriander rub with pork tenderloin, dried oregano, ground coriander, dried thyme, ground cumin, curry powder, salt, fresh parsley
ner: pork tenderloin, dried oregano, ground coriander, dried thyme, ground cumin, curry powder, salt, fresh parsley
ingredients: 1.0 pound pork tenderloin, 1.0 teaspoon dried oregano, 1.0 teaspoon ground coriander, 0.5 teaspoon dried thyme, 0.5 teaspoon ground cumin, 0.5 teaspoon curry powder, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 2.0 tablespoon fresh parsley
steps: trim any fat from pork . for dry rub, combine oregano, coriander, thyme, cumin, curry powder and salt in small bowl . moisten pork tenderloin with water coat with dry rub . if desired, place pork in shallow dish cover and marinate in refrigerator for 8 hours or overnight . heat oven to 450 degrees f . place pork on rack in shallow roasting pan . roast about 20 27 minutes or until an instant read thermometer inserted near center reads 145 degrees f . remove from oven and loosely cover pork with foil . let rest for 5 minutes . slice pork arrange slices on a serving plate . sprinkle with parsley.

name: mushroom fennel quinoa stuffing
description: this savory quinoa stuffing is a delicious, protein packed, gluten free alternative to traditional stuffing.
ner: uncooked quinoa, low sodium chicken broth, olive oil, small onion, fennel, celery, carrots, sliced fresh mushrooms, salt and fresh cracked pepper to taste
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked quinoa, 1 1/2 cups low sodium chicken broth, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 small onion, 3/4 cup fennel, 1/2 cup celery, 1/2 cup carrots, 8 oz sliced fresh mushrooms, salt and fresh cracked pepper to taste
steps: cook rinsed quinoa in broth according to package directions . while the quinoa is cooking, in a large heavy saute pan add olive oil to the pan, then the onion, saute one minute . add the fennel, celery, and carrots, salt and pepper to taste cook about 12 15 minutes over medium heat, until vegetables are soft . add the mushrooms to the pan, more salt and pepper if needed and cook, stirring 5 minutes, then cook covered for 2 minutes, or until the mushrooms have released their juice and are cooked through . add the cooked quinoa to the pan and mix well.

name: bali banana date smoothie
description: this simple banana date smoothie is made with a combo of banana, dates, yogurt, honey, ice, and cinnamon, makes a refreshing and tasty concoction.
ner: ripe medium banana, nonfat greek yogurt, 1 milk, honey, pitted date, cinnamon, ice cubes
ingredients: 1/2 ripe medium banana, 1/4 cup nonfat greek yogurt, 1/2 cup 1 milk, 1/2 tbsp honey, 1 pitted date, 1/8 tsp cinnamon, 2 ice cubes
steps: blend banana, yogurt, milk and honey until smooth . add dates, cinnamon, and ice . blend for 3 minutes more.

name: maple pecan banana muffins
description: moist and delicious maple pecan banana muffins, so good you won't believe they are light
ner: medium very ripe bananas, white whole wheat flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, maple sugar, large egg whites, pure maple syrup, unsweetened apple sauce, vanilla extract, crushed pecans
ingredients: 3 medium very ripe bananas, 1 1/4 cups white whole wheat flour, 3/4 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoon unsalted butter, 1/4 cup maple sugar, 2 large egg whites, 1/4 cup pure maple syrup, 2 tbsp unsweetened apple sauce, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/3 cup crushed pecans
steps: preheat oven to 325degf . line a cupcake tin with liners . mash bananas in a bowl, set aside . in a medium bowl, combine flour, baking soda and salt with a wire whisk . set aside . in a large bowl cream butter and 1/4 cup maple sugar with an electric mixer . add egg whites, mashed bananas, maple syrup, apple sauce and vanilla beat at medium speed until mixed well, scraping down sides of the bowl . add flour mixture, then blend at a low speed until just combined . pour the batter into the prepared muffin tin . spread the pecans evenly over the muffins . bake the muffins on the center rack for 30 to 35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

name: pork vindaloo
description: hailing from the portugese influenced state of goa in india, vindaloo is much loved for its combination of sweet spices, tangy vinegar, and fiery heat . it tastes good on day one but even better after a day or two once the seasonings have melded, so you might want to consider making extra . the recipe is a yummly original created by prerna singh https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/prerna singh .
ner: chilies, whole cloves, black peppercorns, cumin seeds, fresh ginger, apple cider vinegar, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic salt, ground turmeric, pork shoulder, red onion, canola oil, sugar, salt, water, basmati rice
ingredients: 5.0 whole chilies, 0.5 teaspoon whole cloves, 0.5 teaspoon black peppercorns, 0.5 teaspoon cumin seeds, 2.0 inch fresh ginger, 0.3 cup apple cider vinegar, 10.0 garlic cloves, 1.0 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 1.0 teaspoon garlic salt, 0.5 teaspoon ground turmeric, 2.0 pound pork shoulder, 1.0 red onion, 3.0 tablespoon canola oil, 1.5 teaspoon sugar, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.5 cup water, basmati rice
steps: put chilies, cloves, peppercorns, and cumin seeds in a small frying pan . toast over medium heat just until fragrant, 2 3 minutes, then immediately pour onto a plate and let cool . pro tip you can buy kashmiri chiles at indian markets and online or use other small dried red chilies from the grocery store . scrape ginger with a spoon to remove peel, then coarsely chop . coarsely grind toasted spices in a spice grinder or clean coffee grinder discard stems from the chiles first . put ginger, ground spices, vinegar, garlic, red pepper flakes, garlic salt, and turmeric in a blender . grind into a coarse paste, scraping container as needed . cut pork shoulder into 1/2 inch chunks . transfer to a medium mixing bowl . add masala paste and massage it into pork . cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour or overnight . roughly chop onion . heat oil in a dutch oven over medium high heat . add onion and stir well, then add sugar and salt . cook, stirring often, until onion begins to turn golden, about 10 minutes . pro tip a non reactive pot such as an enameled dutch oven is perfect for curries like this . stir in pork with marinade and increase heat to high . cook, stirring occasionally, until meat is browned, about 5 minutes . reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer, stirring every 8 10 minutes, until pork is tender and the vindaloo gets a thick, jam like consistency, 45 60 minutes total . during cooking if the vindaloo starts to look like it could scorch, add up to 1/2 cup water . pro tip in india, it's common to cook pork vindaloo one day and reheat and serve it the next . on the second day the vinegar and spices have worked their magic, the pork is much more tender, and the spices are married well together . serve the vindaloo with steamed basmati rice or naan.

name: polish 'doughnuts' with cheese paczki z serem
description: sweet and slightly cheesy pastries, sprinkled with icing sugar mixed with cinnamon . yum taste great with a coffee or a glass of cold milk.
ner: curd cheese, flour, eggs, baking powder, icing sugar, salt, vodka, sour cream, cinnamon, oil
ingredients: 300.0 gram curd cheese, 2.0 cup flour, 4.0 eggs, 2.0 teaspoon baking powder, 2.0 tablespoon icing sugar, 1.0 pinch salt, 40.0 milliliter vodka, 3.0 tablespoon sour cream, cinnamon, oil
steps: mix the cheese with eggs, sour cream and sugar . add the flour, previously mixed with salt and baking powder . stir until you'll get a smooth mixture, add alcohol . alcohol will prevent the pastries from soaking too much oil in . in a medium saucepan, heat up the oil about 1 litre to about 170 degree celsius, try to keep same temperature throughout all the pastry frying if the temperature is too high, the pastries will burn quickly . using small spoon preferably round, like ice cream scoop, take small portions of the dough and place them on the hot oil . the pastries should turn pout nice and round . fry until the pastries are golden on both sides you need to flip them when one side is done . they should flip easily, just tap them with a fork . fish your pastries out with a slotted spoon and place them on a plate lined with a kitchen towel to soak up excess oil . give them few minutes to cool and sprinkle your pastries with icing sugar mixed with cinnamon . taste best when freshly baked and still warm . enjoy

name: bacon wrapped pork medallions with garlic mustard butter
description: bacon wrapped pork medallions with garlic mustard butter with pork tenderloin, bacon, salt, black pepper
ner: pork tenderloin, bacon, salt, black pepper
ingredients: 1.0 pork tenderloin, 4.0 slice bacon, salt, black pepper
steps: cut tenderloin in 8 slices medallions approximately 1 to 1 1/4 inch wide . place two slices medallions together and wrap bacon slice around both pieces to hold together to make pork "mignons." secure with wooden pick . repeat with remaining pork medallions and bacon . season both sides with salt and pepper and spray lightly with cooking spray . broil or grill per directions below . remove wooden pick serve with garlic mustard butter . makes 4 servings . directions for broiling pre heat broiler to 500o . broil pork mignons about 4 inches from heat source for 4 5 minutes per side or until internal temperature reaches 145 degrees fahrenheit, followed by a 3 minute rest time . direction for pan broiling heat skillet or grill pan over high heat add pork mignons . lower heat to medium high cook uncovered for 4 minutes or until nicely browned . turn cook an additional 4 5 minutes or until internal temperature reached 145 degrees fahrenheit, followed by a 3 minute rest time . directions for grilling pre heat grill to 400o . place pork mignons directly over high heat . close grill lid grill for 4 5 minutes per side or until internal temperature reaches 145 degrees fahrenheit, followed by a 3 minute rest time.

name: roasted carrot soup
description: roasted carrot soup with large carrots, onions, garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper, vegetable stock, tarragon leaves, heavy cream
ner: large carrots, onions, garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper, vegetable stock, tarragon leaves, heavy cream
ingredients: 8.0 large carrots, 0.5 onions, 3.0 garlic cloves, 2.0 tablespoon butter, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon pepper, 5.0 cup vegetable stock, 2.0 sprig tarragon leaves, 0.3 cup heavy cream
steps: preheat your oven to 400 degrees f . place carrots, onions and garlic onto a baking sheet and drizzle with melted butter . toss together the vegetables and butter then sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon of salt and 1/4 teaspoon of pepper . bake in the oven for 30 40 minutes until carrots are tender and caramelized . a few minutes before your vegetables are ready to be removed from the oven, heat up your vegetable stock and tarragon leaves in a stockpot over medium high heat . when the vegetables are done, squeeze the garlic out from its skin and add it and the rest of the veggies to the stock . use a kitchenaid pro line series cordless hand blender to blend the soup until smooth . lower the heat and add the cream and additional salt to taste . serve warm.

name: ham quesadillas
description: ham with fruit glaze leftovers get a flavor boost in these quesadillas . serve with sour cream and chopped tomatoes . keep dessert light with sliced oranges.
ner: ham, corn, chili powder, cheddar cheese, flour tortillas
ingredients: 2.0 cup ham, 8.0 ounce corn, 2.0 teaspoon chili powder, 2.0 cup cheddar cheese, 8.0 flour tortillas
steps: in a large bowl toss ham, corn, chili powder and cheese . heat 10 inch nonstick skillet over medium high heat . place one flour tortilla in skillet layer with about 1/2 cup of the ham mixture to within 1/2 inch of edge of tortilla . top with another tortilla . cook over medium high heat for 4 to 5 minutes, turning after 2 minutes, until light golden brown . remove quesadilla from skillet and keep warm . repeat with remaining tortillas and filling . cut quesadillas into wedges to serve.

name: indonesian cold drink "es doger"
description: es doger is an indonesian coconut milk based shaved ice beverage with pinkish color often served as a dessert.
ner: coconut milk, pandan leaves, salt, black glutinous rice
ingredients: 18.0 coconut milk, 2.0 pandan leaves, 1.0 pinch salt, 500.0 gram black glutinous rice
steps: cook everything to boil . remove pandan leaf and let sit cool in freezer . make shaved ice just before serving . to shaving frozen coconut milk you can use ice shaver machine . or just like i did, simply crush it into food processor and pulse until you get shaved ice texture . more detail please go visit http //myhomediaryinturkey.blogspot.com.tr/2016/08/es doger tape ketan hitam indonesian.html

name: baked tostones
description: these baked tostones or twice "fried" plantains aren't fried at all, they are baked in the oven which makes them a delicious, healthy side dish or appetizer
ner: green plantains, canola oil, salt, olive oil spray, sour orange juice, olive oil, large clove garlic, oregano, salt and pepper, cumin
ingredients: 3 medium green plantains, 2 tsp canola oil, salt, olive oil spray, 1/3 cup sour orange juice, 2 tsp olive oil, 1 large clove garlic, pinch oregano, pinch salt and pepper, 1/2 tsp cumin
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . spray baking sheet with cooking spray . peel plantains and slice into 1/2 thick slices . place in a bowl and toss with oil and salt . arrange slices on the baking sheet . lightly coat with a little more oil spray on top and bake for 10 minutes or until slightly brown on the bottom . remove from oven . using a tostonera a press, slightly mash each piece to about a quarter of an inch thick . if a tostonera is not available, insert the pieces between a folded piece of brown paper and press down using a saucer or the bottom of a glass jar . lightly re spray the baking sheet and place the plantains brown side up onto the baking sheet . lightly spray the top and bake for another 15 minutes until golden brown and crispy.

name: mini greek spinach pies
description: these bite sized spinach pies are a fun twist on one of my favorite greek dishes, spanakopita . these are great appetizers for the holidays, football games, or anytime you get together with friends and family.
ner: extra virgin olive oil, scallions, garlic, plum tomatoes, package frozen chopped spinach, fresh dill, fresh parsley, 2.5 oz reduced fat crumbled feta, grated parmesan cheese, kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, shells
ingredients: 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 1/2 cup scallions, 1 clove garlic, 2 plum tomatoes, 15 oz package frozen chopped spinach, 1 tbsp fresh dill, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, 1/2 cup 2.5 oz reduced fat crumbled feta, 2 tbsp grated parmesan cheese, kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 30 shells
steps: in a medium skillet, heat the oil over medium heat . add the scallions and garlic and cook until soft, about 2 minutes . add the tomatoes, spinach, dill, parsley and a pinch salt . cook about 3 to 5 minutes . adjust salt and pepper, to taste and cook for another minute . remove from the heat mix in feta and parmesan cheese set aside . when ready to serve, preheat the oven to 350degf . fill the fillo cups with spinach filling, place on a baking sheet and bake until hot, about 10 to 15 minutes.

name: chocolate raspberry brownie trifles
description: chocolate raspberry brownie trifles with ghirardelli 60 cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, large eggs, pure vanilla extract, salt, all purpose flour, ghirardelli dark chocolate raspberry filled squares, heavy cream, ghirardelli 60 cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips, whipped cream, fresh raspberries
ner: ghirardelli 60 cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, large eggs, pure vanilla extract, salt, all purpose flour, ghirardelli dark chocolate raspberry filled squares, heavy cream, ghirardelli 60 cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips, whipped cream, fresh raspberries
ingredients: 1.0 cup ghirardelli 60 cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips, 0.8 cup unsalted butter, 1.0 cup granulated sugar, 3.0 large eggs, 1.0 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 1.0 cup all purpose flour, 9.0 ghirardelli dark chocolate raspberry filled squares, 4.0 ounce heavy cream, 4.0 ounce ghirardelli 60 cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips, 2.0 cup whipped cream, 1.5 cup fresh raspberries
steps: preheat oven to 350deg f . line an 8x8 inch baking pan with foil and spray with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . microwave ghirardelli 60 cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips and butter in a large bowl microwave safe bowl at medium 50 power . stir every 30 seconds until chocolate and butter are melted and smooth . add sugar, eggs, vanilla, and salt to the chocolate mixture and whisk to combine . gradually add in flour stir until just combined . spread half the brownie batter into prepared pan . evenly place the ghirardelli dark chocolate raspberry filled squares and cover with remaining batter . spread batter evenly over the ghirardelli dark chocolate raspberry squares and bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes . remove pan to cooling rack to cool completely . once brownies are completely cooled, remove them from the pan and use a small glass or round biscuit cutter to cut the brownies into 8 9 circular shapes . once you have 8 9 brownie circles, slice each brownie in half horizontally, directly through the centers of the brownies, so each brownie is now two thinner circular brownies . when ready to serve, make the ganache . place ghirardelli 60 cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips in a medium bowl . in a medium saucepan over medium heat, bring cream to a boil and immediately remove from heat . pour hot cream over ghirardelli 60 cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips and let stand for 3 5 minutes . whisk ganache until smooth . alllow ganache to cool at room temperature for 10 15 minutes before assembling the trifles . to assemble the trifles place a brownie at the bottom of each trifle dish or small glass . evenly pipe or spoon a layer of ganache onto each brownie . add a layer of whipped cream and then a layer of fresh raspberries . repeats layers . serve immediately.

name: ann marie's chocolate chip cake
description: i worked with anne marie at a publishing company . she made this chocolate chip cake all the time for special occasions . she left publishing to become a heroic firefighter in the philadelphia fire department.
ner: butter, vanilla extract, sugar, eggs, sour cream, flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, sugar, cinnamon, semisweet chocolate chips
ingredients: 0.2 pound butter, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1.0 cup sugar, 2.0 eggs, 1.0 cup sour cream, 2.0 cup flour, 1.5 teaspoon baking soda, 1.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon cinnamon, 0.5 cup sugar, 1.0 teaspoon cinnamon, 6.0 ounce semisweet chocolate chips
steps: cream together first 3 ingredients butter, vanilla extract, sugar after creaming, add the 2 eggs, 1 cup sour cream in a separate bowl mix 2 cup flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon and add to the first bowl . in a 3rd bowl mix the remaining sugar, cinnamon, chocolate chips grease 9x13 baking pan, preheat oven at 350f put 1/2 the batter in the pan, add the chip mixture and then add the rest of the batter . tops with rest of chip mixture . bake for 1/2 hour . "cool and serve this bad boy, " said ann marie

name: gluten free dairy free pizza
description: this is the best gluten free pizza and not just because i made it . no more are the days of eating cardboard pizzas
ner: tapioca flour, brown rice flour, white rice flour, potato flour, cane sugar, baking powder, salt, xanthan gum, instant yeast, vegetable oil, apple cider vinegar, warm water, cornmeal, gluten free flour
ingredients: 0.8 cup tapioca flour, 0.8 cup brown rice flour, 0.5 cup white rice flour, 0.2 cup potato flour, 2.0 tablespoon cane sugar, 0.5 baking powder, 0.5 salt, 1.0 xanthan gum, 2.2 instant yeast, 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1.0 apple cider vinegar, 1.0 cup warm water, 2.0 tablespoon cornmeal, 1.0 gluten free flour
steps: preheat the oven to 200 degrees . grease a 13 inch round pizza pan or standard cookie sheet and dust with flour and corn meal . combine the yeast, apple cider vinegar, oil and water in a bowl and set aside to allow the yeast to hydrate . in a large mixing bowl combine the tapioca flour, brown rice flour, white rice flour, sweet potato flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and xanthan gum . add the wet ingredients to the dry and mix on low use the paddle attachment for kitchenaid mixers then once combined, switch to the dough hook to knead . once the dry ingredients have combined with the wet, scrape down the sides and mix on low for three minutes . after three minutes lightly oil hands and start to shape the dough into a flat disc . lay the dough onto the prepared pizza pan and flatten from the middle out using the palm of your hand . you can also use a rolling pin . leave the edges thick for the crust . loosely cover the dough with wax paper and place in the oven to rise for 25 minutes . turn off the oven while it is rising . after 25 minutes remove the dough from the oven and place it on the stove top or draft free counter top still covered . preheat the oven to 400 degrees . once the oven comes to temperature remove the wax paper from the dough, spritz the edges with water optional prevents cracking, and place the dough on the bottom rack . bake for 8 10 minutes . then remove from the oven and let cool for about ten minutes . once cooled coat the edges with oil i like to use olive oil for this . now it's ready for toppings . once toppings are added place back into the oven on the middle rack and bake for about 10 12 minutes . for a crisp crust bake directly on oven rack . recipe for pizza toppings 2 1/2 ounces precooked breakfast sausage omit for vegan 3 4 ounces daiya brand imitation mozzarella shreds 4 tablespoons tomato sauce or dairy free pesto 6 ounces spinach, chopped 1 clove garlic, crushed 1 2 tablespoons olive oil salt in a bowl, mix the garlic, spinach, olive oil and salt . evenly spread a thin layer of tomato sauce or dairy free pesto onto the pizza crust . then add the spinach mix, sausage and daiya "cheese". bake in the oven on the middle rack for 10 12 minutes at 400 degrees.

name: asian star anise sauce
description: asian star anise sauce with reduced sodium soy sauce, water, firmly packed brown sugar, star anise, hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, lemon juice
ner: reduced sodium soy sauce, water, firmly packed brown sugar, star anise, hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, lemon juice
ingredients: 0.5 cup reduced sodium soy sauce, 0.2 cup water, 3.0 tablespoon firmly packed brown sugar, 2.0 star anise, 1.0 cup hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, 2.0 tablespoon lemon juice
steps: in 1 quart saucepan, bring soy sauce, water, brown sugar and star anise to a boil over high heat . reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, 20 minutes or until thickened let cool . remove star anise discard . in medium bowl, combine soy mixture with hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise and lemon juice . chill, if desired, and serve with your favorite grilled meat or fish.

name: avocado and mango salsa
description: this avocado and mango salsa is a light and colorful party dish with chips . the combination of flavors, sweet and salty with tangy hint of lime makes this a winner . this is also great over grilled fish or chicken

name: mezcal in a jar
description: we're not exactly sure how many calories this recipe is but we know it's incredibly delicious try our mezcal in a jar recipe . we have a feeling you will love it as much as we do this mezcal in a jar recipe only takes 20 minutes to cook and is full of flavor let us know your thoughts by commenting below . you can also let us know your thoughts on this mezcal in a jar recipe by giving this recipe a star rating.
ner: lime, orange, grapefruit, grapefruit, soda, mezcal, salt
ingredients: 1.0 lime, 1.0 orange, 0.5 grapefruit, grapefruit, soda, 1.5 ounce mezcal, 0.5 teaspoon salt
steps: cut the lime, orange and grapefruit into small slices save one slice of each fruit for later . squeeze the juice from all of the fruits into a jar . add the mezcal, soda, and salt into the jar and mix well . place the slices of fruit into the drink and mix again . serve with plenty of ice and enjoy.

name: biefstuk met sherry pepersaus
description: biefstuk met sherry pepersaus with prei, blue band vloeibaar, sherry, blue band finesse voor koken, knorr peperroomsaus, biefstukken, zout, peper

steps: snijd de prei in dunne reepjes . verhit een eetlepel vloeibare margarine in een pan en smoor hierin de prei . voeg de sherry en de finesse voor koken toe en laat het iets inkoken . breng 2, 5 deciliter water aan de kook . neem de pan van het vuur en roer de mix erdoor . voeg de saus toe aan de prei . laat het op laag vuur zachtjes pruttelen . bestrooi ondertussen de biefstukken met zout en peper . verhit de resterende vloeibare margarine in een koekenpan en bak hierin de biefstukken rondom bruin en tot ze de gewenste gaarheid hebben bereikt . serveer het vlees met de saus.

steps: arrange lettuce on serving platter, then top with steak, oranges, snow peas and onion . just before serving, sprinkle with peanuts, then drizzle with wish bone light asian sesame ginger vinaigrette dressing.

name: cauliflower griddle cakes
description: cauliflower griddle cakes with cauliflower, garlic cloves, scallions, sheep, large eggs, lemon, baking powder, kosher salt, freshly ground pepper, all purpose flour, extra virgin olive oil, parmigiano reggiano cheese, lemon wedges
ner: cauliflower, garlic cloves, scallions, sheep, large eggs, lemon, baking powder, kosher salt, freshly ground pepper, all purpose flour, extra virgin olive oil, parmigiano reggiano cheese, lemon wedges
ingredients: 1.0 cauliflower, 2.0 garlic cloves, 4.0 scallions, 0.5 cup sheep, 2.0 large eggs, 1.0 lemon, 1.0 tablespoon baking powder, kosher salt, freshly ground pepper, 0.5 cup all purpose flour, 4.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 0.5 pound parmigiano reggiano cheese, lemon wedges
steps: grate the raw cauliflower on a box grater into small pieces . in a large bowl, combine the cauliflower, garlic, scallions, ricotta, eggs, lemon zest, baking powder and 1 teaspoon each of salt and pepper . stir well, then stir in flour until just incorporated . heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a saute pan or on flat top griddle . working in batches, add 2 tablespoon mounds of the cauliflower batter to the hot oil, spreading them to form 3 inch fritters . fry over moderately high heat, turning once, until browned and crisp, about 3 minutes . continue with remaining olive oil and batter . transfer fritters to serving plate, grate the parmigiano reggiano over them and serve right away with lemon wedges.

name: death by chocolate brownies
description: incredibly gooey, fudgy, death by chocolate brownies are the most obscenely sinful brownies you'll ever eat.
ner: chocolate chips, eggs, sugar, vanilla, instant coffee, flour, baking powder, salt
ingredients: 4.0 cup chocolate chips, 3.0 eggs, 1.0 cup sugar, 0.5 teaspoon vanilla, 1.0 teaspoon instant coffee, 0.5 cup flour, 0.5 teaspoon baking powder, 0.2 teaspoon salt
steps: preheat the oven to 350. melt 2 3 cups of chocolate chips . mix up three eggs with 1 c sugar, 1/2 tsp vanilla, and 1 tsp instant coffee . turn the mixer on low and leave it on while you stir together 1/2 c flour, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 1/4 tsp salt, and another cup of your awesome chocolate chips . put the dry ingredients in the wet, then add the chocolate and butter mixture . mix well and pour into a tart pan, or a 9" round, your mouth, etc . if it survives until the oven, bake at 350 for 35 minutes . inside is gooey chocolate heaven, so don't expect a toothpick to come out completely clean.

name: fig and carob milkshake
description: carob powder adds chocolatey flavor, without any actual chocolate, to this delicious "milkshake" that's made with unsweetned plain yogurt and milk in lieu of ice cream . fresh figs add plenty of sweetness meaning you may or may not need to add honey or sugar, depending on your taste preference . while this may seem like a strange combination, it's similar in spirit to the famous date shakes that you can find in california.
ner: plain yogurt, milk, carob flour, honey, figs
ingredients: 1.0 plain yogurt, 100.0 milliliter milk, 1.0 teaspoon carob flour, 2.0 teaspoon honey, 6.0 figs
steps: in the blender, add all the ingredients and grind until smooth . taste and sweeten if necessary . serve well chilled.

name: creme de grao e abobora com nabicas
description: receita robot de cozinha
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: coloque a cebola, o nabo e a abobora, cortados em pedacos, no copo e pique durante 7 segundos, na velocidade 5. raspe as paredes do copo com a espatula, junte o azeite e programe 8 minutos, a 100degc, na velocidade 2. adicione o grao, escorrido e lavado, e agua ate chegar ao nivel abaixo do maximo . tempere com sal e um pouco de noz moscada . ponha as folhas de nabica na vaporeira, encaixe a sobre o copo e coloque a tampa . programe 25 minutos, a 100degc, na velocidade 2. espere alguns minutos ate a sopa deixar de ferver, retire a vaporeira e encaixe o copo medidor na tampa do copo . triture 1 minuto e 30 segundos, na velocidade progressiva 6 a 10. junte as folhas da nabica cozidas a sopa e misture com a espatula.

name: one bowl banana pudding with coconut whipped cream
description: banana pudding, beloved by all, is really more of an icebox cake than a pudding . no matter what you call it, creamy vanilla pudding studded with chopped bananas and layered with vanilla wafers that soften into cake while the dessert rests in the fridge is comfort food of the highest order . add a coconut whipped cream topper, and you're in business . the recipe is a yummly original created by jessie sheehan https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/jessie sheehan .
ner: granulated sugar, cornstarch, salt, whole milk, heavy cream, large egg, large egg yolk, vanilla extract, unsalted butter, bananas, nilla vanilla wafers, heavy cream, confectioners sugar, coconut extract, sweetened shredded coconut, nilla vanilla wafers, banana
ingredients: 1.0 cup granulated sugar, 0.2 cup cornstarch, 0.8 teaspoon salt, 1.5 cup whole milk, 1.8 cup heavy cream, 1.0 large egg, 1.0 large egg yolk, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.0 tablespoon unsalted butter, 4.0 bananas, 7.0 ounce nilla vanilla wafers, 2.0 cup heavy cream, 0.2 cup confectioners sugar, 1.0 teaspoon coconut extract, 0.5 cup sweetened shredded coconut, 4.0 nilla vanilla wafers, 0.5 banana
steps: whisk together granulated sugar, cornstarch, and salt in a medium saucepan . add milk and cream, then egg and egg yolk, and whisk again until eggs are well blended . set pan over medium high heat, whisking constantly . pro tip for a somewhat less indulgent dessert, you can substitute whole milk for the heavy cream . once bubbles begin popping on surface and pudding thickens slightly, about 7 minutes, decrease heat to medium and whisk continuously for 45 seconds for cornstarch to fully cook . remove pan from heat . add vanilla and butter and whisk until butter melts . chop 2 of the bananas into small cubes and the remaining bananas into 1/2 inch coins . fold cubed bananas into pudding . transfer half of the pudding to an 8 inch square pan, spreading evenly . top with a layer of cookies, breaking them to fill any gaps . top cookies with half of the banana coins, distributing them evenly . repeat with remaining pudding, cookies, and banana coins . pro tip be sure to scrape the saucepan well and wipe it with a paper towel if necessary, as you'll be using it as a vessel for whipping your cream . set dish on 2 hot pads in the refrigerator and chill until somewhat cool, 15 30 minutes . put cream, confectioners sugar, and coconut extract in cooled medium saucepan . whip with a mixer on medium high speed until medium peaks form when beaters are lifted . fold in shredded coconut, if using . spread whipped cream evenly over pudding . crush cookies with your hands and sprinkle decoratively around the edge of the pudding . slice banana into coins, if using . scoop generous portions of pudding onto serving plates and add a few banana coins . pudding is best eaten within a day of being made, but will keep 2 days in refrigerator tightly wrapped in plastic wrap.

name: bospaddenstoelen soep met paddenstoelspiesjes
description: een heerlijk winters voorgerecht en gemakkelijk te bereiden . bospaddenstoelensoep met paddenstoelenspiesjes.
ner: paddenstoelen, boter, peterselie, ei, mosterd, paddenstoelen, blue band vloeibaar

steps: verkruimel de boterham dat gaat heel makkelijk in een keukenmachine . meng de broodkruimels op een groot bord met 1 eetlepel peterselie . klop het ei in een diep bord los met de mosterd en 2 eetlepels koud water . maak de paddenstoelen schoon . snijd grote paddenstoelen doormidden, rijg ze aan de spiesen en bestrooi ze met wat zout . rol de paddenstoelspiesen eerst door het ei en vervolgens losjes door het broodkruimmengsel . bewaar ze tot gebruik op een met keukenpapier bedekt bord in de koelkast . verwarm de bospaddenstoelensoep volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . verhit de vloeibare margarine in een grote koekenpan en bak hierin de paddenstoelspiesjes rondom lichtbruin . schep de soep in kleine soepkopjes of theekopjes, zet ze op grote borden en leg de paddenstoelspiesjes ernaast . strooi de rest van de peterselie over de soep . eet smakelijk

name: comfort food "bom petisco"/tuna patties with peas in butter and mint
description: are you in need of a healthy, rich and inexpensive comfort food meal how about "bom petisco, " which is tuna patties with peas in a butter and mint sauce . the tuna patties are rich and flavorful and include a mash potato puree with butter, milk, salt, nutmeg and pepper . once mixed well and chilled, they are breaded and fried . this dinner will comfort your family and not break your bank.
ner: butter, onion, tuna in oil, parsley, lemon, dijon mustard, potatoes, butter, milk, nutmeg, eggs, bread crumbs, flour, oregano, salt, pepper, frozen peas, sea salt, sugar, mint leaves, unsalted butter, white rice
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon butter, 1.0 onion, 3.0 can tuna in oil, 1.0 tablespoon parsley, 1.0 lemon, 1.0 teaspoon dijon mustard, 2.0 potatoes, 2.0 tablespoon butter, 2.0 tablespoon milk, nutmeg, 2.0 eggs, bread crumbs, flour, 1.0 teaspoon oregano, salt, pepper, 600.0 gram frozen peas, 2.0 tablespoon sea salt, 2.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 tablespoon mint leaves, 2.0 tablespoon unsalted butter, white rice
steps: in a large saucepan, saute onion in butter for about 5 minutes, until translucent . season with salt and pepper and add the well drained tuna . add the parsley, lemon zest, and mustard . once well mixed, turn off the heat, set aside . in the meantime, cook the potatoes until they are soft . mash the potatoes into a puree, add the butter and milk, season with salt, nutmeg, and pepper, and mix well . add the tuna mixture and mix well with the potatoes . shape the dough into patties and put in a large dish to make them harder, you can put the dough in the fridge for at least an hour . beat the eggs, put the flour in one dish, and in another one put the breadcrumbs blended with oregano . drip the rissoless in egg, then in flour, and finally in breadcrumbs . fry for about 3 4 minutes on each side . put water to boil in a saucepan, season with salt and sugar . add the peas and cook until they turn bright green . strain, and while still hot, add the chopped mint and the butter, stirring gently to mix well . taste and adjust seasoning . serve with the patties.

name: easy chocolate cake
description: this easy one bowl chocolate cake comes out perfectly every time the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: granulated sugar, canola oil, eggs, coffee, buttermilk, sour cream, vanilla extract, all purpose flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, heavy cream, salt
ingredients: 1.8 cup granulated sugar, 0.5 cup canola oil, 2.0 eggs, 0.8 cup coffee, 0.8 cup buttermilk, 0.2 cup sour cream, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.0 cup all purpose flour, 0.8 cup cocoa powder, 1.0 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 8.0 ounce unsalted butter, 2.0 ounce cream cheese, 4.0 cup powdered sugar, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 3.0 tablespoon heavy cream, 0.1 teaspoon salt
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray two 8 or 9 inch cake pans liberally with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . place the sugar, canola oil, eggs, coffee, sour cream, buttermilk, and vanilla in a large mixing bowl . whisk until smooth and combined . sift the flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt into the bowl . whisk until the ingredients come together in a smooth batter . divide the batter evenly between the two cake pans . bake the cakes on middle rack of oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 28 33 minutes . check to see that cakes are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the cakes to cool in the pans for 15 20 minutes . to release the cakes, run a butter knife between the edge of the cake and the pan . turn each cake onto a cooling rack . allow the cakes to cool fully for 1 2 hours before frosting . while the cakes cool, make the frosting . place the butter and cream cheese in a large mixing bowl . beat with a mixer on medium speed until smooth and creamy . add the powdered sugar in two additions, beating on low speed after each, until the sugar is fully incorporated . add the vanilla extract, heavy cream, and salt to the bowl . continue beating on medium high speed for 2 3 minutes, until the frosting is light and fluffy . adjust the consistency with an additional tablespoon of heavy cream if the frosting seems too thick . frost cake as desired . refrigerate until ready to serve.

name: mac 'n cheddarwurst smoked sausage pasta
description: enjoy a new twist on sausage mac and cheese with cheddarwurst smoked sausage and some fresh vegetables.
ner: hillshire farm cheddarwurst smoked sausage, unsalted butter, all purpose flour, milk, white cheddar cheese, pasta, broccoli florets, green peas, pasta water, kosher salt
ingredients: 1.0 package hillshire farm cheddarwurst smoked sausage, 0.2 cup unsalted butter, 3.0 tablespoon all purpose flour, 1.0 cup milk, 1.0 cup white cheddar cheese, 1.0 cup pasta, 1.0 ounce broccoli florets, 0.2 cup green peas, 1.0 cup pasta water, 1.0 tablespoon kosher salt
steps: cut sausage into 1/2 inch slices and place in a large skillet . cook and stir over medium high heat 4 5 minutes or until lightly browned . in the same skillet, melt butter and stir in flour until combined . whisk in milk until thick remove skillet from heat and stir in cheese until melted . cook pasta according to package instructions . add the broccoli and peas after 2 minutes of cooking reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain remaining . stir the pasta water into the cheese sauce until smooth . add the sausage, pasta and vegetables until coated season with salt.

name: sheetpan italian chicken and veggie dinner
description: assemble this super easy chicken and vegetable dinner on a sheet pan or two and pop it into your oven for a delicious, fuss free meal . for easy clean up, line your sheet pan with foil or parchment.
ner: kosher salt, onion powder, dried oregano, dried basil, thyme, sugar, black pepper, crushed garlic, olive oil, red wine vinegar, cooking spray, 4 oz each boneless skinless chicken thighs, trimmed of fat, kosher salt, zucchini, carrots, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, red onion, chopped parsley for garnish
ingredients: 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, 1/2 teaspoon dried basil, 1/4 teaspoon thyme, 1/2 teaspoon sugar, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 1 clove crushed garlic, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, cooking spray, 8 4 oz each boneless skinless chicken thighs, trimmed of fat, 1/2 tsp kosher salt, 12 ounces zucchini, 3 carrots, 1 red bell pepper, 1 yellow bell pepper, 1 red onion, chopped parsley for garnish
steps: preheat oven to 450f degrees . spray 2 large nonstick sheetpans with oil or use parchment or foil for easy cleanup . arrange the center rack and lower third . combine the italian seasoning ingredients in a large bowl . season chicken with 1/2 teaspoon salt, then add the chicken, zucchini, carrots, bell peppers and red onion to the bowl and toss well to coat . marinate 30 minutes or as long as overnight . arrange everything onto the prepared baking sheets spread out into a single layer . the vegetables and chicken should not touch . bake about 20 minutes, turn chicken and vegetables and bake an additional 10 minutes, until roasted and tender . top with fresh parsley and serve.

name: italian roasted pork chops
description: italian roasted pork chops with boneless pork chops, bread crumbs, butter, lemon peel, dried basil leaves, egg
ner: boneless pork chops, bread crumbs, butter, lemon peel, dried basil leaves, egg
ingredients: 4.0 boneless pork chops, 0.5 cup bread crumbs, 1.0 tablespoon butter, 2.0 teaspoon lemon peel, 1.0 teaspoon dried basil leaves, 1.0 egg
steps: heat oven to 425 degrees f . line a 15x10x1 inch baking pan with foil spray with vegetable cooking spray . in a shallow dish combine breadcrumbs, butter, lemon peel and basil . brush chops with egg, then dip in crumb mixture to coat top and sides . roast for 15 20 minutes or until internal temperature on a thermometer reads between 145f to 160f and allow to rest 3 minutes before serving.

name: pomegranate champagne cocktail
description: delicious champagne cocktail recipe with pure pomegranate juice, orange liqueur, sweet lime juice and champagne . includes mocktail variation.
ner: pure 100 pomegranate juice, chilled, cointreau, pomegranate seeds, sweetened lime juice, champagne or sparkling wine, chilled
ingredients: 2 tbsp pure 100 pomegranate juice, chilled, 1 tbsp cointreau, 1/2 tsp pomegranate seeds, 1/2 tsp sweetened lime juice, champagne or sparkling wine, chilled
steps: spoon the pomegranate seeds into the bottom of a champagne flute . add pomegranate juice, cointreau and sweetened lime juice . top off the flute with chilled champagne or sparkling wine . virgin mocktail modification substitute 1 tbsp fresh squeezed orange juice for the cointreau and non alcoholic sparkling cider for the champagne/sparkling wine . this makes a really yummy non alcoholic version

name: mangosteen and peach dazzler
description: mangosteen and peach dazzler with water, lipton white mangosteen and peach green tea bags, cranberry juice cocktail, honey, chilled seltzer
ner: water, lipton white mangosteen and peach green tea bags, cranberry juice cocktail, honey, chilled seltzer
ingredients: 1.0 cup water, 2.0 lipton white mangosteen and peach green tea bags, 0.2 cup cranberry juice cocktail, 2.0 tablespoon honey, none chilled seltzer
steps: pour boiling water over lipton white mangosteen and peach green tea bags cover and brew 3 minutes . remove tea bags and squeeze . stir in honey . combine juice with tea . serve in ice filled glass with mineral water.

name: gehaktballetjes in rode wijn met bleekselderij
description: heerlijke italiaanse gehaktballetjes in rode wijn met bleekselderij, in polpette stijl . serveer hem zoals echte italianen het doen met stokbrood en een eenvoudige italiaanse salade of bij de tapas . er is genoeg voor 4 personen.
ner: rundergehakt, oregano, peterselie, knoflook, pijnboompitten, broodkruimels, kaas, ei, bleekselderij, winterwortel, ui, gin, bertolli pastasaus traditioneel toscaans, wijn, suiker, laurier
ingredients: 450.0 gram rundergehakt, 3.0 tablespoon oregano, 2.0 tablespoon peterselie, 4.0 clove knoflook, 50.0 gram pijnboompitten, 1.0 tablespoon broodkruimels, 50.0 gram kaas, 3.0 ei, 2.0 stalk bleekselderij, 1.0 winterwortel, 1.0 ui, 2.0 tablespoon gin, 1.0 bag bertolli pastasaus traditioneel toscaans, 150.0 milliliter wijn, 1.0 tablespoon suiker, 3.0 laurier
steps: meng de ingredienten voor de gehaktballen in een kom goed door elkaar en draai er kleine balletjes van . verhit de bertolli vloeibaar in een braadpan en bak hierin de balletjes rondom bruin in 5 minuten . snijd ondertussen de bleekselderij en de winterwortel in stukken . hak de ui en het teentje knoflook fijn . verhit wat extra vergine olijfolie in een koekenpan en fruit hierin eerst de ui en de knoflook . voeg vervolgens de stukken bleekselderij en wortel toe en roerbak ze enkele minuten mee . schep de groenten bij de gehaktballetjes in de braadpan en voeg nu ook de bertolli pastasaus traditioneel toscaans toe . schep dit ongeveer 1 minuut lang om en schenk dan de rode wijn erbij . doe als laatste de suiker en de laurierblaadjes in de pan en laat het gerecht nog 15 minuten pruttelen . deze gehaktballetjes zijn heerlijk met pasta of roseval aardappeltjes.

name: eggplant and cheese timbale
description: eggplant and cheese timbale with eggplant, bertolli classico olive oil, sweet italian sausage links, cut into, garlic, penne pasta, cooked and drained, bertolli organic olive oil, basil and garlic sauce, mozzarella cheese, pecorino romano cheese
ner: eggplant, bertolli classico olive oil, sweet italian sausage links, cut into, garlic, penne pasta, cooked and drained, bertolli organic olive oil, basil and garlic sauce, mozzarella cheese, pecorino romano cheese
ingredients: 2.0 eggplant, 3.0 tablespoon bertolli classico olive oil, 1.0 pound sweet italian sausage links, cut into, 2.0 clove garlic, 1.0 pound penne pasta, cooked and drained, 1.0 jar bertolli organic olive oil, basil and garlic sauce, 1.0 pound mozzarella cheese, 1.5 cup pecorino romano cheese
steps: lightly salt eggplant and drain in colander, if desired, about 30 minutes . preheat oven to 375deg . rinse eggplant, then drain on paper towels pat to dry . brush eggplant with olive oil, then arrange on baking sheet . bake, turning once, 30 minutes or until golden set aside . meanwhile, cook sausage with garlic in 12 inch nonstick skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, 10 minutes or until sausage is done . brush bottom and sides of 10 inch springform pan with additional olive oil, then line with eggplant . combine hot penne, sausage, sauce, mozzarella cheese and 1/2 of the pecorino cheese in large bowl . turn into springform pan and press down firmly . bake 40 minutes . cool 15 minutes on wire rack remove from pan . top with remaining pecorino cheese.

name: thai chicken salad
description: the best thing about food is being able to discover other cultures through eating traditional dishes . this thai chicken salad recipe is one that resembles the cultural flavors and traditional ingredients of thailand . you will love this thai salad recipe . let us know about your experience cooking this thai chicken salad in the comments below . you can also give this thai chicken salad recipe a star rating so other users can learn about your experiences as well.
ner: boneless skinless chicken breast, carrots, red bell pepper, green onions, cabbage, fresh coriander, lemon, soy sauce, peanut butter, chile pepper, olive oil, water
ingredients: 1.0 boneless skinless chicken breast, 2.0 carrots, 0.5 red bell pepper, 3.0 green onions, 1.0 cup cabbage, 3.0 tablespoon fresh coriander, 1.0 lemon, 1.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 1.0 tablespoon peanut butter, 1.0 chile pepper, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 tablespoon water
steps: cook the chicken in boiling water with a little bit of salt . once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the water, set it aside to cool off, and shred the meat . peel and grate the carrots and cut the bell pepper into long, thin strips . cut the green onions into round, thin slices . mix the chicken, carrots, onions, cabbage, and coriander . using a whisk, mix the lemon, soy sauce, peanut butter, ground pepper, oil, and water and pour it on the salad . mix everything well and place the bowl in the refrigerator for half an hour before serving . serve the salad with peanuts, either crushed or whole.

name: caesar salad ree drummond
description: food network pioneer woman
ner: anchovy fillets, dijon mustard, balsamic vinegar, worcestershire sauce, garlic, lemon, evoo, freshly grated parmesan, salt, freshly ground black pepper, french bread, evoo, garlic, salt, hearts of romaine, parmesan
ingredients: 4.0 whole anchovy fillets, 2.0 tablespoon dijon mustard, 1.0 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 1.0 teaspoon worcestershire sauce, 2.0 clove garlic, 0.5 whole lemon, 0.5 cup evoo, 0.2 cup freshly grated parmesan, 1.0 dash salt, freshly ground black pepper, 0.5 loaf french bread, 0.2 cup evoo, 2.0 clove garlic, salt, hearts of romaine, parmesan
steps: for the dressing place the anchovies into a blender or food processor . throw in the dijon mustard, vinegar, worcestershire, garlic and lemon juice . pulse the processor or blend on low speed for several seconds . scrape down the sides . with the food processor or blender on, drizzle the olive oil into the mixture in a small stream . scrape down the sides . add the parmesan, salt and a generous grind of black pepper . pulse the whole thing together and mix until thoroughly combined . refrigerate the dressing for a few hours it just gets better before using it on the salad . for the croutons slice the bread into thick slices and cut them into 1 inch cubes . throw them onto a baking sheet . heat the olive oil in a small saucepan or skillet over low heat . crush but don't chop the garlic and add them to the oil . use a spoon to move the garlic around in the pan . after 3 to 5 minutes, turn off the heat and remove the garlic from the pan . slowly drizzle the olive oil over the bread cubes . mix together with your hands, and then sprinkle lightly with salt . toss and cook in the pan until golden brown and crisp . add a little butter for more flavor for the salad wash and dry the hearts of romaine lettuce . leave them whole . use a vegetable peeler and shave off large, thin slices of parmesan . drizzle about half of the dressing over the top of the hearts . throw in a good handful of the parmesan shavings . give it a good initial toss, just so you can evaluate how much more dressing you need . add more dressing and parmesan to taste . add the cooled croutons . toss gently.

name: mie met roergebakken kool en pinda's
description: mie met roergebakken kool en pinda's with mie, hamlappen, pinda, bladselderij, olie, knorr kruidenpasta nasi and bami speciaal, kool
ner: mie, hamlappen, pinda, bladselderij, olie, knorr kruidenpasta nasi and bami speciaal, kool
ingredients: 300.0 gram mie, 300.0 gram hamlappen, 100.0 gram pinda, 3.0 sprig bladselderij, 1.0 tablespoon olie, 1.0 container knorr kruidenpasta nasi and bami speciaal, 300.0 gram kool
steps: kook de mie beetgaar volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . snijd het vlees in dunne reepjes . hak de pinda's en de bladselderij . verhit de olie in een wok en bak op een hoog vuur het vlees bruin en gaar . voeg 100 ml water en de kruidenpasta toe . breng de saus al roerend aan de kook en laat alles 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken . schep om met de gesneden chinese kool, de pinda's, de bladselderij en de mie en bak het geheel nog even op.

name: meringue met slagroomijs light en frambozen
description: saus maken voor dit recept met rode vruchten is leuk en lekker voor bij dit speciale toetje . slagroom maken is niet nodig het zit al in het ijs . deze meringue met slagroomijs light en frambozen vraagt weinig werk, maar een lange oventijd.
ner: citroen, eiwitten, fijne suiker, poedersuiker, frambozen, hertog slagroomijs light
ingredients: 1.0 citroen, 4.0 eiwitten, 100.0 gram fijne suiker, 50.0 gram poedersuiker, 250.0 gram frambozen, 1.0 container hertog slagroomijs light
steps: zet de oven tot 100 degc . rasp de schil van de citroen of limoen en pers uit . maak met wat sap op keukenpapier een grote kom en de gardes van de mixer goed schoon . doe de eiwitten met 1 tl sap in de schaal en klop stevig . blijf vervolgens goed doorkloppen en telkens een lepeltje fijne suiker toevoegen totdat de suiker op is en de eiwitten zo stijf dat er torentjes op de garde blijven staan . zeef de poedersuiker erboven en schep met een lepel in enkele tellen door het schuim . maak met 2 lepels 4 brede bodems met een opstand randje of kleine torentjes van het schuim op een met bakpapier beklede bakplaat . laat de meringue in 3 4 uur in de oven drogen en hard worden . laat afkoelen . pureer de frambozen en roer de citroenrasp erdoor . breng eventueel op smaak met wat poedersuiker . leg de meringue bodems op borden of leg in elk glas enkele meringue torentjes . schep er bolletjes hertog slagroomijs light op en schenk de frambozensaus erover . serveer direct.

name: southwestern pork pot roast
description: southwestern pork pot roast with boneless pork shoulder, canola oil, salt, pepper, enchilada sauce, white onion, small red potatoes, hominy, queso fresco, cilantro sprigs
ner: boneless pork shoulder, canola oil, salt, pepper, enchilada sauce, white onion, small red potatoes, hominy, queso fresco, cilantro sprigs
ingredients: 3.0 pound boneless pork shoulder, 1.0 tablespoon canola oil, salt, pepper, 19.0 ounce enchilada sauce, 1.0 white onion, 12.0 ounce small red potatoes, 15.0 ounce hominy, 0.2 cup queso fresco, cilantro sprigs
steps: preheat the oven to 350 degrees f . meanwhile, season the pork with salt and pepper . in an oven ready skillet, braising pan, or dutch oven large enough to comfortably hold the pork with the lid on, warm the oil over medium high heat . add the pork and cook until well browned on all sides, 10 to 12 minutes . transfer the meat to a plate or platter and set aside . add the enchilada sauce to the skillet and bring to a boil, scraping up any browned bits careful it may splatter . return the pork to the skillet, along with any accumulated juices, and return to a boil . cover the skillet, place it in the oven, and cook for 1 hour . turn the meat over and add the onion and potatoes to the skillet, submerging them in the liquid . cover and cook until the vegetables start to soften, about 30 minutes . add the hominy, cover, and cook until the pork is tender but not falling apart, the onion and potatoes are tender, and the hominy is heated through, about 15 minutes . remove the skillet from the oven, set aside, letting the meat rest in the liquid for 15 minutes . remove the meat from the skillet, remove the kitchen twine, if necessary, and slice the meat across the grain . arrange on plates or a platter with the vegetables alongside . drizzle with a little sauce . sprinkle with the queso fresco and garnish with the cilantro, if using . serve the remaining sauce at the table.

name: cheesy sausage and mushroom pizza
description: cheesy sausage and mushroom pizza with bulk italian sausage, pizza crust, pizza sauce, provolone cheese, mushroom
ner: bulk italian sausage, pizza crust, pizza sauce, provolone cheese, mushroom
ingredients: 8.0 ounce bulk italian sausage, 10.0 ounce pizza crust, 0.5 cup pizza sauce, 2.0 cup provolone cheese, 4.0 ounce mushroom
steps: heat oven to 450 degrees f . spread pizza crust evenly with sauce, one cup cheese, sausage, mushroom, and remaining cup of cheese . bake directly on oven rack for 10 minutes, or until crust is crisp and cheese is melted.

name: lasagne met groenteratatouille en 3 kazen
description: deze lasagne met groenteratatouille en 3 kazen is een frans pasta recept met verrukkelijke basilicum pastasaus van bertolli.
ner: broccoli, wortel, paprika, courgette, rode ui, mozzarella, olijfolie, knoflook, bertolli pastasaus basilicum, ricotta, lasagne, kaas
ingredients: 1.0 broccoli, 1.0 wortel, 2.0 paprika, 1.0 courgette, 1.0 rode ui, 1.0 mozzarella, 2.0 tablespoon olijfolie, 1.0 clove knoflook, 1.0 bag bertolli pastasaus basilicum, 1.0 container ricotta, 1.0 packet lasagne, 100.0 gram kaas
steps: verwarm de oven voor tot 180 degc . was de groenten . verdeel de broccoli in kleine roosjes en snijd de wortel, paprika's, courgette en ui in dobbelsteentjes van ongeveer 1 cm . snijd de mozzarella in stukjes . verwarm de olijfolie in een hapjespan en fruit hierin het uitgeperste teentje knoflook met de ui kort aan . voeg vervolgens de groenten toe en roerbak ze ongeveer 4 minuten mee . breng de groenten op smaak met zout en peper . schenk dan de bertolli pastasaus basilicum erbij en laat alles nog 8 a 10 minuten zachtjes pruttelen . schep de laatste twee minuten de ricotta door de saus . vet een ovenschaal in en bedek de bodem met een schepje saus . bedek de saus met bertolli pasta lasagne en schep daarop weer een laagje saus . vul de schaal zo verder, met om en om lasagne vellen en saus . eindig met een laagje saus en maak het gerecht af met de mozzarella en tot slot de geraspte kaas . zet de schaal in de oven en bak de lasagne in 40 a 45 minuten gaar en goudbruin.

name: sage pork tenderloin medallions with white wine jus
