description: these pork tenderloin medallions are an elegant dish that is easy and healthy . recipe courtesy of michelle dudash.
ner: whole wheat flour, dried sage, salt, pepper, garlic powder, olive oil, pork tenderloin, chicken broth, dry white wine, butter
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon whole wheat flour, 0.5 teaspoon dried sage, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon pepper, 0.2 teaspoon garlic powder, 4.0 teaspoon olive oil, 1.0 pork tenderloin, 0.5 cup chicken broth, 0.5 cup dry white wine, 2.0 teaspoon butter
steps: stir together flour, sage, salt, pepper and garlic powder in a shallow dish or plate, and preheat a large skillet over medium heat . slice pork crosswise into 3/4 inch thick medallions and arrange flat on a cutting board . pound with a mallet to 1/2 inch thickness and coat pork in flour on all sides . add 2 teaspoons oil to the pan . once the oil shimmers, place the pork in a single layer . you may need to divide the pork into two batches to avoid overcrowding the pan . brown on one side for 2 to 3 minutes and turn to brown the other side . remove pork onto a plate and scrape the brown bits up from the bottom of pan with a wooden spoon, putting them into the measured broth or wine . add the remaining 2 teaspoons oil to pan and repeat the cooking procedure . add the pork to the plate . remove pan from heat, add wine, place back on heat, and simmer for 4 minutes or until wine reduces down to a couple of tablespoons . add broth and simmer 3 minutes or until reduced by half . remove from heat, swirl in butter, and add pork back to the pan to coat . arrange pork on plates and spoon sauce on top.

name: bialy mleczny chleb z automatu
description: najlepszy bialy chleb z automatycznego wypiekacza do chleba jaki mozna znalezc pyszny z maslem, gdy jeszcze cieply . znakomity na tosty . http //allrecipes.pl/przepis/2151/bia y mleczny chleb z automatu.aspx
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: umiescic wszystkie skladniki w pojemniku automatu do chleba w kolejnosci sugerowanej przez producenta . wybrac program "chleb zwykly" lub "chleb bialy" i wlaczyc urzadzenie . gdy chleb sie upiecze, ostudzic na metalowej kratce przed pokrojeniem.

name: winter squash salad
description: winter squash salad with cannellini beans, garlic, bay leaf, acorn, garlic, red onion, olive oil, sea salt, freshly ground black pepper, ground cumin, paprika, sumac, sardines, gluten free bread, parsley, red wine vinegar, microgreens
ner: cannellini beans, garlic, bay leaf, acorn, garlic, red onion, olive oil, sea salt, freshly ground black pepper, ground cumin, paprika, sumac, sardines, gluten free bread, parsley, red wine vinegar, microgreens
ingredients: 1.0 cup cannellini beans, 1.0 garlic, 1.0 bay leaf, 0.5 acorn, 2.0 clove garlic, 0.5 red onion, 4.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 teaspoon sea salt, 1.0 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1.0 teaspoon ground cumin, 0.5 teaspoon paprika, 0.5 teaspoon sumac, 2.0 sardines, 2.0 slice gluten free bread, 1.0 tablespoon parsley, 1.0 tablespoon red wine vinegar, 0.5 cup microgreens
steps: place the dried beans in a kitchenaid 7 ply 3.0 quart low casserole with lid . cover with water . cover with the lid and refrigerate overnight . add a bay leaf and garlic head to the low casserole with beans . add more water if necessary . we need the beans to be covered by 1'' of water . bring the liquid to a boil over medium heat . reduce heat to low and simmer the beans for an hour or until tender, but not mushy . drain the beans . discard the bay leaf and garlic . preheat the kitchenaid single wall oven to 400deg f . toss the squash, garlic clove, red onion, 3 tablespoons olive oil, sea salt, black pepper, cumin, paprika, and sumac together on a kitchenaid jelly roll pan . roast the squash for 40 minutes or until tender and caramelized . place the bread in a kitchenaid pro line series 16 cup food processor and pulse until you have chunky breadcrumbs . in a kitchenaid 10'' skillet, heat the remaining olive oil over medium heat . add the sardines or anchovy paste and cook for a minute until it crumbles into the olive oil . add the breadcrumbs and toss to coat in the oil . cook until slightly toasted, about 2 minutes . add the parsley, toss, and set aside . transfer the squash and roasted garlic and onion to a platter . top with beans, breadcrumbs, vinegar, and microgreens . toss and serve lukewarm or room temperature.

name: italian chicken cutlets
description: italian chicken cutlets with fresh breadcrumbs, grated parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, eggs, bertolli classico olive oil, bertolli tomato and basil sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese
ner: fresh breadcrumbs, grated parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, eggs, bertolli classico olive oil, bertolli tomato and basil sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese
ingredients: 0.5 cup fresh breadcrumbs, 2.0 tablespoon grated parmesan cheese, 4.0 boneless skinless chicken breast halves, 1.0 eggs, 1.0 tablespoon bertolli classico olive oil, 1.0 jar bertolli tomato and basil sauce, 0.5 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
steps: combine bread crumbs and parmesan cheese in shallow bowl . dip chicken in egg, then bread crumb mixture . heat olive oil in 12 inch nonstick skillet over medium high heat and cook chicken, turning once, 12 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked . arrange chicken on serving platter to serve . spoon sauce over chicken, then sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.

name: apple cinnamon bundt cake copy cat
description: i have been using this recipe for a very long time and it tastes amazing . i heard about this recipe but then i changed a few things about.
ner: all purpose flour, ground cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, unsalted butter, light brown sugar, large eggs, apples, confectioners sugar, water
ingredients: 2.5 cup all purpose flour, 1.0 tablespoon ground cinnamon, 2.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 1.0 cup unsalted butter, 1.5 cup light brown sugar, 4.0 large eggs, 6.0 apples, 1.0 cup confectioners sugar, 2.0 tablespoon water
steps: preheat oven to 350 degrees . make the cake in a medium bowl, whisk together flour, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, and baking soda . in a large bowl, combine butter, brown sugar, and eggs . whisk until smooth . gradually whisk in dry ingredients just until combined do not over mix . using a rubber spatula, fold in apples . spoon batter into a 12 cup nonstick bundt pan, and smooth top . bake until a tester inserted in cake comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes . cool in pan on rack 15 minutes invert onto rack to cool completely . to make the glaze whisk together confectioners' sugar and enough water to form a thick yet pour able glaze . set rack with cake over a piece of wax paper for easy cleanup drizzle cake with glaze, and let set before serving.

name: chicken and roasted vegetable tortilla soup
description: chicken and roasted vegetable tortilla soup with water, chopped green chilies, undrained, vegetable oil, corn tortillas, olive oil, garlic, tomato, onion, dried oregano leaves, crushed, knorr tomato bouillon with chicken flavor, cooked chicken, frozen whole kernel corn, zucchini, lime juice
ner: water, chopped green chilies, undrained, vegetable oil, corn tortillas, olive oil, garlic, tomato, onion, dried oregano leaves, crushed, knorr tomato bouillon with chicken flavor, cooked chicken, frozen whole kernel corn, zucchini, lime juice
ingredients: 7.0 cup water, 2.0 chopped green chilies, undrained, vegetable oil, 6.0 corn tortillas, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 6.0 clove garlic, 1.5 pound tomato, 1.0 onion, 2.0 teaspoon dried oregano leaves, crushed, 2.0 tablespoon knorr tomato bouillon with chicken flavor, 2.0 cup cooked chicken, 1.0 cup frozen whole kernel corn, 1.0 zucchini, 1.0 lime juice
steps: heat olive oil over medium heat in 5 quart saucepot and cook garlic, stirring frequently, 1 minute . add tomatoes, onion, chilies and oregano and cook, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes . stir in remaining 6 cups water and knorr tomato bouillon with chicken flavor . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered, stirring occasionally, 20 minutes . process mixture in food processor or blender, in batches, until smooth . return soup to saucepot . stir in chicken, corn and zucchini . bring to a boil over high heat, stirring occasionally . reduce heat to medium, then add tortilla strips . simmer, stirring occasionally, 3 minutes . stir in lime juice . garnish, if desired, with chopped fresh cilantro, diced avocado, sour cream, lime wedges and additional fried tortilla strips . bring 1 cup water to a boil over high heat in 1 quart saucepan . remove saucepan from heat and add chilies . cover and let stand 5 minutes or until softened . drain, cool and coarsely chop chilies set aside . heat 1 inch vegetable oil over medium high heat in another 1 quart saucepan and cook tortillas, in batches, until golden and crisp . drain on paper towels set aside.

name: green bean mushroom casserole
description: food network magazine
ner: unsalted butter, white onion, cremini mushrooms, shiitake mushrooms, all purpose flour, low sodium chicken, half and half, kosher salt, green beans, freshly ground pepper, white onion, buttermilk, all purpose flour, kosher salt, vegetable oil
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon unsalted butter, 1.0 white onion, 4.0 ounce cremini mushrooms, 4.0 ounce shiitake mushrooms, 2.0 tablespoon all purpose flour, 2.0 cup low sodium chicken, 0.5 cup half and half, kosher salt, 1.5 pound green beans, freshly ground pepper, 1.0 white onion, 1.0 cup buttermilk, 2.0 cup all purpose flour, kosher salt, vegetable oil
steps: make the casserole melt the butter in a large dutch oven over medium heat . add the diced onion cook, stirring, until softened, 7 to 10 minutes . add the mushrooms saute until softened and most of the liquid has evaporated, 10 minutes . sprinkle in the flour cook, stirring, 1 minute . add the broth and half and half . bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium low and simmer until thickened, about 5 minutes . bring a pot of salted water to a boil . add the green beans and cook until crisp tender, 7 to 10 minutes . drain shake off any excess water and add to the mushroom sauce . cook, stirring occasionally, until the beans are very tender, 10 to 12 minutes . season with salt and pepper . make the topping soak the sliced onion in the buttermilk, 5 minutes . combine the flour and 1 teaspoon salt in a medium bowl . heat 2 to 3 inches vegetable oil in a large pot until a deep fry thermometer registers 350 degrees f . working in batches, drain the onion, toss with the flour and shake off the excess, then fry until golden, 4 to 6 minutes . drain on paper towels . transfer the green bean mixture to a 4 quart baking dish and top with the fried onion . the casserole and topping can be made up to 2 hours ahead refrigerate the casserole . bring to room temperature reheat at 350 degrees f, 30 minutes . top with the fried onion bake 5 more minutes.

name: the jiefer man special
description: this is very nice it is spicy and sour
ner: none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none
steps: put 7 table spoons of chill sauce juice lemons in chilli really fine shreded cabbage add cabbage mix then server with chips

name: savory balsamic asparagus
description: savory balsamic asparagus with asparagus, i can't believe it's not butter spray original, balsamic vinegar, salt, ground black pepper
ner: asparagus, i can't believe it's not butter spray original, balsamic vinegar, salt, ground black pepper
ingredients: 2.0 pound asparagus, 30.0 spray i can't believe it's not butter spray original, 2.0 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon ground black pepper
steps: preheat oven to 425deg . arrange asparagus in roasting pan evenly spray with i can't believe it's not butter spray original . roast 15 minutes or until asparagus are crisp tender . drizzle with vinegar and season with salt and pepper . serve warm or at room temperature.

name: mediterranean roasted vegetable and shrimp salad
description: mediterranean roasted vegetable and shrimp salad with wish bone mediterranean italian vinaigrette dressing, tomatoes, fennel, zucchini, shallots, arugula leaves, uncooked large shrimp, lemon juice, garlic
ner: wish bone mediterranean italian vinaigrette dressing, tomatoes, fennel, zucchini, shallots, arugula leaves, uncooked large shrimp, lemon juice, garlic
ingredients: 0.5 cup wish bone mediterranean italian vinaigrette dressing, 2.0 tomatoes, 1.0 cup fennel, 1.0 zucchini, 2.0 shallots, 8.0 cup arugula leaves, 1.0 pound uncooked large shrimp, 1.0 tablespoon lemon juice, 1.0 clove garlic
steps: preheat oven to 425deg . toss 1/4 cup wish bone mediterranean italian vinaigrette dressing with tomatoes, fennel, zucchini, shallots and garlic in 13 x 9 inch shallow roasting pan . roast, stirring once, until vegetables are tender, about 25 minutes . stir in shrimp and lemon juice . roast until shrimp are heated through, about 5 minutes . toss arugula with remaining 1/4 cup dressing in serving bowl . top with shrimp and vegetables . garnish, if desired, with chopped fresh basil.

name: cranberry nut stove top cake
description: if you want to try something sweet, salty, and easy, then try this cranberry nut stove top cake . you don't have to work in the kitchen all day and worry about heating up the oven for this delicious dessert . it takes 35 minutes to prepare this hearty and heavenly confection . this deccadent cake combines sweet buttery ingredients with sweet dried cranberries for a tantalizing treat . we hope you enjoy this dessert.
ner: flour, nut, yeast, sugar, dark brown sugar, eggs, melted butter, milk, dried cranberries
ingredients: 125.0 gram flour, 50.0 gram nut, 1.0 tablespoon yeast, 70.0 gram sugar, 80.0 gram dark brown sugar, 3.0 eggs, 50.0 gram melted butter, 100.0 milliliter milk, 40.0 gram dried cranberries
steps: mix the flour, nut powder, and baking powder . whisk the eggs with the sugar . add the melted butter then the milk while mixing . add the dry mixture to egg mixture, then add the cranberries . heat a frying pan about 24 cm in diameter with a dab of butter . pour the mixture into the hot pan . cover, and cook it for about twenty minutes over low heat, until the cake is completely stiff . using a plate, turn over the cake, and cook it for about 5 minutes on the other face.

name: hawaiian ham and cheese sandwiches
description: hawaiian ham and cheese sandwiches with hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, white bread, american cheese, cooked ham, sliced pineapple in natural juice
ner: hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, white bread, american cheese, cooked ham, sliced pineapple in natural juice
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, 4.0 slice white bread, 4.0 slice american cheese, 4.0 ounce cooked ham, 2.0 slice sliced pineapple in natural juice
steps: assemble sandwiches with bread, ham, pineapple and cheese . spread outside of sandwiches with hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise . cook sandwiches in 12 inch skillet over medium heat, turning once, until golden brown and cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.

name: crunchy veggie wrap with hummus
description: spiralized summer squash and carrot give this veggie wrap great crunch and flavor
ner: yellow squash, large carrot, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, chopped fresh cilantro, tortilla wraps, hummus, crumbled feta cheese, avocado
ingredients: 0.5 yellow squash, 1.0 large carrot, 1.0 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, 2.0 teaspoon olive oil, 0.2 teaspoon kosher salt, 0.1 teaspoon pepper, 2.0 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, 4.0 tortilla wraps, 8.0 hummus, 0.5 cup crumbled feta cheese, 1.0 avocado
steps: trim ends off squash and carrot, then cut to fit spiralizer attachment . use the fine spiralizing blade and peeling blade to peel and spiralize the squash and carrot . in medium bowl, stir together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper and cilantro . add the spiralized squash and carrot and toss to coat . assemble wraps spread each wrap with hummus leaving a 1" border at edge . arrange the feta and avocado across the center of the wrap, horizonally, leaving a 1" border at the sides . arrange the spiralized squash and carrot over the feta and avocado . fold in both sides of the wrap . fold the bottom of the wrap over the filling in the middle and pressing gently, continue rolling up to close . cut in half with a serrated knife and serve or wrap and refrigerate for up to 4 hours.

name: b and b sunrise
description: a great make ahead breakfast that's a powerhouse of nutrition packed in a bowl . perfect for those "on the go" mornings when you have to take breakfast on the run nutritious, delicious, quick and easy . breakfast doesn't have to be complicated.
ner: banana, milk, greek yogurt, rolled oats, chia seeds, agave nectar, fresh blueberries, fig jam, hemp hearts
ingredients: 1.0 banana, 1.2 cup milk, 0.5 cup greek yogurt, 1.0 cup rolled oats, 1.0 tablespoon chia seeds, 1.0 tablespoon agave nectar, 0.7 cup fresh blueberries, fig jam, hemp hearts
steps: mix all the ingredients except for toppings in a bowl . cover and place in fridge overnight . scoop into bowls and top with jam and hemp hearts . enjoy...or take it on the go

name: strawberries and cream bread
description: buttery, vanilla flavored bread has fresh strawberries and a cheesecake swirl in every slice the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: nonstick cooking spray, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, large eggs, sour cream, all purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, strawberries, cream cheese, sour cream, vanilla extract, granulated sugar, vanilla extract
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 0.5 cup unsalted butter, 0.8 cup granulated sugar, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.0 large eggs, 0.5 cup sour cream, 1.8 cup all purpose flour, 1.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 1.0 cup strawberries, 3.0 ounce cream cheese, 1.0 tablespoon sour cream, 0.2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.0 tablespoon granulated sugar, 0.2 teaspoon vanilla extract
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray a 9x5 inch loaf pan with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . in large mixing bowl, use a mixer to cream together the butter, granulated sugar, and vanilla extract on medium high speed until smooth and combined, 1 2 minutes . add the eggs and sour cream and continue to beat, scraping down the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula as needed, until the mixture is pale and fluffy . add the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt to the bowl . beat the mixture on medium low speed, scraping down the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula, until just combined . do not over mix . fold in the strawberries . place the cream cheese, sour cream, granulated sugar, and vanilla extract in a medium bowl . beat with a mixer on medium speed until the mixture is completely smooth without lumps, 2 3 minutes . spoon half of the strawberry batter into the loaf pan . spread the cream cheese mixture evenly on top, leaving a half inch border around the edges . spoon the remaining strawberry batter over the cream cheese layer . bake the bread on middle rack of oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 55 65 minutes . check to see that bread is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the bread to rest in the pan for 10 minutes, then release the bread from the pan onto a cooling rack . allow to cool for at least 1 hour before slicing and serving . leftover bread may be stored in a large zip top bag in the refrigerator for 4 days, or in the freezer for up to 3 months.

name: cinnamon apple spiced oatmeal
description: none
ner: uncooked quick oats, apple butter, dash of cinnamon, low fat granola
ingredients: 1/3 cup uncooked quick oats, 2 tbsp apple butter, dash of cinnamon, 1 tbsp low fat granola
steps: cook oatmeal in water according to package directions . pour cooked oatmeal in a bowl and top with apple butter, granola, cinnamon . you can add a little skim milk if you like your oatmeal thinner . enjoy

name: blt lettuce wraps
description: skip the bread and enjoy all the flavors you love in a blt, without all the carbs so easy and seriously satisfies my blt cravings . add some avocado if you wish
ner: center cut bacon, medium tomato, light mayonnaise, large iceberg lettuce leaves, fresh cracked pepper, avocado optional
ingredients: 4 slices center cut bacon, 1 medium tomato, 1 tbsp light mayonnaise, 3 large iceberg lettuce leaves, fresh cracked pepper, 1 ounce avocado optional
steps: carefully remove 2 large outer leaves of a head of lettuce . if you rip or tear one, just save it for the 3rd leaf you need to shred . shred the 3rd leaf and set aside . dice tomato and set aside in a bowl . combine diced tomato with mayonnaise and fresh black pepper . place lettuce cups on a plate, top with shredded lettuce . add tomato then bacon and roll it like a wrap and dig in

name: lechon in caja china
description: lechon in caja china with suckling pig, fresh garlic, salt, ground black pepper, garlic salt, oregano, sazon seasoning, olive oil, sea salt
ner: suckling pig, fresh garlic, salt, ground black pepper, garlic salt, oregano, sazon seasoning, olive oil, sea salt
ingredients: 1.0 suckling pig, 1.0 head fresh garlic, 0.5 cup salt, 4.0 tablespoon ground black pepper, 4.0 tablespoon garlic salt, 4.0 tablespoon oregano, 4.0 tablespoon sazon seasoning, 0.5 cup olive oil, 2.0 teaspoon sea salt
steps: break a head of fresh garlic into cloves, peel and smash on a mortar . combine salt, ground black pepper, garlic salt, fresh garlic and sazon seasoning and mix well . rub pig with olive oil to ensure season sticks . starting with the skin side up, use a knife to make incisions to the pig skin . season pig with about one third to half the seasoning mix . flip pig skin down and make incisions on legs and shoulders and season thoroughly with remaining seasoning mix . to start the grill, add 8 9 lbs of briquette charcoal . add lighter fluid to charcoal and let soak in for about 5 minutes before starting . once charcoal is fully lit, spread around to ensure even cook . this process will take about 20 minutes . place suckling pig skin down on rack in the caja china . secure pig on rack using "s" hooks so pig can easily be turned later on . insert a meat probe appropriate for high temperature to the leg or fresh ham . add 5 6 lbs of charcoal every hour until the inserted probe hits 190 degrees f, about 3 hours . set aside charcoal tray and flip the pig . add about three to four pounds of charcoal and cook for about 30 minutes . lift and shake charcoal grid before removing the ash from the pan . replace the ash pan and charcoal grid with about 2 lbs of charcoal on top of box to crisp the skin for about 20 minutes . safely remove charcoal pan . retrieve pig and immediately sprinkle sea salt on top . serve with your favorite side dishes . note adjust the spice ratios for your personal touch.

name: southwestern chopped salad with grilled turkey
description: recipe and images courtesy of little broken https //www.littlebroken.com/2018/05/05/southwestern chopped salad with grilled turkey and croutons/ tasty recipes 10808 .
ner: honeysuckle white mccormick grill mates southwest style chipotle marinated turkey breast tenderloins, olive oil, romaine lettuce, vine tomatoes, black beans, avocado, red onion, cilantro, croutons, kosher salt, black pepper, fresh lime juice, extra virgin olive oil, honey, black pepper
ingredients: 1.0 package honeysuckle white mccormick grill mates southwest style chipotle marinated turkey breast tenderloins, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 8.0 cup romaine lettuce, 2.0 vine tomatoes, 1.0 cup black beans, 1.0 avocado, 1.0 cup red onion, cilantro, croutons, kosher salt, black pepper, 0.2 cup fresh lime juice, 0.2 cup extra virgin olive oil, 4.0 teaspoon honey, black pepper
steps: take the turkey breast strips out of the package and rinse under cold water . pat dry lightly with paper towel and place in a bowl . toss with olive oil and season with salt and pepper, to taste . thread turkey strips onto skewers and place on a platter . grill the turkey for 2 minutes per side or until fully cooked through . turkey is fully cooked when meat reaches an internal temperature of 165degf using a meat thermometer . add the remaining salad ingredients into a large bowl and toss with the dressing . add salt and pepper to taste . serve immediately.

name: bread from god
description: with a name like bread from god, how could you go wrong with this recipe these sweet and savory rolls are perfect appetizers for a family dinner, party, special occasion, or celebration . they take 70 minutes to prepare and are a mere 45 calories per serving . each morsel you pop in your mouth will tantalize the taste buds . some ingredient that make this bread special grated coconut and powdered sugar.
ner: flour, sugar, butter, large eggs, bakers yeast, fine salt, milk, egg yolks, grated coconut, refined sugar, large eggs, powdered sugar
ingredients: 500.0 gram flour, 50.0 gram sugar, 50.0 gram butter, 1.0 large eggs, 5.0 gram bakers yeast, fine salt, 200.0 milliliter milk, 1.0 egg yolks, 100.0 gram grated coconut, 50.0 gram refined sugar, 1.0 large eggs, powdered sugar
steps: preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius . place the flour a working surface, and make a hole in the center . add the sugar, butter, egg, yeast, salt, and milk carefully, so ingredients don't overflow . start mixing from the inside outwards until all the liquid is absorbed by the flour . knead to reach a very smooth dough about 10 to 15 minutes . place in a bowl, cover with a cloth or plastic wrap, and let rise in a warm, draft less place until doubled in size, about 2 hours . on a floured surface, divide the dough into 8 equal balls, trying not to alter the dough too much . place on a baking tray line with parchment paper . brush with beaten egg yolk . for the topping, mix well the coconut, sugar, and egg . divide for the eight balls . let rise for about 30 minutes . bake at 180 c for approximately 30 minutes . remove from oven, let cool, unmold, and sprinkle with powdered sugar.

name: hearty two bean vegetable chili
description: hearty two bean vegetable chili with promise buttery spread, sweet onion, zucchini, yellow bell pepper, cannellini, black beans, tomato sauce, chili powder, dri oregano leaves, crush, salt
ner: promise buttery spread, sweet onion, zucchini, yellow bell pepper, cannellini, black beans, tomato sauce, chili powder, dri oregano leaves, crush, salt
ingredients: 0.2 cup promise buttery spread, 1.0 sweet onion, 2.0 zucchini, 2.0 yellow bell pepper, 16.0 ounce cannellini, 15.0 ounce black beans, 15.0 ounce tomato sauce, 1.0 tablespoon chili powder, 1.0 teaspoon dri oregano leaves, crush, 0.2 teaspoon salt
steps: melt promise buttery spread in 6 quart saucepot over medium high heat and cook onion, zucchini and bell peppers, stirring occasionally, 8 minutes or until vegetables are tender and just starting to brown . stir in remaining ingredients . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer 8 minutes or until heated through . serve, if desired, with fat free sour cream . tip for a saucier chili, stir in 1/4 cup water.

name: smoky panko schnitzel bites
description: recipe for bite sized chicken schnitzel pieces coated in smoky, crispy panko breadcrumbs with sesame, served with warm honey sriracha sauce.
ner: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, eggs, panko breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, smoked paprika, grapeseed oil or oil with a high smoke point for frying, sriracha sauce, honey, salt
ingredients: 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, 2 large eggs, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs, 1 1/2 tsp sesame seeds, 1 1/2 tsp smoked paprika, grapeseed oil or oil with a high smoke point for frying, 1/2 cup sriracha sauce, 1 1/2 tbsp honey, 1/8 tsp salt
steps: use a knife or kitchen shears to cut the chicken breasts into 1 or 2 inch bite sized chunks . sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper . beat together 2 eggs with 1 tsp water till fluffy . in another bowl stir together the panko breacrumbs, sesame seeds, smoked paprika and 1/4 tsp salt . coating one piece at a time, dredge the chicken pieces into the beaten eggs, then coat with the panko breadcrumb mixture . place prepared schnitzel pieces on a plate . heat oil over medium until hot enough for frying . fry the breaded chicken pieces in batches of 6. if the oil is at the correct temperature, it should bubble and sizzle evenly no splatters or popping . flip the chicken pieces when they turn dark golden brown . it will take 2 3 minutes per side for the chicken to become golden and crisp . try to only turn them once, rather than repeatedly turning the pieces this will help to keep the crispy coating intact and keep them from becoming overly greasy.place fried chicken pieces on a wire rack to drain, if you have one . this will keep the chicken as crisp as possible . use paper towels to catch the oil drips underneath the rack . if you don't have a wire rack, you can drain the chicken pieces on a double layer of paper towels.

name: red chilaquiles with fried eggs
description: spicy and smoky guajillo chilies make this breakfast feast a family favorite . the recipe is a yummly original created by ericka sanchez https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/ericka sanchez .
ner: dried guajillo chilies, coarsely chopped onion, large garlic clove, crushed tomatoes, salt, extra virgin olive oil, tortilla chips, shredded mozzarella cheese, extra virgin olive oil, large eggs, radish, red onion, cotija cheese, cilantro leaves, black pepper
ingredients: 10.0 dried guajillo chilies, 0.3 cup coarsely chopped onion, 1.0 large garlic clove, 1.0 can crushed tomatoes, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 1.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 8.0 ounce tortilla chips, 0.5 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 4.0 large eggs, 1.0 radish, 2.0 tablespoon red onion, 1.0 tablespoon cotija cheese, cilantro leaves, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper
steps: snip off chili stems, then cut lengthwise and shake out seeds . put 4 cups water and chilies in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil over medium heat . boil until chilies are pliable, about 3 minutes . pro tip instead of guajillo chilies, you can use dried california or new mexico chilies . while chilies are softening, coarsely chop onion and garlic and put in a blender . use tongs to transfer the boiled chilies to blender, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid . add tomatoes, salt, and the reserved cooking water, and blend until smooth . heat oil in a large frying pan or dutch oven over medium heat . add guajillo mixture, cover, and cook 10 minutes, stirring occasionally . fold in tortilla chips a handful at a time, stirring gently until all chips are evenly covered with sauce . decrease heat to low, top chips with cheese, and cover pan of chilaquiles . heat oil in a second large frying pan over medium heat . fry eggs until done the way you like, about 4 minutes for cooked whites and runny yolks . using a wide spatula, set fried eggs over chilaquiles . remove pan of chilaquiles from heat . slice radish, finely slice red onion, and crumble cotija cheese then scatter over chilaquiles . add cilantro and season with black pepper . serve.

name: easy garlic bread
description: buttery, toasty garlic bread is easy to make in your home oven
ner: italian bread, salted butter, olive oil, garlic
ingredients: 1.0 loaf italian bread, 6.0 tablespoon salted butter, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 3.0 clove garlic
steps: preheat the oven to 375degf . line a baking sheet with aluminum foil . arrange the bread halves cut side up on the sheet . place the softened butter, olive oil, and garlic in a medium bowl . stir until thoroughly mixed . spread the butter mixture evenly over the bread halves . bake the garlic bread on middle rack of oven, rotating the pan halfway through the cook time, until the bread is light golden brown at the edges, 12 18 minutes . check to see that bread is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . cut the bread into 2 to 3 inch slices and serve.

name: pittige hutspot met nasikruiden
description: heerlijk stamppot gerecht met nasikruiden en een pittige rookworst . snel en makkelijk te bereiden.
ner: ui, winterwortels, ui, bosui, conimex nasi goreng, unox pittige rookworst, sambal
ingredients: 500.0 gram ui, 1.0 kilogram winterwortels, 1250.0 gram ui, 2.0 bosui, 1.0 bag conimex nasi goreng, 1.0 unox pittige rookworst, 3.0 teaspoon sambal
steps: pel de uien en snijd ze in partjes . schil de wortels, halveer ze in de lengte en snijd ze in plakjes van 1/2 cm dik . schil de aardappelen, snijd ze in gelijke stukken . maak de bosuitjes schoon en snijd ze in schuine ringetjes . verdeel de aardappels, uien en wortels in een grote pan en voeg 5 cm water en zout naar smaak toe . breng alles, met de deksel op de pan, aan de kook en kook het geheel in 20 25 minuten gaar . wel de nasimix 10 minuten in 1 1/2 dl kokend water . verwarm de unox pittige rookworst volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . giet de aardappelen en de groenten af, vang het kookvocht op en stamp de aardappelen met de groenten door elkaar . schep de gewelde nasimix en zoveel van het kookwater erdoor zodat een smeuige stamppot ontstaat . garneer met de bosui en serveer met de sambal en de rookworst . eet smakelijk

name: instant pot mashed potatoes
description: these creamy mashed potatoes come out perfect in the instant pot, and are made in a fraction of the time it takes to make on the stove
ner: peeled russet potatoes, water, kosher salt, low fat 1 buttermilk, light sour cream, whipped butter, kosher salt, fresh black pepper, chopped chives or parsley
ingredients: 2 pounds peeled russet potatoes, 3 cups water, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/3 cup low fat 1 buttermilk, 1/4 cup light sour cream, 2 tablespoons whipped butter, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, fresh black pepper, chopped chives or parsley
steps: add potatoes to the instant pot and pour enough water to just cover, season with salt . cover and cook on high pressure 10 minutes, quick release to check the potatoes are soft . they are done when a sharp knife can easily be inserted through the potato . drain and reserve 1/2 cup of the water, add the butter, sour cream and buttermilk, salt and black pepper and mash with a potato masher . adjust salt to taste and keep on warm until ready to serve . it's best to eat right away, but if you're eating them later and the potatoes get dry, add the reserved water to loosen them . serve garnished with chopped chives or parsley.

name: ginger sesame stir fry with vegetables
description: ginger sesame stir fry with vegetables with ham, orange juice, soy sauce, cornstarch, ground ginger, garlic powder, cooking oil, broccoli florets, pepper, sesame seeds, toasted
ner: ham, orange juice, soy sauce, cornstarch, ground ginger, garlic powder, cooking oil, broccoli florets, pepper, sesame seeds, toasted
ingredients: 12.0 ounce ham, 0.3 cup orange juice, 2.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 1.0 tablespoon cornstarch, 0.5 teaspoon ground ginger, 0.5 teaspoon garlic powder, 1.0 tablespoon cooking oil, 3.0 cup broccoli florets, 8.0 ounce pepper, 2.0 teaspoon sesame seeds, toasted
steps: for sauce, combine orange juice, soy sauce, cornstarch, ginger and garlic powder in a small bowl . set aside . pour cooking oil into a large skillet or wok . heat over medium high heat . add broccoli and frozen peppers to skillet . cook and stir about 3 minutes or until vegetables are just tender . remove vegetables from skillet . add ham to skillet cook and stir about 1 minute or until heated through push ham to edges of skillet . stir sauce add to center of skillet . cook and stir until thickened . return vegetables to skillet . cook and stir about 1 minute more or until heated through . sprinkle with sesame seeds.

name: anzac biscuits
description: a traditional recipe for anzac biscuits in honor of australia's anzac day, a memorial day for australian war veterans . kosher, dairy, cookies
ner: shredded coconut, flour, sugar, rolled oats, salt, unsalted butter, treacle, aka golden syrup, boiling water, baking soda, more water if needed
ingredients: 1 cup shredded coconut, 1 cup flour, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup rolled oats, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 4 tsp treacle, aka golden syrup, 2 1/2 tbsp 1/2 tsp boiling water, 1 tsp baking soda, more water if needed
steps: preheat oven to 350 degrees f . line a baking sheet with parchment paper these biscuits can be quite sticky, so i really recommend the parchment paper if you have it .if you'd like to toast your coconut, pour the shredded coconut into a skillet and heat slowly over medium, stirring constantly, till the flakes begin to turn golden brown . watch it very carefully, the coconut can go from brown to burnt in a matter of seconds . when it's browned to your liking, immediately pour it into a large mixing bowl . add the flour, sugar, rolled oats, and salt to the large mixing bowl and stir to combine . in a small saucepan, melt the butter and the treacle together, whisking till well combined . remove from heat . in a small bowl, combine the baking soda with the boiling water, stir to combine . add the soda and water to the melted butter and treacle . pour the melted butter mixture into the dry ingredients and stir till well combined . if the mixture seems to dry, add a little more water i added about a tablespoon . drop the dough in heaping teaspoonfuls onto the lined baking sheet, leaving plenty of room for spreading they will spread quite a bit . bake the biscuits in preheated oven for 10 15 minutes or until golden . allow the biscuits to cool on the tray for a few minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.

name: broiled tilapia with tomato caper sauce
description: none
ner: extra virgin olive oil, 6 oz tilapia filets, garlic cloves, shallots, matoes, capers, white wine, salt and fresh pepper
ingredients: 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, 4 6 oz tilapia filets, 2 garlic cloves, 2 shallots, 2 to matoes, 2 tbsp capers, 1/4 cup white wine, salt and fresh pepper
steps: brush fish with 1 tbsp olive and season with salt and pepper . in a medium saute pan, heat remaining olive oil . add garlic and shallots and saute on medium low about 4 5 minutes . add tomatoes and season with salt and pepper . add wine and saute until wine reduces, about 5 minutes . add capers and saute an additional minute . meanwhile, set broiler to low and place fish about 8 inches from the flame . broil until fish is cooked through, about 7 minutes . place fish on a platter and top with tomato caper sauce.

name: cream of asparagus soup
description: i love cream of asparagus soup, it's pure comfort in a bowl and so simple to make . this recipe is made with just 5 ingredients, not counting salt and pepper and is ready under 25 minutes
ner: asparagus, unsalted butter, medium onion, reduced sodium chicken broth, low fat sour cream, kosher salt and fresh pepper
ingredients: 2 lbs asparagus, 1 tbsp unsalted butter, 1 medium onion, 6 cups reduced sodium chicken broth, 2 tbsp low fat sour cream, kosher salt and fresh pepper
steps: melt butter over low heat in a large pot . add onion and saute until soft, about 2 minutes . cut the asparagus in half and add to the pot along with chicken broth and black pepper, to taste . bring to a boil, cover and cook low about 20 minutes or until asparagus is very tender . remove from heat, add sour cream and using your hand held blender, puree until smooth or in two batches in a large blender .

name: perfect pulled pork
description: bring the flavor of pulled pork to your slow cooker . add your favorite bottled barbecue sauce and nothing could be simpler . serve with baked beans, coleslaw, and potato chips.
ner: boneless blade pork roast, smoked paprika, black pepper, cayenne, dried thyme, garlic powder, salt, water, sandwich buns
ingredients: 5.0 pound boneless blade pork roast, 1.5 teaspoon smoked paprika, 2.0 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 teaspoon cayenne, 1.0 teaspoon dried thyme, 1.0 teaspoon garlic powder, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 1.0 cup water, sandwich buns
steps: combine all the seasonings in a small bowl and rub evenly over roast . place meat in a 6 quart slow cooker . add water . cover and cook on low for 6 8 hours or high for 4 5 hours or until pork is very tender . remove pork to a large cutting board or platter and let rest for 10 15 minutes . pull, slice or chop to serve . serve in buns with barbecue sauce.

name: brown sugar glazed pork chops
description: tender bone in pork chops are coated in a homemade caramelized brown sugar glaze . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: nonstick cooking spray, bone in pork chops, salt, black pepper, olive oil, olive oil, butter, brown sugar, dijon mustard, cinnamon, cayenne
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 4.0 bone in pork chops, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.5 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 tablespoon butter, 0.2 cup brown sugar, 1.0 teaspoon dijon mustard, 1.0 dash cinnamon, 1.0 dash cayenne
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray a 9x13 inch casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray . season the pork chops on both sides with salt and black pepper . set a large skillet over medium high heat and pour in olive oil . once the oil is shimmering, place two pork chops in the skillet . sear the pork, undisturbed, until browned on the bottom, 2 3 minutes . flip the chops and sear for an additional 2 minutes on the other side . transfer the pork chops to the baking dish . repeat the searing process with the remaining oil and pork chops . do not rinse or wipe out the skillet after all the pork chops have been seared . bake the pork chops on middle rack of oven until the meat reaches an internal temperature of 135 140degf, 8 10 minutes . check to see that pork chops are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . carefully transfer the pork chops to a dinner plate . set the skillet from earlier over medium heat . pour the pork juices from the casserole dish into the skillet . add the butter, brown sugar, dijon, cinnamon, and cayenne . cook the glaze, whisking constantly, until it begins to bubble and thicken, 2 3 minutes . once bubbling, place the pork chops in the skillet, turning to coat in the glaze . plate the pork chops, spoon any extra glaze over the top, and serve immediately.

name: raspberry yogurt popsicles
description: these easy, healthy raspberry yogurt ice pops, made with just three ingredients, are a wonderful treat on a hot summer day.
ner: raspberries, raw sugar, stonyfield full fat plain yogurt
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups raspberries, 3 1/2 tablespoons raw sugar, 2 1/2 cups stonyfield full fat plain yogurt
steps: place the raspberries in a bowl and slightly mash with a fork . top with sugar and set aside about 10 minutes to let the juices release from the berries . add the yogurt and stir together . divide the mixture evenly into the popsicle molds, or disposable small plastic cups . insert the sticks and freeze until solid, at least 5 to 6 hours.

name: worteltaart met roomkaasglazuur
description: "eet je groenten". wie heeft dat niet vaak gehoord als kind met deze taart geen enkel probleem . natuurlijk kun je ook cupcakes maken met dit recept, houd dan ongeveer de helft van de baktijd aan.
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: bereiding worteltaart rasp de wortels . maal de noten fijn tot de gewenste structuur . verwarm de oven voor op 170 graden . klop de eieren los . mix de eieren met de palmsuiker tot een smeuig geheel . voeg de kokosolie toe en mix op de laagste stand tot een glad mengsel . voeg het mengsel toe aan de bloem . voeg het bakpoeder toe . meng alles tot een glad mengsel . voeg de wortels, noten en rozijnen toe . doe wat kokosolie in een taartvorm en bestrooi met bloem . klop de overtollige bloem uit de vorm . doe het beslag in de taartvorm en bak ongeveer een uur in de oven . dek gedurende de helft van de baktijd de bovenkant af met wat aluminiumfolie . de taart is klaar als een houten sateprikker er schoon uit komt.maak ondertussen de roomkaasglazuur . bereiding roomkaasglazuur mix de boter zacht en romig . meng de boter met de roomkaas tot een glad mengsel . voeg de gezeefde poedersuiker en/of eventueel stevia toe en meng tot een glad mengsel . laat de taart afkoelen voordat je hem uit de vorm haalt minstens een half uur . laat de taart verder afkoelen op een taartrooster een uurtje . breng het glazuur naar wens aan . eventueel kun je de taart met een taartzaag halveren en vullen met de glazuur . maak dan 1.5 x de hoeveelheid glazuur in het recept . dit recept is afkomstig van www.vertruffelijk.nl neem je dit recept mee check dan ook eens m'n foodblog www.vertruffelijk.nl voor nog meer lekkere recepten, artikelen en fun food facts vertruffelijk heeft ook facebook, pinterest en twitter.

name: rock drops aka rock cakes
description: from cupcakes, muffins and more a collection of easy and elegant recipes by love food tm
ner: butter, plain flour, baking powder, golden caster sugar, sultanas, glace cherries, egg, milk
ingredients: 100.0 gram butter, 200.0 gram plain flour, 2.0 teaspoon baking powder, 75.0 gram golden caster sugar, 100.0 gram sultanas, 25.0 gram glace cherries, 1.0 egg, 2.0 tablespoon milk
steps: lightly grease a baking sheet, large enough for 8 big rock drops, with a little butter . sift the flour and baking powder into a mixing bowl . rub the butter with your fingertips until the mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs . stir in the sugar, sultanas and chopped glace cherries, mixing well . add the beaten egg and the milk to the mixture and mix to form a soft dough . spoon 8 mounds of the mixture onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing them well apart as they will spread while cooking . bake in a preheated oven, 200oc / 400of, for 15 20 minutes or until firm to the touch . remove the rock drops from the baking sheet . either serve immediately or transfer to a wire rack to cool before serving.

name: crispy panko fish with orange sesame sauce
description: make crispy fried panko sesame fish with a sweet and spicy orange sesame sauce . step by step photos and instructions . kosher, pareve.
ner: boneless skinless white fish fillets choose a firm white fish like cod, snapper or halibut, seltzer water, flour, cornstarch, salt, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, panko breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, vegetable oil with a high smoke point for frying i prefer grapeseed, cornstarch, freshly squeezed orange juice, agave nectar, low sodium soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, cayenne
ingredients: 1 1/2 lbs boneless skinless white fish fillets choose a firm white fish like cod, snapper or halibut, 1 1/2 cups seltzer water, 1 cup flour, 1 tbsp cornstarch, 1 tsp salt, 3/4 tsp garlic powder, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 1 1/2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 3 tbsp sesame seeds, vegetable oil with a high smoke point for frying i prefer grapeseed, 2 tsp cornstarch, 1/2 cup freshly squeezed orange juice, 1/3 cup agave nectar, 1/4 cup low sodium soy sauce, 2 tbsp sesame oil, 1 tbsp rice vinegar, 1/4 tsp cayenne
steps: cut fish or ask your fishmonger to slice it into single serving fillets no thicker than 1/2 inch 1/4 inch thickness is optimal . for irregularly sized cuts like cod, you may need to slice some fillets in half lengthwise to make them thinner . alternatively, you can slice the fish into smaller bite sized fish sticks, about 2 inches long and 1 inch wide the smaller pieces will be a bit easier to manage in the frying pan . in a mixing bowl, whisk together the seltzer, flour, cornstarch, salt, garlic powder, and cayenne to make a batter . the batter will bubble at first, then settle . stir together the panko breadcrumbs and sesame seeds, then pour them onto a plate . have an empty plate handy for the breaded fish . dip each piece of fish into the batter . when you pull the fish out of the batter, let the excess batter run back into the bowl . after dipping in the batter, gently roll each piece in panko crumbs to coat . leaving too much batter on the fish will lead to clumping and will make the coating fall off the fish when frying, so make sure your fish is only lightly coated with batter before breading . place the breaded fish onto the empty plate . heat 1/2 inch of vegetable oil in a skillet over medium till hot but not smoking . fry the breaded fish pieces in batches of 3 if using smaller sized fish sticks, you can fry up to 6 at a time . if the oil is at the correct temperature, it should bubble and sizzle evenly no splatters or popping . flip the fish when they turn dark golden brown . don't flip them till they're completely golden the more you flip them, the more fragile the coating will become, so try to only flip each fillet once . if your oil is at the right temperature, it should take about 4 5 minutes per side for the fish to become golden and crisp . place fried fish pieces on a wire rack to drain, if you have one . this will keep the fish as crisp as possible . use paper towels to catch the oil drips underneath the rack . if you don't have a wire rack, you can drain the fish pieces on a double layer of paper towels.once fish has drained, you make the sauce immediately and serve, or place the wire rack without paper towels on a baking sheet in the oven at 200 degrees f for up to 30 minutes till ready to serve . this will keep the fish warm, fresh and crisp . just before serving, whisk together cornstarch and 2 tbsp water in the bottom of a small saucepan till dissolved . whisk in orange juice, soy sauce, agave nectar, sesame oil and a pinch of cayenne . heat the sauce over medium to a simmer for 2 3 minutes, whisking constantly, till it thickens slightly . remove from heat and let it cool for 2 minutes.serve fish hot drizzled with the warm orange sesame sauce.

name: chickpea shawarma sandwich
description: amazing, 30 minute chickpea shawarma sandwich with spicy baked chickpeas, a creamy garlic dill sauce, and lots of fresh vegetables . a healthy, quick and satisfying plant based meal.
ner: chickpeas, seed, cumin, garlic powder, sea salt, black pepper, smoked paprika, ground coriander, cinnamon, hummus, lemon, dried dill, garlic, water, pita, sliced tomato, romaine lettuce
ingredients: 15.0 ounce chickpeas, 1.0 tablespoon seed, 1.0 teaspoon cumin, 1.0 teaspoon garlic powder, 0.5 teaspoon sea salt, 0.5 teaspoon black pepper, 0.5 teaspoon smoked paprika, 0.2 teaspoon ground coriander, 0.2 teaspoon cinnamon, 0.2 cup hummus, 0.5 lemon, 0.8 teaspoon dried dill, 3.0 clove garlic, 3.0 tablespoon water, pita, sliced tomato, romaine lettuce
steps: preheat oven to 400 degrees f and line a large baking sheet with foil or parchment paper . in a small mixing bowl toss rinsed and dried chickpeas with oiled spices and spread baking sheet . bake for 25 minutes, or until slightly crispy and golden brown . once slightly cooled, sample and adjust seasonings as desired . while the chickpeas are roasting, prepare your sauce by adding hummus, lemon juice, dill, and garlic to a mixing bowl and whisk to combine . add enough water or almond milk to thin so it's pourable about 2 3 tbsp . taste and adjust seasonings as needed . add more garlic for more zing, salt for savoriness, lemon juice for freshness, and dill for a more intense herb flavor . to serve, warm pitas or flatbread in the microwave for 15 30 seconds or the still warm oven for 1 minutes and top with desired amount of chickpeas, sauce, and vegetables of choice . best when fresh, though leftover chickpeas and sauce will keep well stored separately in the refrigerator for 3 4 days.

name: hawaiian style fruit salad
description: are you searching for that perfect dinner meal for the family that will give them flavor and nutrition try our hawaiian style fruit salad recipe . this recipe is relatively easy to prepare and is one you will want to pass down to your children and theirs . we are confident you will love this hawaiian style fruit salad recipe as it is delicious and healthy . let us know your thoughts in the comments below or rate this recipe by star . happy cooking
ner: stevia, rice vinegar, dried chili flakes, cumin, papaya, mango, red onion, green bell pepper, coriander
ingredients: 1.0 gram stevia, 1.0 tablespoon rice vinegar, dried chili flakes, cumin, 1.0 cup papaya, 1.0 mango, 0.2 cup red onion, 0.5 green bell pepper, 2.0 tablespoon coriander
steps: mix the stevia, vinegar, chili flakes to taste and a pinch of cumin . add the papaya, mango, onion, bell pepper, and coriander . mix carefully to avoid crushing the fruit . taste and add salt if needed . serve as a side dish for chicken or fish.

name: loaded mashed potato casserole
description: loaded mashed potato casserole with mashed potatoes, milk, cream cheese, sour cream, mccormick parsley flakes, garlic salt, mccormick nutmeg, ground, shredded cheddar cheese, bacon
ner: mashed potatoes, milk, cream cheese, sour cream, mccormick parsley flakes, garlic salt, mccormick nutmeg, ground, shredded cheddar cheese, bacon
ingredients: 5.5 cup mashed potatoes, 0.5 cup milk, 8.0 ounce cream cheese, 1.0 cup sour cream, 2.0 teaspoon mccormick parsley flakes, 1.0 teaspoon garlic salt, 0.2 teaspoon mccormick nutmeg, ground, 0.8 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 12.0 slice bacon
steps: preheat oven to 350degf . place all ingredients, except cheese and bacon, in large bowl . beat with electric mixer on medium high speed until potatoes are smooth and creamy . spoon mixture into lightly greased 13x9 inch baking dish . sprinkle with cheese and bacon . if you prefer extra crispy bacon, reserve bacon and sprinkle at the end of cooking . cover . bake 30 minutes or until heated through.

name: dan dan noodles
description: dan dan noodles dan dan mian with keto saucy dan dan noodle sauce is a flavor explosion that's beyond delicious and easy to make this recipe is courtesy of i heart umami https //iheartumami.com/ .
ner: ground pork, coconut aminos, toasted sesame oil, garlic cloves, ginger, scallions, shirataki noodles, bok choy, avocado oil, coarse sea salt, chinese sesame paste, sichuan peppercorn powder, chicken stock, sichuan chili oil, coconut aminos, chicken stock, aged balsamic, chinese sesame paste, sichuan peppercorn powder, toasted almonds
ingredients: 0.8 pound ground pork, 1.0 tablespoon coconut aminos, 2.0 teaspoon toasted sesame oil, 4.0 garlic cloves, 0.3 ounce ginger, 2.0 bulb scallions, 14.0 ounce shirataki noodles, bok choy, 1.5 tablespoon avocado oil, 4.0 pinch coarse sea salt, 2.0 tablespoon chinese sesame paste, 0.5 teaspoon sichuan peppercorn powder, 2.0 cup chicken stock, 2.0 tablespoon sichuan chili oil, 4.0 tablespoon coconut aminos, 2.0 tablespoon chicken stock, 2.0 teaspoon aged balsamic, 4.0 teaspoon chinese sesame paste, 0.5 teaspoon sichuan peppercorn powder, toasted almonds
steps: in a medium bowl, season the pork with 1 tbsp coconut aminos and 2 tsp sesame oil . mix well and set it aside . prepare the 4 garlic cloves and 0.3 oz ginger in one bowl . 2 scallions in another bowl and 14 oz rinsed noodles on a plate . preheat a wok or large saute pan over medium low heat until it feels too hot to place your palm near the surface . boil a pot of water to blanch the bok choy vegetables . add the 1 1/2 tbsp avocado oil to the wok and fry the pork over medium high heat . season with 2 pinches of salt . break it to fine bits and cook until the pork is browned and turns into crisp crumbles, about 3 4 minutes . add garlic and ginger to the pork . saute for 10 15 seconds with 2 more pinches of salt, then add 2 tbsp sesame paste and 1/2 tsp peppercorn powder . continue sauteing for 30 seconds . add the 2 cups stock . scrape the bottom of the pan to lift up the brown bits and nothing sticks to the pan . cover with a lid . lower the heat to medium low . allow it to come to a gentle boil, about 3 minutes . keep the broth hot . in the meantime, assemble the dan dan noodle bowls . divide the 2 tbsp sichuan chili oil, 4 tbsp coconut aminos, 2 tbsp chicken stock, 2 tsp aged balsamic, 4 tsp chinese sesame paste, and sichuan peppercorn powder equally into two serving bowls . stir well . divide the noodles equally into the bowls . place the vegetables next to the noodles . ladle the pork mince and the broth over . sprinkle with scallions and nuts . drizzle with more hot chili oil and peppercorn powder, if desired . stir the noodle bowl well and enjoy while it's hot.

name: bread 'n' butter waffles
description: a quaint and ridiculously easy vintage recipe for bread and butter waffles from the 1950's . a cross between french toast and waffles.
ner: bread, butter, milk, salt, egg, slightly beaten
ingredients: 8 slices bread, 8 tbsp butter, 3/4 cup milk, 1/8 tsp salt, 1 large egg, slightly beaten
steps: spread bread slices lightly but evenly on both sides with butter . combine milk, salt, and beaten egg blend well . dip slices of bread into egg milk mixture quickly . drain . bake in moderately hot waffle iron 5 minutes, or until golden brown . serve hot with syrup.

name: soft and chewy ginger cookies
description: soft, spiced ginger cookies, just like grandma used to make or you wished she would .
ner: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, granulated sugar, large egg, molasses, vanilla extract, all purpose flour, baking soda, ground ginger, pumpkin pie spice, salt
ingredients: 0.8 cup unsalted butter, 0.5 cup light brown sugar, 0.5 cup granulated sugar, 1.0 large egg, 0.2 cup molasses, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.3 cup all purpose flour, 1.5 teaspoon baking soda, 2.5 teaspoon ground ginger, 1.0 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 0.5 teaspoon salt
steps: line 2 baking sheets with silicone baking mats or parchment paper . set aside . place butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar in a large bowl . use a hand mixer to beat on medium speed for 1 minute, or until well combined . add egg, molasses, and vanilla and continue to beat for 30 seconds, until smooth . with a sifter or fine mesh strainer, sift flour, baking soda, spices, and salt into the butter mixture in bowl . beat on low speed, scraping sides of bowl with a rubber spatula as needed, until a smooth dough forms . divide cookie dough into 24 balls, about 2 tbsp . each, and arrange on prepared baking sheets at least 1 inch apart from one another . transfer sheets to freezer for 10 15 minutes, while oven preheats . preheat the oven to 350degf . bake cookies on middle rack of oven for 15 17 minutes, until puffy and cracked . pro tip if baking sheets do not both fit on the middle rack, place one on the bottom rack and switch the sheets halfway through cooking time so cookies on bottom rack do not get too crispy . keep a close eye to make sure none burn . check to see that cookies are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow cookies to rest and firm up on baking sheets for 5 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely before serving.

name: easy tomatillo huevos rancheros
description: once in a while, i crave something different for breakfast something with a little flavor and spice to wake up my taste buds . and that's when huevos rancheros land on the menu in my home . but this time, rather than making them the traditional way, i had some tomatillo salsa lying around and i thought why not simmer the eggs in there.
ner: corn tostadas, olive oil, scallion, prepared tomatillo salsa, cumin, large eggland's best eggs, shredded cheese, shredded iceberg lettuce, small diced tomato, cilantro leaves
ingredients: 4 corn tostadas, 1/2 tsp olive oil, 1 scallion, 1 cup prepared tomatillo salsa, pinch cumin, 4 large eggland's best eggs, 2 oz shredded cheese, 1/2 cup shredded iceberg lettuce, 1 small diced tomato, 8 cilantro leaves
steps: heat the tostadas according to package directions . set aside . heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat and add scallions, cook 1 to 2 minutes then add salsa verde, pinch of cumin and simmer covered until hot, 2 to 3 minutes . when hot, reduce heat to medium low and gently add the eggs, season with a little salt and pepper and cover until the eggs are cooked to your liking i like mine a little runny . to serve, place a tortilla on each plate, top with the cooked egg and salsa verde, then finish with cheese, lettuce, tomato and cilantro.

name: mexican corn chowder
description: sweet corn and mild mexican spices are perfectly blended in this richly flavored deeply satisfying soup.
ner: mazola corn oil, diced onion, minced garlic, serrano peppers, maseca instant corn masa flour, mazola chicken flavor bouillon powder, spice islands ground cumin, water, frozen whole kernel corn, half and half, fresh cilantro, salt
ingredients: 0.3 cup mazola corn oil, 2.0 cup diced onion, 1.0 tablespoon minced garlic, 2.0 serrano peppers, 0.3 cup maseca instant corn masa flour, 2.0 tablespoon mazola chicken flavor bouillon powder, 2.0 teaspoon spice islands ground cumin, 5.0 cup water, 8.0 cup frozen whole kernel corn, 1.0 cup half and half, 0.2 cup fresh cilantro, salt
steps: heat oil in a large dutch oven or soup pot over medium heat . add onions and cook until softened, about 2 to 3 minutes . stir in garlic and chile peppers and continue cooking for 1 minute . combine corn masa flour, bouillon powder and cumin in a small bowl . stir to blend add to pot with onions and mix well . gradually add water and mix well using a whisk . add corn and bring to a boil . reduce heat to low . ladle about 1/3 of the corn mixture into a blender or food processor . add the half and half and puree for 30 seconds or until smooth . pour pureed mixture back into the soup, stirring to combine . bring soup to a low boil reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes . remove from heat and stir in cilantro . to serve, ladle into bowls and sprinkle with additional fresh cilantro and hot sauce, if desired.

name: braised brisket with potatoes and carrots
description: braised brisket slow cooked in the oven with potatoes, carrots and onions . slicing the brisket half way through cooking assures that the meat is tender and flavorful.
ner: beef brisket, cake meal, freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, large white onions, tomato paste, kosher salt, garlic, fat free beef broth, large carrots, red potatoes, chopped fresh parsley
ingredients: 1 large beef brisket, 1 tbsp cake meal, freshly ground black pepper, 1 tbsp olive oil, 4 large white onions, 3 tbsp tomato paste, kosher salt, 4 cloves garlic, 2 cups fat free beef broth, 3 large carrots, 8 medium red potatoes, 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley
steps: preheat the oven to 375degf . lightly season the brisket with salt and pepper to taste and lightly dust with cake meal . heat the oil over medium high heat in a large 7 quart dutch oven or other heavy pot with a lid large enough to hold the brisket . add the brisket to the pot and brown on both sides, about 10 12 minutes . remove meat and set aside . add the onions, salt and pepper to the pot and cook until soft and browned, about 10 12 minutes stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, scraping up any browned bits stuck to the bottom of the pot . return the brisket and any accumulated juices to the pot on top of the onions . spread the tomato paste over the brisket, sprinkle with salt and more pepper to taste, then add the garlic, beef broth and carrots to the pot . cover the pot, transfer to the oven, and cook the brisket for about 1 1/2 hours . remove the brisket and transfer to a cutting board . using a sharp knife, slice the meat across the grain into approximately 1/8 inch thick slices . return the slices back to the pot, keeping the brisket together so it resembles the unsliced brisket . add potatoes and sprinkle with a little more salt and pepper . cover the pot and return to the oven . reduce heat to 325degf and cook the brisket until it is fork tender and the potatoes are cooked through, about 1 1/2 hours . check once or twice during cooking to add more broth if needed . to serve you can arrange the meat on a platter with the carrots, onions, potatoes and some of the liquid and garnish with fresh chopped parsley . serve the remaining gravy on the side.

name: bow tie pasta with braised pork white wine and bacon
description: bow tie pasta with braised pork white wine and bacon with pork shoulder roast, salt, freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, onions, celery, carrots, garlic, tomato paste, flour, white wine, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, parsley sprigs, water, bow tie pasta, bacon
ner: pork shoulder roast, salt, freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, onions, celery, carrots, garlic, tomato paste, flour, white wine, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, parsley sprigs, water, bow tie pasta, bacon
ingredients: 2.0 pound pork shoulder roast, salt, freshly ground black pepper, 3.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 onions, 2.0 stalk celery, 1.0 carrots, 1.0 clove garlic, 2.0 tablespoon tomato paste, 2.0 tablespoon flour, 1.0 cup white wine, 1.5 cup vegetable broth, 28.0 ounce diced tomatoes, 1.0 bunch parsley sprigs, 1.0 cup water, 1.0 pound bow tie pasta, 12.0 ounce bacon
steps: preheat the oven to 325 degrees f . pat the pork dry with paper towels and season with salt and pepper . in a large dutch oven heat the olive oil over medium high heat . brown the meat on all sides until a golden brown . transfer the pork to a plate . into the pan add the onion, celery, and carrot . cook until fragrant and softened, 5 to 7 minutes . add the garlic and cook another 2 minutes . stir in the tomato paste and and roasted tomatoes, cook for 3 minutes . add the flour and cook another 2 minutes to cook off the raw flour flavor . add the wine, whisk well to combine . let the sauce reduce by half . return the pork to the dutch oven . stir in the veggie stock and add the parsley stems . add some water if liquid does not come up to the top of the pork . you should not completely submerge the pork with liquid . cover the pot and place it in the oven to braise until the meat is fork tender, about 2 45 to 3 hours . taste and season the pork with more salt and pepper, if needed . when the pork is almost done cooking, cook the pasta according to package directions . when it's done drain and toss with some olive oil . remove the pork from the pot and shred with a fork or your hands . add it back into the dutch oven and mix to combine the sauce well . toss the bowties with the sauce and some bacon . serve with freshly grated parmesan or pecorino romano cheese . top with chopped fresh parsley and more bacon crumbles.

name: spinach, feta, and artichoke breakfast bake
description: eggs, spinach, artichokes and feta cheese a healthy breakfast casserole bake, perfect to feed a crowd . if you have family staying over for the holidays, this couldn't be easier.
ner: 10 ounce package frozen chopped spinach, thawed, all excess liquid squeezed out, scallions, chopped artichokes, diced red pepper, garlic, fresh dill, large eggs, large egg whites, fat free milk, grated parmesan cheese, kosher salt, ground pepper, crumbled feta cheese
ingredients: 1 10 ounce package frozen chopped spinach, thawed, all excess liquid squeezed out, 1/2 cup scallions, 3/4 cup chopped artichokes, 1/3 cup diced red pepper, 1 clove garlic, 1 tablespoon fresh dill, 8 large eggs, 4 large egg whites, 1/4 cup fat free milk, 2 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese, 1 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground pepper, 1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese
steps: preheat the oven to 375degf . spray a 9 x 13 casserole dish with nonstick spray . in a small bowl combine spinach, scallions, artichoke, red pepper, garlic and dill . pour into the casserole dish spreading evenly . in another bowl, whisk together the eggs, egg whites, milk, parmesan, salt and pepper . mix in feta cheese and pour over vegetables . bake until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean, 32 to 35 minutes . let stand 8 to 10 minutes before cutting into 8 pieces.

name: pastaschotel met gehakt, aubergine en courgette
description: dit pasta recept met rundvlees, aubergine courgette, is een heerlijke italiaanse maaltijd . deze gehakt ovenschotel is klaar in 40 minuten.
ner: mozzarella, penne, aubergine, courgette, vloeibare margarine, rundergehakt, knoflook, water, knorr mix voor macaroni, kaas
ingredients: 1.0 mozzarella, 300.0 gram penne, 1.0 aubergine, 1.0 courgette, 1.0 tablespoon vloeibare margarine, 350.0 gram rundergehakt, 1.0 clove knoflook, 150.0 milliliter water, 1.0 bag knorr mix voor macaroni, 100.0 gram kaas
steps: verwarm de oven voor tot 160oc . snijd de mozzarella in plakken . kook de penne volgens aanwijzingen op de verpakking beetgaar . snijd de aubergine en courgette in blokjes . verhit de vloeibare margarine in een hapjespan en bak hierin het rundergehakt rul . roerbak de aubergine een paar minuten mee . pers het teentje knoflook uit boven het vlees . bak de courgetteblokjes 2 minuten mee . roer er 150 ml water en de knorr mix voor macaroni erdoor en laat het 3 minuten zachtjes pruttelen . voeg als laatste de gekookte penne toe . roer het gerecht nog even goed door en schep het in een ingevette ovenschaal . leg de plakken mozzarella erop en strooi hier de geraspte kaas over . zet de schotel in de oven totdat de kaas gesmolten is.

name: root vegetable fries
description: root vegetable fries with carrots, garnet yam, sweet potato, golden beet, olive oil, fresh rosemary, sea salt
ner: carrots, garnet yam, sweet potato, golden beet, olive oil, fresh rosemary, sea salt
ingredients: 2.0 carrots, 1.0 garnet yam, 1.0 sweet potato, 1.0 golden beet, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, 2.0 sprig fresh rosemary, 2.0 teaspoon sea salt
steps: preheat the kitchenaid compact oven to 400deg f . gather your root vegetables, rinse, and peel . using the kitchenaid ceramic chef knife, slice the vegetables in chopstick shapes, approximately 1/4'' thick and 3'' in length . the size will vary on the shape of the vegetable . place the vegetables in a medium sized bowl . pour salt onto a small cutting board and top with finely chopped rosemary . using the ceramic chef knife, cut in the rosemary with the salt to help infuse it . sprinkle 1 teaspoon of the infused salt onto the vegetables in the bowl, reserving the additional teaspoon for after baking only if needed . drizzle olive oil and stir to incorporate with a spoon or spatula . lightly grease the baking tray that came with the compact oven and place the vegetables on it, spreading them out as a single layer . place the baking tray in the oven . roast for 20 25 minutes or until soft when pierced with a fork . remove from oven and enjoy warm . add more salt to taste if preferred.

name: pressure cooker beef in sauce
description: melt in your mouth, unbelievably tender meat in aromatic, rich and hearty, yet light sauce.
ner: millet flour, sea salt, black pepper, schnitzels, olive oil, butter, pancetta, onion, garlic, rosemary, marjoram, carrots, leek, red wine, bay leaves, tomato paste, tomato puree, sea salt, black pepper, parsley
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon millet flour, 1.0 teaspoon sea salt, 1.0 teaspoon black pepper, 450.0 gram schnitzels, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, 50.0 gram butter, 200.0 gram pancetta, 1.0 onion, 3.0 clove garlic, 2.0 sprig rosemary, 3.0 teaspoon marjoram, 2.0 carrots, 1.0 leek, 300.0 milliliter red wine, 2.0 bay leaves, 1.0 tablespoon tomato paste, 200.0 milliliter tomato puree, 1.0 teaspoon sea salt, 1.0 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 tablespoon parsley
steps: mix and combine the flour with salt and pepper . dredge the steaks through the mixture until covered in flour on both sides . shake off any excess flour . saute schnitzels in hot oil and butter in a shallow pressure cooker pot for about 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown . remove from the pot and set aside . saute pancetta in the same pot for about 2 minutes, add the onion and garlic, saute briefly . add rosemary sprigs and marjoram . add carrots and leek, stir, simmer for 2 3 minutes . stir in water, red wine and bay leaves . add tomato paste and tomato puree, season with salt and pepper, stir . place the schnitzels back into the pan, bring to the boil, then cover the pressure cooker pot and cook on low heat for about 40 minutes . sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve with a side dish of short pasta fusili .

name: grilled couscous with raisins
description: requiring only 5 ingredients and 30 minutes to prepare, this simple recipe packs a ton of flavor . red onion gives it a nice bit of savory flavor while raisins pack a nice sweetness . pair this dish with a piece of meat or fish and some sauteed or roasted vegetables for a complete meal that is sure to keep you satisfied . the soy sauce in this dish stands in for salt and adds a extra kick of flavor.
ner: couscous, red onion, raisins, butter oil, black soy sauce
ingredients: 200.0 gram couscous, 1.0 red onion, 0.3 cup raisins, 1.0 teaspoon butter oil, black soy sauce
steps: boil water . in a shallow plate, pour the couscous and pour the boiling water over it the water should just cover the semolina . cover the plate and let the couscous absorb the water at leat 10 minutes . fluff using a fork . soak the raisins in a little bit of warm water . slice the red onion and brown it gently in a pan with the butter or oil . add the couscous and brown it, stirring regularly . when the couscous is nicely browned, add the drained raisins and soy sauce about a tablespoon it replaces the salt, so adjust quantity to your taste . stir well for a good minute . serve it with grilled vegetables or fish, and for the children with a sliced hot dog, added at the same time as the couscous.

name: broccoli pesto pasta
description: this simple recipe is made with pasta, pesto, and steamed broccoli . healthy meal in under 20 minutes . dairy, vegan, gluten free options . kosher.
ner: spaghetti, vermicelli, capellini, or angel hair pasta whole wheat or gluten free pasta works great, broccoli heads, cut from stalks into small florets, pesto with cheese or dairy free, extra virgin olive oil, grated parmesan, pecorino, or vegan parmesan cheese, salt to taste
ingredients: 1 lb spaghetti, vermicelli, capellini, or angel hair pasta whole wheat or gluten free pasta works great, 1 1/2 lbs broccoli heads, cut from stalks into small florets, 3/4 cup pesto with cheese or dairy free, 3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, grated parmesan, pecorino, or vegan parmesan cheese, salt to taste
steps: bring a large pot of salted water to a boil . add pasta to the boiling water and cook to desired tenderness, stirring frequently . see pasta package for instructions cooking time will depend on the type of pasta you choose . while pasta is cooking, bring 3/4 cup water to a boil in a medium saucepan . add broccoli florets to the pan and cover tightly with a lid . let the broccoli steam for 2 5 minutes, or until tender and bright green . remove from heat and drain in a colander . when the pasta is cooked, reserve about 1 cup of the cooking water in a separate bowl, then drain the pasta in a colander . in a medium mixing bowl, combine pesto, olive oil, and 1/2 cup of the reserved pasta water . add additional pasta water to make the sauce more liquid, if desired . season with salt to taste if using dairy free pesto, you may need more salt for flavor . add the steamed broccoli to the pasta along with the pesto sauce . toss the pasta and vegetables gently with the sauce to coat . salt again to taste, if desired . serve pasta topped with grated parmesan, pecorino, or vegan parmesan cheese . if you're vegetarian, be sure to choose parmesan with a vegetarian rennet . you can also sprinkle on a few red pepper flakes for a touch of spice, if desired.

name: veggie brown rice and orzo pilaf
description: veggie brown rice and orzo pilaf with i can't believe it's not butter spread, yellow onion, red bell pepper, sliced, carrots, salt, ground black pepper, dried thyme leaves, crushed, brown rice, chicken broth, finely chopped fresh parsley, orzo pasta
ner: i can't believe it's not butter spread, yellow onion, red bell pepper, sliced, carrots, salt, ground black pepper, dried thyme leaves, crushed, brown rice, chicken broth, finely chopped fresh parsley, orzo pasta
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon i can't believe it's not butter spread, 1.0 yellow onion, 2.0 red bell pepper, sliced, 1.0 carrots, 0.1 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon ground black pepper, 0.1 teaspoon dried thyme leaves, crushed, 1.0 cup brown rice, 2.2 cup chicken broth, 2.0 tablespoon finely chopped fresh parsley, 1.0 cup orzo pasta
steps: melt i can't believe it's not butter spread in 3 quart saucepot over medium high heat and cook onion, red peppers, carrot, salt, pepper and thyme, stirring frequently, 4 minutes or until vegetables are tender . stir in rice and cook 3 minutes . add broth and bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer covered 25 minutes or until rice is tender . let stand 5 minutes . stir in hot orzo and parsley.

name: appeltjes uit de oven met choco ijs
description: appeltjes uit de oven met choco ijs with appels, bitterkoekjes, suiker, margarine, hertog 3 chocolades, amandelschaafsel
ner: appels, bitterkoekjes, suiker, margarine, hertog 3 chocolades, amandelschaafsel
ingredients: 2.0 appels, 4.0 bitterkoekjes, 25.0 gram suiker, 25.0 gram margarine, 4.0 bulb hertog 3 chocolades, amandelschaafsel
steps: verwarm de oven voor op 200 oc . was de appels en boor met een appelboor het klokhuis eruit.snijd de appels doormidden hak de koekjes fijn en meng ze met de margarine en suiker, vul de appels met het koekjesmengsel . zet ze in een ingevette ovenschaal en bak ze ca . 20 minuten in de voorverwarmde oven . leg op elk bord een halve appel, gebruik het vocht van de appels als saus, laat het eventueel inkoken . schep op elke halve appel een bol 3 chocolades en schenk het appelvocht eromheen . garneer met geroosterd amandelschaafsel.

name: frozen fruit pops
description: freezing fresh fruit with a splash of juice makes for a fresh and healthy snack . use whatever fruit you're heart desires . a perfect summer treat
ner: diced kiwi, diced watermelon, diced strawberries, diced pineapple, fresh pineapple juice or orange juice
ingredients: 1/3 cup diced kiwi, 1/3 cup diced watermelon, 1/3 cup diced strawberries, 1/3 cup diced pineapple, 1/4 cup fresh pineapple juice or orange juice
steps: combine diced fruit in a bowl and fill each 5 oz cup with fruit . add 1 tbsp of juice and insert craft sticks into each cup . they easily stay in place because of all the fruit . place in the freezer a few hours until firm . to remove the pops from the cups, run under warm water a few seconds . enjoy

name: chinese sticky rice / chow lor mei fan
description: chinese sticky rice / chow lor mei fan with chinese sausage, dried shitake mushrooms, dried shrimp, sweet rice, soy sauce, salt, white pepper, granulated sugar, sesame oil, green onion
ner: chinese sausage, dried shitake mushrooms, dried shrimp, sweet rice, soy sauce, salt, white pepper, granulated sugar, sesame oil, green onion
ingredients: 12.0 ounce chinese sausage, 10.0 dried shitake mushrooms, 0.5 cup dried shrimp, 3.0 cup sweet rice, 4.0 tablespoon soy sauce, salt, white pepper, 3.0 teaspoon granulated sugar, 4.0 tablespoon sesame oil, 4.0 stalk green onion
