name: chicken francese
description: chicken francese is an italian american dish made with sauteed chicken cutlets with a lemon butter and white wine sauce . it's my husband's favorite dish, so it's always on rotation in my house
ner: large, unbleached flour, egg whites, large lemon, lemon sliced thin, white wine, low sodium chicken broth, cooking spray, salt and fresh pepper, fresh chopped parsley, butter
ingredients: 4 large, 1/4 cup unbleached flour, 1/2 cup egg whites, 1 large lemon, 1/2 lemon sliced thin, 1/3 cup white wine, 15 oz low sodium chicken broth, cooking spray, salt and fresh pepper, 3 tbsp fresh chopped parsley, 1 tbsp butter
steps: season the chicken with salt and pepper . place the flour in a bowl, and the beaten egg whites in another bowl . heat a very large non stick pan over medium heat . when hot spray with cooking spray to lightly coat the bottom of the pan . lightly flour chicken, then dip in eggs and add to the hot pan a few at a time . saute chicken 2 3 minutes on each side . when cooked, transfer onto a plate . repeat until all chicken has been cooked and set aside . once all chicken is cooked, place the chicken broth in the bowl with 1 tablespoon of flour and whisk . add to the pan along with the juice of the lemon, white wine, lemon slices, parsley and butter and simmer over medium heat for about 2 minutes so it reduces slightly and thickens . turn off heat . return chicken to the pan to combine with the sauce . serve immediately.

name: bouillabaisse
description: bouillabaisse with french bread, garlic, vegetable oil, carrots, fennel, onion, dry white wine, lipton recipe secrets savory herb with garlic soup mix, water, clams, uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, fish fillets
ner: french bread, garlic, vegetable oil, carrots, fennel, onion, dry white wine, lipton recipe secrets savory herb with garlic soup mix, water, clams, uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, fish fillets
ingredients: 12.0 slice french bread, 1.0 clove garlic, 1.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2.0 pound carrots, 1.0 pound fennel, 1.0 onion, 0.2 cup dry white wine, 1.0 lipton recipe secrets savory herb with garlic soup mix, 2.0 cup water, 12.0 clams, 1.0 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, 0.5 pound fish fillets
steps: 1. on broiler pan, arrange bread slices . broil bread, turning once, 1 1/2 minutes or until golden brown . rub one side of each bread slice with garlic set aside . 2. in dutch oven or 6 quart saucepot, heat oil over medium heat and cook carrots, fennel and onion, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes . stir in wine . bring to a boil over high heat and continue boiling 1 minute . stir in lipton recipe secrets savory herb with garlic soup mix blended with water return to a boil . add clams reduce heat to medium and cook covered 3 minutes or until clams begin to open . add shrimp and fish continue cooking covered 1 minute or until shrimp turn pink and fish flakes . discard any unopened clam shells . serve with garlic toast . makes about 4 servings . food note bouillabaisse is a seafood stew that originated in provence, france . it is traditionally served with crusty french bread . copyright 2006 publications international, ltd . used by permission.

name: lemon garlic roasted cornish hen
description: lemon garlic roasted cornish hen with tyson premium cornish hen, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, lemon, garlic, pepper
ner: tyson premium cornish hen, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, lemon, garlic, pepper
ingredients: 1.0 tyson premium cornish hen, 0.5 cup olive oil, 2.0 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1.0 lemon, 5.0 clove garlic, 0.1 teaspoon pepper
steps: remove cornish hen from bag and place into large resalable plastic bag with olive oil . remove hen with tongs and place hen on rack, tucking the wings behind the breasts, season with salt and pepper . place in oven and cook for 20 minutes . zest lemon and smash garlic cloves . juice the lemon that was used for zest and set juice aside . in saute pan toast the lemon zest and garlic for about 3 minutes or until they are golden brown . place all ingredients into bag with cornish hen, removing as much air as possible before sealing . marinate 8 hours or overnight . preheat oven to 375 degrees and prepare a roasting pan or place a rack over a deep baking dish lined with foil . spray rack with non stick spray . remove cornish hen from bag, pouring liquid into the baking dish or roasting pan . place cornish hen breast side down on cutting board and with kitchen shears carefully cut down both sides of the spine to remove it from the hen . then carefully cut the bone directly behind the breast bone and below the neck . heat a cast iron skillet over medium heat until hot and coat with non stick spray . place hen in pan breast side down and cook 3 5 minutes until it reaches a golden sear.

name: rice noodle, beef and vegetable stir fry
description: noodles are a savory dish that is quick and easy for any night of the week . this rice noodle, beef and vegetable stir fry recipe takes 30 minutes to make and has 430 calories per serving . it is hearty and packed with flavors and textures . this recipe combines succulent beef with savory sauces and hearty vegetables for a dish that is out of this world . the sauce is decadent . enjoy
ner: beef, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, ground ginger, sesame oil, garlic, red bell pepper, water chestnuts, bamboo shoots, shiitake mushrooms, broccoli florets, pea pods, zucchini, rice noodles, scallions, toasted sesame seeds, sauce, rice vinegar, orange juice, honey, pepper, vegetable oil
ingredients: 300.0 gram beef, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, ground ginger, 2.0 tablespoon sesame oil, 3.0 clove garlic, 1.0 red bell pepper, 1.0 can water chestnuts, 1.0 can bamboo shoots, 1.5 cup shiitake mushrooms, 1.0 cup broccoli florets, 0.5 cup pea pods, 0.5 cup zucchini, 1.0 package rice noodles, 0.5 cup scallions, toasted sesame seeds, sauce, 1.0 tablespoon rice vinegar, 0.2 cup orange juice, 1.0 tablespoon honey, 1.0 teaspoon pepper, 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil
steps: soak the dehydrated mushrooms in a cup of water for approximately 10 minutes to reconstitute them . marinate the beef in 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 3 tablespoons hoisin sauce, and 1 tablespoon ground ginger in a bowl . meanwhile, heat the 2 tablespoons of sesame oil at medium heat in a wok . add the minced garlic and 1 tablespoon of ground ginger and saute for 1 minute . add the beef to the wok, letting it brown on all sides, for approximately 2 minutes . then, add the rest of the ingredients to the wok, starting with those that will take the longest to cook . remove from heat . prepare the rice noodles by boiling in water until al dente, this will only take a few seconds . drain and add to the noodle sauce . add the prepared noodles to the wok and mix slightly.

name: garlic sriracha pork stir fry
description: garlic sriracha pork stir fry with ground pork, canola oil, garlic, red onion, chinese eggplant, sweet baby peppers, soy sauce, packed brown sugar, sriracha, frozen petite green beans, freshly chopped cilantro

steps: in a large skillet or wok over medium high, brown ground pork, breaking up with a wooden spoon, add garlic and saute for additional 3 minutes . transfer to a plate and set aside . return pan to high heat and warm oil . saute onion eggplant and peppers for 5 minutes until charred and soft . in a bowl mix soy sauce, brown sugar, and sriracha until smooth . add browned pork back to pan along with the sauce and mix until well coated . add beans and heat through . remove from heat, garnish with cilantro and serve.

name: pork chow fun noodles

name: banana nut bread
description: this super moist, banana nut bread recipe is insanely delicious and healthier than most because it uses less butter, oil and sugar than most recipes.
ner: ripe medium bananas, 4 oz unsweetened apple sauce, 13.5 ounces unbleached all purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, 6 1/2 oz light brown sugar, large egg whites, vanilla extract, 3/4 cup chopped walnuts, baking spray
ingredients: 7 ripe medium bananas, 1/2 cup 4 oz unsweetened apple sauce, 2 1/2 cups 13.5 ounces unbleached all purpose flour, 1 1/2 tsp baking soda, 1/2 tsp salt, 4 tbsp butter, 1 cup 6 1/2 oz light brown sugar, 4 large egg whites, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 3 oz 3/4 cup chopped walnuts, baking spray
steps: preheat oven to 350degf . grease two 8x5 inch loaf pans with baking spray . in a medium bowl, combine flour, baking soda and salt with a wire whisk . set aside . in a large bowl cream butter and sugar with an electric mixer . add egg whites, apple sauce and vanilla, and beat at medium speed until thick . scrape down sides of the bowl . add 1/3 of the flour mixture and blend at low speed until combined, add another 1/3 of the flour and blend at low speed, add remaining 1/3 of flour mixture and the bananas and blend at low speed until combined . do not over mix . fold in the walnuts . pour batter into loaf pans and bake on the center rack for 50 to 52 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean . let the pan cool at least 20 minutes, bread should be room temperature before slicing.

name: sheet pan korean pork chops
description: sheet pan korean pork chops with bone in pork chops, honey, hot and sweet gochujang sauce, fresh ginger, seasoned rice vinegar, asian toasted sesame oil, nonstick cooking spray, broccolini spears, rainbow carrots, canola oil, toasted sesame seeds, sliced green onions, cooked rice
ner: bone in pork chops, honey, hot and sweet gochujang sauce, fresh ginger, seasoned rice vinegar, asian toasted sesame oil, nonstick cooking spray, broccolini spears, rainbow carrots, canola oil, toasted sesame seeds, sliced green onions, cooked rice
ingredients: 4.0 bone in pork chops, 0.2 cup honey, 0.2 cup hot and sweet gochujang sauce, 2.0 teaspoon fresh ginger, 2.0 teaspoon seasoned rice vinegar, 1.0 teaspoon asian toasted sesame oil, nonstick cooking spray, 8.0 ounce broccolini spears, 3.0 rainbow carrots, 3.0 tablespoon canola oil, toasted sesame seeds, sliced green onions, cooked rice
steps: preheat oven to 425degf . pat pork chops dry with paper towels . for the glaze, in a small bowl stir together honey, gochujang sauce, ginger, rice vinegar and sesame oil set aside 1/3 cup . lightly spray 2 large rimmed baking pans with cooking spray . place chops on one of the prepared pans . brush pork chops with remaining glaze mixture . in a large bowl toss broccolini and carrots with enough canola oil to lightly coat . place, in a single layer, on the other prepared pan . roast pork chops and vegetables for to 15 to 20 minutes or until internal temperature of pork reaches 145degf and vegetables are crisp tender . remove baking pans from oven . loosely cover each with foil let pork rest for 3 minutes . brush chops half of the with the reserved glaze mixture . arrange pork chops and vegetables on serving platter . garnish with sesame seeds and/or green onions, if desired . serve with remaining glaze and rice.

name: crab cakes benedict with avocado relish
description: treat yourself or your loved ones to this special dish crab cakes benedict topped with avocado relish and a poached egg . perfect for breakfast, lunch or brunch
ner: jumbo lump crabmeat, plain nonfat greek yogurt, panko breadcrumbs, large eggs, freshly squeezed lime juice, finely chopped fresh cilantro, finely chopped fresh chives, ground cumin, dashes tabasco sauce, 2 small ripe hass avocados diced, finely chopped red onion, small tomato, chopped fresh cilantro, fresh lime juice, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, large eggs, white or cider vinegar, kosher salt, chopped cilantro
ingredients: 1 pound jumbo lump crabmeat, 2 tablespoons plain nonfat greek yogurt, 1/2 cup panko breadcrumbs, 2 large eggs, 1 teaspoon freshly squeezed lime juice, 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh cilantro, 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh chives, 1/4 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 3 dashes tabasco sauce, 8 oz 2 small ripe hass avocados diced, 1/4 cup finely chopped red onion, 1 small tomato, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, 2 teaspoons fresh lime juice, 2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 6 large eggs, 2 teaspoons white or cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, chopped cilantro
steps: place crab meat in medium mixing bowl . in small mixing bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients add yogurt mixture to crab meat and gently combine, do not over mix . shape into 6 3 1/2 inch cakes, refrigerate 1 hour or as long as overnight.

name: crustless sausage and spinach quiche
description: this crustless sausage and spinach quiche with italian chicken sausage, spinach, havarti, and parmesan is an easy and healthy recipe for breakfast, brunch, or dinner.
ner: cooking spray, links sweet italian turkey or chicken sausage, bag baby spinach, grated light havarti or cheddar, grated parmesan cheese, 2 milk, half and half cream, large eggs, kosher salt, ground black pepper, freshly grated nutmeg
ingredients: cooking spray, 3 links sweet italian turkey or chicken sausage, 12 ounce bag baby spinach, 1 cup grated light havarti or cheddar, 1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese, 2/3 cup 2 milk, 1/4 cup half and half cream, 5 large eggs, 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper, pinch freshly grated nutmeg
steps: preheat your oven to 350 degrees . spray a pie dish with oil . cook the sausage in a large skillet over medium heat, breaking up until cooked, about 5 minutes . add the spinach and reduce heat to low, cook until wilted stirring occasionally, about 7 minutes . drain spinach well . evenly spread the spinach sausage mixture in the prepared dish and top it evenly with the grated havarti and parmesan cheese . make the custard mixture by whisking together the milk, half and half, eggs, salt, black pepper, and the nutmeg . pour the custard into the dish and bake 35 to 40 minutes, until the center is set . cut the quiche into 6 pieces and serve.

name: open faced tuna melt sandwich

steps: combine tuna, celery, carrots, onion, mayonnaise, vinegar, salt and pepper . heat a large skillet over low heat . spray skillet with oil, and place two slices of bread on top . top bread with cheese, then tuna salad and tomato . cook on low heat until cheese melts and bread gets toasty . serve immediately.

description: modified from the broth of http //www.drweil.com/drw/u/rcp02421/french lentil soup with cremini mushrooms sweet potatoes and thyme.html and the veggies and meat of http //www.midwestliving.com/recipe/chicken/french chicken stew.
ner: rosemary, thyme, bay leaves, smoked paprika, pepper, red wine, chicken broth, button mushrooms, mushroom, medium carrots, onion, red potato, frozen green beans, black olives, grape tomatoes, chicken thighs, celery, water
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon rosemary, 1.0 teaspoon thyme, 3.0 bay leaves, 1.0 teaspoon smoked paprika, 1.0 teaspoon pepper, 0.2 cup red wine, 3.0 cup chicken broth, 2.0 cup button mushrooms, 2.0 cup mushroom, 2.0 medium carrots, 1.0 onion, 1.0 red potato, 1.0 cup frozen green beans, 0.5 can black olives, 1.0 handful grape tomatoes, 8.0 chicken thighs, 2.0 stalk celery, 3.0 cup water
steps: combine all ingredients in slow cooker 6 quarts . bury chicken in vegetables . don't put herbs directly on chicken because skin is removed later add enough broth and water to cover most of ingredients . liquid level rises a good amount during cooking, so careful with filling the slow cooker too much . turn slow cooker on low for 6 7 hours or high 3 4 hours . note in my newer crock pot this was enough time, but in my parents' older crock pot 7 hours on low was not enough don't know how long would be good . we left the veggies a little tough . pull out all chicken . skim off fat from top with spoon pull off skin and remove bones from chicken . shred and return to soup.

name: chocolate and mascarpone mousse duo
description: chocolate is a rich and creamy dessert by itself . but this chocolate and mascarpone mousse duo steps it up to a level your taste buds will jump for joy to devour . there may be only five ingredients in this decadent dessert, but it guarantees a scrumptious afternoon snack or late night treat . when the sweet tooth comes knocking, make sure to have this delight ready your mouth will thank you for it
ner: eggs, sugar, unsweetened baking chocolate, butter, mascarpone cheese
ingredients: 8.0 eggs, 250.0 gram sugar, 150.0 gram unsweetened baking chocolate, 125.0 gram butter, 250.0 gram mascarpone cheese
steps: beat 4 egg whites until stiff, set aside . heat the butter and chocolate in a water bath, or double boiler . melt while stirring in order to get a smooth and shiny cream . whisk 100 grams of sugar and 4 egg yolks to a whitish cream . add the chocolate to the sugar mixture, and whisk to a homogeneous paste . gently mix the stiff egg whites in with the chocolate mixture . whisk the mascarpone with 150 grams of sugar, and 4 egg yolks . in another bowl, whisk the remaining 4 egg whites until stiff . gently mix the egg whites with the cheese paste . put the mousse in serving cups, alternating the layers . refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

name: chopped wedge salad
description: classic wedge salad meets chopped salad in this easy side salad dish made with lettuce, bacon, tomatoes, blue cheese and chives with a light homemade blue cheese dressing.
ner: chopped romaine, small tomatoes, cooked center cut bacon, crumbled blue cheese, homemade blue cheese dressing, chopped chives
ingredients: 6 cups chopped romaine, 2 small tomatoes, 5 slices cooked center cut bacon, 1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese, 1/2 cup homemade blue cheese dressing, chopped chives
steps: place the lettuce in a large platter, top with tomatoes, crumbled bacon, blue cheese and serve with blue cheese dressing . top with chopped chives.

name: zalm carbonara met tagliatelle
description: zalm carbonara met tagliatelle with tagliatelle, zalm, citroen, ontbijtspek, melk, knorr mix voor macaroni carbonara, roomkaas, bieslook
ner: tagliatelle, zalm, citroen, ontbijtspek, melk, knorr mix voor macaroni carbonara, roomkaas, bieslook
ingredients: 300.0 gram tagliatelle, 150.0 gram zalm, 1.0 citroen, 3.0 ontbijtspek, 500.0 milliliter melk, 1.0 bag knorr mix voor macaroni carbonara, 100.0 gram roomkaas, 3.0 tablespoon bieslook
steps: kook de tagliatelle zoals aangegeven op de verpakking . snijd de zalm in reepjes en rasp de schil van de citroen heel fijn . bak het ontbijtspek zonder olie of margarine krokant en breek dit in stukjes . giet de melk in een pan en voeg de inhoud van het zakje knorr mix, de roomkaas en de citroenrasp toe . breng de saus al roerend langzaam aan de kook . zet het vuur laag, roer tot de kaas gesmolten is en laat het geheel 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken . serveer de tagliatelle met de saus, de reepjes zalm, de stukjes spek en bestrooi met de bieslook.

name: mediterranean pork tenderloin crostini
description: mediterranean pork tenderloin crostini with roasted red peppers, finely chopped fresh basil, shredded parmesan cheese, pork tenderloin, extra virgin olive oil, aged balsamic vinegar, coarse ground black pepper, garlic salt, nonstick cooking spray, baguette, garlic and herbs chevre goat cheese, chopped fresh thyme
ner: roasted red peppers, finely chopped fresh basil, shredded parmesan cheese, pork tenderloin, extra virgin olive oil, aged balsamic vinegar, coarse ground black pepper, garlic salt, nonstick cooking spray, baguette, garlic and herbs chevre goat cheese, chopped fresh thyme
ingredients: 6.0 ounce roasted red peppers, 3.0 tablespoon finely chopped fresh basil, 1.0 ounce shredded parmesan cheese, 1.0 pork tenderloin, 2.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 2.0 tablespoon aged balsamic vinegar, 0.5 teaspoon coarse ground black pepper, 0.5 teaspoon garlic salt, nonstick cooking spray, 12.0 slice baguette, 4.0 ounce garlic and herbs chevre goat cheese, chopped fresh thyme
steps: preheat oven to 425degf . pat roasted peppers dry with paper towel finely chop the red peppers to make 3/4 cup . in a small bowl stir together chopped red peppers, basil and parmesan cheese . set mixture aside . pat pork tenderloin dry with paper towels . using a very sharp thin knife, trim silver skin and connective tissue from the pork tenderloin . make a lengthwise cut through center of tenderloin . cut to, but not through, opposite side . open meat so it lies flat . spoon red pepper mixture evenly on half of tenderloin . fold other half of pork over to form original shape of tenderloin . tie close with kitchen string at 1 to 1 1/2 inch intervals in another small bowl combine olive oil, balsamic vinegar, black pepper and garlic salt set aside . rub tenderloin with balsamic mixture . lightly spray a rack in shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray . place tenderloin on prepared rack in pan . roast, uncovered, for 20 to 35 minutes or until instant read thermometer inserted near center and not touching filling reads 145degf . transfer tenderloin to a cutting board cool pork for 30 minutes . wrap pork and chill in refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight . to serve, spread baguette toasts with goat cheese . remove strings from pork tenderloin and cut into 3/8 inch thick slices . lightly spray rack in shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray . place slices on top of goat cheese . sprinkle with thyme, if desired.

name: steak and caramelized onions with arugula and penne
description: grilled steak, arugula and pasta salad is topped with sweet balsamic caramelized onions and fresh shaved parmesan . i'm a sucker for a good steak salad, and this one is awesome
ner: top sirloin, kosher salt and fresh cracked pepper, penne pasta, baby arugula, olive oil, golden balsamic, shaved parmesan or pecorino romano cheese, medium red onion, large white onion, paprika, kosher coarse salt, golden balsamic vinegar, olive oil
ingredients: 1 lb top sirloin, kosher salt and fresh cracked pepper, 4 oz penne pasta, 3 oz baby arugula, 4 teaspoons olive oil, 1 1/2 tbsp golden balsamic, 1/2 oz shaved parmesan or pecorino romano cheese, 1/2 medium red onion, 1 large white onion, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 tsp kosher coarse salt, 1 tbsp golden balsamic vinegar, 1 tbsp olive oil
steps: bring a large pot of salted water to a boil . season steak with salt and pepper to taste . for the caramelized onions cut onions in half and thinly slice short end . add 1 tbsp olive oil to a nonstick skillet and add the onions . add salt, paprika, and balsamic vinegar and cook on medium low to low heat until onions are tender, transparent, and slightly brown, about 30 to 35 minutes, stirring occasionally . meanwhile, cook pasta according to package directions . drain and set aside in a large work bowl and let cool . while the pasta is cooling, heat a grill pan over high heat and spray with cooking spray or preheat the broiler to high . cook the steaks about 3 to 4 minutes on each side for medium rare, or longer to your desired likeness until a thermometer inserted in the center registers 145degf for medium rare, 160degf for medium, or 165degf for well done . let stand for 10 minutes, then slice into thin strips . add the arugula, 4 teaspoons olive oil, 1 1/2 tbsp balsamic, salt and pepper to the bowl with the pasta and toss . add the caramelized onions, toss well and divide between four plates, about 1 1/2 cups each . top each with 3 oz steak and shaved parmesan . eat right away.

name: challah chestnut stuffing
description: a savory kosher stuffing with challah, chestnuts, carrots, celery, and herbs . kosher, meat or pareve, thanksgiving, holidays.
ner: pre shelled roasted chestnuts or 3/4 lb . chestnuts in shell, schmaltz, divided, sliced white mushrooms, onion, minced, celery, diced including leaves, carrots, diced small, curly leaf parsley, minced, fresh sage, minced, fresh thyme leaves, minced, fresh marjoram, minced, garlic, minced, chicken or vegetable broth, medium loaf of challah bread, cubed about 10 cups of cubes, eggs, beaten
ingredients: 1 cup pre shelled roasted chestnuts or 3/4 lb . chestnuts in shell, 1/4 cup schmaltz, divided, 8 oz sliced white mushrooms, 1 onion, minced, 2 cups celery, diced including leaves, 1 cup carrots, diced small, 1/2 cup curly leaf parsley, minced, 2 tbsp fresh sage, minced, 1 tbsp fresh thyme leaves, minced, 1 tsp fresh marjoram, minced, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 quart chicken or vegetable broth, 1 medium loaf of challah bread, cubed about 10 cups of cubes, 4 large eggs, beaten
steps: if you are using pre peeled chestnuts, chop them into bits and reserve them in a bowl for later use . if you are using chestnuts in the shell, you will need to roast and peel them before chopping in my experience this takes about 45 minutes of prep time . preheat oven to 350 degrees f . in a skillet, melt 2 tbsp schmaltz or margarine over medium high heat, tilting to coat the bottom of the pan . spread the mushrooms in a single layer at the bottom of the skillet . sprinkle them with salt and pepper and turn the heat to high . let the mushrooms sear without stirring . after 2 minutes, stir the mushrooms continuously for another 2 3 minutes until they are seared golden brown and shrink to half their size . reserve the mushrooms in a bowl, return skillet to the stove . turn flame to medium high and melt 2 more tbsp of schmaltz or margarine in the skillet . saute the onion till it softens, then add the celery, carrots, minced garlic cloves and chopped chestnuts . saute mixture for 5 minutes until veggies begin to brown and caramelize . stir in the seared mushrooms, parsley, and herbs . pour in 3 cups of the chicken or veggie broth reserve the last cup, bring to a boil . reduce heat and allow mixture to simmer for 10 minutes . season with salt and pepper to taste i like lots of black pepper . remove from heat and let the mixture cool for a few minutes . meanwhile, spread challah bread cubes in a single layer across two cookie sheets and place them in the oven . let them lightly toast for 5 6 minutes until the edges start to turn golden . you want to dry out the cubes just slightly they should still retain some of their sponginess . place challah bread crumbs in a very large mixing bowl . in a small bowl, beat the eggs . pour the eggs over the breadcrumbs, stir with a large wooden spoon or spatula . add the broth mixture and continue to stir till the vegetables and liquid are fully incorporated into the breadcrumbs.you can use this stuffing to stuff a 10 16 lb . bird, or you can bake the stuffing separately . if stuffing the bird, make sure you follow the appropriate food safety guidelines . to bake the stuffing outside the bird, spread the stuffing in an even layer in a 9x13 baking dish and place uncovered in the oven . let it cook for 30 45 minutes . check once halfway through cooking if the stuffing seems too dry, pour more chicken broth evenly across the top . let it continue to bake till the top turns golden brown . serve hot . to keep this dish vegetarian, use vegetable broth and butter or margarine.

name: chicken curry filipino style
description: i wrote a song for you, and all the things you do and it was called yellow . coldplay
ner: chicken, medium potato, garlic, onion, green bell pepper, coconut milk, curry powder, small carrots, salt, msg, blackpepper, oil
ingredients: 0.5 kilogram chicken, 2.0 medium potato, 4.0 clove garlic, 1.0 onion, 1.0 green bell pepper, 2.0 cup coconut milk, 2.0 tablespoon curry powder, 3.0 small carrots, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon msg, 0.2 teaspoon blackpepper, 2.0 tablespoon oil
steps: in a large pan, saute the garlic and onion . add the chicken pieces and cook for 2 3 minutes, stirring continuously . add the salt, msg, black ground pepper then mix, add curry powder stir . add the first cup of coconut milk, stir, and cook for a minute until chicken is partly cook . add the potatoes, carrots and green bell pepper, 2nd cup of coconut milk and bring to a boil, then turn the heat down to simmer for 10 15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender . serve hot with rice.

name: endive salad with oranges and red onion
description: endive salad with oranges and red onion with orange, endive, red onion, wish bone red wine vinaigrette dressing, ground black pepper
ner: orange, endive, red onion, wish bone red wine vinaigrette dressing, ground black pepper
ingredients: 2.0 orange, 2.0 head endive, 1.0 red onion, 3.0 tablespoon wish bone red wine vinaigrette dressing, 0.1 teaspoon ground black pepper
steps: cut between membranes of oranges to remove segments over medium bowl, with sharp knife, reserving juice . just before serving, toss orange segments and their juice with remaining ingredients.

name: aubergine gehaktschotel met pesto rosso
description: een zalige gehaktschotel bereid met de bertolli pesto rosso is natuurlijk aanlokkelijk . maak snel deze heerlijke aubergine gehaktschotel met pesto rosso.
ner: aubergines, bertolli vloeibaar voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, rundergehakt, bertolli pesto rosso, peterselie, kaas
ingredients: 2.0 aubergines, 2.0 tablespoon bertolli vloeibaar voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, 500.0 gram rundergehakt, 4.0 tablespoon bertolli pesto rosso, 2.0 tablespoon peterselie, 100.0 gram kaas
steps: verwarm de oven voor tot 175 degc . snijd de aubergine in plakken en dep ze droog . bestrijk ze dun met bertolli vloeibaar en bak ze in gedeelten in een hete grillpan of koekenpan tot ze mooie grillstrepen hebben . bak het rundergehakt in een wok zonder vet rul en bruin . schep er 2 eetlepels bertolli pesto rosso en de fijngehakte peterselie door en laat het gehakt nog zo'n 5 minuten pruttelen . leg een derde van de plakken aubergine in een ingevette ovenschaal en bestrijk ze royaal met pesto . verdeel de helft van het gehakt erover . leg hierop weer een laag aubergine een eetlepel pesto, dan de rest van het gehakt en tot slot de derde laag aubergine met pesto . strooi de geraspte parmezaanse kaas erover . bak de schotel in de oven in 25 minuten mooi bruin en gaar.

name: easy, not so easy spaghetti with tomato sauce
description: it is undecided whether this recipe is easy or not so easy so we decided to call it the easy, not so easy spaghetti with tomato sauce . this is a traditional italian meal that you see often at italian restaurants but with an even more delicious and flavorful tomato sauce . we recommend you be an intermediate level chef to try this recipe but you will love it without a doubt . try it out today
ner: extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, tomato puree, dried basil, salt, ground black pepper, spaghetti, parmesan cheese
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 1.0 garlic clove, 400.0 gram tomato puree, dried basil, salt, ground black pepper, 400.0 gram spaghetti, 2.0 tablespoon parmesan cheese
steps: in a skillet on medium heat, add the oil and saute the garlic for a minute . add tomato puree and a pinch each of basil, salt, and black pepper . stir well . simmer on low heat for 10 minutes . in a large pot filled with salted water on high heat, boil the pasta for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente . drain the pasta . add the pasta to the sauce and cook for another minute . serve sprinkled with the parmesan cheese.

name: final lap macaroni salad with shrimp
description: final lap macaroni salad with shrimp with elbow macaroni, cooked and drained, green onions, pitted ripe olives, chopped celery, hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, lemon pepper, dijon mustard, garlic salt, medium shrimp
ner: elbow macaroni, cooked and drained, green onions, pitted ripe olives, chopped celery, hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, lemon pepper, dijon mustard, garlic salt, medium shrimp
ingredients: 1.0 pound elbow macaroni, cooked and drained, 4.0 green onions, 2.0 can pitted ripe olives, 0.5 cup chopped celery, 1.5 cup hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, 0.5 teaspoon lemon pepper, 2.0 teaspoon dijon mustard, 1.0 dash garlic salt, 1.5 pound medium shrimp
steps: combine macaroni, olives, green onions and celery in large bowl set aside . combine hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, lemon pepper, mustard and garlic salt stir into macaroni mixture . gently toss in shrimp . chill at least 3 hours.

name: hummus sriracha deviled eggs
description: spiced up, lightened up, smoky deviled eggs recipe . lower cholesterol and lower fat than traditional deviled eggs, with an addictive spicy kick.
ner: eggs, chickpeas, cooked or canned and drained, tahini, roasted garlic, freshly squeezed lemon juice, sriracha, extra virgin olive oil, honey, salt, smoked paprika for garnish
ingredients: 8 large eggs, 1 3/4 cups chickpeas, cooked or canned and drained, 3 tbsp tahini, 4 cloves roasted garlic, 2 tbsp freshly squeezed lemon juice, 1 1/2 tbsp sriracha, 1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, 2 1/2 tsp honey, 1/2 tsp salt, smoked paprika for garnish
steps: place eggs in pot and cover with cold water . bring to a rolling boil over high heat . turn off the heat and let sit for 15 minutes . remove with a slotted spoon and run cold water over the eggs . the eggs are easiest to peel if they're still slightly warm . also, older eggs peel easier than fresh . cut peeled eggs in half with a sharp knife, dipping the knife in water between each egg so they slice smoothly . scoop out the yolks . reserve 4 of the yolks in bowl of a food processor . discard the other yolks or save them as a special treat for your dog . add the chickpeas, tahini, roasted garlic, lemon juice, sriracha, extra virgin olive oil, honey and salt to the food processor and process, adding the reserved chickpea liquid in small batches until mixture is smooth and easily spreadable . if you're spice sensitive, you might want to start with 1/2 tbsp sriracha and add more to taste . use a pastry bag with tip to pipe the hummus mixture into the halved eggs or, if you want to be less fancy, just scoop a bit of the mixture into each egg . dust the eggs with smoked paprika using a mesh strainer to disperse the spice neatly and evenly . if you have leftover filling, place it in a small bowl for spreading on crackers . these deviled eggs can be made up to 1 day ahead and refrigerated in a covered container until ready to serve . refrigerate them immediately after making, do not leave at room temperature for very long or they may spoil.

name: rock 'n' eel 4 hour chef
description: rock 'n' eel 4 hour chef with broccoli, unagi, avocado, lime, grapeseed oil, soy sauce, sesame oil, toasted sesame seeds
ner: broccoli, unagi, avocado, lime, grapeseed oil, soy sauce, sesame oil, toasted sesame seeds
ingredients: 1.0 head broccoli, 12.0 ounce unagi, 1.0 avocado, 0.5 lime, 2.0 tablespoon grapeseed oil, 1.0 soy sauce, 1.0 sesame oil, 1.0 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds
steps: preheat to high broil dice avocado, add to bowl with lime juice food process broccoli heat 2 t oil over high heat add broccoli in equal layer, cook undisturbed for 1 2 min each side add broccoli to avocado bowl and toss chop cod/eel, broil for 1 5 min divide veggies among plates, top with eel/cod splash soy sauce, sesame oil, and sesame seeds on top

name: bow tie pasta with savory lentil sauce
description: bow tie pasta with savory lentil sauce with lentils, chicken broth, water, pasta sauce, balsamic vinegar, bow tie pasta
ner: lentils, chicken broth, water, pasta sauce, balsamic vinegar, bow tie pasta
ingredients: 0.5 cup lentils, 14.5 ounce chicken broth, 0.5 cup water, 24.0 ounce pasta sauce, 1.0 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 16.0 ounce bow tie pasta
steps: bring lentils, broth and water to a boil over high heat in 3 quart saucepot or dutch oven . reduce heat to low and simmer covered, stirring occasionally, 20 minutes . stir in pasta sauce and vinegar . simmer covered, stirring occasionally, an additional 20 minutes or until lentils are tender . serve over hot pasta.

name: bell pepper and potato frittata
description: egg frittatas are my answer to an easy, inexpensive meal solution whether i'm having it for breakfast, lunch or dinner . i made these with bell pepper and potato and served with a side of berries or fruit . for dinner, i serve with a salad on the side and call it a meal
ner: thin slices green bell pepper, large eggs, large egg whites, kosher salt and pepper, olive oil, minced shallots, 7 oz medium peeled yukon gold potatoes, diced into 1/2 inch pieces, garlic powder, paprika
ingredients: 4 thin slices green bell pepper, 4 large eggs, 4 large egg whites, kosher salt and pepper, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1/4 cup minced shallots, 1 7 oz medium peeled yukon gold potatoes, diced into 1/2 inch pieces, 1/4 tsp garlic powder, 1/4 tsp paprika
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . crack the eggs and egg whites into a large bowl . add salt and fresh cracked pepper and beat until blended . heat a 10 inch nonstick oven safe skillet over medium heat . add the oil and shallots to the pan and cook until golden, 2 to 3 minutes . add the potatoes, season with salt, garlic powder, paprika and black pepper . cover and cook the potatoes over medium low heat, stirring occasionally, until crisp and tender, about 12 to 15 minutes . pour the egg mixture into the skillet . carefully arrange the bell peppers on top to create a shamrock pattern if desired . reduce the heat to low and cook until the edges are set, 6 to 8 minutes . transfer the skillet to the oven and bake until the frittata is completely set and cooked through, 8 to 10 minutes . remove from the oven and transfer onto a large plate . cut into 4 wedges and serve.

name: star cookies
description: theese little star cookies make the perfect dessert for celebrating a birthday or other special occasion . the dough comes together easily with very few ingredients and once it is cut out into stars, it is topped with colorful candies . the cookies are whimsical and bright, making them great for a kids party . you can even get the kids involved in making the cookies, as this recipe is very simple to prepare.
ner: flour, butter, eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, yeast, smarties
ingredients: 500.0 flour, 180.0 butter, 2.0 eggs, 200.0 gram sugar, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 0.5 teaspoon yeast, smarties
steps: mix all ingredients till the dough is not sticking to your hands . roll out the dough with the help of a kitchen roll . if it's sticking, put a plastic bag over it and spread it . cut the dough with star cutters and decorate it with two smarties each . bake in preheated oven at 350 deg f for 10 minutes . do not let them get golden because when cool they get hard . let them cool on the rack.

name: pork chop santa fe
description: a quick braised dinner for those hurried weekend meals . serve with spanish rice, steamed green beans and blue heaven cornbread.
ner: boneless ribeye rib pork chops, vegetable oil, chunky salsa, oregano, ground cumin, garlic
ingredients: 4.0 boneless ribeye rib pork chops, 1.0 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1.0 cup chunky salsa, 1.0 teaspoon oregano, 0.5 teaspoon ground cumin, 1.0 clove garlic
steps: in large heavy skillet, heat oil over medium high heat . brown chops quickly, about 2 minutes per side . lower heat add remaining ingredients to pan . cover and simmer 8 minutes, until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees fahrenheit, followed by a 3 minute rest time.

name: grilled clams in foil
description: grilled clams cooked in foil packets with zucchini and tomatoes in a garlic white wine sauce so fast and easy, perfect to make all summer long
ner: reynolds wrap heavy duty aluminum foil, 1 medium zucchini, cut 1 inch pieces, cherry tomatoes, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt and black pepper, littleneck or cherrystone clams, dry white wine, crushed red pepper flakes
ingredients: reynolds wrap heavy duty aluminum foil, 10 ounce 1 medium zucchini, cut 1 inch pieces, 5 cherry tomatoes, 1 clove garlic, 3 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt and black pepper, 20 littleneck or cherrystone clams, 1 tablespoon dry white wine, crushed red pepper flakes
steps: preheat the grill to high heat . make foil packets . tear off 2 18" sheets of reynolds wrap heavy duty or non stick aluminum foil . in a medium bowl combine the zucchini, tomatoes, garlic, 2 teaspoons of the olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt and black pepper to taste . place 10 clams on the center of each foil sheet . divide the vegetables, then top with crushed red pepper flakes . drizzle the remaining 1/2 teaspoon oil over each and 1/2 tablespoon wine over both . bring up the long sides of the foil, so the ends meet over the food . double fold the ends, leaving room for heat to circulate inside . double fold the two short ends to seal the packet tight, so no steam escapes . grill covered over high heat, until the clams open, 8 to 10 minutes . use gloves or tongs to remove and carefully open . eat right away to bake in the oven, preheat oven to 425f and cook about 10 minutes.

name: sliced bread lasagna
description: in this quick and easy take on traditional lasagna, sliced bread replaces the usual noodles, for a result that's more akin to a savory bread pudding, with the bread soaking up the juices from the other components during baking . here, the bread is layered with simply seasoned diced tomatoes in lieu of a cooked tomato sauce, chopped ham and mozzarella, and grated parmesan cheese, and then the whole thing is doused with beaten eggs with milk and cream in lieu of a cooked bechamel sauce .
ner: diced tomato, dried oregano, extra virgin olive oil, salt, ground black pepper, cooked ham, mozzarella cheese, eggs, cream, milk, parmesan cheese, bread
ingredients: 15.0 ounce diced tomato, dried oregano, extra virgin olive oil, salt, ground black pepper, cooked ham, mozzarella cheese, 2.0 eggs, 2.0 milliliter cream, 50.0 milliliter milk, parmesan cheese, 1.0 square bread
steps: preheat the oven to 180 degrees celsius . in a bowl, season the tomato with a little olive oil, and a pinch each of salt, black pepper, and oregano . coarsely chop the ham and mix with mozzarella cheese . in a separate bowl, beat the eggs with cream and milk . set aside . cut the crusts from the bread slices and carefully place in a rectangular oven proof dish . keep the crusts to use elsewhere arrange the bread slices close together so as to cover the whole base . cut to size, if necessary, ensuring no gaps . cover the bread with a layer of tomato mixture, half the mozzarella and ham, then sprinkle with parmesan cheese . place another layer of bread and repeat the process above with the remaining mozzarella and ham . add final layer of bread and tomato . then pour over the egg mixture to completely cover the top and sides . finish off with a generous sprinkling of parmesan cheese . cook for about 20 minutes . then place under a broiler for 7 to 10 minutes until golden brown . the lasagna should be soft inside and crunchy outside . cool before serving.

name: mexican chorizo huevos rancheros
description: mexican chorizo huevos rancheros with mexican chorizo, corn tortillas, cooking spray, refried black beans, vegetable oil, large eggs, tomato salsa, cilantro, avocado, queso fresco
ner: mexican chorizo, corn tortillas, cooking spray, refried black beans, vegetable oil, large eggs, tomato salsa, cilantro, avocado, queso fresco
ingredients: 12.0 ounce mexican chorizo, 8.0 corn tortillas, cooking spray, 15.0 ounce refried black beans, vegetable oil, 8.0 large eggs, 15.0 ounce tomato salsa, cilantro, avocado, queso fresco
steps: preheat oven to 400 degrees f . arrange tortillas on 2 baking sheets, making sure they are evenly spaced and not overlapping . lightly spray the top of each tortilla with cooking spray and then transfer the baking sheets into the oven . bake for 10 to 12 minutes until crisp, but not brown . heat a cast iron skillet over medium high heat . once hot, stir in the chorizo, breaking it up with a wooden spoon as it starts to cook . cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until chorizo is cooked through . remove the cooked chorizo from the skillet with a slotted spoon to let any excess fat drip off . place the chorizo in a medium bowl and set aside . drain any excess fat left behind from the chorizo and, in the same skillet, add 2 3 teaspoons of oil . carefully crack 3 eggs into the skillet, evenly spaced so they have room to cook, and cook until the egg white is solid, 3 to 4 minutes . remove the fried eggs to a parchment lined baking sheet and repeat this process for remaining eggs . to assemble, smear equal amounts of the refried beans on top of each crisp tortilla, followed by equal parts of the jarred salsa . sprinkle equal amounts of the cooked chorizo on top of the salsa, followed by one fried egg on top of each tortilla . serve immediately.

name: hawaiian salmon poke
description: poke poke ay is a favorite appetizer common in hawaii . this salmon poke is fresh, flavorful, and even better than your favorite sashimi . make it into a hand roll for an impressive and fun way to nosh . be sure to chill at least an hour . from chew out loud recipe type appetizer, side serves 4 6
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: combine all ingredients together in a bowl . toss to coat well . cover tightly and chill for at least 1 hour . serve cold . serve with white rice, or make into hand rolls . if making hand rolls, simply cut a nori sheet in half, fill with desired amount of rice and salmon poke, and roll it up . eat rolls immediately.

name: pumpkin and peanut butter dip
description: pumpkin and peanut butter dip with pumpkin, skippy creamy peanut butter, sweetened whipped cream, reduced fat cream cheese, pumpkin pie spice, apple, graham cracker crumbs
ner: pumpkin, skippy creamy peanut butter, sweetened whipped cream, reduced fat cream cheese, pumpkin pie spice, apple, graham cracker crumbs
ingredients: 0.5 cup pumpkin, 0.2 cup skippy creamy peanut butter, 3.0 tablespoon sweetened whipped cream, 2.0 tablespoon reduced fat cream cheese, 0.2 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 1.0 apple, 2.0 graham cracker crumbs
steps: combine pumpkin, skippy creamy peanut butter, cider, cream cheese and pumpkin pie spice in medium bowl . serve with apple and graham crackers.

name: lavash flatbread pizzas
description: if you like thin crust pizza, you'll love these super easy lavash flatbread pizzas kids love them and they take only minutes to prepare.
ner: x12" lavash flatbread, olive oil spray, marinara sauce, reduced fat shredded mozzarella, dried oregano, fresh basil
ingredients: 9 x12" lavash flatbread, olive oil spray, 3 tbsp marinara sauce, 2 oz reduced fat shredded mozzarella, pinch dried oregano, 2 tbsp fresh basil
steps: preheat oven to 450deg . if you have a pizza stone, heat it as well . spray lavash lightly with oil then top with sauce . too much sauce will make the bread soggy so don't over do it . top with cheese and oregano, then bake until the cheese melts, about 5 minutes . remove from the oven and cut into 4 pieces . top with fresh basil and eat immediately.

name: slow cooker stuffed peppers
description: slow cooker stuffed peppers with green peppers, ground pork, instant white rice, frozen peas, water, kraft original barbecue sauce, velveeta
ner: green peppers, ground pork, instant white rice, frozen peas, water, kraft original barbecue sauce, velveeta
ingredients: 4.0 green peppers, 0.5 pound ground pork, 1.0 cup instant white rice, 1.0 cup frozen peas, 0.8 cup water, 0.5 cup kraft original barbecue sauce, 0.2 pound velveeta
steps: cut tops off peppers chop tops, then refrigerate for another use . remove seeds from peppers discard . set pepper shells aside . mix meat, rice, peas, and 1/4 cup each water and barbecue sauce just until blended spoon into pepper shells . combine remaining water and barbecue sauce in slow cooker . stand peppers in slow cooker top with velveeta . cover with lid . cook on low 5 to 7 hours or on high 2 1/2 to 3 1/2 hours . serve peppers topped with sauce.

name: momofuku's bo ssam
description: this is a recipe to win the dinner party sweepstakes, and at very low stakes slow roasted pork shoulder served with lettuce, rice and a raft of condiments . the chef david chang serves the dish, known by its korean name, bo ssam, at his momofuku restaurant in the east village and elsewhere.
ner: pork butt, white sugar, kosher salt, brown sugar, scallions, fresh ginger, neutral oil, light soy sauce, sherry vinegar, kosher salt, bean, chili paste
ingredients: 1.0 whole pork butt, 1.0 cup white sugar, 1.0 cup kosher salt, 7.0 tablespoon brown sugar, 2.5 cup scallions, 0.5 cup fresh ginger, 0.2 cup neutral oil, 1.5 teaspoon light soy sauce, 0.5 cup sherry vinegar, 0.5 teaspoon kosher salt, 2.0 tablespoon bean, 1.0 tablespoon chili paste
steps: place the pork in a large, shallow bowl . mix the white sugar and 1 cup of the salt together in another bowl, then rub the mixture all over the meat . cover it with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator for at least 6 hours, or overnight . when you're ready to cook, heat oven to 300. remove pork from refrigerator and discard any juices . place the pork in a roasting pan and set in the oven and cook for approximately 6 hours, or until it collapses, yielding easily to the tines of a fork . after the first hour, baste hourly with pan juices . at this point, you may remove the meat from the oven and allow it to rest for up to an hour . meanwhile, make the ginger scallion sauce . in a large bowl, combine scallions, ginger, 1/4 cup oil, light soy sauce, 1 teaspoon sherry vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste . mix well and taste, adding salt if needed . make the ssam sauce . in a medium bowl, combine both the chili pastes with the remaining 1/2 cup sherry vinegar and 1/2 cup oil, and mix well . prepare rice, wash lettuce and, if using, shuck the oysters . put kimchi and sauces into serving bowls . when your accompaniments are prepared and you are ready to serve the food, turn oven to 500. in a small bowl, stir together the remaining tablespoon of salt with the brown sugar . rub this mixture all over the cooked pork . place in oven for approximately 10 to 15 minutes, or until a dark caramel crust has developed on the meat . serve hot, with the accompaniments . suggested to serve with 2 cups plain white rice, cooked 3 heads bibb lettuce, leaves separated, washed and dried 1 dozen or more fresh oysters optional kimchi available in many asian markets, and online

name: traditional whole turkey
description: traditional whole turkey with warm water, salt, sugar, onion, garlic, vegetable stock, orange, bay leaves, peppercorns, ice, shady brook farms fresh young turkey, fennel bulb, garlic, leek, small apple, thyme, orange, olive oil, salt, pepper, white wine
ner: warm water, salt, sugar, onion, garlic, vegetable stock, orange, bay leaves, peppercorns, ice, shady brook farms fresh young turkey, fennel bulb, garlic, leek, small apple, thyme, orange, olive oil, salt, pepper, white wine
ingredients: 1.0 quart warm water, 0.5 cup salt, 0.2 cup sugar, 1.0 onion, 1.0 head garlic, 2.0 quart vegetable stock, 1.0 orange, 2.0 bay leaves, 1.0 tablespoon peppercorns, 4.0 cup ice, 1.0 shady brook farms fresh young turkey, 1.0 fennel bulb, 4.0 clove garlic, 1.0 leek, 1.0 small apple, 1.0 bunch thyme, 1.0 orange, 3.0 tablespoon olive oil, salt, pepper, 1.0 cup white wine
steps: in warm water add salt and sugar, stir and allow to fully dissolve . add remaining brine ingredients and finally ice to fully cool . once cold, place turkey in brine and fully submerge . store in refrigerator for 12 24 hours . when turkey has finished brining, preheat oven to 350degf . remove turkey from the brine, rinse, and pat dry . place in roasting pan . in a bowl mix fennel, garlic, leeks, apples, thyme, orange with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, and generous amount of salt and pepper . stuff seasoned aromatics into turkey cavity . brush turkey with remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil, then season with salt and pepper . add wine to the bottom of roasting pan . bake at until golden brown and internal temperature is 165degf in the thickest area of the breast . rotate turkey after roasting for approximately 1 hour and baste with juices in pan . cover loosely with foil if turkey browns too quickly . allow the turkey to rest covered for 15 20 minutes before carving.

name: pomegranate molasses brisket
description: slow roasted brisket infused with pomegranate molasses, garlic, and spice . kosher, meat, rosh hashanah, holiday
ner: beef brisket, pomegranate molasses, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, minced, cinnamon, salt, cayenne pepper, large sweet onions, sliced, fresh mint leaves, pomegranate seeds
ingredients: 4 5 lb beef brisket, 1/2 cup pomegranate molasses, extra virgin olive oil, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp salt, 1/8 tsp cayenne pepper, 2 large sweet onions, sliced, fresh mint leaves, pomegranate seeds
steps: rinse the brisket and pat dry, then place in a ceramic or glass oven safe roasting dish . in a small mixing bowl, whisk together pomegranate molasses, 1/4 cup olive oil, minced garlic cloves, cinnamon, salt, and cayenne pepper . pour half of the marinade over the top of the brisket, making sure the entire surface is covered in an even layer . turn the brisket over and pour the other half of the marinade over the brisket so both sides are evenly coated.cover the dish with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator overnight, or up to two days . when ready to cook, preheat your oven to 300 degrees f . heat 2 tbsp of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat . take the brisket out of the marinade, scraping any excess marinade back into the roasting dish . place the brisket into the skillet . brown the brisket on both sides about 5 minutes per side . while brisket is browning, stir 1/4 cup of water into the marinade at the bottom of the roasting dish to make it more liquid . transfer brisket back to the roasting dish on top of the liquid marinade, making sure the fatty layer is on top . place sliced onions into the hot skillet . saute the onions for 10 15 minutes, scraping up the brown bits as the onions cook . when onions are nicely browned and caramelized, pour them over the top of the brisket along with the brown bits and oil from the skillet . use a spoon to scoop up some of the marinade from the bottom of the dish spoon marinade over the top of the onions . cover the roasting dish with foil . place brisket in the oven and let it slowly roast for 4 5 hours . it will take about 1 hour per pound of meat leaner cuts of meat may take longer test for doneness . if your cut of brisket is very lean, you may need a little more water to keep it moist while it cooks . check halfway through cooking and add more water to the bottom of the dish, if needed . the brisket will shrink by about 1/3 in size as it cooks . brisket is ready when it flakes tenderly . you can let it cook even longer if you like a soft, shredded texture . scrape the cooked onions off the top of the brisket . reserve . remove brisket from the pan and place it on a cutting board.cover the brisket with foil to keep it warm . let it rest for 20 30 minutes before slicing this will allow the juices to distribute through the meat . strain pan drippings from the roasting pan into a saucepan and allow to cool . once the pan drippings have cooled slightly, you will see the clear fat rise to the surface of the liquid . skim as much of this fat off of the surface as you can . use an immersion blender to blend the reserved onions into the cooking liquid . this will thicken the sauce and add flavor . if you'd like a stronger, more pronounced pomegranate flavor, you can also blend in an additional 1 tbsp of pomegranate molasses optional . warm the sauce in a small saucepan on the stovetop . season with salt and pepper to taste . cut fat cap off the brisket, then cut the brisket in thin slices against the grain . place brisket slices into a serving dish . pour the warmed sauce over the brisket slices . my favorite way to serve this brisket is sliced over freshly cooked saffron rice . i like to garnish it with fresh pomegranate seeds arils and fresh mint for a colorful and aromatic presentation.

name: lemony walnut crusted fish fillets
description: lemony walnut crusted fish fillets with bread, i can't believe it's not butter all purpose sticks, fresh parsley leaves, lemon juice, lemon, salt, salmon, chopped walnuts
ner: bread, i can't believe it's not butter all purpose sticks, fresh parsley leaves, lemon juice, lemon, salt, salmon, chopped walnuts
ingredients: 2.0 slice bread, 2.0 tablespoon i can't believe it's not butter all purpose sticks, 0.2 cup fresh parsley leaves, 1.0 tablespoon lemon juice, 1.0 teaspoon lemon, 0.1 teaspoon salt, 1.0 pound salmon, 0.2 cup chopped walnuts
steps: preheat oven to 425deg . arrange cod on baking sheet, then drizzle with lemon juice set aside . process bread in food processor until fine crumbs . add parsley, lemon peel and salt and process until chopped . add i can't believe it's not butter all purpose sticks and pulse just until combined . combine bread mixture with walnuts in small bowl . evenly top cod with crumb mixture . bake 15 minutes or until cod flakes with a fork and crumbs are golden.

name: quick mexican brown rice
description: this quick mexican brown rice is the perfect side dish that goes with everything from tacos, enchiladas, refried beans you name it
ner: cooked brown rice, olive oil, medium onion, medium plum tomatoes, jalapeno, garlic cloves, tomato paste, cumin, smoked paprika, cayenne pepper, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, lime wedges, chopped cilantro
ingredients: 4 cups cooked brown rice, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1/2 medium onion, 2 medium plum tomatoes, 1 jalapeno, 2 garlic cloves, 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 1/2 teaspoon cumin, 1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, 5 lime wedges, chopped cilantro
steps: heat the cooked rice . set aside . heat the oil in a large skillet over medium high heat . when hot, add the onions, tomatoes and jalapeno and saute until just tender, about 2 3 minutes . add garlic and saute for another minute . add the tomato paste, cumin, paprika, cayenne, salt and pepper . stir to evenly coat the vegetables . add the cooked rice, stir, and cook for 1 minute or until heated through . serve with cilantro and lime wedges on the side.

name: cheesy zucchini and rice casserole
description: this creamy, cheesy zucchini and rice casserole is sure to be a new meatless monday favorite.
ner: nonstick cooking spray, zucchini, yellow onion, garlic, salted butter, fresh thyme, all purpose flour, chicken broth, half and half, salt, black pepper, shredded gruyere cheese, shredded parmesan cheese, short grain rice, shredded gruyere cheese
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 3.0 zucchini, 0.5 yellow onion, 2.0 clove garlic, 3.0 tablespoon salted butter, 4.0 sprig fresh thyme, 0.3 cup all purpose flour, 1.0 cup chicken broth, 2.0 cup half and half, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper, 0.2 cup shredded gruyere cheese, 0.3 cup shredded parmesan cheese, 4.0 cup short grain rice, 1.5 cup shredded gruyere cheese
steps: preheat the oven to 375degf . spray a 9x13 inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . cut the zucchini into 3/4 inch pieces . finely chop the onion . mince the garlic . set a large pot over medium high heat and add the butter . once butter is melted, add the onions and zucchini . saute until onions are softened and zucchini is slightly tender, 5 6 minutes . add the garlic and thyme leaves and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute . sprinkle the flour over zucchini and onions and stir to coat . slowly pour the broth into the pot, stirring vigorously to dissolve flour . pour in the half and half and season with the salt and black pepper . cook the sauce, stirring constantly, until it begins to bubble and thicken, 3 4 minutes . remove pot from heat . add the shredded cheese to sauce and stir until melted . add the cooked rice and fold until thoroughly coated in sauce and the zucchini is well distributed . pour the zucchini and rice mixture into the prepared baking dish . sprinkle evenly with the shredded cheese . bake the casserole on middle rack of oven until bubbling at edges and cheese is golden brown on top, 30 35 minutes . check to see that casserole is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the casserole to rest for 10 15 minutes before serving.

name: red mexican casserole
description: love beans and rice
ner: sausage, rice mix, red peppers, grape tomatoes, red kidney beans, green chilies, sauce
ingredients: 350.0 gram sausage, 227.0 gram rice mix, 200.0 gram red peppers, 200.0 gram grape tomatoes, 540.0 gram red kidney beans, 114.0 can green chilies, 0.5 cup sauce
steps: cook sausages in a large fry pan . when cooked thru remove from pan . in same pan make rice according to instructions, but added an extra 1/2 cup water . after 10 minutes of cooking the rice, add the rest of the ingredients . cook until rice is soft, another 10 15 minutes . if you want the mixture less dry, and more water or tomato juice.

name: kinder way bowl
description: kinder way bowl with eggs, yolk, cornstarch, protifar, fat free yogurt, chocolate, artificial sweetener, skim milk powder, extract, praline, fat free petit suisse
ner: eggs, yolk, cornstarch, protifar, fat free yogurt, chocolate, artificial sweetener, skim milk powder, extract, praline, fat free petit suisse
ingredients: 3.0 eggs, 1.0 yolk, 2.0 tablespoon cornstarch, 1.0 tablespoon protifar, 1.0 fat free yogurt, 1.0 tablespoon chocolate, artificial sweetener, skim milk powder, extract, praline, fat free petit suisse
steps: mix the 3 eggs, cornstarch, protifar, yogurt, 1 tablespoon of low fat cocoa, liquid sweetener and 1 teaspoon of baking powder . pour the mixture into a relatively large container the liquid must fill 1/3 of the container . put everything in the microwave, 5 minutes, maximum power . the mixture will swell up . dissolve the leftover cocoa and the milk powder in the egg yolk . add sweetener and hazelnut flavoring to the praline . cut the cake in half . crush two petit suisse with sweetener . line the two parts of the cake and close it . cover the cake with the chocolate mixture.

name: key lime yogurt pie
description: this easy key lime yogurt pie is a cross between a key lime pie and a key lime cheesecake, made lighter the filling is sweet and tart, made with key lime juice, yogurt and cream cheese in a graham cracker crust.
ner: sheets graham crackers, cold whipped butter, sugar, gelatin, key lime juice, 1/3 less fat cream cheese, 0 fat stonyfield plain yogurt, sugar, grated lime zest, key lime slices, whipped cream
ingredients: 6 sheets graham crackers, 3 tbsp cold whipped butter, 2 tablespoons sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons gelatin, 1/2 cup key lime juice, 6 ounces 1/3 less fat cream cheese, 1 cup 0 fat stonyfield plain yogurt, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 tablespoon grated lime zest, key lime slices, whipped cream
steps: place graham crackers, butter and sugar into a food processor and pulse a few times . add 1 tbsp water and pulse a few more times until it has a texture of coarse meal . press into an 8 inch pie dish making the crust about 1/8 inch thick evenly all around and up the sides . refrigerate the crust for 30 minutes before you bake it, this will help prevent crumbling when you want to serve it . preheat oven to 375degf . bake until the edges are golden, about 8 to 10 minutes . remove from the oven and let the crust cool on a wire rack, before filling.

name: jam swirl pound cake
description: a swirl of sweet fruit jam running through each slice makes this buttery vanilla pound cake extra special.
ner: nonstick cooking spray, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, almond extract, large eggs, all purpose flour, baking powder, salt, fruit jam
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 1.0 cup unsalted butter, 1.0 cup granulated sugar, 1.5 teaspoon vanilla extract, 0.2 teaspoon almond extract, 4.0 large eggs, 1.8 cup all purpose flour, 0.5 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.3 cup fruit jam
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray a 9x5 inch loaf pan liberally with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . place the butter, sugar, vanilla extract, and almond extract into a large mixing bowl . using a hand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment or stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment, cream ingredients together on medium speed until pale and fluffy, 3 4 minutes . add the eggs one at a time, beating for 15 20 seconds between each, until mixture is smooth and combined . sift the flour, baking powder, and salt into the bowl . beat mixture on low until it becomes a smooth, thick batter . using a rubber spatula, spread 1/3 of the batter into the prepared loaf pan . drop half of the jam by teaspoonfuls over the batter . gently cut through jam with a butter knife . repeat this process with another 1/3 of cake batter and remaining jam . spoon last 1/3 of cake batter into pan . bake the cake on middle rack of oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 60 75 minutes . check to see that cake is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow cake to cool in the pan for 15 20 minutes . to release cake, run a butter knife between edge of cake and pan . turn the cake onto a large plate . allow cake to cool for 1 2 hours before slicing and serving.

name: fish tacos w/ cilantro slaw
description: i got this a long time ago and everyone loves it . really a low cal/low fat fish to serve to kids without them knowing it is healthy, lol
ner: fish fillets, flour tortillas, green cabbage, chopped fresh cilantro, green onion, jalapeno, light mayonaise, lime juice, cumin seeds, salt
ingredients: 4.0 fish fillets, 4.0 flour tortillas, 0.3 head green cabbage, 2.0 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, 1.0 green onion, 1.0 teaspoon jalapeno, 1.0 tablespoon light mayonaise, 1.0 tablespoon lime juice, 0.5 teaspoon cumin seeds, salt
steps: bake fish fillets shred or chop the cabbage . in a medium bowl, combine the cabbage with all the remaining ingredients . cut each hot fish fillet into 6 8 pieces, then pile into a hot tortilla with lots of slaw

name: quick orange beef stir fry
description: quick orange beef stir fry with asian vegetable medley, smucker's natural orange marmalade fruit spread, soy sauce, crisco pure vegetable oil, beef sirloin, minced garlic, cooked rice
ner: asian vegetable medley, smucker's natural orange marmalade fruit spread, soy sauce, crisco pure vegetable oil, beef sirloin, minced garlic, cooked rice
ingredients: 10.8 ounce asian vegetable medley, 0.3 cup smucker's natural orange marmalade fruit spread, 2.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 1.0 tablespoon crisco pure vegetable oil, 0.5 pound beef sirloin, 2.0 teaspoon minced garlic, cooked rice
steps: microwave vegetables according to package directions for only 4 minutes to partially cook . stir marmalade and soy sauce in small bowl until blended . heat oil in large skillet over high heat . add beef to hot oil stir fry 1 1/2 minutes . add garlic stir fry 15 seconds . add vegetables and marmalade mixture . bring to a boil, stirring frequently . cook 1 to 2 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly . serve over rice.

name: low fat whole wheat blueberry muffins
description: none
ner: unsweetened applesauce, 100 whole wheat pastry flour, raw sugar, baking soda, salt, blueberries, large egg, vanilla, butter
ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened applesauce, 2 cups 100 whole wheat pastry flour, 1/2 cup raw sugar, 1 tsp baking soda, 1/2 tsp salt, 1 1/2 cups blueberries, 1 large egg, 1 tsp vanilla, 2 tbsp butter
steps: preheat oven to 325deg . combine flour, sugar, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl . mix well . in a medium bowl, mix eggs, melted butter, vanilla and applesauce . add to the flour mixture and stir until just blended . gently fold in blueberries . pour batter into 12 lined muffin tins and bake at 325deg for 25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean . cool for about 10 minutes.

name: tortilla encrusted chicken tenders
description: these baked chicken tenders are coated with seasoned crushed tortilla chips, baked until golden and served with salsa . an easy, weeknight chicken dish, great for the kids, or even adults
ner: 8 boneless, skinless chicken breast tenders, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, all purpose flour, large egg, crushed tortilla chips, garlic powder, cumin, olive oil spray, lime, chopped fresh cilantro, jarred salsa
ingredients: 1 1/4 pound 8 boneless, skinless chicken breast tenders, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, 2 tablespoons all purpose flour, 1 large egg, 3 1/2 oz crushed tortilla chips, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, olive oil spray, 1/2 lime, chopped fresh cilantro, 1/2 cup jarred salsa
steps: check labels for gluten free . preheat oven to 400f . season chicken tenders with 3/4 teaspoon salt and pepper . place flour on a shallow plate and egg in a medium bowl . place tortilla chips, remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt, garlic powder, cumin, and pepper on another shallow plate . dredge each tender lightly in flour, then egg shaking off excess, then chip mixture . lightly spray sheet pan with olive oil, place tenders on pan and spray the top with olive oil . bake about 8 to 10 minutes on each side or until cooked through . to serve place 2 tenders on each plate, sprinkle with cilantro . serve with 1 lime wedge and salsa for dipping.

name: easy korean sticky chicken
description: the sweet and spicy flavors of this dish echo korean fried chicken wings, but without the hassle of deep frying . look for gochujang, a sweet and spicy korean red pepper paste, in the international aisle of many grocery stores, at an asian market, and online . the recipe is a yummly original created by julia lee https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/julia lee .
ner: green onions, boneless, skinless chicken thighs, salt, cornstarch, water, fresh ginger, garlic, gochujang, mirin, honey, toasted sesame oil, seasoned rice vinegar, vegetable oil, toasted sesame seeds
ingredients: 2.0 green onions, 1.5 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 4.0 teaspoon cornstarch, 1.0 teaspoon water, 0.5 inch fresh ginger, 2.0 clove garlic, 3.0 tablespoon gochujang, 2.0 tablespoon mirin, 1.0 tablespoon honey, 1.0 tablespoon toasted sesame oil, 1.0 tablespoon seasoned rice vinegar, 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1.0 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds
steps: thinly slice green onions and set aside . cut chicken into 1 inch pieces . combine chicken, salt, cornstarch, and water in a medium bowl then, set mixture aside . peel and finely grate ginger using a hand held rasp style grater or box grater transfer ginger to a small mixing bowl . grate or mince garlic . add it to the ginger with the gochujang, mirin, honey, sesame oil, and vinegar, and stir until well combined . set sauce aside . heat a large, heavy bottomed frying pan over medium high heat . once hot, add oil, swirling to coat bottom . add chicken and spread pieces into a single layer . cook until well browned on underside, 2 3 minutes . turn pieces over and cook until browned on second side, 2 3 minutes . transfer chicken to a bowl . reduce heat to medium low and add sauce mixture to pan . cook, stirring constantly, until hot, about 30 seconds . return chicken to pan and toss until well coated . transfer chicken to a serving plate . sprinkle with sesame seeds and reserved green onions, and serve immediately.

name: asian glazed drumsticks
description: soy sauce, vinegar and sriracha hot sauce make these asian glazed chicken drumsticks savory delicious serve over rice or vegetables for an easy meal
ner: medium chicken drumsticks, olive oil spray, water, sriracha hot sauce, balsamic vinegar, low sodium soy sauce, honey, garlic, ginger, chives or scallions, sesame seeds
ingredients: 8 medium chicken drumsticks, olive oil spray, 3/4 cup water, 1 tbsp sriracha hot sauce, 1/3 cup balsamic vinegar, 1/3 cup low sodium soy sauce, 1 tbsp honey, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tsp ginger, 2 tbsp chives or scallions, 1 tsp sesame seeds
steps: in a heavy large saucepan, brown chicken on high for 3 4 minutes with a little spray oil . add water, balsamic, soy sauce, honey, garlic, ginger, hot sauce and cook on high until liquid comes to a boil . reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for about 20 minutes . remove cover and bring heat to high, allowing sauce to reduce down, about 8 10 minutes, until it becomes thick, turning chicken occasionally . keep an eye on glaze, you don't want it to burn when it start becoming thick . transfer chicken to a platter and pour sauce on top . top with chives and sesame seeds and serve.

name: kabeljauw met olijven
description: kabeljauw met olijven with olijven, rode ui, bertolli originale extra vergine olijfolie, tijm, wijn, kabeljauwfilets, peper, zout
ner: olijven, rode ui, bertolli originale extra vergine olijfolie, tijm, wijn, kabeljauwfilets, peper, zout
ingredients: 4.0 tablespoon olijven, 1.0 rode ui, 3.0 tablespoon bertolli originale extra vergine olijfolie, 1.0 teaspoon tijm, 1.0 deciliter wijn, 4.0 kabeljauwfilets, peper, zout
steps: ontpit de olijven en hak ze in grove stukken . snipper de ui fijn . verhit de olijfolie in een anti aanbakpan en fruit hierin de ui glazig met de tijm . schenk de witte wijn erbij en kook deze een beetje in . leg de visfilets in de pan en schep de olijven er omheen . voeg zout en versgemalen peper toe . laat de vis 8 minuten stoven in de wijnsaus, keer de filets halverwege . lekker met spaghetti.

name: raw nut free cacao and raspberry spread
description: a summery spread to start your mornings with a sweet note or simply to enjoy all day, every day a guilt free indulgence with ancient superfood yacon root syrup, which sweetens the spread, aids gut health and even supports in weight management add antioxidant rich peruvian raw cacao powder and there is no way you can resist . not to mention delicious fresh raspberries....you need those for your 1 of 5 in a day
ner: avocado, raspberries, cacao powder, yacon syrup
ingredients: 1.0 avocado, 0.3 cup raspberries, 2.0 tablespoon cacao powder, 1.5 tablespoon yacon syrup
steps: simply blend until smooth and top it up with fresh raspberries if you have a sweet tooth, add extra spoon of ote yacon syrup, it has just 1/3 of calories of the cane sugar

name: dan dan mian
description: dan dan mian with peanut oil, ya cai, ground pork, hong you, soy sauce, soy sauce, chinkiang black vinegar, shaoxing wine, szechwan peppercorns, scallions, sesame paste, kosher salt, chinese wheat noodles
ner: peanut oil, ya cai, ground pork, hong you, soy sauce, soy sauce, chinkiang black vinegar, shaoxing wine, szechwan peppercorns, scallions, sesame paste, kosher salt, chinese wheat noodles
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon peanut oil, 3.0 tablespoon ya cai, 4.0 ounce ground pork, 3.0 tablespoon hong you, 2.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 1.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 2.0 teaspoon chinkiang black vinegar, 1.0 teaspoon shaoxing wine, 0.5 teaspoon szechwan peppercorns, 2.0 scallions, 2.0 tablespoon sesame paste, kosher salt, 12.0 ounce chinese wheat noodles
steps: heat peanut oil in a 14 inch wok over high heat . add preserved vegetable cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds . add pork cook, stirring and breaking up meat into small pieces, until browned, 2 to 3 minutes . remove from heat stir in chile oil, soy sauces, vinegar, rice wine, ground peppercorns, sesame paste, and scallions set sauce aside . bring a large pot of salted water to a boil cook noodles until tender, 7 9 minutes . drain noodles and divide between 4 large serving bowls divide sauce over or under noodles.

name: pistachio rose blondies with white chocolate
description: pistachio rose blondies with white chocolate and browned butter . wow your friends with this easy, exotic and irresistible dessert recipe.
ner: unsalted butter, canola or grapeseed oil, brown sugar, packed, eggs, all purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, raw pistachios, white chocolate chips, rosewater
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 1/2 cup canola or grapeseed oil, 1 1/4 cups brown sugar, packed, 2 large eggs, 1 1/4 cups all purpose flour, 3/4 tsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp baking soda, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/2 cup raw pistachios, 1/2 cup white chocolate chips, 2 tbsp rosewater
steps: preheat oven to 325 degrees f . in a small saucepan, whisk the butter over medium heat until it turns golden brown and has a nutty aroma . careful, don't let the butter burn . remove from heat as soon as it's golden and place the pan on a cool surface . once the browned butter has cooled, transfer to a mixing bowl and combine with the oil, brown sugar and eggs . whisk till well combined . in a medium mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt . combine thoroughly with a whisk . in a small bowl, toss the pistachios and white chocolate chips with some of the flour mixture . this will help prevent them from sinking to the bottom of the batter during baking . add the flour mixture to the butter mixture along with the rosewater and mix very thoroughly . fold in the floured pistachios and white chocolate chips, along with the flour they were tossed in . grease a 9x9 inch baking pan with nonstick cooking spray and pour in the batter . bake for 25 30 minutes, or until the center of the blondies has set and a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean.

name: fudge when in need of comfort or just for any reason
description: this recipe has been modified many times in different countries but now in central asia with russian chocolate and local dried fruit and liqueur it has taken on a new taste
ner: none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: in a double boiler melt the chocolate and add the can of sweetened condensed milk along with the liqueur and stir well so it is all warm and well mixed . add the cut up nuts or dried fruit and stir well . lay out on to baking paper into a shallow tin about 200 mm x 200 mm and allow to cool . store in the fridge in plastic bags and cut into small pieces to serve . when using dried apricots of cranberries i may cut into small pieces and soak in the liqueur for a week or so before hand . usually just cover dried fruit and by the time you make it all the brandy or other has been absorbed . if you do this you do not need to add liqueur to the mix.

name: vegetarian three bean chili
description: vegetarian three bean chili with diced red onion, garlic cloves, black beans, kidney beans, diced tomatoes, salsa, hot sauce, cumin, paprika, chili powder, coriander, cayenne, salt, pepper, brown lentils, vegetable broth, sour cream, salsa, jalapeno, chopped cilantro, sliced green onions, corn tortilla chips, shredded cheese, hot sauce
ner: diced red onion, garlic cloves, black beans, kidney beans, diced tomatoes, salsa, hot sauce, cumin, paprika, chili powder, coriander, cayenne, salt, pepper, brown lentils, vegetable broth, sour cream, salsa, jalapeno, chopped cilantro, sliced green onions, corn tortilla chips, shredded cheese, hot sauce
