description: warm and savory, this butternut squash and tomato soup makes a great wintertime lunch or dinner entree, especially when served with hot and melty grilled cheese sandwiches . roasted before being blended, the butternut squash, tomato, and garlic have a rich savory flavor . blended until smooth and creamy, the vegetable soup is flavored with ras el hanout seasoning to taste and heated until ready to serve . low in calories, this butternut squash and tomato soup is also vegetarian, gluten free, and vegan.
ner: butternut squash, tomatoes, garlic cloves, olive oil, onion, water, spice, salt
ingredients: 1.0 butternut squash, 5.0 tomatoes, 5.0 garlic cloves, olive oil, 1.0 onion, 8.0 ounce water, 0.5 tablespoon spice, salt
steps: preheat the oven to 180 degrees celsius . place the butternut squash, tomatoes, and garlic cloves on a baking tray lined with aluminum foil . drizzle olive oil over them . wrap the whole onion in aluminum foil . add everything to the oven to bake for 30 minutes . check the garlic cloves after about 10 minutes and remove them first . once the vegetables are roasted, peel the garlic and the squash . add all the vegetables plus the juice in the pan into a blender along with the water and blend until fine . pour the blended mixture into a pot . stir in the ras al hanout and salt to taste . heat for about 5 to 6 minutes until hot and serve.

name: asian quesadilla
description: asian quesadilla with red bell pepper, zucchini, boneless, skinless chicken breasts, hoisin sauce, black pepper, chinese 5 spice powder, kosher salt, wheat tortillas, mozzarella cheese
ner: red bell pepper, zucchini, boneless, skinless chicken breasts, hoisin sauce, black pepper, chinese 5 spice powder, kosher salt, wheat tortillas, mozzarella cheese
ingredients: 0.5 red bell pepper, 1.0 zucchini, 2.0 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 8.0 teaspoon hoisin sauce, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper, 0.8 teaspoon chinese 5 spice powder, 0.5 teaspoon kosher salt, 4.0 whole wheat tortillas, 0.2 tablespoon mozzarella cheese
steps: in a medium bowl, toss chicken strips with 5 spice powder, salt and pepper . heat a large nonstick skillet over medium high heat . coat with cooking spray . add chicken and cook, stirring occasionally, until chicken is cooked through . remove chicken from pan and set aside . wipe the pan clean, coat with cooking spray and place over medium heat . add zucchini and red bell pepper, and cook until just tender . spread 2 teaspoons of hoisin sauce on each tortilla . heat a medium sized skillet over medium heat . lay one tortilla with hoisin sauce in the skillet, and cover half of the tortilla with a quarter of the chicken, zucchini, bell peppers and 1 tablespoon of mozzarella . fold the tortilla over the filling and cook until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes per side . remove from pan and cut into 3 pieces . repeat with remaining tortillas and fillings . serve.

name: lebanese fruit cocktail
description: lebanese fruit cocktail is a thick smoothie packed with a medley of fresh assorted fruits including bananas, cherries, avocados, mangoes, kiwis, etc topped with areesha, curdled cream pine nuts, and slivered almonds and sweetened with a drizzle of honey, traditionally served in a tall glass accompanied by a spoon a classic that is found almost in every street corner cafe in beirut and a summer refreshing treat for both kids and adults this is just what the hot summer weather calls for

name: herb crusted roasted pork roast
description: herb crusted roasted pork roast with boneless pork loin roast, fresh parsley, fresh tarragon, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, fresh oregano, salt, pepper, green beans, shallots, butter, pork stock, salt, pepper, bibb lettuce, fresh parsley, fresh tarragon, fresh dill, buttermilk, honey, apple cider vinegar, shallot, grapeseed oil, salt, pepper
ner: boneless pork loin roast, fresh parsley, fresh tarragon, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, fresh oregano, salt, pepper, green beans, shallots, butter, pork stock, salt, pepper, bibb lettuce, fresh parsley, fresh tarragon, fresh dill, buttermilk, honey, apple cider vinegar, shallot, grapeseed oil, salt, pepper
ingredients: 3.0 pound boneless pork loin roast, 1.5 tablespoon fresh parsley, 1.5 tablespoon fresh tarragon, 0.2 cup fresh rosemary, 0.2 cup fresh thyme, 0.2 cup fresh oregano, salt, pepper, 1.0 pound green beans, 0.5 cup shallots, 2.0 tablespoon butter, 1.0 cup pork stock, salt, pepper, 2.0 head bibb lettuce, 0.5 cup fresh parsley, 0.2 cup fresh tarragon, 0.2 cup fresh dill, 0.7 cup buttermilk, 1.0 tablespoon honey, 0.3 cup apple cider vinegar, 0.2 cup shallot, 0.5 cup grapeseed oil, salt, pepper
steps: preheat your oven to 400 degrees . mix the chopped herbs together and divide in half . cover half the herbs and refrigerate until later . season the pork roast with salt and pepper . rub the other half of chopped herbs all over the pork, including both ends . place the pork roast on a roasting rack into preheated oven . cook roast 50 60 minutes or until you reach an internal temperature between 145 degrees f . medium rare to 160 degrees f . medium . remove roast from the oven carefully remove the rack from the pan . pour out juice into a bowl with the reserved chopped herbs . baste the top of the roast with herb mixture . tent lightly with foil and let rest 20 minutes before slicing . meanwhile, make the green beans bring a pot of salted water to a boil, add green beans and blanch until tender, about 2 to 4 minutes . then place them in ice water to shock them and stop the cooking process . to make the salad in a bowl, pull cleaned lettuce leafs apart and tear into bite sized pieces . to make the dressing place the herbs, buttermilk, honey, and apple cider vinegar into a blender carafe . begin blending and slowly add the grapeseed oil in a steady stream until the dressing emulsifies . season with salt and pepper . when ready to serve place a large saute pan over medium low heat . sweat the shallots in butter add the beans and pork stock . raise the heat to medium high and reduce the liquid until the beans are nicely glazed . season with salt and pepper to taste.

name: rode vruchten yoghurtijs met romige aardbeiensaus
description: rode vruchten yoghurtijs met romige aardbeiensaus with aardbeien, sinaasappellikeur, poedersuiker, slagroom, hertog zuivelzacht rood boomgaard, lange vingers
ner: aardbeien, sinaasappellikeur, poedersuiker, slagroom, hertog zuivelzacht rood boomgaard, lange vingers
ingredients: 750.0 gram aardbeien, sinaasappellikeur, 3.0 tablespoon poedersuiker, 2.5 deciliter slagroom, 1.0 container hertog zuivelzacht rood boomgaard, 8.0 lange vingers
steps: was de aardbeien en verwijder de kroontjes . pureer de helft in de keukenmachine en voeg de sinaasappellikeur, suiker en de room toe . mix het tot een gladde saus . snijd de rest in stukjes en doe ze in een coupe . schep hierop 1 flinke lepel zuivelzacht . bedek het met de aardbeiensaus . garneer de coupe met lange vingers.

name: all american salad
description: all american salad with uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, boston lettuce, romaine lettuce, watercress, chopped celery, onion, pitted ripe olives, wish bone italian dressing, whole peeled tomatoes, undrained and chopped, orange peel
ner: uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, boston lettuce, romaine lettuce, watercress, chopped celery, onion, pitted ripe olives, wish bone italian dressing, whole peeled tomatoes, undrained and chopped, orange peel
ingredients: 1.0 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, 1.0 head boston lettuce, 1.0 head romaine lettuce, 1.0 cup watercress, 1.0 cup chopped celery, 1.0 onion, 15.0 pitted ripe olives, 0.5 cup wish bone italian dressing, 10.0 whole peeled tomatoes, undrained and chopped, 2.0 orange peel
steps: combine shrimp, lettuces, watercress, celery, onion, olives and wish bone italian dressing in large salad bowl toss well . add tomatoes and oranges toss gently.

name: orecchiette pasta with chicken sausage and broccoli
description: orecchiette pasta with chicken sausage and broccoli is one of my favorite weeknight pasta dishes, my family loves it
ner: package italian chicken sausage, uncooked orecchiette pasta, fresh broccoli florets, garlic, grated pecorino romano or parmesan cheese, olive oil, kosher salt and fresh cracked pepper
ingredients: 14 oz package italian chicken sausage, 12 oz uncooked orecchiette pasta, 6 1/2 cups fresh broccoli florets, 5 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup grated pecorino romano or parmesan cheese, 2 tbsp olive oil, kosher salt and fresh cracked pepper
steps: bring a large pot of salted water to a boil . meanwhile heat a large nonstick skillet and brown the sausage over medium high, breaking it up as it cooks with a wooden spoon until browned, 5 to 7 minutes remove from heat . when the water boils, add the pasta and bring back to a boil, when the water is boiling, add broccoli and cook according to pasta instructions for al dente . when pasta is almost done cooking, reserve about 1 cup of the pasta water and set aside . drain pasta and broccoli . return the pot to the stove and set heat to high add 1 tbsp olive oil, when hot, add garlic . cook until golden, about 1 minute, reduce flame to low and add pasta back to the pot with the sausage . mix well, add remaining olive oil, grated cheese, salt and pepper to taste mixing well and smashing any large pieces of broccoli to break up . add 1/2 cup of reserved pasta water and mix well adding more if needed . serve in pasta bowls with additional grated cheese on the side, if desired.

name: instant pot steel cut oats
description: a warm and heart healthy breakfast, making steel cut oats in the instant pot is so much faster than making them on the stove
ner: steel cut oats, water, cinnamon sticks, medium ripe bananas, fresh or frozen blueberries, milk of your choice, pure maple syrup or honey, ground cinnamon
ingredients: 2 cups steel cut oats, 6 cups water, 2 cinnamon sticks, 4 medium ripe bananas, 2 cups fresh or frozen blueberries, 1 cup milk of your choice, 8 teaspoons pure maple syrup or honey, ground cinnamon
steps: combine the steel cut oats and water in the bowl of your pressure cooker and stir . add the cinnamon sticks, cover and cook 6 minutes on high pressure . allow the pressure to naturally release . remove the cinnamon sticks and discard and stir in blueberries . to serve, pour 1 cup of oats in each bowl, and top each with 2 tablespoons milk, 1/2 sliced banana, drizzle with 1 teaspoon honey or maple syrup and finish with a pinch of cinnamon . leftovers can be refrigerated in glass or plastic containers . to reheat, microwave for 2 to 3 minutes, until warm then add toppings.

name: spicy thai shrimp salad
description: this refreshing thai style salad with greens, herbs, veggies and shrimp, all tossed in a delicious cashew dressing, is the perfect one dish summer dinner.
ner: olive oil, lime juice, whole roasted, red pepper flakes, honey, 2 inch piece fresh ginger, roughly chopped, unseasoned rice vinegar, cilantro, garlic, roughly chopped white onion, garlic powder, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, large peeled, garlic powder, ground ginger, kosher salt, turmeric, chili powder, freshly ground black pepper, toasted sesame oil, shredded purple cabbage, packed baby arugula, packed chopped romaine lettuce, small corn cob, medium cucumber, shredded carrots, chopped basil, chopped cilantro, lime wedges
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 3 tablespoons lime juice, 1/4 cup whole roasted, 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 2 teaspoons honey, 1 2 inch piece fresh ginger, roughly chopped, 1 tablespoon unseasoned rice vinegar, 1/4 cup cilantro, 1 clove garlic, 1/4 cup roughly chopped white onion, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, 1/2 pound large peeled, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/8 teaspoon turmeric, 1/8 teaspoon chili powder, freshly ground black pepper, 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil, 1 cup shredded purple cabbage, 1 1/2 cups packed baby arugula, 1 1/2 cups packed chopped romaine lettuce, 1 small corn cob, 1/2 medium cucumber, 1/2 cup shredded carrots, 2 tablespoons chopped basil, 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, lime wedges
steps: in a small blender or food processor, combine dressing ingredients . refrigerate and set aside until ready to use.

name: ham and peas parmesan
description: ham and peas parmesan with water, milk, knorr pasta sides parmesan, cooked ham, green peas, white mushrooms
ner: water, milk, knorr pasta sides parmesan, cooked ham, green peas, white mushrooms
ingredients: 1.5 cup water, 0.5 cup milk, 1.0 package knorr pasta sides parmesan, 3.0 cup cooked ham, 1.0 cup green peas, 0.5 cup white mushrooms
steps: bring water and milk to a boil in 2 quart saucepan over high heat . stir in knorr pasta sides parmesan and return to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to medium and cook covered, stirring occasionally, 6 minutes . stir in ham, peas and mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, 2 minutes or until pasta is tender.

name: asian salad dressing
description: by shelby bassett

ingredients: equal, 1.0 sriracha chili sauce, 3.0 sesame oil
steps: mix together and add to salad.

name: 5 ingredient honey mustard chicken breasts
description: this easy crowd pleaser is made with just a few simple seasonings that you may already have on hand . the recipe is a yummly original created by edwina clark https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/edwina clark .
ner: whole grain mustard, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic powder, honey, olive oil
ingredients: 0.2 cup whole grain mustard, 4.0 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 0.5 teaspoon garlic powder, 0.2 cup honey, 2.0 teaspoon olive oil
steps: preheat the oven to 425degf . line a large sheet pan with parchment paper . combine the mustard, honey, garlic powder, and olive oil in a medium mixing bowl or shallow baking dish . stir until uniformly mixed . place the chicken breasts one at a time in the honey mustard mixture, turning to coat . arrange the chicken breasts on the prepared sheet pan . bake on middle rack of oven until the thickest part of the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165degf, about 15 minutes . check to see that chicken is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the chicken to rest for 5 minutes before serving.

name: sausage and peppers with cheesy macaroni
description: sausage and peppers with cheesy macaroni with sweet italian sausage links, cut into, red bell pepper, sliced, onion, water, 2 milk, knorr pasta sides cheesy bacon macaroni
ner: sweet italian sausage links, cut into, red bell pepper, sliced, onion, water, 2 milk, knorr pasta sides cheesy bacon macaroni
ingredients: 1.0 pound sweet italian sausage links, cut into, 2.0 red bell pepper, sliced, 1.0 onion, 1.8 cup water, 0.5 cup 2 milk, 1.0 package knorr pasta sides cheesy bacon macaroni
steps: cook sausage in 12 inch nonstick skillet over medium high heat, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes or until cooked . remove sausage and set aside . reserve 1 tablespoon drippings . add red peppers and onions to drippings and cook over medium high heat, stirring frequently, 5 minutes or until tender . remove vegetables and set aside . bring water and milk to a boil in same skillet . add knorr pasta sides cheesy bacon macaroni and return to a boil . reduce heat to medium and cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, 10 minutes or until pasta is tender . stir in sausage and vegetables.

name: parmesan baked zucchini
description: this easy savory baked zucchini is the best way to enjoy summer's harvest the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: zucchini, extra virgin olive oil, salt, black pepper, grated parmesan cheese
ingredients: 1.0 pound zucchini, 1.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper, 3.0 tablespoon grated parmesan cheese
steps: preheat oven to 400degf . line a large baking sheet with parchment paper . cut zucchini into 1/4 inch thick slices and arrange on prepared baking sheet . drizzle zucchini with olive oil . sprinkle with salt and black pepper . use a rubber spatula to toss zucchini until evenly coated in oil . sprinkle grated parmesan evenly over the zucchini . roast zucchini for 18 22 minutes on the middle rack of oven, flipping slices halfway through cooking time, until they are fork tender and golden brown . check to see that zucchini is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . serve immediately.

name: slow cooked black eyed peas with ham
description: none
ner: smoked lean ham steak, dried black eyed peas, bay leaves, olive oil, medium onion, garlic, red bell pepper, jalapeno chile, mato, chili powder, cumin, salt to taste, ground black pepper
ingredients: 8 oz smoked lean ham steak, 1 pound dried black eyed peas, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp olive oil, 1 medium onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 red bell pepper, 1 jalapeno chile, 1 to mato, 1/2 tsp chili powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons cumin, salt to taste, 1 tsp ground black pepper
steps: soak peas overnight in 6 cups of water . the next morning, drain peas and add to slow cooker . add 4 cups of water, bay leaves and ham . cover and cook on high 6 hours or until the beans are tender . after 6 hours, in a large frying pan, add oil and saute onion, garlic, bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, and tomato until soft, about 6 minutes . add to the slow cooker and season black eyed peas generously with salt, cumin, chili powder and black pepper . cover and cook on high 1 to 1 1/2 more hours . discard bay leaves and serve.

name: mango tea frost

ingredients: 0.2 cup lipton green tea with honei and lemon sweeten iced tea mix, 12.0 ounce mango nectar, 0.2 cup half and half, 3.0 cup ice cubes
steps: in blender, add all ingredients process until smooth . serve immediately.

name: 82 queen's she crab soup
description: 82 queen's award winning she crab soupmakes 12 servings
