steps: in a saucepan, melt butter over low hea add flour and whisk until it makes a pasty roux add milk and cream, bringing to a boil add lightly sauteed carrots, celery, and onions, and remaining ingredients simmer for 20 minutes.

name: easy yet elegant balsamic lamb chops
description: this recipe is easy and fancy enough to be the perfect dinner party option, or is great for home if like nice food, sever with an herb salad, and white bean puree and it's fit for a five star restaurant.
ner: lamb chops, garlic, brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt, butter
ingredients: 3.0 lamb chops, 0.5 tablespoon garlic, 1.5 tablespoon brown sugar, 0.2 cup balsamic vinegar, salt, 2.0 tablespoon butter
steps: grease a baking tray, place the lamb chops on the tray . salt and pepper them also put your garlic over them . place them in your oven on broil for 5 minutes flip them and broil for a another 3 to 5 minutes . when there done take them out to cool a little . to make the glaze bring butter, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt and pepper to a boil, in a medium sized saucepan . to finish spoon balsamic glaze over them let it sit for about 2 minutes and service all done, tell us how it came out.

name: chunky chocolate chip cookie sundaes
description: chunky chocolate chip cookie sundaes with breyers blasts snickers caramel swirl chunk ice cream, chocolate chip cooki, strawberries
ner: breyers blasts snickers caramel swirl chunk ice cream, chocolate chip cooki, strawberries
ingredients: 2.0 cup breyers blasts snickers caramel swirl chunk ice cream, 4.0 chocolate chip cooki, none strawberries
steps: scoop breyers blasts snickers caramel swirl chunk ice cream onto warm cookies . garnish with bananas.

name: skillet chocolate chip cookie sundae
description: skillet chocolate chip cookie sundae with vanilla ice cream, sugar in the raw, butter, molasses, egg, all purpose flour, baking soda, salt, semisweet chocolate chips, whipping cream, hot fudge sauce, chopped pecans, maraschino cherries
ner: vanilla ice cream, sugar in the raw, butter, molasses, egg, all purpose flour, baking soda, salt, semisweet chocolate chips, whipping cream, hot fudge sauce, chopped pecans, maraschino cherries
ingredients: 1.0 vanilla ice cream, 0.7 cup sugar in the raw, 0.5 cup butter, 1.0 tablespoon molasses, 1.0 egg, 1.2 cup all purpose flour, 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.8 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 0.5 cup whipping cream, 1.2 cup hot fudge sauce, 0.5 cup chopped pecans, 12.0 maraschino cherries
steps: heat oven to 350degf . lightly grease 10 inch cast iron skillet with shortening . scoop ice cream into balls and place on cookie sheet with sides . freeze until serving time . in large bowl, combine 2/3 cup of the sugar in the raw, butter, molasses and egg . beat with electric mixer on medium speed 5 minutes or until very light and creamy . add flour, baking soda and salt . beat on low speed until well mixed . by hand, stir in chocolate chips . spread dough in skillet . bake 18 to 20 minutes or until deep golden brown . remove from oven set skillet on cooling rack . cool 15 minutes . in small bowl, beat whipping cream with remaining 1 tablespoon sugar in the raw until stiff peaks form . to serve, pile ice cream balls on warm cookie in skillet . drizzle with some of the hot fudge sauce and sprinkle with nuts . top with whipped cream and some of the cherries . scoop cookie, ice cream and toppings into individual dessert bowls . top with remaining hot fudge sauce and cherries.

name: asparagus and swiss cheese frittata
description: spring asparagus, shallots and swiss cheese is a delicious combination with eggs in this slimmed down frittata which is perfect for breakfast, lunch or dinner
ner: asparagus, shallots, butter, large eggs, large egg whites, 1 milk, fresh grated pecorino romano, reduced fat swiss cheese, salt and fresh pepper to taste
ingredients: 1/2 lb asparagus, 1/2 cup shallots, 2 tsp butter, 3 large eggs, 5 large egg whites, 1 tbsp 1 milk, 2 tbsp fresh grated pecorino romano, 3 oz reduced fat swiss cheese, salt and fresh pepper to taste
steps: steam asparagus crisp and tender, about 3 to 4 minutes . thinly slice on the diagonal into 1/2 inch pieces . preheat oven to 350degf . heat butter in a 10 inch oven safe skillet over medium heat . stir in shallots and saute until golden, about 4 5 minutes . add steamed asparagus, salt and pepper . in a medium bowl whisk eggs, egg whites, grated cheese, milk, salt, and pepper . add the swiss cheese and mix well . add eggs to the skillet making sure eggs cover the asparagus . cook on medium for about 4 minutes, until the edges begin to set . move the skillet to oven . cook about 16 to 18 minutes, or until frittata is completely cooked . serve hot, cut into 4 to 6 equal wedges.

name: mashed potatoes with carrots and onions
description: mashed potatoes with carrots and onions with all potato purpos, carrots, onion, salt, i can't believe it's not butter spread, ground black pepper, milk
ner: all potato purpos, carrots, onion, salt, i can't believe it's not butter spread, ground black pepper, milk
ingredients: 4.0 all potato purpos, 4.0 carrots, 1.0 onion, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.2 cup i can't believe it's not butter spread, 0.2 teaspoon ground black pepper, 0.5 cup milk
steps: cover potatoes, carrots and onion with water in 3 quart saucepan . add 1/2 teaspoon salt . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer 40 minutes or until vegetables are very tender drain . return vegetables to saucepan . mash vegetables . stir in i can't believe it's not butter spread, remaining 1/2 teaspoon salt and pepper . stir in milk . garnish, if desired, with finely chopped parsley.

name: pressure cooker egg pudding
description: both chefs and pastry chefs alike proudly proclaim their love for pressure cookers, and you will too once you discover how many ways you can use a pressure cooker as a time saving kitchen tool . take this pudding, for example, which calls for exactly four ingredients, and that's it . the pudding is mixed together, poured into the lined mold, and then steamed in the cooker in just ten minutes . let cool, umold, chill, and serve.
ner: liquid caramel, eggs, sugar, milk
ingredients: liquid caramel, 6.0 eggs, 6.0 tablespoon sugar, 500.0 milliliter milk
steps: spread liquid caramel in a pudding mold with a cover . place eggs, sugar and milk in a bowl and mix well with an electric mixer . pour mix into mold and seal . place pudding mold in pressure cooker and add water until container is half submerged . close pressure cooker well . cook over high heat and bring to a boil . reduce heat . cook for 10 minutes and remove from heat . let pressure cooker cool completely before opening . let cool and remove pudding from pan . refrigerate and serve cold.

name: spaghetti and meatball sundaes
description: spaghetti and meatball sundaes with breyers rocky road ice cream, chocolate wafer cookies, crumbled, strawberries, sugar, breyers natural vanilla ice cream, vanilla wafer cookies, crushed
ner: breyers rocky road ice cream, chocolate wafer cookies, crumbled, strawberries, sugar, breyers natural vanilla ice cream, vanilla wafer cookies, crushed
ingredients: 12.0 scoop breyers rocky road ice cream, 1.0 cup chocolate wafer cookies, crumbled, 2.0 cup strawberries, 2.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 cup breyers natural vanilla ice cream, 2.0 vanilla wafer cookies, crushed
steps: freeze plate 30 minutes . for 'meatballs', arrange breyers rocky road ice cream scoops on chilled plate . arrange chocolate cookie crumbs on another plate . roll scoops, one at at time, in cookie crumbs, then return to chilled plate until ready to serve . for ''tomato'' sauce, mash strawberries with sugar in medium bowl with potato masher or fork to make chunky sauce . stir in additional sugar if desired . to build sundaes, evenly press breyers natural vanilla ice cream through potato ricer into 4 dessert bowls for 'spaghetti'. top each with 3 'meatballs', then 'tomato' sauce . top with crushed shortbread cookie 'cheese'. serve with a fork

name: beef stroganoff casserole
description: this classic dish of beef and noodles in a creamy sauce comes together easily for a comforting meal . the recipe is a yummly original created by danielle moore https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/danielle moore .
ner: nonstick cooking spray, olive oil, onion, garlic, ground beef, salt, pepper, tomato sauce, cottage cheese, cream cheese, salt, black pepper, egg noodles, cheddar cheese, parsley
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 cup onion, 2.0 clove garlic, 1.5 pound ground beef, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon pepper, 1.0 cup tomato sauce, 1.0 cup cottage cheese, 4.0 ounce cream cheese, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon black pepper, 3.5 cup egg noodles, 1.0 cup cheddar cheese, 1.0 tablespoon parsley
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray 9x13 inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray and set aside . heat the olive oil in a large saute pan over medium high heat . once oil is hot, add the onion and cook until translucent, 2 3 minutes . add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds . add the ground beef and cook, stirring and breaking meat up with a wooden spoon, until cooked through, 5 6 minutes . once cooked, carefully drain any excess fat from pan . season with the salt and pepper . add the tomato sauce, cottage cheese, cream cheese, salt, and pepper . cook, stirring occasionally, until cream cheese is melted, 2 3 minutes . add the cooked noodles and toss to coat . transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish and spread into an even layer . top evenly with the cheese . bake the casserole on middle rack of oven until bubbling, 20 25 minutes . check to see that casserole is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the casserole to cool for 10 minutes . serve garnished with parsley.

name: quinoa and spinach patties
description: these quinoa patties are delicious, vegetarian and packed with protein and nutrients
ner: uncooked quinoa, water, eggs, parmesan cheese, large scallions, garlic, kosher salt, steamed spinach, plain breadcrumbs, olive oil
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked quinoa, 2 cups water, 4 eggs, 1/3 cup parmesan cheese, 3 large scallions, 3 cloves garlic, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 cup steamed spinach, 1 cup plain breadcrumbs, 1 teaspoon olive oil
steps: rinse the quinoa thoroughly and place the grains in a medium sauce pan with 2 cups of water . bring the water to a boil and reduce to a simmer . cook until quinoa is tender and has absorbed the liquid, about 20 minutes . let it cool . in a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, eggs, parmesan, scallions, garlic, salt, steamed spinach, and breadcrumbs . let everything sit for a few minutes to absorb the liquid . the batter should be moist, but not runny . form patties 1/4 cup each . heat the oil in a large non stick skillet over medium low heat . in 2 or 3 batches, cook the patties covered for 8 10 minutes on each side, or until browned and golden.

name: seared tuna salad with wasabi butter sauce
description: this panko and sesame crusted seared tuna on a bed of arugula and spinach salad, all topped with a wasabi butter sauce, takes japanese food to whole new level
ner: panko bread crumbs, black and white sesame seeds, 5 ounce raw ahi or yellowfin tuna steaks i used trader joes frozen ahi tuna steaks, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, canola oil or cooking spray, reduced sodium or gluten free soy sauce, prepared wasabi paste, minced shallots, white wine, whole milk, unsalted butter, fresh baby arugula, fresh baby spinach, sliced radish, sliced cucumber
ingredients: 1/2 cup panko bread crumbs, 3 tablespoons black and white sesame seeds, 4 5 ounce raw ahi or yellowfin tuna steaks i used trader joes frozen ahi tuna steaks, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, canola oil or cooking spray, 2 tablespoons reduced sodium or gluten free soy sauce, 1 teaspoon prepared wasabi paste, 2 teaspoons minced shallots, 1/4 cup white wine, 2 tablespoons whole milk, 2 tablespoon unsalted butter, 4 cups fresh baby arugula, 4 cups fresh baby spinach, sliced radish, sliced cucumber
steps: mix panko and sesame seeds on a large plate or shallow bowl . season tuna with salt and pepper, to taste . gently press both sides of each tuna steak into the crumb mixture . heat a large skillet over medium high heat and spray with oil . add 2 steaks, spray each with oil and allow them to cook 2 3 minutes, or until the outer edge becomes opaque . flip each steak, spray second side with oil and cook an additional 2 minutes, or until the outer edge is opaque . repeat with remaining 2 steaks . set all 4 steaks on a cutting board and allow them to rest and cool . meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine soy sauce and wasabi paste . set aside . in a small skillet over medium low heat, add shallots and wine . simmer until reduced by half, 2 3 minutes . add the milk and whisk constantly until the sauce no longer looks separated and has slightly thickened about 1 minute . remove from heat and whisk in soy and wasabi paste mixture . add butter and whisk to combine . to serve distribute arugula and spinach evenly among 4 shallow bowls . thinly slice the tuna and top each bed of lettuce with 1 tuna steak . drizzle each with about 1 1/2 tablespoons of sauce . serve immediately.

name: herb roasted pork shoulder
description: real simple
ner: pork shoulder, garlic, fresh rosemary, chopped fresh sage, black pepper
ingredients: 6.0 pound pork shoulder, 3.0 clove garlic, 1.0 tablespoon fresh rosemary, 1.0 tablespoon chopped fresh sage, black pepper
steps: heat oven to 400deg f with a rack in the middle position . score the skin of the pork in a criss cross diamond pattern every 1 1/2 inches . turn the pork skin side down and rub with the garlic, rosemary, sage, 2 teaspoons salt, and 3/4 teaspoon pepper . roll up the pork with the skin on the outside and tie every 2 inches with kitchen twine . place on a rimmed baking sheet . roast the pork for 1 hour . reduce heat to 350deg f and continue to roast until the skin is very crispy and pulls away from the meat easily, 2 to 2 1/2 hours more . transfer to a cutting board, tent loosely with foil, and let rest for 15 minutes before slicing.

name: pineapple raisin noodle kugel
description: a delicious and adaptable sweet noodle kugel recipe with pineapple and raisins . make as written, or substitute your favorite kugel ingredients . the only limit is your imagination
ner: wide egg noodles, unsalted butter, eggs, vanilla, cinnamon, sugar, lowfat cream cheese, lowfat cottage cheese, lowfat sour cream, pineapple chunks in juice, raisins, graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, sugar, cinnamon
ingredients: 16 oz wide egg noodles, 2 tbsp unsalted butter, 6 large eggs, 1 tsp vanilla, 1 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1 cup sugar, 1 lb lowfat cream cheese, 1/2 cup lowfat cottage cheese, 1/2 cup lowfat sour cream, 16 oz pineapple chunks in juice, 1/2 cup raisins, 3/4 cup graham cracker crumbs, 2 tbsp melted butter, 2 tbsp sugar, 3/4 tsp cinnamon
steps: preheat oven to 350 degrees f . bring a large pot of water to a boil . add egg noodles, stir, and boil until tender . drain . melt 2 tbsp of butter in the hot noodles and stir to coat . in a food processor or blender, combine eggs, vanilla, cinnamon, sugar, cream cheese, cottage cheese and sour cream . blend the ingredients until creamy . add creamy mixture to the noodles in the pot along with the raisins . drain the pineapple chunks and dice them into small pieces, then add them to the pot . stir all ingredients until thoroughly mixed . pour the noodles into a greased 9x13 baking dish . combine graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, sugar and cinnamon in a small mixing bowl to form a crumbly topping.sprinkle the topping evenly over the top of the kugel . cover dish with foil and place in the oven . bake the kugel for 40 minutes . remove the foil and bake for 20 minutes more until the top is golden brown.may be served warm or cold . refrigerate if you don't plan on serving it the same day you make it . if you want to reheat your kugel, place it in a 350 degree oven for 15 20 minutes, or until heated through.

name: creamy broccoli salad
description: creamy broccoli salad with mayonnaise, sugar, red wine vinegar, broccoli florets, raisins, diced red onion, topping mix
ner: mayonnaise, sugar, red wine vinegar, broccoli florets, raisins, diced red onion, topping mix
ingredients: 0.5 cup mayonnaise, 1.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 tablespoon red wine vinegar, 4.0 cup broccoli florets, 0.2 cup raisins, 0.2 cup diced red onion, 0.2 cup topping mix
steps: mix mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar in large bowl until well blended . add broccoli, raisins, red onion and 2 tablespoons of the salad toppins toss to coat well . cover . refrigerate at least 2 hours or until ready to serve . sprinkle with remaining 2 tablespoons salad toppins.

name: simple vietnamese pork noodle bowl
description: simple vietnamese pork noodle bowl with pork tenderloin, rice noodles, coleslaw mix, red onion, chicken broth, fish sauce, soy sauce, canola oil, basil leaves, lime
ner: pork tenderloin, rice noodles, coleslaw mix, red onion, chicken broth, fish sauce, soy sauce, canola oil, basil leaves, lime
ingredients: 1.2 pound pork tenderloin, 12.0 ounce rice noodles, 4.0 cup coleslaw mix, 0.2 red onion, 4.5 cup chicken broth, 4.5 teaspoon fish sauce, 1.0 teaspoon soy sauce, 2.0 tablespoon canola oil, 0.2 cup basil leaves, 1.0 lime
steps: prepare the noodles according to package directions . arrange the noodles in 6 serving bowls . top with the slaw mix and onion and set aside . while the noodles are cooking, in a medium saucepan, combine the chicken broth, fish sauce, and soy sauce and bring to a boil over medium high heat . reduce the heat to very low, to keep the broth just below a simmer . in a very large skillet over medium high heat, warm the oil . add the pork and cook until browned and pork reaches an internal temperature of 145 degrees f., 1 to 2 minutes per side you may have to do this in batches . let stand at room temperature for three minutes . arrange the pork on top of the noodle bowls . ladle in the piping hot broth, garnish with the basil and lime wedges, and serve.

name: red velvet poke cake
description: a super moist, easy to make red velvet cake soaked with sweetened condensed milk and topped with to die for whipped cream cheese frosting.
ner: nonstick cooking spray, unsalted butter, canola oil, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, vanilla extract, large eggs, all purpose flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, red food coloring, cream cheese, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, heavy whipping cream, salt, sweetened condensed milk
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 0.5 cup unsalted butter, 2.0 tablespoon canola oil, 1.0 cup granulated sugar, 0.3 cup light brown sugar, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.0 large eggs, 2.0 cup all purpose flour, 0.2 cup cocoa powder, 1.0 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 1.0 cup buttermilk, 2.0 tablespoon red food coloring, 1.0 block cream cheese, 0.5 cup granulated sugar, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.0 cup heavy whipping cream, 0.1 teaspoon salt, 1.0 can sweetened condensed milk
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray a 9x13 inch baking dish liberally with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . place the butter, canola oil, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla in a large mixing bowl . using a hand mixer or stand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment, cream the ingredients together on medium speed until smooth, scraping sides of bowl with rubber spatula as necessary, about 1 minute . add the eggs, and continue to beat until the mixture is light and fluffy, about 1 minute . sift the flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt into the bowl . beat the mixture on low until the ingredients begin to come together . slowly stream in the buttermilk and food coloring and continue mixing, scraping the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula as needed, until a smooth, vibrant batter forms . pour the batter into the prepared baking dish . bake the cake on middle rack of oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 37 40 minutes . check to see that cake is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the cake to cool on cooling rack for 10 minutes . while the cake cools, make the whipped cream cheese frosting . place the cream cheese, granulated sugar, and vanilla extract in a medium mixing bowl . use a mixer to beat on medium high speed until completely smooth, 2 3 minutes . add half of the heavy cream to the bowl . beat on low speed to incorporate, then stream in the remaining cream . beat on medium high speed just until the frosting holds stiff peaks, 2 3 minutes . do not overbeat . cover the bowl of whipped cream cheese frosting with plastic wrap and transfer to the refrigerator . use the handle of a wooden spoon to poke 32 evenly spaced holes into the cake, stopping 1/2 inch from the bottom . pour the sweetened condensed milk evenly over the cake, allowing it to seep down into the holes . cover the cake loosely with plastic wrap and transfer to the refrigerator to cool for at least 1 one hour . when the cake is completely cool, remove from the refrigerator . spread the whipped cream cheese frosting evenly onto the cake . return to the refrigerator until ready to serve.

name: vegetable bow tie pasta
description: vegetable bow tie pasta with country crock spread, broccoli, carrots, red bell pepper, zucchini, garlic, ragu pasta sauce, bow tie pasta
ner: country crock spread, broccoli, carrots, red bell pepper, zucchini, garlic, ragu pasta sauce, bow tie pasta
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon country crock spread, 1.0 cup broccoli, 1.0 cup carrots, 1.0 red bell pepper, 1.0 zucchini, 1.0 clove garlic, 1.0 jar ragu pasta sauce, 16.0 box bow tie pasta
steps: melt spread in 12 inch skillet over medium heat and cook vegetables and garlic, stirring frequently, 8 minutes or until vegetables are crisp tender . heat pasta sauce in 2 quart saucepan . toss sauce with hot pasta . top with vegetables and sprinkle, if desired, with grated parmesan cheese.

name: air fryer salmon with maple soy glaze
description: healthy air fryer salmon with maple soy glaze is delicious, and ready in minutes
ner: pure maple syrup, reduced sodium soy sauce, sriracha hot sauce, garlic, wild salmon fillets
ingredients: 3 tbsp pure maple syrup, 3 tbsp reduced sodium soy sauce, 1 tbsp sriracha hot sauce, 1 clove garlic, 4 wild salmon fillets
steps: combine maple syrup, soy sauce, sriracha and garlic in a small bowl, pour into a gallon sized resealable bag and add the salmon . marinate 20 to 30 minutes, turning once in a while . preheat air fryer to 400f . lightly spray the basket with nonstick spray . remove the fish from the marinade, reserving and pat dry with paper towels . place the fish in the air fryer, in batches, air fry 7 to 8 minutes, or longer depending on thickness of the salmon . meanwhile, pour the marinade in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium low heat and reduce until it thickens into a glaze, 1 to 2 minutes . spoon over salmon just before eating.

name: kantonese kip
description: heerlijke kantonese kip met roergebakken mie . dit verrukkelijke aziatische gerecht staat in slechts 30 minuten al op tafel en is vol van smaak door knorr wereldgerecht chinese kantonese kip . mag niet ontbreken bij een rijsttafel.
ner: kipfilet, kip, prei, winterwortel, ui, uien, komkommer, zonnebloemolie
ingredients: 500.0 gram kipfilet, 1.0 packet kip, 1.0 prei, 1.0 winterwortel, 1.0 ui, 3.0 uien, 1.0 komkommer, 6.0 tablespoon zonnebloemolie
steps: snijd de kipfilet in reepjes . maak de marinade door de marinademix van knorr wereldgerecht chinese kantonese kip te mengen met 2 eetlepels olie . marineer de kip hier minimaal 10 minuten in . kook de mie in ruim kokend water in 10 minuten gaar . maak de mie los met een vork en spoel af met koud water . snijd de prei in ringetjes en was goed . snijd de wortel in blokjes . pel de ui en snijd in halve ringen . snijd de lente uitjes in ringetjes . snijd de komkommer in dunne plakjes . meng de dressingmix met 2 eetlepels olie en 2 eetlepels water . meng de dressing door de gesneden komkommer . bereid de kantonese saus met 150 ml water . verhit 1 eetlepel olie in een koekenpan en bak hierin de gemarineerde kip gaar . voeg de lente ui toe en laat op laag vuur verder pruttelen . verhit 3 eetlepels olie in een wok en bak hierin alle groentes . voeg de kantonese saus toe en roerbak 2 a 3 minuten verder . voeg de gekookte mie toe en warm het geheel goed door . doe de geroerbakte mie over in een schaal en schep de kip er op . serveer de kantonese kip met de komkommersalade apart erbij.

name: grilled tenderloin with cumin, green tomatillos and onion salsa
description: grilled tenderloin with cumin, green tomatillos and onion salsa with pork tenderloin, olive oil, ground cumin, salt, black pepper, tomatillos, jalapeno chiles, onion, water, fresh cilantro
ner: pork tenderloin, olive oil, ground cumin, salt, black pepper, tomatillos, jalapeno chiles, onion, water, fresh cilantro
ingredients: 1.0 pork tenderloin, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 teaspoon ground cumin, salt, black pepper, 10.0 tomatillos, 2.0 jalapeno chiles, 1.0 onion, 3.0 tablespoon water, 0.5 cup fresh cilantro
steps: butterfly pork tenderloin lengthwise . flatten pork with the palm of your hand to achieve even thickness . cover with oil and season with cumin, salt and pepper . prepare grill for medium high heat . grill tomatillos, jalapenos and onion for about 5 to 10 minutes, turning often, until soft . remove vegetables from grill . seed and stem jalapenos . add tomatoes, jalapenos and half the onions to a blender or food processor blend until mixture becomes a thick paste . transfer to a serving dish and mix in water and cilantro, adding, adding salt to taste . place pork on the grill and cook for 4 5 minutes on each side about 20 minutes total time, until internal temperature as measured with an instant read thermometer is 145 degrees fahrenheit, followed by a 3 minute rest time . slice pork and arrange on a warm serving tray . spoon some of the tomatillo mixture over the pork and decorate with the remaining grilled onions . garnish with cilantro . serve pork with remaining sauce.

name: babycakes nyc chocolate chip cookies brm gf
description: yummy and healthful gf and vegan cookie from bob's red mill and babycakes nyc note can make oat flour and flax seed meal by using high speed blender
ner: gluten free oat flour, organic sugar, flaxseed meal, arrowroot starch, baking soda, salt, xanthum gum, coconut oil, apple sauce, vanilla extract, chocolate chips
ingredients: 1.5 cup gluten free oat flour, 1.0 cup organic sugar, 0.2 cup flaxseed meal, 0.2 cup arrowroot starch, 1.5 teaspoon baking soda, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.5 xanthum gum, 0.8 cup coconut oil, 6.0 tablespoon apple sauce, 2.0 tablespoon vanilla extract, 1.0 cup chocolate chips
steps: in medium bowl mix together all dry ingredients through xanthum gum add oil, apple sauce, vanilla to dry ingredients with rubber spatula until thick dough forms stir in add ins..i.e chocolate chips, nuts, raisins, coconut, etc preheat oven to 325f, prepare two cookie sheets with parchment paper drop by tablespoons about 1 1/2 inch apart... gently press down if desired bake for total of 12 14 minutes... maybe less ...turning cookie sheets mid way until golden brown and firm important let cookies stand on cookie sheets for 15 minutes before removing.. important for gf baked goods . cookies age well ... get tastier the next day

name: harissa eggs in purgatory
description: harissa eggs in purgatory is a simple italian egg dish, simmered in a fiery tomato sauce . tastes like heaven if you need a quick inexpensive meal with a kick
ner: olive oil, minced red onion, can petite tomatoes, prepared harissa, large eggs, salt and pepper, fresh chopped parsley or chives
ingredients: 1/2 tsp olive oil, 2 tbsp minced red onion, 14.5 oz can petite tomatoes, 2 tbsp prepared harissa, 4 large eggs, salt and pepper, 1 tsp fresh chopped parsley or chives
steps: heat a large non stick skillet over medium heat, add the oil then the onion and saute until golden, about 2 to 3 minutes . add the tomatoes, harissa, salt and pepper and increase the heat to medium high and simmer until the liquid reduces a bit, about 3 to 4 minutes . reduce the heat to medium low, carefully add the eggs, salt and pepper and cover . cook until the top of the eggs set, about 4 to 5 minutes, or to your liking . top with chopped fresh parsley or chives and serve.

name: baked zucchini chips
description: a snack that's healthy, delicious, and easy might seem out of reach, but these zucchini chips fit the bill perfectly dipped in egg whites, coated in breadcrumbs, and baked rather than deep fried for that crispy crunch . all you need for this treat is 10 to 15 minutes in the oven perfect for anything from a workplace snack to movie night.
ner: nonstick cooking spray, zucchini, seasoned breadcrumbs, black pepper, grated parmesan, egg whites, marinara sauce, ranch dressing
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 2.0 zucchini, 1.0 cup seasoned breadcrumbs, 0.1 teaspoon black pepper, 2.0 tablespoon grated parmesan, 2.0 egg whites, marinara sauce, ranch dressing
steps: preheat the oven to 475degf . spray a baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . cut zucchini into 1/4 inch thick slices . in a shallow bowl, stir together the breadcrumbs, pepper, and parmesan cheese . place the egg whites in a small mixing bowl . dip the zucchini slices into the egg whites, then dredge them in the breadcrumb mixture to coat both sides . arrange the slices on the prepared baking sheet . bake the zucchini on middle rack of oven for 5 minutes . using a spatula, flip the slices over . continue baking until browned and crispy, 5 10 minutes . check to see that chips are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . serve with marinara sauce or ranch dressing for dipping, if desired.

name: kielbasa veggie sheet pan dinner
description: kielbasa veggie sheet pan dinner is made with turkey kielbasa, asparagus, tomatoes and bell peppers cooked all on one pan, easy cleanup it's also keto, whole30, low carb and gluten free.
ner: turkey kielbasa, asparagus, 8 ounces grape tomatoes, halved, large orange bell pepper, olive oil, sea salt, italian seasoning, paprika, garlic powder, black pepper
ingredients: 14 ounces turkey kielbasa, 1 pound asparagus, 1 1/2 cups 8 ounces grape tomatoes, halved, 1 large orange bell pepper, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon sea salt, 1 teaspoon italian seasoning, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . line a 20 x 14 inch baking sheet or two 14 x 10 inch pans with foil and grease well . arrange the kielbasa in a single layer on the baking sheet . roast for 12 to 15 minutes, until it starts to brown on the bottom . meanwhile, in a large bowl, toss together the veggies . in a small bowl, whisk together the oil, sea salt, italian seasoning, paprika, garlic powder, and black pepper . pour over the veggies and toss to coat . when the kielbasa is done, remove the pan from the oven but leave it on . flip the kielbasa pieces over and move them to one side of the pan, leaving space for the veggies . arrange the veggies in a single layer on the other side of the extra large pan, or on the second pan if using two pans . roast for 18 to 20 minutes, until the veggies are tender and the kielbasa is further browned.

name: ballpark pork gyro with peppers and onions
description: ballpark pork gyro with peppers and onions with new york top loin pork roast, dried oregano, dried oregano, fresh oregano, dried rosemary, dried rosemary, fresh rosemary, cumin, granulated garlic, canola oil, red bell pepper, red onion, salt, pepper, parsley, pita bread, tomatoes, fresh lemon juice, greek yogurt
ner: new york top loin pork roast, dried oregano, dried oregano, fresh oregano, dried rosemary, dried rosemary, fresh rosemary, cumin, granulated garlic, canola oil, red bell pepper, red onion, salt, pepper, parsley, pita bread, tomatoes, fresh lemon juice, greek yogurt
ingredients: 1.0 pound new york top loin pork roast, 1.0 tablespoon dried oregano, 1.0 tablespoon dried oregano, 2.0 tablespoon fresh oregano, 1.0 tablespoon dried rosemary, 1.0 tablespoon dried rosemary, 2.0 tablespoon fresh rosemary, 0.5 teaspoon cumin, 1.0 teaspoon granulated garlic, 0.2 cup canola oil, 1.0 red bell pepper, 1.0 red onion, salt, pepper, 2.0 tablespoon parsley, 5.0 pita bread, 5.0 slice tomatoes, 2.0 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 5.0 tablespoon greek yogurt
steps: preheat oven to 450 degrees f . in a mixing bowl, toss together the pork, oregano, rosemary, cumin and garlic and set the bowl aside . meanwhile, make the peppers and onions heat 2 tablespoons of the canola oil in a large skillet over medium high heat . add the peppers and onions and cook, stirring occasionally, until they begin to caramelize, 8 minutes . season with salt and pepper set them aside on a plate . pour the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil into the large skillet and turn the heat up to high . when the oil begins to smoke, add in the pork and spread it out into 1 layer . without stirring, let it cook and develop a deep brown color, about 2 minutes . then stir the pork, season with salt and pepper, and then add the peppers and onions back into the pan . toss the pork and pepper mixture together and continue to cook until the pork is cooked through, about 2 minutes . stir the parsley into the pork mixture . to assemble the gyros, divide the pork and pepper mixture between each pita, topping each gyro with 2 tomato halves, some of the lemon juice, and a tablespoon of yogurt . wrap in wax paper and serve.

name: veggie couscous
description: veggie couscous with couscous, vegetable broth, garlic, oil, salt, zucchini, tomatoes, eggplant
ner: couscous, vegetable broth, garlic, oil, salt, zucchini, tomatoes, eggplant
ingredients: couscous, vegetable broth, garlic, oil, salt, zucchini, tomatoes, eggplant
steps: heat oil in a nonstick skillet and saute veggies until they have some color cooking harder vegetables first, then adding softer ones . add minced garlic in toward the end . season with salt and pepper in another pot, bring vegetable broth to a boil . once boiling, add couscous, cover and remove from heat . after 5 minutes, couscous will be ready . uncover and fluff with a fork . combine vegetables and couscous may need a little more liquid if things aren't sticking together / it seems too dry . this also reheats pretty easily if you add just add a little water to couscous in skillet to heat through.

name: gingerbread men ornaments
description: gingerbread men ornaments with canola oil, unsweetened applesauce, organic sugar, molasses, almond milk, whole wheat pastry flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, pumpkin pie spice, cinnamon, ground ginger
ner: canola oil, unsweetened applesauce, organic sugar, molasses, almond milk, whole wheat pastry flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, pumpkin pie spice, cinnamon, ground ginger
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon canola oil, 3.0 tablespoon unsweetened applesauce, 0.8 cup organic sugar, 0.2 cup molasses, 0.2 cup almond milk, 2.0 cup whole wheat pastry flour, 0.5 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 1.0 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 0.5 teaspoon cinnamon, 1.5 teaspoon ground ginger
steps: beat oil, applesauce, stevia and sugar together until well combined . incorporate molasses and almond milk and set aside . sift all dry ingredients together in a separate bowl . slowly add dry ingredients to the wet and mix well, but do not over mix . transfer dough to plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes . after 30 minutes, preheated the oven to 350 degrees and rolled out the dough on a floured board . cut out our men and decorated them using red hots, raisins, etc.

name: toasted sun dried tomato bread
description: toasted sun dried tomato bread with i can't believe it's not butter spread, sun dried tomatoes in oil, onions, garlic, french bread
ner: i can't believe it's not butter spread, sun dried tomatoes in oil, onions, garlic, french bread
ingredients: 0.5 cup i can't believe it's not butter spread, 2.0 tablespoon sun dried tomatoes in oil, 1.0 onions, 1.0 clove garlic, 1.0 loaf french bread
steps: blend all ingredients except bread in small bowl . evenly spread bread with sun dried tomato mixture . arrange bread on baking sheet and broil until golden . slice and serve.

name: pumpkin creme brulee
description: if you have been toying with trying a different pumpkin dessert recipe this year for thanksgiving, then make this decadent pumpkin creme brulee . the sweet and creamy flavors are out of this world . if you are planning an intimate family or friend thanksgiving dinner, this is the dessert to prepare . these individual serving sweet treats look amazing and are packed with rich holiday flavors . we hope you love this recipe as much as we do.
ner: pumpkin, eggs, skimmed milk, milk powder, sweetener
ingredients: 300.0 gram pumpkin, 2.0 eggs, skimmed milk, 3.0 tablespoon milk powder, sweetener
steps: preheat oven to 284f cut the pumpkin into cubes . after steam cooking the pumpkin, mash it with a fork and set aside . in a saucepan, mix the eggs with the milk and then add the milk powder and sweetener . mix well and cook on low heat . add the mashed pumpkin and continue to cook while mixing . when the mixture has thickened, pour into ramekins and bake for 30 minutes . let cool, then refrigerate . when ready to serve, sprinkle sugar over the top and torch to caramelize.

name: air fryer pork belly tacos
description: air fryer pork belly tacos with pork belly, canola oil cooking spray, ancho chile powder, sugar, ground cumin, flour tortillas, shredded cabbage, fresh pineapple, diced avocado, pico de gallo, pickled red onions, cotija cheese, chopped fresh cilantro, lime wedges
ner: pork belly, canola oil cooking spray, ancho chile powder, sugar, ground cumin, flour tortillas, shredded cabbage, fresh pineapple, diced avocado, pico de gallo, pickled red onions, cotija cheese, chopped fresh cilantro, lime wedges
ingredients: 1.0 pound pork belly, canola oil cooking spray, 1.0 tablespoon ancho chile powder, 2.0 teaspoon sugar, 0.5 teaspoon ground cumin, 6.0 flour tortillas, shredded cabbage, fresh pineapple, diced avocado, pico de gallo, pickled red onions, cotija cheese, chopped fresh cilantro, lime wedges
steps: preheat air fryer to 325degf according to manufacturer's directions . meanwhile, cut pork belly into 1/2 inch thick slices . then cut slices crosswise into 3/4 inch pieces transfer to a medium bowl . lightly spray pork pieces with cooking spray toss . in a small bowl combine chile powder, sugar and cumin . sprinkle over pork pieces toss until evenly coated . lightly spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray . place pork pieces in the basket . cook for 16 to 18 minutes or just until pork pieces begin to crisp, shaking pork pieces in basket or tossing with tongs after every 6 minutes . to assemble tacos, spoon pork pieces on warm tortillas . top with desired toppers . serve with lime wedges.

name: chicken and chorizo pasta bbc good food
description: a quick and easy pasta dish with stong, bold flavours suitable for a midweek supper or a saturday night indoors with friends
ner: pasta, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, chorizo, garlic, red chilli, red onion, red pepper, cherry tomatoes, red pesto, low fat creme fraiche, lemon juice
ingredients: 300.0 gram pasta, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 3.0 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 100.0 gram chorizo, 2.0 clove garlic, 1.0 red chilli, 1.0 red onion, 1.0 red pepper, 20.0 cherry tomatoes, 63.3 gram red pesto, 300.0 milliliter low fat creme fraiche, lemon juice
steps: heat olive oil in a pan . dice chicken and chorizo and add to pan fry gently for 3 4 minutes until chicken is browned and chorizo oil is released whilst chicken is cooking, roughly chop onion and pepper and finely chop garlic and chilli . add to pan and cook until onion and peppers have softened and chicken is cooked thoroughly add tomatoes to pan, gently cook for 5 min until tomatoes begin to burst . cook pasta as per pack instructions whilst pasta is cooking add creme fraiche, lemon juice and pesto to chicken and warm thorugh . season to taste add cooked drained pasta to chicken and creme fraiche mix and stir until coated serve with a rocket and parmesan salad

name: on the go sloppy joe
description: on the go sloppy joe with ground beef, sloppy joe seasoning mix, tomato ketchup, french's classic yellow mustard, water, hamburger rolls
ner: ground beef, sloppy joe seasoning mix, tomato ketchup, french's classic yellow mustard, water, hamburger rolls
ingredients: 1.0 pound ground beef, 1.0 package sloppy joe seasoning mix, 1.0 cup tomato ketchup, 2.0 teaspoon french's classic yellow mustard, 0.5 cup water, 6.0 hamburger rolls
steps: brown ground beef in large skillet on medium high heat . drain fat . stir in seasoning mix, ketchup, mustard and 1/2 cup water . bring to boil . reduce heat to low cover and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally . serve on hamburger rolls.

name: pork with garlic and nam pla
description: serve with stir fried vegetables and purchased egg drop soup.
ner: boneless pork loin, corn oil, pepper, garlic, thai fish sauce
ingredients: 0.5 pound boneless pork loin, 1.0 teaspoon corn oil, 0.2 teaspoon pepper, 0.5 teaspoon garlic, 1.0 teaspoon thai fish sauce
steps: in a nonstick skillet heat corn oil over high heat, add pork slices, cook over medium high heat 2 3 minutes, turn and sprinkle pork with garlic, pepper and nam pla . cook 2 minutes more, shaking pan to prevent garlic from burning . serve pork immediately with pan juices.

name: eggplant panini with pesto
description: a perfect summer lunch panini made with eggplant, tomatoes, mozzarella and skinny pesto on crispy french bread . make this for one, or for the whole family.
ner: large eggplant, kosher salt to taste, olive oil spray, french bread, 3 oz total part skim mozzarella cheese sargento, skinny pesto, thin sliced tomato
ingredients: 1 large eggplant, kosher salt to taste, olive oil spray, 12 oz french bread, 4 slices 3 oz total part skim mozzarella cheese sargento, 2 tbsp skinny pesto, 8 thin sliced tomato
steps: slice the eggplant into 1/4 inch thick slices . place the eggplant slices on a paper towel and season with salt set aside about 30 minutes . this will help draw some of the moisture out of the eggplant . pat the eggplant dry with paper towels . preheat panini grill . lightly spritz eggplant with olive oil, season with salt and pepper . when the grill is hot, grill eggplant about 7 8 minutes, turning once half way through . set aside . slice the bread open and place 3 slices of grilled eggplant, 1 slice of mozzarella, 1/2 tablespoon of pesto, and 2 slices of tomatoes on each sandwich . close and lightly spray the top of the bread with oil . place on a panini press and close until the cheese melts and the bread is toasted . cut in half diagonally and eat immediately.

name: perfect soft and chewy vegan sugar cookies
description: these vegan sugar cookies are unexpectedly soft and chewy perfect for a sweet snack the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: canola oil, granulated sugar, brown rice syrup, almond milk, vanilla extract, almond extract, all purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt
ingredients: 0.5 cup canola oil, 1.0 cup granulated sugar, 1.0 tablespoon brown rice syrup, 0.2 cup almond milk, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 0.2 teaspoon almond extract, 2.0 cup all purpose flour, 1.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 teaspoon salt
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . line two baking sheets with silicone baking mats or parchment paper . set aside . in a large bowl, whisk together the canola oil, granulated sugar, brown rice syrup, nut milk, and extracts until thoroughly combined . add the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt to the bowl . stir with a rubber spatula until a thick dough forms . form the cookie dough into about 20 balls . arrange on the prepared baking sheets . bake the cookies on middle and upper middle racks of oven until they are cracked and puffy on top and slightly golden brown at the edges, 12 13 minutes . check to see that cookies are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow cookies to cool for 5 minutes on the baking sheets, then transfer to cooling racks . serve and enjoy . store leftovers in an airtight container at room temperature for 3 days, or in the refrigerator for 5 days.

name: mashed red skin potatoes with carrots and onions
description: mashed red skin potatoes with carrots and onions with potatoes, carrots, onion, salt, i can't believe it's not butter spread, ground black pepper, skim milk
ner: potatoes, carrots, onion, salt, i can't believe it's not butter spread, ground black pepper, skim milk
ingredients: 5.0 potatoes, 4.0 carrots, 1.0 onion, 0.8 teaspoon salt, 0.2 cup i can't believe it's not butter spread, 0.2 teaspoon ground black pepper, 0.5 cup skim milk
steps: cover potatoes, carrots and onion with water in 3 quart saucepan . add 1/2 teaspoon salt . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer 40 minutes or until vegetables are very tender drain . return vegetables to saucepan mash . stir in remaining ingredients . garnish, if desired, with finely chopped parsley.

name: copycat red lobster cheddar bay biscuits
description: i love this recipe because these biscuits are even better than the ones you just can't stop eating when you go to red lobster . they are quick to make and we have them at least 2 times a week . find the recipe here http //jennifersikora.com/2015/10/copycat red lobster cheddar bay biscuits/
ner: all purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, garlic powder, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, buttermilk, unsalted butter, shredded sharp cheddar cheese, butter, fresh parsley, garlic powder
ingredients: 2.0 cup all purpose flour, 1.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 tablespoon baking powder, 2.0 teaspoon garlic powder, 0.5 teaspoon kosher salt, 0.2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1.0 cup buttermilk, 0.5 cup unsalted butter, 2.0 cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese, 3.0 tablespoon butter, 1.0 tablespoon fresh parsley, 0.5 teaspoon garlic powder
steps: preheat oven to 450 degrees f . line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone baking mat set aside . in a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, garlic powder, salt and cayenne pepper, if using . in another bowl, whisk together buttermilk and butter . pour mixture over dry ingredients and stir using a rubber spatula just until moist . gently fold in cheese . using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the batter evenly onto the prepared baking sheet . place into oven and bake for 10 12 minutes, or until golden brown . for the topping, whisk together butter, parsley and garlic powder in a small bowl . working one at a time, brush the tops of the biscuits with the butter mixture . if they are not brown enough by this time, stick them under the broiler for just a few minutes until they get the desired color you want . serve hot or at room temperature.

name: penny cap mushroom salad with parmesan and chestnuts
description: this recipe for penny cap mushroom salad with parmesan and chestnut makes a great vegetarian lunch option or can be served as a side for dinner to accompany grilled meat or vegetables . marinated in a garlic and sage oil for 30 minutes, the sliced penny cap mushrooms are tender and flavorful . tossed in a sherry vinegar, the mushrooms are served with crushed chestnuts and parmesan for a salad that has a delicious blend of flavors and textures.
ner: garlic cloves, virgin olive oil, sage leaves, salt, ground white pepper, mushrooms, chestnuts, parmesan cheese, sherry vinegar
ingredients: 2.0 garlic cloves, 5.0 tablespoon virgin olive oil, 1.0 handful sage leaves, salt, ground white pepper, 2.0 mushrooms, 1.0 handful chestnuts, 40.0 gram parmesan cheese, sherry vinegar
steps: mince the garlic and mix with the oil . slightly crush the sage leaves and add to the oil . season with salt and black pepper . separate the mushroom caps and clean with a moistened rag . fillet using a mandolin or knife . cut into strips and add to the dressing . marinate for a while . make an incision on the chestnuts and microwave for 30 seconds to loosen the skin . peel and slightly crush . pour a drizzle of sherry vinegar on the mushrooms . serve with crushed chestnuts and parmesan cheese slices on top.

name: little italy sub wrapwich
description: little italy sub wrapwich with hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, fajita size flour tortillas, basil, lettuce leaves, sliced deli meats, provolone cheese, red onion, pitted ripe olives, wish bone italian dressing
ner: hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, fajita size flour tortillas, basil, lettuce leaves, sliced deli meats, provolone cheese, red onion, pitted ripe olives, wish bone italian dressing
ingredients: hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, 4.0 fajita size flour tortillas, basil, 4.0 lettuce leaves, 0.8 pound sliced deli meats, 4.0 slice provolone cheese, 1.0 red onion, 2.2 ounce pitted ripe olives, wish bone italian dressing
steps: squeeze it squeeze hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise generously onto tortillas . stuff it layer lettuce, deli meats, cheese, red onion and olives down center of each tortilla . drizzle with italian dressing . wrap it roll and fold the filled tortilla.

name: sauteed snow peas and baby carrots
description: sauteed snow peas and baby carrots with i can't believe it's not butter spread, shallots, carrots, snow peas, finely chopped fresh parsley
ner: i can't believe it's not butter spread, shallots, carrots, snow peas, finely chopped fresh parsley
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon i can't believe it's not butter spread, 2.0 tablespoon shallots, 5.0 ounce carrots, 4.0 ounce snow peas, 2.0 teaspoon finely chopped fresh parsley
steps: melt i can't believe it's not butter spread in 12 inch nonstick skillet over medium heat and cook shallots, stirring occasionally, 1 minute or until almost tender . add carrots and snow peas and cook, stirring occasionally, 4 minutes or until crisp tender . stir in parsley and heat through.

name: artichoke risotto
description: risotto can be made into a side dish or a main entree depending on the flavors and other ingredients . this recipe for risotto with artichokes is a delicious dish that is packed with hearty white wine, artichokes and soft risotto rice . be sure to pick up these tasty ingredients the next time you go shopping so you can surprise your family with a decadent dinner . serve this with your favorite meat main entree.
ner: shallots, broth, olive oil, risotto rice, white wine, artichoke cream, artichokes, salt, pepper
ingredients: 2.0 shallots, broth, 3.0 tablespoon olive oil, 500.0 gram risotto rice, white wine, 100.0 gram artichoke cream, 1.0 jar artichokes, salt, pepper
steps: chop the shallots . heat 1 1/2 liters of broth . heat 3 tablespoons of olive oil in a stew pot, then add the shallots . add the risotto rice and mix . pour in 20 centiliters of white wine . add the broth, one ladle at a time, while gently stirring . continue until all the broth has been absorbed . add artichoke cream . mix well . add salt and pepper . heat the artichoke pieces in a pan . add to the risotto . serve immediately.

name: ina mae's gingerbread
description: this recipe has been in our family my whole life and most of my parents life . this is the real deal . make sure you have plenty of milk
ner: sugar, butter, eggs, sorghum, flour, ginger, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, baking soda
ingredients: 1.0 cup sugar, 1.0 cup butter, 2.0 eggs, 1.0 cup sorghum, 3.0 cup flour, 1.0 teaspoon ginger, 1.0 teaspoon cinnamon, 2.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 1.0 teaspoon baking soda
steps: preheat oven to 350 cream together the sugar and butter add eggs one at a time to the creamed mixture, creaming well after each addition . add sorghum to creamed mixture 1. sift together i don't have a sifter . you can lift the flour with a spoon several times to loosen it so that is isn't packed down, and spoon lightly into the cup, then level then mix all of the dry ingredients . 2. add to creamed mixture and mix until flour disappears . add 1 cup hot water into mixture pour mixture into pan that has a bottom lined with ungreased wax paper, or parchment paper, or i grease with butter then coat with flour . sprinkle top with 6 t sugar and 2 teaspoons ground cloves bake at 350 for 25 minutes

name: super moist roasted turkey
description: super moist roasted turkey with turkey, hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, shallots, dried sage leaves, crushed, knorr roasted turkey gravy mix
ner: turkey, hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, shallots, dried sage leaves, crushed, knorr roasted turkey gravy mix
ingredients: 11.0 pound turkey, 1.0 cup hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, 1.0 shallots, 1.0 tablespoon dried sage leaves, crushed, 1.0 knorr roasted turkey gravy mix
steps: preheat oven to 425deg . remove giblets from turkey cavities and rinse turkey inside and out pat dry with paper towels . season, if desired, with salt and freshly ground black pepper set aside . combine hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, shallot and herbs in medium bowl set aside . starting at neck opening, gently loosen skin on turkey and evenly spread 1/2 of the mayonnaise mixture under skin . tie legs together with kitchen string . arrange turkey, breast side up, in large shallow roasting pan with rack rub remaining mayonnaise mixture over outside of turkey . tent with heavy duty aluminum foil . decrease oven to 325deg and roast turkey 1 1/2 hours . remove foil and continue roasting, about 1 hour, basting occasionally with pan juices, until thermometer inserted in thickest part of the thigh reaches 165deg . let stand covered loosely with foil 20 minutes before carving . serve with hot knorr roasted turkey gravy.

name: quesadilla casserole
description: quesadilla casserole with ground beef, chopped onion, tomato sauce, black beans, whole kernel corn, green chiles, mccormick chili powder, mccormick cumin ground, mccormick garlic, mccormick oregano leaves, mccormick red pepper, crushed, flour tortillas, shredded cheddar cheese
ner: ground beef, chopped onion, tomato sauce, black beans, whole kernel corn, green chiles, mccormick chili powder, mccormick cumin ground, mccormick garlic, mccormick oregano leaves, mccormick red pepper, crushed, flour tortillas, shredded cheddar cheese
ingredients: 1.0 pound ground beef, 0.5 cup chopped onion, 2.0 can tomato sauce, 15.0 ounce black beans, 8.8 ounce whole kernel corn, 4.5 ounce green chiles, 2.0 teaspoon mccormick chili powder, 1.0 teaspoon mccormick cumin ground, 1.0 teaspoon mccormick garlic, 0.5 teaspoon mccormick oregano leaves, 0.5 teaspoon mccormick red pepper, crushed, 6.0 flour tortillas, 2.0 cup shredded cheddar cheese
steps: preheat oven to 350degf . brown beef and onion in large skillet on medium high heat drain . add tomato sauce, beans, corn and green chiles mix well . stir in all of the seasonings . bring to boil . reduce heat to low simmer 5 minutes . spread 1/2 cup of the beef mixture on bottom of 13x9x2 inch baking dish sprayed with no stick cooking spray . top with 3 of the tortillas, overlapping as needed . layer with 1/2 of the remaining beef mixture and 1/2 of the cheese . repeat with remaining tortillas, beef mixture and cheese . bake 15 minutes or until heated through . let stand 5 minutes before serving.

name: santa fe grilled shrimp salad
description: santa fe grilled shrimp salad with raw shrimp, kosher salt, green onions, fresh cilantro, lime juice, vegetable oil, sugar, jalapeno, chipotle tabasco sauce, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, frozen corn, black beans, zucchini, avocados, red bell pepper, red onion
ner: raw shrimp, kosher salt, green onions, fresh cilantro, lime juice, vegetable oil, sugar, jalapeno, chipotle tabasco sauce, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, frozen corn, black beans, zucchini, avocados, red bell pepper, red onion
ingredients: 2.0 pound raw shrimp, kosher salt, 5.0 green onions, 1.0 cup fresh cilantro, 1.0 cup lime juice, 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 tablespoon jalapeno, 2.0 teaspoon chipotle tabasco sauce, 3.0 teaspoon kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, 2.0 cup frozen corn, 30.0 ounce black beans, 1.0 zucchini, 2.0 avocados, 1.0 red bell pepper, 0.3 cup red onion
steps: place the smart oven grill attachment in oven . select grill mode and preheat grill to high heat setting . skewer the shrimp onto metal skewers . there should be 6 7 shrimp per skewer . season lightly with kosher salt . place skewered shrimp onto preheated grill and cook for 4 minutes turn shrimp and grill for another 4 minutes . remove from grill and cool . remove shrimp from skewers . cut in half lengthwise . set aside until ready to use . place all ingredients for santa fe dressing in work bowl of food processor . process until smooth . transfer to airtight container and refrigerate until ready to use . can be made 1 day ahead . toss salad ingredients in large bowl . add shrimp and toss with desired amount of santa fe dressing . chill 3 4 hours before serving.

name: thai ribeye pork chops
description: thai ribeye pork chops with boneless ribeye rib pork chops, soy sauce, cilantro, garlic, brown sugar, vegetable oil, lime
ner: boneless ribeye rib pork chops, soy sauce, cilantro, garlic, brown sugar, vegetable oil, lime
ingredients: 4.0 boneless ribeye rib pork chops, 0.2 cup soy sauce, 0.2 cup cilantro, 3.0 clove garlic, 3.0 tablespoon brown sugar, 1.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1.0 lime
steps: whisk together the soy sauce, cilantro, garlic, brown sugar, vegetable oil and lime juice in a bowl . in a large baking dish, arrange the ribeye pork chops in an even layer . pour the marinade over the pork chops, reserving about 1/4 cup of the marinade in the refrigerator for later use . marinate the pork chops for 20 to 30 minutes . heat an indoor grill pan or outdoor grill to medium high heat . remove pork chops from the marinade, discarding the excess marinade . place pork chops on the hot grill for 4 minutes on each side, flipping once until the internal temperature of the pork measures between 145 degrees f . medium rare and 160 degrees f . medium on a meat thermometer . transfer the grilled pork chops to a cutting board and let rest for 3 minutes before slicing against the grain . pour the reserved marinade over the sliced pork before serving.

name: pork tenderloin diane
description: pork tenderloin diane with pork tenderloin, lemon pepper, butter, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, dijon, parsley
ner: pork tenderloin, lemon pepper, butter, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, dijon, parsley
ingredients: 1.0 pork tenderloin, 2.0 teaspoon lemon pepper, 1.0 tablespoon butter, 1.0 tablespoon lemon juice, 1.0 tablespoon worcestershire sauce, 1.0 teaspoon dijon, 1.0 tablespoon parsley
steps: place each piece of tenderloin between 2 pieces of plastic wrap . flatten slightly with heel of hand . sprinkle surfaces of pork with lemon pepper . heat butter in heavy nonstick skillet brown pork evenly, about 3 4 minutes on each side . remove to serving platter, keep warm . add lemon juice, worcestershire sauce and mustard to skillet . cook, stirring with pan juices, until heated through . pour sauce over medallions, sprinkle with parsley and serve.

name: banana bread pbandj
description: banana bread pbandj with jif creamy peanut butter, smucker's seedless strawberry jam, banana bread
ner: jif creamy peanut butter, smucker's seedless strawberry jam, banana bread
ingredients: jif creamy peanut butter, smucker's seedless strawberry jam, 2.0 slice banana bread
steps: spread peanut butter on one slice of bread . spread jam on remaining slice . press together to form sandwich.

name: kimchi pork dumplings
description: kimchi pork dumplings with all purpose flour, salt, boiling water, ground pork, scallions, kimchi, firm tofu, fresh ginger, cornstarch, garlic, egg, sesame oil, salt, soy sauce, white pepper, cold water, oil, water
ner: all purpose flour, salt, boiling water, ground pork, scallions, kimchi, firm tofu, fresh ginger, cornstarch, garlic, egg, sesame oil, salt, soy sauce, white pepper, cold water, oil, water
ingredients: 2.0 cup all purpose flour, 1.0 pinch salt, 0.8 cup boiling water, 1.0 pound ground pork, 0.5 cup scallions, 1.0 cup kimchi, 8.0 ounce firm tofu, 2.0 teaspoon fresh ginger, 1.0 teaspoon cornstarch, 1.0 clove garlic, 1.0 egg, 1.0 tablespoon sesame oil, 1.0 tablespoon salt, 4.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 1.0 teaspoon white pepper, 0.5 cup cold water, 2.0 tablespoon oil, 3.0 tablespoon water
steps: first, start with making the dumpling wrapper . whisk together the all purpose flour and salt . bring water to a boil then immediately remove from heat . after five seconds, gently stream water into the dry ingredients, constantly stirring . when the mixture is tolerable to touch, knead into a dough . if it's too dry, add a bit more water . knead for another three minutes, until elastic and smooth, but not sticky . wrap tightly in plastic wrap and let the dough sit for 30 minutes at room temperature . in the meantime, mix the pork, scallions, kimchi, tofu, ginger, cornstarch, garlic, egg, sesame oil, salt, soy sauce, and white pepper together . use your hands or a spatula to mix until it becomes a unified mass . divide the mass into quarters . place the other three quarters in plastic wrap . take one quarter and roll into a log . divide into 12 even pieces . roll a piece into a ball, then flatten gently into a circle . dust the kitchenaid pasta roller attachment with flour then attach to the power hub of the kitchenaid artisan mini stand mixer . turn the artisan mini stand mixer to setting 1 low and run the dough through . change to setting 2, then rotate the dough 90deg and run through again . change to setting 3, rotate and run the dough through again . if the dough is like an oval, simply run it the wide way through the pasta roller attachment to form a circle . repeat until all 12 pieces are shaped . place one circle in one hand . scoop about 1 1/2 tablespoons of filling into the center . dip a finger in water and trace the top semi circle edge . fold over and pleat . repeat with the rest of the filling . to cook boil place the dumplings in a single layer in a pan . cover with water . bring to a boil then add 1/2 cup cold water . bring to a boil again, until the dumplings float . remove with a slotted spoon . pan fry heat the oil in a non stick pan over medium low heat until a drop of water sizzles when hitting the pan . place the dumplings in a single layer in the pan . when the bottoms of the dumplings are golden, pour the water into the pan and cover with a lid, turning the heat to low . let the dumplings steam for 5 10 minutes or until the water has evaporated . remove the lid and let the rest of the water evaporate and allow dumplings to crisp up even more.

name: knorr perfect steak rub
description: knorr perfect steak rub with knorr beef flavored bouillon cube, olive oil, flank steak
ner: knorr beef flavored bouillon cube, olive oil, flank steak
ingredients: 1.0 knorr beef flavored bouillon cube, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 pound flank steak
steps: to make a super easy and flavorful meat rub, blend a crumbled knorr beef flavored bouillon cube with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, mashing until well combined . rub on your favorite cut of beef and prepare as desired by grilling, broiling, roasting or sauteing.

name: garlic and sage roasted potatoes
description: garlic and sage roasted potatoes with i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread, red potatoes, chopped fresh sage, garlic
ner: i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread, red potatoes, chopped fresh sage, garlic
ingredients: 0.2 cup i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread, 2.0 pound red potatoes, 1.0 teaspoon chopped fresh sage, 3.0 clove garlic
steps: preheat oven to 425deg . melt i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread in shallow roasting pan in oven about 2 minutes . stir in potatoes, sage and garlic . season, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper . roast, stirring twice, 40 minutes or until potatoes are golden and crisp.

name: mom's lightened beef stroganoff
description: none
ner: lean tri tip sirlion steak, olive oil cooking spray, butter, small onion, garlic, of sliced mushrooms, can of campbell's tomato soup, of water, small fresh bay leaf, worcestershire sauce, of light sour cream
ingredients: 1 1/2 lbs lean tri tip sirlion steak, olive oil cooking spray, 1 tbsp butter, 1 small onion, 2 cloves garlic, 10 oz of sliced mushrooms, 1 can of campbell's tomato soup, 1 cup of water, 1 small fresh bay leaf, 2 tsp worcestershire sauce, 2/3 cup of light sour cream
steps: in a heavy saucepan, heat pan over high heat . when pan is hot, spray with oil and add steak . brown meat until cooked . remove meat from pan . lower heat, melt butter, then add onions . cook about 2 3 minutes until translucent, add garlic and mushrooms and saute about 2 3 more minutes until cooked . add a can of tomato soup, steak, water, bay leaf, and worcestershire sauce . cover and cook on low about 40 minutes . remove bay leaf and mix in sour cream . serve over noodles or rice.

name: vegetarian matzo ball soup
description: one secret ingredient makes this the ultimate meatless matzo ball soup savory chicken flavor without the meat . kosher for passover recipe.
ner: carrots, celery, onion, leek, sliced and cleaned, fresh dill 2 tbsp chopped fresh dill, divided, fresh parsley, bay leaves, whole peppercorns, whole cloves, saffron threads, good quality extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, eggs, vegetable oil or light olive oil, seltzer water, matzo meal, baking powder, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, chopped fresh dill, saffron threads
ingredients: 1/2 lb carrots, 1/2 lb celery, 1 onion, 1 leek, sliced and cleaned, 1 bunch fresh dill 2 tbsp chopped fresh dill, divided, 1 bunch fresh parsley, 2 bay leaves, 10 whole peppercorns, 6 whole cloves, pinch saffron threads, 2 tbsp good quality extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, 2 large eggs, 2 tbsp vegetable oil or light olive oil, 1 tbsp seltzer water, 1/2 cup matzo meal, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 1/8 tsp salt, 1/8 tsp garlic powder, 1/8 tsp onion powder, 1/2 tbsp chopped fresh dill, pinch saffron threads
steps: combine all soup ingredients in a large pot with 1 tbsp kosher salt reserve the 2 tbsp chopped fresh dill for later . if you're salt sensitive, you can start with 2 tsp salt, however please note that for the saffron flavor to shine here, you do need salt in the mix . i really recommend 1 tbsp if you're not watching your salt intake . cover ingredients with 4 quarts 16 cups water . bring to a boil . reduce heat to a simmer around medium heat . let the stock cook uncovered for 60 90 minutes until the liquid reduces by a third and the stock is flavorful . note the olive oil may taste strange in the beginning, but don't fret . as the stock slowly cooks the flavors will meld, and that olive oil will give the broth some much needed richness and depth . while the stock is cooking, make the matzo balls . whisk eggs in a small mixing bowl with vegetable oil and seltzer water . use a fork to stir in the matzo meal, baking powder, salt, garlic powder, onion powder and chopped fresh dill to make a thick batter . place the batter in the refrigerator for 30 minutes . while the batter is chilling, in a second pot combine 3 quarts 12 cups of water with a pinch of saffron and 1 tbsp salt . bring to a simmer, stir to dissolve the salt . keep the salted saffron water hot until the matzo ball mixture is fully chilled . place a small dish of cold water beside the pot of saffron water . take the chilled matzo ball batter out of the refrigerator . bring the saffron water to a simmer . wet your hands and roll the matzo ball batter into walnut sized balls, then gently drop them into the simmering saffron water . wet your hands between each ball this makes forming them easier . don't make them larger than walnuts, they'll expand a lot as they cook when all of the matzo balls are in the water, bring back to a low bubbling simmer not a heavy boil and cover the pot . let the matzo balls simmer for 30 35 minutes, keeping the pot covered for at least the first 30 minutes . no peeking keeping the pot covered will help the matzo balls become fluffy . let the matzo balls simmer until they're cooked through . when they are fully cooked, turn off the heat and keep the matzo balls in the hot saffron water until ready to serve . if you won't be serving within an hour, remove the matzo balls from the pot with a slotted spoon and reserve so they don't get mushy and fall apart . when the vegetable stock liquid has reduced by a third, strain the stock through a fine mesh strainer or cheese cloth into a large bowl . separate out the carrots and celery from the cooked vegetables and herbs . rinse the pot and pour the stock back into the pot . add the carrots and celery back to the stock along with 1 tbsp chopped dill . adjust seasoning to taste, adding more salt if desired . keep the stock warm till ready to serve . serve 1 2 matzo balls per bowl ladle the hot soup and vegetables over the warm matzo balls.

name: chicken pesto pizza
description: chicken pesto pizza with pizza dough, pesto sauce, roasted chicken, roasted red pepper, red onion, roma tomato, gorgonzola cheese, gruyere cheese, mozzarella cheese
ner: pizza dough, pesto sauce, roasted chicken, roasted red pepper, red onion, roma tomato, gorgonzola cheese, gruyere cheese, mozzarella cheese
ingredients: 1.0 pizza dough, 0.2 cup pesto sauce, 1.0 cup roasted chicken, 0.2 cup roasted red pepper, 0.1 red onion, 1.0 roma tomato, 1.0 tablespoon gorgonzola cheese, 0.5 cup gruyere cheese, 0.5 cup mozzarella cheese
steps: place the smart oven grill attachment in oven . select grill mode and preheat grill to high heat setting . roll out raw pizza dough on a countertop approximately 12 inches in diameter . once the grill is preheated, lower the temperature setting to medium, and partially bake the pizza dough on the preheated grill attachment for about 4 minutes until it is a light golden color . carefully remove the dough from the oven with a pizza peel or flat baking sheet . return the grill attachment to the oven, so it stays at temperature . turn crust over so the grilled side is facing up . spread the pesto sauce evenly over the crust . sprinkle the roasted chicken on top of sauce . place the vegetables on top of the pizza in the following order roasted red pepper, sliced red onion, then the roma tomato . sprinkle the gorgonzola cheese and the gruyere cheese on top to cover the ingredients . add the mozzarella cheese on top . transfer pizza back onto grill . bake approximately 30 minutes until the cheese is melted and the sauce is bubbling . to obtain a criss cross pattern on the bottom of the pizza, rotate the pizza 1/4 turn after about 20 minutes . remove the pizza from the oven using the pizza peel or baking sheet . place the baked pizza on a large cutting board . let rest for about 3 minutes before slicing into desired number of pieces.

name: easy pilgrim hat cookies with fudge stripes and reese's peanut butter cups for thanksgiving
description: looking for a fun, frugal, easy thanksgiving themed cookie treat or dessert well, these pilgrim hat cookies are just too cute and easy not to share they are also an "instant fancy treat." it is so simple and looks so festive that it is really hard to pass this dessert up for thanksgiving parties and themes the kids love these as they are so fun and us adults love it because it combines foods from our childhood we invite you over to thethriftycouple.com to explore finances, frugal living, family and recipes . it is our hope that you'll pull up a chair, grab a beverage and stay with us as we highlight ways to creative and intentional living.
ner: fudge, miniature peanut butter cups, butter cream frosting, orange food coloring
ingredients: 1.0 package fudge, 1.0 package miniature peanut butter cups, butter cream frosting, orange food coloring
steps: 1. mix food coloring into frosting to create an orange color . 2. spoon frosting into piping bag . use smallest round decorating tip, or cut a very small hole into the edge of the bag . 3. place fudge stripe cookies upside down, so chocolate side is facing up . 4. pipe a small square on the front of the reese's cup . 5. flip it upside down and pipe a generous amount of frosting around the edges . 6. place the reese's cup frosting side down in the middle of the fudge stripe cookie . frosting should spillover, but touch up as needed.

name: black eyed pea burgers
description: black eyed pea burgers with smoked paprika, shallots, carrots, garlic, panko breadcrumbs, herbs and spices . easy affordable vegetarian entree . kosher.
ner: dried black eyed peas, salt, divided, shallots, chopped, carrots, , tomato paste, garlic, , fresh dill, , flat leaf parsley, , eggs, smoked paprika, turmeric, black pepper, cayenne, panko breadcrumbs, grapeseed or olive oil for frying
ingredients: 1 lb dried black eyed peas, 1 3/4 tsp salt, divided, 4 shallots, chopped, 4 carrots, , 3 tbsp tomato paste, 2 cloves garlic, , 1/3 cup fresh dill, , 1/3 cup flat leaf parsley, , 5 large eggs, 1 tbsp smoked paprika, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp cayenne, 1 1/2 cups panko breadcrumbs, grapeseed or olive oil for frying
steps: rinse and sort the black eyed peas in a colander, removing any stones or impurities . drain.add the peas to a pot and cover with 3 inches of water . bring to a boil for 3 minutes . remove from heat and let the peas soak for 1 hour . drain the peas and rinse them in cold water . return them to the pot and cover again with 3 inches of water along with 1 tsp of salt . bring to a boil . simmer the peas for 30 40 minutes till soft but not mushy . drain in a colander shake the colander to get rid of as much excess water as possible.return the peas to the hot pot and let them dry out a bit while you prepare the other ingredients . heat 1 tbsp olive or grapeseed oil in a skillet over medium heat . add the chopped shallots and saute for 3 4 minutes till they begin to turn golden . add the chopped carrots and continue to saute for 4 5 minutes till softened . add the garlic and saute for 1 more minute till fragrant . add tomato paste to the skillet and stir, blending with the other ingredients, for 1 2 minutes longer . remove from heat . place the vegetables in a food processor along with the cooked, drained black eyed peas, flat leaf parsley, fresh dill, eggs, 3/4 tsp salt, and spices . note if your food processor is on the small side, you may need to process the mixture in batches . pulse for 30 45 seconds, scraping the sides of the processor periodically, to form a thick, crumbly paste similar to a roughly textured hummus . don't over process pour the black eyed pea mixture into a large mixing bowl . stir in the panko breadcrumbs with a fork . form the mixture into compact patties using 1/2 cup of mixture per patty . if the patties aren't holding together well, add more panko till they do . pour olive or grapeseed oil into a nonstick skillet to cover the bottom of the skillet in my very large skillet, i use about 1/3 cup of oil . heat over medium till hot enough for frying . fry the patties in batches of 3 for 3 4 minutes on each side, till both sides of the patties are golden brown and crisp . serve hot burgers on warm toasted buns with lettuce, tomatoes, and your favorite hamburger fixings . i really like these topped with mayonnaise, avocado, and sliced dill pickles . a slice of cheese wouldn't hurt, either, if you don't mind adding dairy to the mix . delish

name: sopa de ajo garlic soup
description: food52
ner: olive oil, large garlic cloves, bread, spanish paprika, water, salt, bay leaves, eggs
ingredients: 2.0 olive oil, 8.0 large garlic cloves, 1.0 cup bread, 0.5 teaspoon spanish paprika, 6.0 cup water, 2.0 teaspoon salt, 4.0 bay leaves, 3.0 eggs
steps: boil your water with the bay leaves and 2 teaspoons salt . once it boils, keep it at a simmer . meanwhile, heat oil in a pot over low/medium low heat . add garlic and cook until fragrant but not brown, about 5 minutes . add bread cubes . cook, stirring frequently so the garlic doesn't burn, 2 to 3 more minutes . add the paprika and stir to coat everything . add boiling water do not remove bay leaves . simmer for 20 minutes . taste the broth, and add salt as needed . remove bay leaves . stir the soup pot in wide circles, and slowly stream the beaten eggs into the pot . you want them to turn into wisps and ribbons, not clumps, so keep stirring for a few extra seconds, after everything is added . serve immediately.

name: chicken and lentil soup
description: this delicious, hearty chicken and lentil soup made withcilantro, cumin and spices is perfect for warming your belly on those cold winter nights . what's more, it's easy to make, economical and very satisfying.
ner: dried lentils, 3 boneless skinless chicken thighs, all fat trimmed, water, chicken better than bouillon, small onion, scallions, chopped cilantro, garlic, medium ripe tomato, garlic powder, cumin, oregano, ground annato, salt
ingredients: 1 lb dried lentils, 12 oz 3 boneless skinless chicken thighs, all fat trimmed, 8 cups water, 1 tbsp chicken better than bouillon, 1 small onion, 2 scallions, 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, 3 cloves garlic, 1 medium ripe tomato, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1/4 tsp oregano, 1/4 tsp ground annato, salt
steps: in a large pot combine lentils, chicken, water and chicken bullion . bring to a boil, covered over medium low heat until chicken is cooked, about 20 minutes . remove the chicken and shred, return to the pot meanwhile, in a chopper or by hand, mince the onions, scallions, cilantro, garlic, and tomato . add to the lentils with garlic powder, cumin, oregano and annato and cook, covered until the lentils are soft, about 25 more minutes, adding more water as needed if too thick . adjust salt to taste as needed.

name: salad for a day at the beach
description: you have been invited to a party or potluck and you want to provide the perfect palate pleasing appetizer . this recipe for salad for a day at the beach combines the rich and delicious flavors that will melt in your mouth . these savory cakes are packed with flavor and make the perfect party appetizer . be sure to pick these ingredients up the next time you go shopping so you can surprise your friends with your culinary skills.
ner: chickpeas, crab sticks, palm hearts, octopus, prawns, carrots, green beans, pickles, salt, vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, spanish paprika
ingredients: 350.0 gram chickpeas, 6.0 crab sticks, 3.0 palm hearts, 200.0 gram octopus, 100.0 gram prawns, 2.0 carrots, 4.0 green beans, pickles, salt, vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, spanish paprika
