name: savory chinese rice noodle salad
description: http //lightorangebean.com/savory chinese rice noodle salad/
ner: water, mung bean sprouts, rice noodles, canola oil, garlic, salt, sesame oil, cucumber, red wine vinegar, soy sauce, broth, chili oil
ingredients: 5.0 cup water, 5.0 ounce mung bean sprouts, 6.0 ounce rice noodles, 1.0 teaspoon canola oil, 1.0 clove garlic, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.5 teaspoon sesame oil, 3.0 ounce cucumber, 2.0 tablespoon red wine vinegar, 1.0 teaspoon soy sauce, 3.0 tablespoon broth, 1.0 tablespoon chili oil
steps: add water in a saucepan . bring it to a rolling boil . add bean spouts and count for 5 seconds . use a pasta ladle to transfer the bean spouts from the hot water to a colander, rinse with cold water immediately, set aside . add uncooked noodles to the saucepan . cook for 7 minutes and stir occasionally . or follow the package instructions . rinse the noodles with cold water in a colander . place in the mixing bowl . add canola oil and toss gently . while noodles are cooking, mash garlic with a knife or cheese grater . place in a bowl . add a pinch of salt and sesame oil . cut cucumber into strips, approximately 1/8 inch thick and 3 inches long . 7. combine all ingredients and gently toss . serve immediately . notes 1. if the rice noodles are cooked in advance, slightly warm them up in microwave oven before adding all the other ingredients . 2. recipes for the spice broth and chili oil are available on http //lightorangebean.com

name: new england corn chowder
description: new england corn chowder with canadian style bacon, butter, flour, basil leaves, salt, white pepper, chicken broth, water, potatoes, carrots, green onions, frozen corn
ner: canadian style bacon, butter, flour, basil leaves, salt, white pepper, chicken broth, water, potatoes, carrots, green onions, frozen corn
ingredients: 8.0 ounce canadian style bacon, 0.2 cup butter, 0.2 cup flour, 0.2 teaspoon basil leaves, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon white pepper, 14.5 ounce chicken broth, 0.5 cup water, 2.0 cup potatoes, 1.0 cup carrots, 0.5 cup green onions, 1.5 cup frozen corn
steps: melt butter in large saucepan over medium heat . stir in flour, seasonings, chicken broth and water . cook and stir until mixture thickens and boils . stir in potatoes, carrots and onions . bring to a boil simmer 5 10 minutes or until vegetables are crisp tender . stir in frozen corn, canadian style bacon and half and half . cook until very hot but not boiling.

name: skinny caesar dressing
description: an easy, creamy, egg less caesar salad dressing using the core ingredients which make up the classic lemon parmesan anchovies, then lightened up with greek yogurt.
ner: grated parmigiano reggiano, fresh lemon juice, small garlic clove, dijon mustard, anchovy fillets, extra virgin olive oil, fat free greek yogurt
ingredients: 1/3 cup grated parmigiano reggiano, 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, 1 small garlic clove, 1/2 tbsp dijon mustard, 2 anchovy fillets, 1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, 5 tbsp fat free greek yogurt
steps: in the bowl of a food processor add the cheese, the lemon juice, garlic clove, mustard and the anchovies . turn the machine on and let it run for 15 to 20 seconds . add the oil and yogurt and let the machine run for another 15 seconds.

name: acv pickling spice thankgiving turkey brine
description: take that frozen turkey out of the freezer and pop it into this delicious brine for the perfect bird apple cider vinegar, pickling spices, sugar, salt, peppercorn, parsley, sage, rosemary, thyme.
ner: turkey, water, apple cider vinegar, maple syrup, himalayan pink salt, ground sage, ground thyme, ground rosemary, parsley, pickling spices
ingredients: 1.0 turkey, 1.0 gallon water, 1.0 cup apple cider vinegar, 1.5 cup maple syrup, 0.8 cup himalayan pink salt, ground sage, 2.0 ground thyme, 1.0 ground rosemary, 1.0 parsley, 2.0 pickling spices
steps: bring 3 1/2 cups of water to a boil in a saucepan, add the salt, take off the heat and add 8 cups of cold water add all spices, apple cider vinegar, and maple syrup to the brine shove your frozen bird into the brine in a large container to cover it and refrigerate for 2 3 days rinse off bird after done in the brine and season, stuff skin with butter, stuff turkey if wanted and bake a few hours 13 mins per lb of turkey at 350 degrees f cover with foil first hour and uncover and cook 2 more hours

name: roe salad with coriander and grapefruit sauce
description: look for frozen packages of cod roe in specialty markets or you may need to order them online or ask your local fishmonger for a source . the roe is boiled and then sliced and served with blanched potatoes, chickpeas, tomatoes, and onion on a platter, with cilantro and grapefruit as garnishes . a sauce is made by blending together cilantro with olive oil and grapefruit juice.
ner: cod roe, potatoes, chickpeas, tomatoes, onion, coriander, grapefruit, salt, extra virgin olive oil
ingredients: 1.0 cod roe, 1.0 kilogram potatoes, 2.0 can chickpeas, 2.0 tomatoes, 1.0 onion, 1.0 bunch coriander, 1.0 grapefruit, salt, extra virgin olive oil
steps: boil the roe in water seasoned with salt until opaque . drain, let cool and slice . peel the potatoes, cut into cubes and cook in water seasoned with salt . drain and cool . on a large serving platter, arrange the potatoes, chickpeas, roe, tomato wedges and chopped onion . garnish with coriander leaves and grapefruit sections . for the dressing place the coriander, olive oil, salt and juice of half a grapefruit . serve the salad drizzled with the dressing.

name: far east shrimp kabobs
description: far east shrimp kabobs with wish bone italian dressing, honey, soy sauce, ground ginger, uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, sliced green onions
ner: wish bone italian dressing, honey, soy sauce, ground ginger, uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, sliced green onions
ingredients: 1.0 cup wish bone italian dressing, 2.0 tablespoon honey, 2.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 0.2 teaspoon ground ginger, 2.0 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, 4.0 sliced green onions
steps: for marinade, combine wish bone italian dressing, honey, soy sauce and ginger . pour 3/4 cup marinade over shrimp and green onions in large, shallow nonaluminum baking dish or plastic bag toss to coat . cover, or close bag, and marinate in refrigerator, turning occasionally, 15 minutes to 3 hours . refrigerate remaining 1/2 cup marinade . remove shrimp and green onions from marinade, discarding marinade . alternately thread shrimp and green onions on skewers . grill or broil, turning once and brushing occasionally with refrigerated marinade, until shrimp turn pink.

name: chocolate mug cake
description: chocolate mug cake with cocoa powder, flour, sugar, milk, olive oil, egg, baking powder
ner: cocoa powder, flour, sugar, milk, olive oil, egg, baking powder
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon cocoa powder, 2.0 tablespoon flour, 2.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 tablespoon milk, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 egg, 0.3 teaspoon baking powder
steps: add all ingredients in a mug and mix very well put in the microwave for 1 2 minutes.

name: mountain man burger
description: mountain man burger with rye bread, bacon, canadian bacon, beef, salt, peppered, tomato, onion, lettuce, egg, cheese, thousand island, mayonnaise
ner: rye bread, bacon, canadian bacon, beef, salt, peppered, tomato, onion, lettuce, egg, cheese, thousand island, mayonnaise
ingredients: 2.0 slice rye bread, 3.0 slice bacon, 2.0 slice canadian bacon, beef, salt, peppered, tomato, 0.2 onion, lettuce, 1.0 egg, cheese, thousand island, mayonnaise
steps: in one pan, start frying your onion in a little oil, stirring occasionally until brown and a little soft . in a larger pan, cook the bacon and ham until they begin to brown, then remove . in the larger pan add the patties, flipping as necessary . when they are almost done, put the cheese on top and cover . in the smaller pan, fry an egg, breaking the yoke and cooking until medium . on the lower slice of rye, put mayonnaise, lettuce and onions . layer on tomato, meat, cheese, pork and pork products . put thousand island on the top slice and you have your mountain man burger . you may well want to split it with someone you like.

name: pickle ham and swiss chicken roll ups cuban chicken
description: these pickle, ham and swiss chicken roll ups came to me after having a serious pickle craving
ner: 1 lb thin boneless chicken cutlets, pickle juice, deli mustard, thin sliced reduced sodium deli ham, shredded swiss cheese, dill pickles, olive oil spray, large egg, seasoned wheat or gluten free breadcrumbs, seasoned wheat or gluten free panko, cooking spray
ingredients: 4 1 lb thin boneless chicken cutlets, 1 1/4 cups pickle juice, 4 teaspoons deli mustard, 2 oz thin sliced reduced sodium deli ham, 2 oz shredded swiss cheese, 1 2 dill pickles, olive oil spray, 1 large egg, 1/3 cup seasoned wheat or gluten free breadcrumbs, 1/3 cup seasoned wheat or gluten free panko, cooking spray
steps: place chicken in a shallow bowl and cover with pickle juice enough to cover completely . marinate in the refrigerator 8 hours . after 8 hours, drain and dry the chicken completely on paper towels discard marinade . preheat oven to 425f . spray a baking sheet with oil . spread 1 teaspoon of mustard over each piece of chicken . layer the ham on top, then the swiss cheese and pickles along the center and roll . place egg in a medium bowl . in a shallow bowl, combine the bread crumbs and panko . dip chicken in the egg wash, then into the breadcrumb mixture and shake off excess . transfer to the prepared baking sheet and spray the top generously with oil . bake 25 minutes, until golden outside and cooked through.

name: triple chocolate almond mandelbrot
description: a decadent recipe for triple chocolate almond mandelbrot, also known as mandelbread . nutty, cocoa rich chocolate chip dough dipped in chocolate.
ner: eggs, sugar, canola oil, pure vanilla extract, salt, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, coarsely chopped or sliced almonds, chocolate chips or chunks semisweet, dark, or white, dark or semisweet chocolate, chopped for melting
ingredients: 3 large eggs, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup canola oil, 1 1/2 tsp pure vanilla extract, 1/4 tsp salt, 3 cups flour, 1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 tsp baking powder, 1 cup coarsely chopped or sliced almonds, 1 cup chocolate chips or chunks semisweet, dark, or white, 12 oz dark or semisweet chocolate, chopped for melting
steps: using your electric mixer, mix together eggs, sugar, canola oil, vanilla and salt on medium high speed until well combined . in a separate bowl, sift together flour, cocoa powder, and baking powder . gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet, mixing on medium low after each addition, until a smooth, sticky dough forms . add the almonds and chocolate chips and use the mixer to incorporate them into the dough . place the dough in a bowl that will easily fit in your refrigerator.cover the dough with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator . let the dough chill for at least 2 hours . you can chill it up to 48 hours before baking . when ready to bake, preheat your oven to 350 degrees f and line a baking sheet with parchment paper . slice the dough into four equal sections inside the bowl . lightly grease your hands with canola oil . take the 4 sections of chilled dough and form 4 long, thick rows or rectangles on the baking sheet . each row should be about 3 1/2 inches wide . make sure you leave at least 1 inch between rows, as they will expand during baking . i usually put the fourth row on a second baking sheet so there is plenty of extra room for spreading . you can squeeze them all on one sheet if you prefer, but you might want to make the rows a bit narrower . bake mandelbrot for 25 minutes . i like to line my baking sheet with parchment paper for easy cleanup . take mandelbrot out of the oven and let the oven cool to 275 degrees f . while oven is cooling, slice the 4 rows into 1/2 inch wide biscotti sized slices . put the slices cut side down back onto the cookie, then bake at 275 degrees f for another 20 minutes, or until crisp . the longer they stay in the oven, the crisper they'll be . keep an eye on the texture and don't over bake, or the mandelbrot will dry out . remove from the oven and allow to cool completely on a rack . slowly melt the dark or semisweet chocolate in a double boiler or in the microwave till smooth . dip the mandelbrot into the chocolate . there are two ways to do this . the first way which dries the prettiest works best with a rack . line the surface below the rack with paper to protect your countertop . take a mandelbrot and dip the upper mounded half of the mandelbrot lengthwise into the chocolate . turn the wet chocolate coated side up and place it on the rack to dry . for the second dipping method, you'll need a baking sheet lined with parchment or wax paper . melt the chocolate in a narrow container, so the chocolate pool is deep . dip the mandebrot endwise to coat the lower half of each piece with chocolate . let the excess chocolate drip off the bottom of the mandelbrot . place the chocolate dipped pieces onto the paper lined sheet and allow to dry . you'll need to leave the pieces for at least one hour to dry they may take longer depending on the weather . you can put the pieces in the refrigerator if you want them to firm up more quickly . store in an airtight container up to five days . for a longer shelf life, wrap each individual cookie in foil, place in a sealed plastic bag, and freeze for up to three weeks.

name: lemon meringue yogurt cup
description: reminiscent of a lemon meringue pie, but much easier, this delicious yogurt cup is just the perfect snack
ner: yoplait greek 2 lemon meringue yogurt, lemon curd, marshmallow creme, graham cracker squares
ingredients: 5.3 ounce yoplait greek 2 lemon meringue yogurt, 1.0 tablespoon lemon curd, 0.2 cup marshmallow creme, graham cracker squares
steps: set oven control to broil . spoon yogurt into ovenproof 6 oz custard cup . carefully spoon lemon curd onto center of yogurt . spray 1/4 cup measuring cup and small rubber spatula with cooking spray before measuring marshmallow creme . top lemon curd and yogurt with marshmallow creme . place custard cup on pan . broil with top 5 inches from heat 1 to 2 minutes or until golden brown watch carefully . serve immediately with graham crackers.

name: tagliatelle met ham
description: tagliatelle met ham with tagliatelle, ham, knoflook, wortel, bleekselderij, margarine, knorr kruidenpasta spaghetti bolognese, kaas
ner: tagliatelle, ham, knoflook, wortel, bleekselderij, margarine, knorr kruidenpasta spaghetti bolognese, kaas
ingredients: 300.0 gram tagliatelle, 2.0 ham, 2.0 clove knoflook, 150.0 gram wortel, 2.0 stalk bleekselderij, 25.0 gram margarine, 1.0 container knorr kruidenpasta spaghetti bolognese, 50.0 gram kaas
steps: kook de tagliatelle beetgaar volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . snijd de ham in blokjes en snipper de knoflook . snijd de wortel en de bleekselderij in reepjes . verhit de margarine en bak de hamblokjes even aan . bak de knoflook, de wortel en de bleekselderij even mee . voeg 400 ml water en de kruidenpasta toe . breng de saus al roerend aan de kook en laat alles 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken . serveer de tagliatelle met de saus en de geraspte kaas.

name: korean bulgogi
description: you don't need to go to a korean bbq restaurant or have a korean grandma to enjoy this deeply flavorful version of bulgogi korean grilled beef . in fact, you can pull it off on a weeknight . the only secret for great salty sweet flavor is to put the meat in the simple marinade at least 8 hours ahead . we've gone for lean and economical flank steak here instead of the more traditional and pricier short rib . and to keep things extra easy, we cooked the meat on a grill pan rather than firing up the grill . add a pot of rice if you'd like a more filling meal, and lettuce leaves if you want to make wraps . the recipe is a yummly original created by julia lee https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/julia lee .
ner: flank steak, garlic cloves, mirin, soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, light brown sugar, salt, freshly ground black pepper, flank steak, vegetable oil, green onions, steamed rice, red leaf lettuce, kimchi
ingredients: 1.5 pound flank steak, 2.0 garlic cloves, 0.2 cup mirin, 3.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 2.0 tablespoon toasted sesame oil, 4.0 teaspoon light brown sugar, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1.5 pound flank steak, 1.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 3.0 green onions, steamed rice, 1.0 head red leaf lettuce, kimchi
steps: lay steak flat and seal in a shallow lidded container or sheet of plastic wrap . freeze about 30 minutes to make slicing easier . make the marinade thinly slice garlic and put in a shallow mixing bowl . add mirin, soy sauce, sesame oil, brown sugar, salt, and pepper and stir until sugar dissolves . slice steak on a diagonal across the grain into 1/4 inch thick slices . add steak to marinade and mix until each slice is well coated . cover bowl and refrigerate at least 8 hours and up to 24 hours, turning meat occasionally in marinade . heat a grill pan or large frying pan over medium high heat until hot . brush oil onto the grates . grill steak flat in a single layer in 2 3 batches, turning as needed, until steak is lightly charred and cooked through, 1 3 minutes total . if using a frying pan, add oil if needed to prevent sticking . transfer meat to a serving platter as it is done . slice green onions on a diagonal and scatter over bulgogi . serve beef with rice, lettuce, and kimchi if you like.

name: ham salad with hot peanut dressing
description: this thai inspired salad is a new makeover for leftover ham that won't have your family saying, "ham...again " use variety of different lettuce greens and sprinkle with roasted nuts for an added crunch . this entree salad needs only hot bread or breadsticks to complete the menu.
ner: boneless ham, vegetable oil, peanut butter, lime juice, soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic, sugar, cucumber, red onion, romaine lettuce, radicchio, watercress, mandarin orange segments, roasted peanuts
ingredients: 0.8 pound boneless ham, 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 0.5 cup peanut butter, 3.0 tablespoon lime juice, 1.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 1.0 teaspoon ground ginger, 1.0 clove garlic, 1.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 cucumber, 0.5 red onion, 6.0 cup romaine lettuce, 1.0 head radicchio, 1.0 bunch watercress, 11.0 ounce mandarin orange segments, roasted peanuts
steps: in medium saucepan combine oil, peanut butter, lime juice, soy sauce, ginger, garlic and sugar . over low heat stir to dissolve sugar and heat through . in large bowl toss together cucumber, onion, romaine or endive, and watercress . line plates with radicchio, top with tossed vegetables, ham and orange sections . drizzle with dressing . sprinkle with roasted peanuts, if desired.

name: juicy oven baked cajun chicken breasts
description: add a little heat to your plate with this simple, southern inspired chicken breast recipe . the recipe is a yummly original created by edwina clark https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/edwina clark .
ner: boneless skinless chicken breasts, extra virgin olive oil, onion powder, garlic powder, dried oregano, black pepper, dried thyme, cayenne pepper, paprika, salt
ingredients: 2.0 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, 4.0 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil, 1.0 teaspoon onion powder, 1.0 teaspoon garlic powder, 1.0 teaspoon dried oregano, 1.0 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 teaspoon dried thyme, 0.5 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 2.0 teaspoon paprika, 1.0 teaspoon salt
steps: preheat the oven to 425degf . line a large sheet pan with parchment paper . combine the onion powder, garlic powder, dried oregano, black pepper, dried thyme, cayenne, paprika, and salt in a medium mixing bowl or shallow baking dish . coat the chicken breasts in the spice mixture one at a time, and transfer to the prepared sheet pan . drizzle the olive oil over the chicken breasts . bake on middle rack of oven until the thickest part of the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165degf, about 20 minutes . check to see that chicken is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the chicken to rest for 5 minutes before serving.

name: tagliatelle met pittige garnalen
description: tagliatelle met pittige garnalen with tagliatelle, sjalotten, knoflook, peper, basilicum, champignons, margarine, knorr mix voor spaghetti con funghi, garnalen
ner: tagliatelle, sjalotten, knoflook, peper, basilicum, champignons, margarine, knorr mix voor spaghetti con funghi, garnalen
ingredients: 300.0 gram tagliatelle, 2.0 sjalotten, 1.0 clove knoflook, 0.5 peper, 3.0 sprig basilicum, 100.0 gram champignons, 25.0 gram margarine, 1.0 bag knorr mix voor spaghetti con funghi, 250.0 gram garnalen
steps: kook de tagliatelle beetgaar zoals aangegeven op de verpakking . snipper de sjalotten en hak de knoflook fijn . verwijder de zaden van de peper en snijd de peper en de basilicum in reepjes . snijd de champignons in plakjes . verhit de margarine en fruit de sjalot, de knoflook en de rode peper ca . 2 minuten . bak de champignons even mee . voeg 500 ml water, de inhoud van het zakje knorr mix en de garnalen toe en schep alles goed om . breng de saus al roerend aan de kook . zet het vuur laag, doe de basilicum erbij en laat de saus 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken . serveer de pasta met de saus.

name: refined sugar free gluten free sweet potato casserole
description: no refined white sugar is needed for this rich pecan topped, maple sweetened casserole.
ner: sweet potatoes, nonstick cooking spray, butter, maple syrup, heavy cream, ground cinnamon, salt, black pepper, eggs, pecans, maple syrup, flaky sea salt
ingredients: 4.0 pound sweet potatoes, nonstick cooking spray, 0.2 cup butter, 6.0 tablespoon maple syrup, 6.0 tablespoon heavy cream, 1.0 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon black pepper, 3.0 eggs, 1.5 cup pecans, 0.2 cup maple syrup, flaky sea salt
steps: poke holes all over sweet potatoes with a fork, then place them on a large microwave safe plate . microwave on high for 15 20 minutes, until potatoes are very fork tender . microwave in batches if necessary . carefully remove plate from the microwave and allow sweet potatoes to rest for about 15 minutes, or until cool enough to handle . preheat oven to 375degf . spray a 9x13 inch casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray . scoop sweet potato flesh from the skins and place in a large mixing bowl . discard skins . add butter, maple syrup, cream, cinnamon, salt, and pepper . mash the mixture with a potato masher or mixer until it is smooth and creamy . add eggs to the bowl . stir to combine with sweet potato mixture until smooth . transfer sweet potato mixture to prepared casserole dish and smooth mixture into an even layer . place pecans and maple syrup in a bowl and stir to coat nuts . sprinkle nut mixture evenly over sweet potatoes . sprinkle lightly with flaky sea salt, if desired . bake casserole for 30 35 minutes on the middle rack of oven, until nuts are toasted and dish is gently bubbling at the edges . check to see that casserole is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow sweet potato casserole to rest for 5 10 minutes before serving.

name: chinese meat filled buns baozi
description: baozi is a traditional chinese dish consisting of steamed buns with a variety of filling options . these baozi are filled with a savory pork filling featuring soy sauce, ginger, and garlic . you will need a steamer for these tasty buns . make sure you also leave yourself plenty of time for preparation as both the filling and dough need time to rest . ensuring enough time for the yeast to work before steaming is vital for light fluffy buns.
ner: ground pork, spring onions, shiitake mushrooms, fresh ginger, garlic, soy sauce, oyster sauce, rice wine, sugar, sesame oil, pork lard, warm water, flour, baking powder, yeast, sugar, salt, cold water
ingredients: 300.0 gram ground pork, 2.0 spring onions, 3.0 shiitake mushrooms, 1.0 teaspoon fresh ginger, 3.0 clove garlic, 2.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 1.0 tablespoon oyster sauce, 1.0 tablespoon rice wine, 1.0 teaspoon sugar, 0.5 teaspoon sesame oil, 3.0 tablespoon pork lard, 190.0 milliliter warm water, 400.0 gram flour, 1.5 teaspoon baking powder, 2.0 teaspoon yeast, 3.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 50.0 milliliter cold water
steps: mix together all the ingredients for the filling and leave to rest in the refrigerator for 1 hour . place in a large bowl or food mixer 375 grams flour, baking powder, yeast, sugar, and salt . add the warm water and melted lard, and mix into a dough . add the cold water all at once and continue to mix for 8 minutes until the dough is smooth and elastic . add more flour as necessary, a little at a time, if the dough is too sticky . shape into a dough ball and leave to rest for 30 minutes . knead the dough to allow the air to escape . take small portions of dough and shape into balls of approximately 40 grams . press into small circles of 10 cm . place a tbsp . of filling into the center of the dough and close up into a parcel . pinch the edges together to ensure a complete seal . repeat with the remaining dough and filling . on a floured surface, leave the buns to rise for 20 minutes, covered with a clean towel . heat the water in the steamer and place each bun on a sheet of greaseproof paper, alternatively on banana leaves, to ensure the buns do not stick to the steamer . take care to place the buns separately so they do not stick together during cooking . steam for 15 20 minutes or until the surface is firm and shiny, and they appear to break up like bread rolls . serve immediately with soy sauce . leftovers may be frozen and reheated in the microwave on medium heat.

name: our daily dal
description: dal is the comfort food of south asia . mixed hulled or split lentils and peas of all sorts are cooked to a soup like consistency and served with steaming white rice, pickles/acchaari, a fresh chutney/chatni, a serving of sabzi/vegetables, and perhaps some roti or pappadums . dal is a healthy, affordable, protein and fiber rich staple of south asian cuisines . this is our "usual" recipe, it's super simple and very tasty
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: in a large, heavy bottomed pot over medium heat ghee or cooking oil . fry diced onion for 3 minutes or until translucent . add tomatoes, green chilis, garlic paste, and salt while continuing to fry for 3 more minutes or until tomatoes are softened . stir in kashmiri mirch and turmeric powder, fry for 2 minutes . add dals to frying mixture plus 8 c water . bring to boil over high heat . reduce to medium heat and allow to simmer uncovered for 40 to 45 minutes . stir about every 10 minutes to make sure no dal sticks to the bottom of the pan . add more water if necessary . if dal is to desired thickness, salt to taste and your dal is ready . if you wish your dal to be thinner, add more water . if you wish your dal to be thicker continue cooking until liquid evaporates to desired consistency . the mattar dal/split yellow peas are supposed to remain a bit chewy while the masoor dal/red lentils and moong dal/hulled green gram render to a soupy texture.

name: heirloom tomato salad
description: a simple summer tomato salad made with heirloom tomatoes, kalamata olives, red onion, extra virgin olive oil and garden fresh basil.
ner: medium ripe tomatoes, red onion, extra virgin olive oil, kalamata olives, fresh basil, kosher salt and fresh pepper
ingredients: 4 medium ripe tomatoes, 1/4 cup red onion, 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, 8 kalamata olives, fresh basil, kosher salt and fresh pepper
steps: in a bowl combine onions, olive oil, salt and pepper . let it marinate about 5 10 minutes . slice the tomatoes and arrange on a plate . pour olive oil and onions on top and season with additional salt and pepper . top with fresh basil . divide equally in 4 plates.

name: portobello and artichoke risotto
description: the wonderful part about portobello and artichoke risotto is that it is versatile and hearty . it is a wonderful base for any dish and the texture adds so much to a meal . this recipe for portobello and artichoke risotto is rich and flavorful . if you are searching for a fish dish that is creamy, packed with nutrients and has a hearty flavor, then try this meal . we hope you and your loved ones enjoy it as much as we do.
ner: carnaroli rice, artichoke, portobello mushroom, onion, grated parmesan cheese, dry white wine, chicken broth, ham, salt, ground black pepper, olive oil
ingredients: 80.0 gram carnaroli rice, 1.0 artichoke, 1.0 portobello mushroom, 1.0 onion, grated parmesan cheese, dry white wine, 260.0 milliliter chicken broth, ham, salt, ground black pepper, olive oil
steps: heat broth in a large pot and bring to a boil . finely dice green onion and peeled artichoke . saute green onion in a pan with a tablespoon of olive oil . reduce heat, add rice and cook for a couple of minutes . pour in a little dry white wine, and start adding the stock, constantly stirring rice . once all the stock is added, simmer for 16 minutes, stirring occasionally . season with salt and pepper . while the rice is cooking, saute diced portobello in a skillet . when mushrooms are cooked, remove and set aside . fry the artichoke previously cleaned and sliced until golden brown . set aside . fry the ham . set aside . when the rice is done, add some grated parmesan cheese and stir . to assemble, use a pastry ring . put the rice in the ring, cover with artichoke and top with portobello mushroom . garnish with fried ham.

name: greek cucumber spiral salad
description: greek cucumber spiral salad with english cucumber, grape tomatoes, chopped tomatoes, pitted kalamata olives, red onion, feta cheese, lemon juice, red wine vinegar, kosher salt, pepper, dried oregano, dill, olive oil
ner: english cucumber, grape tomatoes, chopped tomatoes, pitted kalamata olives, red onion, feta cheese, lemon juice, red wine vinegar, kosher salt, pepper, dried oregano, dill, olive oil
ingredients: 1.0 english cucumber, 1.0 pint grape tomatoes, 2.0 cup chopped tomatoes, 0.3 cup pitted kalamata olives, 0.2 cup red onion, 3.0 ounce feta cheese, 1.0 tablespoon lemon juice, 1.0 tablespoon red wine vinegar, 0.8 teaspoon kosher salt, 0.2 teaspoon pepper, 0.5 teaspoon dried oregano, 2.0 teaspoon dill, 0.2 cup olive oil
steps: attach spiralizer attachment to the kitchenaid stand mixer . trim the ends of cucumber . center cucumber on fruit and vegetable skewer attach to spiralizer . attach small core slicing blade and position at end of cucumber . turn stand mixer to speed 4 and process until blade reaches end of cucumber . slice the sliced cucumber in half to create individual slices . place tomatoes, olives, onion and sliced cucumber in a large bowl . whisk together all the dressing ingredients except the olive oil in a small bowl . slowly add the oil into mixture while whisking . toss the dressing with the salad, top with feta cheese and serve.

name: groene spinazie doperwtensoep met muntyoghurt
description: groene spinazie doperwtensoep met muntyoghurt with groenten, munt, griekse yoghurt
ner: groenten, munt, griekse yoghurt
ingredients: 1.0 bag groenten, munt, 2.0 tablespoon griekse yoghurt
steps: verwarm de soep volgens de bereidingswijze op de verpakking . hak de munt grof en meng dit door de yoghurt . schenk de soep in soepkommen en doe in iedere kom een eetlepel griekse yoghurt.

name: pbandj banana dogs
description: pbandj banana dogs with jif extra crunchy peanut butter, hot dog rolls, banana, smucker's squeeze strawberry fruit spread, cocktail peanuts
ner: jif extra crunchy peanut butter, hot dog rolls, banana, smucker's squeeze strawberry fruit spread, cocktail peanuts
ingredients: 3.0 tablespoon jif extra crunchy peanut butter, 1.0 whole hot dog rolls, 1.0 banana, smucker's squeeze strawberry fruit spread, 2.0 teaspoon cocktail peanuts
steps: spread peanut butter evenly on inside surface of hot dog roll . place banana in roll . top with desired amount of fruit spread . sprinkle with nuts or raisins.

name: pickle roll up dip
description: compliments of renee hentges 2012 bunco sub.
ner: whipped cream cheese, sliced ham, dill pickles
ingredients: 12.0 ounce whipped cream cheese, 12.0 ounce sliced ham, 16.0 ounce dill pickles
steps: mix together the whipped cream cheese, pickles and meat until well combined . chill until ready to serve . serve with crackers.

name: gegrilde lamskoteletjes met rozemarijn
description: in italiaanse stijl gegrilde lamskoteletjes met rozemarijn . vol van smaak door de knoflook en rozemarijn . een gerecht dat je doet denken aan zomerse avonden . erg lekker als barbecuegerecht of bereid in de oven.
ner: lamskoteletjes, gin, rozemarijn, knoflook, cherrytomaatjes
ingredients: 8.0 lamskoteletjes, 5.0 tablespoon gin, 3.0 sprig rozemarijn, 1.0 clove knoflook, 250.0 gram cherrytomaatjes
steps: wrijf de lamskoteletjes in met zout en peper en besprenkel ze met 2 eetlepels extra vergine olijfolie . laat dit 5 minuten intrekken . hak de rozemarijn of oregano fijn . pel ondertussen de knoflook en snijd de teen in dunne plakjes . verhit 3 eetlepels olijfolie in een koekenpan en fruit hierin de knoflookplakjes heel zachtjes aan . schep de cherrytomaatjes erdoor en voeg de gehakte kruiden en wat zout toe . roerbak de tomaatjes 1 tot 2 minuten . laat de grillpan goed heet worden en rooster hierop de lamskoteletjes in ongeveer 6 minuten aan beiden kanten, zodat ze mooi bruin zijn van buiten en van binnen nog rose . leg de lamskoteletten op 4 voorverwarmde borden en verdeel de tomaten erover.

name: quinoa huevos rancheros bowls
description: eggs are not just for breakfast, i love them for lunch or dinner too this flavorful protein pack breakfast bowl has a mexican flair, topped with salsa verde, black beans, avocados and queso fresco.
ner: cooked quinoa, cooked warm black beans, avocado, lime, kosher salt, nonstick spray, large eggs, salsa verde, sour cream, crumbled queso fresco, fresh cilantro
ingredients: 1 cup cooked quinoa, 2 cups cooked warm black beans, 5 oz avocado, 1 lime, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, nonstick spray, 4 large eggs, 1/2 cup salsa verde, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup crumbled queso fresco, fresh cilantro
steps: spoon quinoa and beans side by side into 4 bowls . top with avocado, season with salt and squeeze lime juice over everything . heat a large skillet over medium low heat, spray with oil and cook eggs to your liking . top each bowl with an egg, salsa verde, queso fresco and drizzle with sour cream . finish with cilantro.

name: turmeric roasted sweet potato and macadamia soup
description: roasted sweet potatoes and red onions are magical in this creamy dairy free soup when combined with macadamia nuts, ginger and a squeeze of lime juice . the crushed macadamia nuts on top are a must
ner: medium red onions, 1kg orange sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks about 6 1/2 cups, extra virgin olive oil, kosher sea salt, 1.9l vegetable broth, minced fresh ginger, ground turmeric, of cayenne pepper, 70g unsalted macadamias, fresh lime wedges, finely chopped fresh cilantro, optional chopped macadamias, for garnish
ingredients: 2 medium red onions, 2 pounds 1kg orange sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks about 6 1/2 cups, 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon kosher sea salt, 8 cups 1.9l vegetable broth, 2 teaspoons minced fresh ginger, 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric, pinch of cayenne pepper, 1/4 cup 70g unsalted macadamias, fresh lime wedges, 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh cilantro, optional chopped macadamias, for garnish
steps: preheat the oven to 375degf . line a large baking sheet with a silicone liner or parchment paper . toss the onions and sweet potatoes in oil and salt and spread out on the prepared baking sheet . roast for about 50 min, until the vegetables are cooked but not burnt . you don't want any black bits . you are going to put them into the pot to boil and cook further . transfer the vegetables to a large saucepan and add the vegetable broth, ginger, turmeric, and cayenne . bring the mixture to a boil, and then reduce the heat to medium high, and simmer, partially covered, for about 15 minutes to allow the flavors to infuse . remove the soup from the heat and stir in the macadamias . allow the mixture to stand for 10 minutes to soften the nuts and cool the soup slightly . pour the soup into your blender in batches and puree on high for 1 to 2 minutes, until smooth and creamy . for conventional blenders, remove the small center lid cap and cover the opening with a kitchen towel so steam can escape while you blend . return the soup to the saucepan, season to taste, and warm it over low heat . to serve, ladle the soup into bowls and add a splash of the lime juice, top with cilantro and macadamias if using.

name: tomato egg scramble
description: recipe for tomato egg scramble with butter and crackers on toast from a 1913 cooking magazine called cooking club . simple breakfast dish.
ner: tomato pulp, well beaten eggs, broken water crackers, butter, melted, toasted bread, salt and pepper to taste, butter or oil for greasing the skillet
ingredients: 1 cup tomato pulp, 5 large well beaten eggs, 1/2 cup broken water crackers, 2 tbsp butter, melted, toasted bread, salt and pepper to taste, butter or oil for greasing the skillet
steps: to make the tomato pulp, rub tomatoes through a sieve or wire mesh strainer . in a mixing bowl, whisk the eggs until they are well beaten . add the tomato pulp, broken crackers and melted butter . whisk to combine . grease a medium skillet and heat over medium . cook the scrambled egg mixture, stirring constantly, until desired doneness . serve over toast.

name: chocolate stuffed cookies baking with eda
description: full recipe http //www.bakingwithnyssaeda.com/2015/02/dark chocolate stuffed cookies.html
ner: softened butter, confectioners sugar, egg white, vanilla sugar, flour, oil
ingredients: 125.0 gm softened butter, 100.0 gm confectioners sugar, 1.0 egg white, 1.0 vanilla sugar, 275.0 gm flour, 60.0 milliliter oil
steps: http //www.bakingwithnyssaeda.com/2015/02/dark chocolate stuffed cookies.html http //www.bakingwithnyssaeda.com/2015/02/dark chocolate stuffed cookies.html

name: skinny no bake chocolate peanut butter cookies
description: these addicting and filling gluten free chocolate peanut butter cookies, made with milk and oats, are perfect for the holidays and no baking is required
ner: sugar, unsweetened cocoa, smart balance light butter, fat free milk, quick oats, better'n peanut butter, vanilla, powdered sugar
ingredients: 2/3 cup sugar, 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa, 2 tbsp smart balance light butter, 1/2 cup fat free milk, 2 1/2 cups quick oats, 3/4 cup better'n peanut butter, 1 tsp vanilla, powdered sugar
steps: combine the first 4 ingredients sugar through milk and boil in a small sauce pan for 2 minutes . remove from heat and mix in oatmeal, better n' peanut butter and vanilla . drop by tablespoons onto a wax paper or roll into balls with slightly moist hands and refrigerate overnight . the next day you can roll them in powdered sugar or cocoa powder if desired . keep refrigerated if storing for several days.

name: maple pecan pie a la mode
description: maple pecan pie a la mode with maple syrup, firmly packed light brown sugar, large eggs, i can't believe it's not butter spread, pecan halves, frozen deep dish pie crust, breyers natural vanilla ice cream
ner: maple syrup, firmly packed light brown sugar, large eggs, i can't believe it's not butter spread, pecan halves, frozen deep dish pie crust, breyers natural vanilla ice cream
ingredients: 1.0 cup maple syrup, 0.5 cup firmly packed light brown sugar, 3.0 large eggs, 2.0 tablespoon i can't believe it's not butter spread, 1.5 cup pecan halves, 1.0 frozen deep dish pie crust, 4.0 cup breyers natural vanilla ice cream
steps: preheat oven to 350deg . combine maple syrup, brown sugar, eggs and i can't believe it's not butter spread in large bowl . stir in pecans . pour into frozen crust . place on baking sheet and bake 50 to 55 minutes or until center is set . cool on wire rack 2 hours . serve topped with breyers natural vanilla ice cream.

name: jamaican me confetti black beans
description: a peaceful collaboration of colorful vegetables, black beans and seasoning that prove no man is an island . i love making variations of this dish to the delight of my non carnivore brethren . the jamaican jerk sauce gives this a light yet distinctive flavor profile.
ner: black beans, jerk sauce, star extra virgin olive oil, roma tomatoes, red onion, brown onion, jalapeno pepper, yellow bell pepper, chopped fresh cilantro, mccormick ground cumin, mccormick oregano leaves, coarse ground black pepper, morton kosher salt, cayenne, limes
ingredients: 15.0 ounce black beans, 2.0 jerk sauce, 1.0 star extra virgin olive oil, 2.0 roma tomatoes, 0.2 red onion, 0.2 brown onion, 2.0 jalapeno pepper, 0.5 yellow bell pepper, 0.5 chopped fresh cilantro, 0.5 mccormick ground cumin, 0.5 mccormick oregano leaves, 0.2 coarse ground black pepper, 0.2 morton kosher salt, 0.1 cayenne, 3.0 limes
steps: open 2 each 15 ounces cans bush's best black beans pour into calendar and rinse with light pressure cold water . use a large skillet on medium high heat . add 1 each ounce star extra virgin olive oil allow to heat for 20 seconds . add 1/4 each diced red onion, 1/4 each diced brown onion, 1/2 each yellow bell pepper and 2 each seeded finely diced jalapeno peppers . cook peppers and onions for 2 to 3 minutes . add spice mix 1/2 each teaspoons mccormick ground cumin and mccormick oregano leaves, 1/4 each teaspoons mccormick coarse ground black pepper and morton kosher salt, and 1/8 each teaspoon mccormick cayenne . squeeze 3 each lime wedges to contents and stir to blend . allow to cook for 2 minutes . add rinsed bush's best black beans and 1 each shot glass 2 ounces starport foods jamaican jerk sauce and stir to blend . allow to cook for 2 minutes . add 2 each diced roma tomatoes and 1/2 each cup chopped fresh cilantro and stir contents until blended and take off heat.

name: cajun shrimp, sausage, and vegetable sheet pan
description: cajun spiced meal with shrimp, sausage, vegetables, and rice.
ner: long grain rice, water, salt, extra virgin olive oil, raw shrimp, pork sausage, zucchini, yellow squash, asparagus, red bell peppers, salt, black pepper, cajun seasoning, extra virgin olive oil
ingredients: 1.5 cup long grain rice, 3.0 cup water, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 1.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 1.0 pound raw shrimp, 14.0 ounce pork sausage, 2.0 zucchini, 2.0 yellow squash, 0.5 bunch asparagus, 2.0 red bell peppers, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.5 teaspoon black pepper, 3.0 tablespoon cajun seasoning, 2.0 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil
steps: combine the rice, water, salt, and olive oil in a rice cooker and cook according to the manufacturer's instructions . when done, hold the cooked rice on the warm setting until ready to serve . preheat the oven to 400degf . in a large mixing bowl combine the shrimp, sausage, zucchini, yellow squash, asparagus, bell peppers, salt, and pepper . add the cajun seasoning and olive oil and toss until coated . spread the mixture evenly between 2 large sheet pans . bake the sheet pan meal on middle rack of oven until shrimp are pink, sausage is cooked through, and vegetables are fork tender, 20 25 minutes . check to see that dish is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow to cool slightly, and serve over the finished rice . leftovers can be stored in an airtight container for up to 1 week.

name: acai almond milk
description: healthy vegan smoothie from anastasia tel aviv with acai powder, maca root, banana, pineapple and date.
ner: banana slices, pineapple chunks, date, , unsweetened almond milk, maca powder, acai powder, salt, vanilla extract, ice cubes
ingredients: 1 1/3 cups banana slices, 2/3 cup pineapple chunks, 1 date, , 3/4 cup unsweetened almond milk, 1 tsp maca powder, 1 tsp acai powder, 1 pinch of salt, 1/4 tsp vanilla extract, 8 ice cubes
steps: blend all ingredients together until smooth and creamy . serve . makes roughly 2 1/2 cups of smoothie two servings of 1 1/4 cup each . note the original recipe from anastasia only includes 3 ice cubes . i prefer 8, which gives it a thicker frothier texture.

name: golden chicken, mushroom and onion salad
description: golden chicken, mushroom and onion salad with country crock spread, onion, sliced mushrooms, boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, wish bone light balsamic basil vinaigrette dressing, mixed salad greens, gorgonzola cheese, bacon
ner: country crock spread, onion, sliced mushrooms, boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, wish bone light balsamic basil vinaigrette dressing, mixed salad greens, gorgonzola cheese, bacon
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon country crock spread, 1.0 onion, 2.0 cup sliced mushrooms, 1.0 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, 0.5 cup wish bone light balsamic basil vinaigrette dressing, 6.0 cup mixed salad greens, 4.0 ounce gorgonzola cheese, 4.0 slice bacon
steps: melt spread in 12 inch skillet over medium high heat and cook onion and mushrooms, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes or until tender . add chicken and cook, stirring occasionally, 7 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked . remove from heat and stir in wish bone light balsamic basil vinaigrette dressing . arrange greens on serving platter . top with chicken mixture, then cheese and bacon . serve, if desired, with additional dressing.

name: pepper and mustard crusted new york chop green garlic potatoes, pig butter au poivre, mache
description: pepper and mustard crusted new york chop green garlic potatoes, pig butter au poivre, mache with new york top loin pork chops, cider vinaigrette, mache, pig butter, thyme, rosemary, water, kosher salt, brown sugar, bay leaves, black peppercorns, thyme, rosemary, star anise, black peppercorns, mustard seed, shallots, garlic, bourbon, bacon fat, peppercorn/mustard mix, pork jowl, lemon zest, salt, yukon gold potatoes, butter, green garlic, kosher salt, cider vinegar, shallots, dijon style mustard, honey, olive oil, salt, pepper
ner: new york top loin pork chops, cider vinaigrette, mache, pig butter, thyme, rosemary, water, kosher salt, brown sugar, bay leaves, black peppercorns, thyme, rosemary, star anise, black peppercorns, mustard seed, shallots, garlic, bourbon, bacon fat, peppercorn/mustard mix, pork jowl, lemon zest, salt, yukon gold potatoes, butter, green garlic, kosher salt, cider vinegar, shallots, dijon style mustard, honey, olive oil, salt, pepper
ingredients: 6.0 new york top loin pork chops, 3.0 tablespoon cider vinaigrette, 6.0 bunch mache, 0.5 cup pig butter, 2.0 sprig thyme, 2.0 sprig rosemary, 8.0 cup water, 0.5 cup kosher salt, 0.5 cup brown sugar, 2.0 bay leaves, 1.0 teaspoon black peppercorns, 5.0 sprig thyme, 5.0 sprig rosemary, 1.0 piece star anise, 0.5 cup black peppercorns, 2.0 tablespoon mustard seed, 2.0 shallots, 1.0 clove garlic, 0.2 cup bourbon, 1.0 tablespoon bacon fat, 1.0 teaspoon peppercorn/mustard mix, 1.0 pound pork jowl, 0.5 teaspoon lemon zest, salt, 2.0 pound yukon gold potatoes, 6.0 tablespoon butter, 0.2 cup green garlic, 1.0 tablespoon kosher salt, 0.2 cup cider vinegar, 3.0 tablespoon shallots, 2.0 teaspoon dijon style mustard, 2.0 teaspoon honey, 0.5 cup olive oil, salt, pepper
steps: brine new york chops for 4 to 6 hours . remove from brine and pat dry . preheat oven to 425 degrees f press chops into mustard seed/peppercorn mixture . place saute pan or flattop griddle on medium high heat and add oil . when pan and oil are hot, place chop in pan and cook for 3 to 4 minutes or until the edges of the steak are golden brown . be careful not to burn the peppercorns . turn the chop over and add a couple tablespoons of butter, sprig of thyme and rosemary to arroser . place in oven for 5 7 minutes or until medium rare to medium about 140 degrees with a three minute rest time . place the potato cake recipe below in hot oiled pan and saute until golden brown on one side . flip and place in oven until heated through, about 4 to 5 minutes . dress cleaned mache with just enough vinaigrette to coat . season and toss . place 4 cups of water in small sauce pot and add remaining ingredients . place on stove on medium heat until salt and sugar are dissolved . add the remaining 4 cups of cold water and allow brine to come to room temperature . place the chop in brine for 4 6 hours . combine peppercorns and mustard seed in small saute pan and lightly toast . carefully place on cutting board, cover with a towel and crush with a mallet or bottom of a pot/pan . the peppercorns should just be cracked . sweat shallots and garlic in the bacon fat . add bourbon and allow the alcohol to evaporate . set aside . cube hog jowl or salt pork and slowly render . i add a touch of water to get this going . you don't want any color . when rendered, strain and place fat in stainless bowl . set this bowl in an ice bath and whisk until it resembles white icing . fold in the remaining ingredients and roll in parchment paper . place in refrigerator to set up until firm . wash potatoes . steam for about 25 minutes or boil until fork tender . place paddle attachment on kitchen aide or hobart mixer . drain potatoes if you boiled them and place in mixer . run mixer on medium speed and add butter, sauteed green garlic and kosher salt . mix thoroughly and taste for seasoning . when mixture is cool enough to handle, weigh out 5 ounce portions and form into cakes . allow to completely cool . combine vinegar, shallots, mustard and honey . whisk in oil, season with a touch of salt and a crank of black pepper . plate the chop, potato and mache . garnish chop with a thin slice of pig butter.

name: seasoned black eyed pea fritters
description: seasoned black eyed pea fritters with sour cream, seasoned salt, pepper, peas, eggs, finely chopped onion, red bell pepper, flour, baking powder, baking soda, vegetable oil
ner: sour cream, seasoned salt, pepper, peas, eggs, finely chopped onion, red bell pepper, flour, baking powder, baking soda, vegetable oil
ingredients: 1.0 cup sour cream, 2.5 teaspoon seasoned salt, 0.2 teaspoon pepper, 2.0 can peas, 2.0 eggs, 1.0 cup finely chopped onion, 0.5 cup red bell pepper, 0.5 cup flour, 0.2 teaspoon baking powder, 0.2 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 cup vegetable oil
steps: mix sour cream, 1/2 teaspoon of the seasoned salt and seasoned pepper in small bowl until well blended . cover . refrigerate until ready to serve . mash black eyed peas in large bowl . stir in remaining ingredients, except oil, until well blended . heat oil in large deep skillet on medium high heat . drop bean mixture into oil by 1/4 cupfuls, flattening slightly . cook fritters, turning once, 7 minutes or until golden brown . drain on paper towels . keep warm while cooking remaining fritters . serve warm fritters with sour cream mixture.

name: house mortadella with mozzarella and robiola encorozza, lard anchovy aoili and spring garnish
description: house mortadella with mozzarella and robiola encorozza, lard anchovy aoili and spring garnish with pork shoulder, tinted curing mix, salt, sugar, garlic powder, white pepper, mace, coriander, nutmeg, nonfat powdered milk, crushed ice, white wine, pork fatback, pistachios, fennel, pickled herbs, anchovies, egg yolks, dijon mustard, lard, garlic, anchovies, capers, lemon juice, salt, pepper, mozzarella cheese, robiola cheese, white bread, mortadella, panko breadcrumbs, thyme leaves, onion powder, garlic powder, all purpose flour, eggs, butter
ner: pork shoulder, tinted curing mix, salt, sugar, garlic powder, white pepper, mace, coriander, nutmeg, nonfat powdered milk, crushed ice, white wine, pork fatback, pistachios, fennel, pickled herbs, anchovies, egg yolks, dijon mustard, lard, garlic, anchovies, capers, lemon juice, salt, pepper, mozzarella cheese, robiola cheese, white bread, mortadella, panko breadcrumbs, thyme leaves, onion powder, garlic powder, all purpose flour, eggs, butter
ingredients: 9071.8 gram pork shoulder, 28.1 gram tinted curing mix, 163.3 gram salt, 79.8 gram sugar, 11.8 gram garlic powder, 16.3 gram white pepper, 11.8 gram mace, 8.2 gram coriander, 4.1 gram nutmeg, 181.4 gram nonfat powdered milk, 453.6 gram crushed ice, 54.4 gram white wine, 1360.8 gram pork fatback, 260.4 gram pistachios, fennel, pickled herbs, anchovies, 2.0 egg yolks, 1.0 tablespoon dijon mustard, 2.0 cup lard, 0.2 cup garlic, 0.5 cup anchovies, 0.5 cup capers, 0.2 cup lemon juice, salt, pepper, 0.2 cup mozzarella cheese, 2.0 tablespoon robiola cheese, 2.0 slice white bread, 2.0 slice mortadella, 1.0 cup panko breadcrumbs, 0.5 teaspoon thyme leaves, 0.8 teaspoon onion powder, 0.1 teaspoon garlic powder, 0.5 cup all purpose flour, 2.0 eggs, 3.0 tablespoon butter
steps: for the mortadella keep all ingredients cold to start . add lean pork shoulder, salt and dry spices to a buffalo chopper and chop for 5 minutes to break down the proteins . add fat pork shoulder, ice and white wine chop until mixture reaches 48degf . remove mixture and fold in blanched fatback and pistachios . using a sausage stuffer with a large nozzle, fill mortadella chubs, tie off and truss lengthwise . poach the finished sausage at 155degf for 2 hours . for the lard aioli put egg yolks in base of blender with dijon mustard . blend on lowest setting while slowly drizzling in warm lard gradually increase speed and stream to emulsify . when fully emulsified, add garlic, anchovies, capers and lemon juice blend to combine . season aioli with salt and pepper to taste . for the grilled cheese in a bowl, combine mozzarella and robiola cheeses . mix with fork or by hand until combined . place mortadella slices on one slice of bread, top with cheese mixture and remaining bread slice . season panko with thyme and onion and garlic powders, then use standard breading procedure with all purpose flour, whisked eggs and seasoned panko to coat the sandwich, covering all edges . heat small saute pan over medium heat and add butter . once it foams, place sandwich in pan and toast until first side is golden brown . flip and baste with butter until both sides and all edges are golden brown and crispy . to serve spoon a circle of lard aioli on the plate . cut grilled cheese in half and plate one half . top with garnish.

name: instant pot refried beans
description: if you love the flavor of refried beans but would rather avoid the lard they are typically cooked in, you'll love this easy, fat free version made in the instant pot.
ner: dried pinto beans, water, yellow onion, garlic, ground cumin, chili powder, freshly ground black pepper, of cayenne pepper, fine sea salt, optional garnish chopped fresh cilantro
ingredients: 1 cup dried pinto beans, 3 cups water, 1/2 yellow onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, pinch of cayenne pepper, 1/2 to 3/4 teaspoon fine sea salt, optional garnish chopped fresh cilantro
steps: combine the drained beans, water, onion, and garlic in the instant pot . stir well, making sure the beans are submerged . secure the lid and move the steam release valve to sealing . select manual/pressure cook to cook at high pressure for 20 minutes . when the cooking cycle is complete, let the pressure naturally release for 10 minutes, then move the steam release valve to venting to release any remaining pressure . when the floating valve drops, remove the lid and drain the beans, reserving the liquid . return the cooked beans to the instant pot, and stir in 1/2 cup of the reserved cooking liquid, along with the cumin, chili powder, black pepper, cayenne, and 1/2 teaspoon salt . use a potato masher to mash the cooked beans until smooth, leaving some texture if you like . you can use an immersion blender for pureed beans, if you prefer . taste and adjust the seasoning, adding more salt as needed, and serve warm with a garnish of cilantro and a squeeze of lime juice . store leftover beans in an airtight container in the fridge for 1 week.

name: pan seared steak with ipa cream sauce
description: pan seared steak with ipa cream sauce with rib eye steaks, steak, india pale ale, cream, butter, rosemary, salt, black pepper, olive oil
ner: rib eye steaks, steak, india pale ale, cream, butter, rosemary, salt, black pepper, olive oil
ingredients: rib eye steaks, steak, india pale ale, cream, butter, rosemary, salt, black pepper, olive oil
steps: 1. coat the steak in olive oil, and season liberally with salt and a lot of black pepper, a touch of rosemary, or other herbs and seasonings you like on steak . allow to come to room temperature, maybe 20 minutes . 2. heat a heavy bottomed skillet with enough olive oil to coat the bottom . should be fairly hot, around the smoke point of the olive oil . 3. sear the steak in the pan on both sides till it looks delicious . if you prefer anything over medium, you might consider finishing it in an oven . 4. remove the steak from the pan and allow to cool while making the sauce . 5. if you've got a lot of oil left in the pan, pour some out . pour in the beer to deglaze the hot pan, making sure to scrape up all the good bits from the bottom of the pan . use maybe 6oz of the ipa . 6. add a splash of cream, 1/4c or so . allow the sauce to reduce in half, seasoning with salt and pepper . 7. remove from heat and whisk in a tablespoon or two of butter . 8. serve however you like it.

name: pizza muffins
description: these grab and go muffins make eating on the run a pleasure.
ner: corn muffin mix, milk, egg, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, sun dried tomatoes
ingredients: 8.5 ounce corn muffin mix, 0.3 cup milk, 1.0 egg, 1.0 cup pepperoni, 0.5 cup mozzarella cheese, 0.2 cup sun dried tomatoes
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . line a muffin pan with 8 paper liners . mix the corn muffin mix, milk and egg together until barely blended and lumpy . gently fold in the pepperoni, mozzarella and tomatoes . scoop into the prepared muffin pan, filling cups about 3/4 full . bake for 15 to 20 minutes, until golden brown and firm to the touch . let cool slightly or serve at room temperature . these can be made in advance and refrigerated in a self sealing plastic bag to prevent dryness . reheat, wrapped loosely in a paper towel, in the microwave just until warm, about 20 seconds on high power.

name: strawberry poke cake
description: a quick and delicious dessert that will be the perfect addition to any family gathering.
ner: yellow cake mix, boiling water, jell o strawberry flavor gelatin, cold water, cool whip whipped topping, vanilla bean, strawberries
ingredients: 1.0 package yellow cake mix, 1.0 cup boiling water, 3.0 ounce jell o strawberry flavor gelatin, 0.5 cup cold water, 1.0 cool whip whipped topping, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla bean, 1.0 container strawberries
steps: preheat oven to the temperature specified on the box . spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray . prepare cake batter per box instructions . pour into pan and bake according to the box cool cake for 15 minutes pierce the cake with a skewer or with a large fork . i poked a bunch of holes in 1/2 inch intervals . prepare your gelatin by bring a cup of water to boil . add the gelatin and mix for 2 minutes . the gelatin should be completely dissolved . add the 1/2 cup cold water . and stir . pour the gelatin mixture over the cake . refrigerate for 3 hours . frost the cake, add sliced strawberries and chill until serving . to make the frosting take the 8 oz container of cool whip and add the 2 tsp . vanilla bean paste . mix well.

name: prosciutto and melon over spring mix
description: prosciutto and melon over spring mix with mixed salad greens, wish bone raspberry hazelnut vinaigrette dressing, watermelon, prosciutto, grated parmesan cheese
ner: mixed salad greens, wish bone raspberry hazelnut vinaigrette dressing, watermelon, prosciutto, grated parmesan cheese
ingredients: 6.0 cup mixed salad greens, 0.2 cup wish bone raspberry hazelnut vinaigrette dressing, 8.0 slice watermelon, 1.0 ounce prosciutto, grated parmesan cheese
steps: toss salad greens with wish bone raspberry hazelnut vinaigrette dressing in large bowl . arrange salad greens on serving plates . top with cantaloupe, prosciutto and cheese . drizzle, if desired, with additional dressing.

name: pork wow
description: linda cifuentes of mahomet created this spicy dish that won first place at illinois state fair
ner: boneless sirloin pork chops, salsa seasoning mix, tomatillos, black olives, green olives, frozen corn kernels, salsa seasoning mix
ingredients: 4.0 boneless sirloin pork chops, 2.0 teaspoon salsa seasoning mix, 1.0 cup tomatillos, 0.5 cup black olives, 0.5 cup green olives, 1.0 cup frozen corn kernels, 1.0 teaspoon salsa seasoning mix
steps: sprinkle 2 teaspoons salsa spice evenly over both sides of pork . heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat until hot . add the pork cook 2 minutes, turn and cook 1 minute top with the remaining ingredients, reduce heat, cover tightly and simmer 20 minutes or until pork is very tender . serves 4 1 pork chop and 1/4 cup corn mixture per serving.

name: southern style barbecue sauce
description: chef louise mellor shares a vintage 1965 recipe for barbecue sauce from "the southern cookbook 250 fine old recipes." bright, tangy, spicy and slightly sweet.
ner: butter or olive oil, finely chopped onion, green pepper, , garlic, , ketchup, chili sauce, water, wine vinegar, sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, prepared horseradish, salt, black pepper, paprika, chili powder
ingredients: 2 tbsp butter or olive oil, 1/4 cup finely chopped onion, 1/4 cup green pepper, , 1 clove garlic, , 1 cup ketchup, 1/2 cup chili sauce, 1/4 cup water, 1/4 cup wine vinegar, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 tbsp worcestershire sauce, 1 tsp prepared mustard, 1/2 tsp prepared horseradish, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp paprika, 1/4 tsp chili powder
steps: heat butter or olive oil in a saucepan . add onion, green pepper, and garlic . cook over medium heat until onion and green pepper are just tender, stirring occasionally . combine remaining ingredients . add to vegetable mixture stir to blend well . bring to a boil, stirring until sugar is dissolved . simmer over low heat 45 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are completely soft and flavors have blended . let sauce cool completely . pour into a mason jar or sealed container and refrigerate . brush on meats before grilling, or use as a condiment.

name: tex mex turnovers
description: as featured at the 2004 international association culinary professionals breakfast . chorizo is a highly seasoned, coarsely ground pork sausage that is widely used in mexican and spanish cooking . look for it in specialty grocery stores or some large supermarkets . serve for breakfast or as part of a brunch buffet with chilaquiles with ham https //www.yummly.com/recipe/chilaquiles with ham 2248012, ham and green chile bite size quiche https //www.yummly.com/recipe/ham and green chile bite size quiche 2248384, and fresh fruit.
ner: chorizo, green onions, black beans, chipotle chile in adobo sauce, nonstick cooking spray, refrigerated pizza dough, manchego cheese, cotija cheese, olive oil, green onions, garlic, diced tomatoes, chipotle chile in adobo sauce, sugar, dried oregano, cumin, cornstarch, cold water
ingredients: 8.0 ounce chorizo, 0.2 cup green onions, 15.0 ounce black beans, 1.0 chipotle chile in adobo sauce, nonstick cooking spray, 20.0 ounce refrigerated pizza dough, 2.7 cup manchego cheese, 1.0 cup cotija cheese, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 0.2 cup green onions, 1.0 clove garlic, 14.5 ounce diced tomatoes, 1.0 chipotle chile in adobo sauce, 1.0 teaspoon sugar, 0.2 teaspoon dried oregano, 0.2 teaspoon cumin, 2.0 teaspoon cornstarch, 1.0 teaspoon cold water
steps: preheat oven to 400degf . in a 2 quart saucepan, crumble and cook chorizo with 1/4 cup green onions over medium heat until chorizo is browned . drain off fat and transfer to a medium bowl . add black beans and 1 chipotle pepper to chorizo and stir to combine . line 2 baking sheets with foil and spray with cooking spray . set aside . working with 1 package of pizza dough at a time, unroll pizza dough . on a lightly floured surface, pat dough to a 15"x 10" rectangle . cut dough into quarters, making 4 rectangles . place about 1/3 cup manchego cheese on each rectangle, placing cheese on half the rectangle . place 1/3 cup chorizo mixture on top of each mound of cheese . brush edges of rectangle with water . fold dough over opposite edge on rectangle . seal edges with tine of fork . place turnovers on prepared baking sheet . repeat with remaining pizza dough, cheese, and chorizo mixture . brush turnovers with water . bake in preheated over for 15 minutes or until golden . serve with ranchero sauce instructions follow and sprinkle with cotija cheese . ranchero sauce directions in a medium saucepan, heat olive oil . cook 1/4 cup green onions and 1 clove garlic until onion is tender . stir in tomatoes, 1 chipotle chile pepper, sugar, oregano, and cumin and bring to a boil . reduce heat and simmer, uncovered for 10 minutes or until most of the liquid has evaporated . in a small bowl, blend cornstarch and 1 tsp water together add to mixture in saucepan and bring to a boil . cook and stir for two minutes more.

name: roasted turkey
description: roasting a turkey is something everyone should do at least once in their life . turkeys scare most people but they are in fact quite easy to prepare . my nana taught me to make a turkey when i could barley even reach the top of the stove, i would sit on a stool and watch and take it all in . by the time i reached 14 i told her i was ready for her to watch me . i was successful . so, here is my turkey tutorial i am writing down the instructions for the first time so, if i seem to have left something out and you are thinking to yourself hey this doesn't make sense, e mail me with your question and i will update the recipe/tutorial.
ner: turkey, butter, salt, pepper, chicken stock, stuffing
ingredients: 1.0 turkey, 1.0 pound butter, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 1.0 teaspoon pepper, 2.0 cup chicken stock, 5.0 cup stuffing
steps: make sure your turkey is completely thawed . wash it . run under water, fill the cavities with water and drain put the turkey on your cutter board and gently pat dry with a paper towel, do not use a dishtowel for sanitary purpose, you need to throw the paper towels away for food safety in a medium saucepan melt 2 cubes of butter 1 cup in the 2 cups of chicken stock once melted set aside . salt and pepper the inside of the cavities . flip the turkey over so it is breast down, a and fill neck cavity with stuffing, then pull the ne3ck flap over the stuffing and use a toothpick or a stainless steel turkey lacer to hold in place . flip turkey back over and stuff with remaining stuffing to opening of cavity . i do not lace closed my turkey so if you want to lace it closed that is a cooks prerogative . i usually keep the metal piece that keeps the leg together in the turkey and once stuffed i put the legs back into it . you can also use the little piece of flesh that is hanging there and pop the ends of the legs into it if all else fails use some kitchen twine to keep the legs together but the stuffing see able . put the thermometer in and make sure it is at the center of the meat not popped all the way through, you need to be able to get a good read on the thermometer . take the other 2 cubes of butter 1 cup and rub it all over the surface of the turkey all over clumps are good . salt and pepper all over the surface of the turkey put into roasting pan on a rack, i like a rack that is at least 1 inch higher than the pan . put the turkey into a preheated oven of 500 degrees . put the turkey into the oven uncovered for 25 minutes . after 25 minutes remove the turkey from the oven and lower the heat to 350 degrees . take the melted chicken stock and butter and pour over the turkey . with aluminum foil, make a tent that will cover the turkey and put over the turkey but do not seal it to all sides of the roasting pan, make sure there is "venting" space put back in the oven every 20 minutes pull your turkey out and baste, make sure the turkey is staying glistening with butter . if your butter chicken stock seems to be drying up, add water as needed or melt your extra butter . the key to the turkey staying moist is basting lift the skin if yo need to and put the basting in that way . as you get into your last hour, look at the skin of the turkey . does it need to brown up then take the tent off . is it getting to brown baste it more and feel at the leg is is loose and the juices running clear check the thermometer is it close tot he temp remember once you take the turkey out of the oven it will cook for at least 20more minutes while it rests . for a stuffed turkey you want to estimate 20 minutes in a 350 oven for each pound . that seems more thatn most guides but this will help you plan your timing of other items . in the last hour of your cooking you are going to literally babysit the turkey so it will be done earlier and give you time to let it rest properly . trust me

name: grote tortellini met pestoragout van biefstuk en paddenstoelen
description: deze tortellini met spinazie en ricotttakaas gevuld combineren goed met de pestoragout van biefstuk en gemengde paddenstoelen . de prei en kappertjes geven de ragout een bijzondere smaak . met deze grote tortellini zet je overheerlijk en bijzonder gerecht op tafel.
ner: spinazie, paddenstoelen, biefreepjes, bertolli voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, prei, kappertjes, bertolli pesto alla genovese, kookroom, rucola
ingredients: 250.0 gram spinazie, 150.0 gram paddenstoelen, 200.0 gram biefreepjes, 3.0 tablespoon bertolli voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, 100.0 gram prei, 2.0 tablespoon kappertjes, 3.0 tablespoon bertolli pesto alla genovese, 200.0 milliliter kookroom, 80.0 gram rucola
steps: kook de tortellini volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . maak de paddenstoelen schoon en snijd de grote doormidden . bestrooi het vlees met zout en peper . verhit de bertolli vloeibaar in een ruime koekenpan en roerbak hierin de biefstukreepjes een minuut of 3. voeg de paddenstoelen, de prei en de kappertjes toe en bak ze 1 min . mee . schepde pesto alla genovese en de kookroom erdoor, breng het tegen de kook aan en laat het 2 min . zachtjes pruttelen . maak 2 voorverwarmde, diepe borden op eerst de helft van de rucola, dan de tortelini gevolgd door de 'ragout' en tot slot de rest van de rucola . eet smakelijk

name: summer breakfast quinoa bowls
description: of all the ways to eat quinoa, these summer quinoa breakfast bowls are my favorite served as a warm cereal topped with fresh fruit and a drizzle of honey . a healthy protein packed breakfast.
ner: small peach, uncooked quinoa, 3/4 cup almond milk, vanilla extract, brown sugar, raspberries, blueberries, local honey
ingredients: 1 small peach, 1/3 cup uncooked quinoa, 2/3 3/4 cup almond milk, 1/2 tsp vanilla extract, 2 tsp brown sugar, 12 raspberries, 14 blueberries, 2 teaspoons local honey
steps: in sauce pan cook combine quinoa and 2/3 cup almond milk, vanilla and brown sugar . cook on medium heat and bring to boil for five minutes . lower the heat to low and cover . cook for 15 to 20 minutes, or until easily fluffs with a fork . meanwhile, heat a grill pan and spray with oil . grill the peaches to bring out their sweetness 2 to 3 minutes set aside . warm the remaining almond milk . divide the cooked quinoa between 2 bowls then pour in warmed almond milk . top with peaches, raspberries and blueberries and drizzle each with 1 teaspoon of honey.

name: vanilla bean panna cotta with strawberries
description: vanilla bean panna cotta vanilla beans, strawberries and cream make this easy, light and luscious dessert worthy of a standing o perfect for the holidays if you need a dessert to impress
ner: fat free milk, vanilla bean, unflavored powdered gelatin, half and half cream, sugar, salt, fresh strawberries, sugar
ingredients: 1 1/3 cups fat free milk, 1 vanilla bean, 2 teaspoons unflavored powdered gelatin, 1 1/2 cups half and half cream, 5 tbsp sugar, pinch salt, 1 1/2 cups fresh strawberries, 1 1/2 tsp sugar
steps: place the fat free milk in a medium heavy saucepan with the seeds from the vanilla bean . sprinkle the gelatin over the milk and let it stand for 10 minutes to soften the gelatin grains . in the meantime, prepare an ice bath in a large plastic bowl . after 10 minutes have passed, heat the saucepan and stir over medium heat just until the gelatin dissolves but the milk does not boil, about 3 minutes . add the half and half cream, 5 tbsp sugar and salt . whisk well and and leave until the mixture is hot, but do not let it come to a boil, about 4 to 5 minutes . remove from the heat, then transfer the liquid into a clean, metal medium sized bowl . place the bowl in the ice bath to cool for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally until the mixture begins to thicken . divide the mixture evenly, about 1/2 cup each between 6 small dessert bowls or glass parfait glasses, then cover each with plastic wrap and refrigerate until firm, about 4 to 6 hours or overnight . 1 hour before serving, combine sugar and halved strawberries in a medium bowl, tossing to coat . cover and chill, tossing strawberries occasionally . drain strawberries before serving . when ready to eat, spoon the fresh strawberries over the panna cotta and serve.

name: crunchy inn and out maguro with jalapeno maki
description: crunchy inn and out maguro with jalapeno maki with water, flour, salt, ice cubes, corn oil, short grain rice, water, konbu, sugar, rice vinegar, salt, nori seaweed, tuna, jalapeno chili
ner: water, flour, salt, ice cubes, corn oil, short grain rice, water, konbu, sugar, rice vinegar, salt, nori seaweed, tuna, jalapeno chili
ingredients: 2.0 cup water, flour, salt, ice cubes, corn oil, 2.5 cup short grain rice, 3.0 cup water, 2.5 inch konbu, 1.0 tablespoon sugar, 70.0 milliliter rice vinegar, 1.5 teaspoon salt, nori seaweed, tuna, 2.0 tablespoon jalapeno chili
steps: 1. wash the rice for 3 times and drain it well, then add the water, konbu on top and cook it like the way you cook the regular rice for 35minutes . 2. for vinegar dressing, add all the ingredients in a sauce pan and make it warm to open up all the flavors and transfer it on a small bowl . 3. for tempura flakes, add all the ingrediens mix it well and sprinkle it in a deep fryer to become a tempura flakes then strain it, put in a paper towels and cool it down . 4. after 35 minutes take out the rice and transfer it in sushi oke wooden mixing tub cool it down a little bit then add your vinegar dressing, mix it well by using a wooden spatula . 5. put the rice in a yaki nori sheet, put it upside down then put the tuna togethere with the jalapenos, and tempura flakes...roll it up by using a makisu bamboo rolling matt . 6. take a tuna, cut the tuna like sushi neta thin slice 6pcs . put it on top of the maki and roll it agian by using a makisu, then cut it in to 8pcs . and add some tempura flakes for toppings ...

name: grilled pork spring roll
description: grilled pork spring roll with pork, cold water, rice, salt, black pepper, white pepper, curing salt, fish sauce, starch, red food dye, won ton wrappers, mint, cilantro, thai basil, chinese chives, spring roll wrapper, pickled carrots, pickled daikon, onion, peanut dipping sauce
ner: pork, cold water, rice, salt, black pepper, white pepper, curing salt, fish sauce, starch, red food dye, won ton wrappers, mint, cilantro, thai basil, chinese chives, spring roll wrapper, pickled carrots, pickled daikon, onion, peanut dipping sauce
ingredients: pork, cold water, rice, salt, black pepper, white pepper, curing salt, fish sauce, starch, red food dye, won ton wrappers, mint, cilantro, thai basil, chinese chives, spring roll wrapper, pickled carrots, pickled daikon, onion, peanut dipping sauce
steps: grind pork, double or triple ground . in a kitchenaid, with a dough hook, combine ground pork with ice water until a spam texture is achieved . mix in salt, black and white pepper, curing salt, fish sauce, mung bean starch and red dye . form pork mixture into rectangular patties, grill, saute or steam patties until cooked through . in a rice paper layer picked herbs, one rolled and crispy spring roll wrapper, pickles, shaved onion and cooked pork.

name: carne guisada com macarrao
description: http //www.cozinharfacil.com/carnes a cia/36 carnes/258 carne guisada com macarrao.html
ner: none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none, none
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: descasque e lave a cebola e os dentes de alho e pique os finamente . descasque a cenoura e corte ao cubos . cozinhe a massa em agua, temporada com sal, durante 7 minutos . leve o azeite ao lume num tacho, deixe aquecer, junte a cebola e os alhos e deixe refogar ate que a cebola fique transparente . depois junte os cubos de carne para caramelizarem, junte tambem o chourico as rodelas . adicione o vinho, a agua e a polpa de tomate, tempere com sal, pimenta, folhas de louro, salsa e caldo knorr . deixar cozinhar durante 10 minutos . adicione a cenoura cortada aos cubos e as ervilhas, deixe cozinhar durante 7 minutos . adicione a massa previamente cozinhada e deixe cozinhar mais 3 minutos.

name: peanut butter and banana dippin'
