ingredients: 2.0 banana, 0.2 cup skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread, 1.0 cup strawberries, 1.0 apple, 1.0 cup celery
steps: combine skippy natural creamy peanut butter spread with bananas in medium bowl . serve with fruit and celery.

name: quick margherita naan pizzas
description: dreaming of a vacation to the south of italy bring the flavors of naples to your home kitchen with these quick and easy margherita naan pizzas . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: naan, olive oil, pizza sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, large tomato, garlic, basil leaves, sea salt flakes
ingredients: 4.0 piece naan, 2.0 teaspoon olive oil, 0.7 cup pizza sauce, 6.0 ounce fresh mozzarella cheese, 1.0 large tomato, 2.0 clove garlic, 4.0 basil leaves, sea salt flakes
steps: preheat oven to 425degf . line a baking sheet with parchment paper . arrange the naan on the baking sheet . drizzle an equal amount of the olive oil over the surface of each piece . spread a generous 2 tablespoons of pizza sauce evenly onto the center of each naan piece, leaving a 1/2 inch border around the sauce . slice the mozzarella into 1/4 inch thick rounds . halve the tomato and remove and discard the seeds . dice tomato into 1/4 inch pieces . finely mince the garlic . stack the basil leaves and roll into a tight log . make very thin slices across the log to create ribbons . distribute mozzarella equally between each piece of naan . add the diced tomato, minced garlic, and half of the basil leaves . reserve remaining basil for garnish . bake pizzas on middle rack of oven until the naan is crisp and the cheese is bubbly and golden, 12 14 minutes . check to see that pizzas are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow pizzas to cool for 2 3 minutes . top with reserved basil ribbons and a sprinkle of flaky sea salt, then slice and serve . refrigerate leftovers in an airtight container for up to 2 days . reheat in the oven at 350degf for 5 7 minutes.

name: ney roasted black pepper corn
description: there's nothing like grilled corn on the cob, and this recipe makes it even better.
ner: corn on the cob, honey, bouillon, melted butter, black pepper
ingredients: 4.0 corn on the cob, 1.0 tablespoon honey, 1.0 tablespoon bouillon, 0.2 cup melted butter, 0.5 teaspoon black pepper
steps: preheat grill to 400 degf . soak the corn, in cold water, in the husk . in a bowl, mix honey, vegetable base, butter, and black pepper pull the husk back from the corn but, don't remove husk and remove the silk from the corn . brush the mixture on the corn, when all sides have been coated, pull husk to cover the corn . lace the corn directly onto the grill . using long handled metal tongs, turn the corn every 3 4 minutes . cook until the corn is soft to the touch approximately 15 18 minutes .

name: old bay hot sauce wings
description: old bay hot sauce wings with chicken wing, old bay seasoning, butter, old bay
ner: chicken wing, old bay seasoning, butter, old bay
ingredients: 3.0 pound chicken wing, 4.0 teaspoon old bay seasoning, 0.2 cup butter, 0.5 cup old bay
steps: preheat oven to 450degf . line a large shallow baking pan with foil . place a wire rack on pan . spray rack lightly with no stick cooking spray . arrange wings in single layer on rack . sprinkle evenly with old bay seasoning . bake 55 to 60 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and skin is crispy, turning halfway through cooking . meanwhile, mix butter and old bay hot sauce in large bowl . add cooked wings toss to coat . serve wings with blue cheese dressing and celery sticks, if desired.

name: taartjes van slagroomijs met aardbeiensalade
description: taart maken met ijs wordt nu wel heel gemakkelijk . deze heerlijke aardbeiensalade met slagroom ijs en country cookies zijn een geweldig toetje . voor extra slagroom zal je zelf nog moeten slagroom kloppen.
ner: pasteibakjes, aardbeien, munt, azijn, lichte basterdsuiker, country cookies, hertog romig slagroomijs, poedersuiker, olie
ingredients: 4.0 pasteibakjes, 250.0 gram aardbeien, 2.0 tablespoon munt, 2.0 tablespoon azijn, 2.0 tablespoon lichte basterdsuiker, 4.0 country cookies, 1.0 container hertog romig slagroomijs, poedersuiker, olie
steps: bekleed de bakjes met plasticfolie en laat de randen overhangen . was de aardbeien, verwijder de kroontjes en snijd de aardbeien in kleine blokjes . verwarm de balsamico azijn met de suiker tot de suiker is opgelost . laat afkoelen en roer door de aardbeien . meng de munt erdoor . schep de aardbeiensalade op de bodem van de schaaltjes . vul de bakjes verder met het hertog romig slagroomijs en dek ze af met een country cookie . vouw het plasticfolie terug en zet de taartjes minstens een uur in de vriezer om op te stijven . om de taartjes te serveren, vouw je het folie opzij en leg je een bordje op het bakje . keer het geheel om en trek het bakje er voorzichtig af . verwijder nu de folie . de aardbeiensalade zal er iets aflopen, maar dat is nou juist de bedoeling . bestrooi de borden met poedersuiker en serveer ze.

name: chicken noodle soup
description: this quick and easy homemade classic chicken noodle soup recipe can be made in a pot on the stove or the instant pot.
ner: boneless skinless chicken thighs, kosher salt, olive oil, diced onion, diced celery, peeled and sliced carrot, garlic, low sodium chicken broth, bay leaves, black pepper, 1 1/2 oz egg noodles, parsley
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken thighs, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1/2 cup diced onion, 1/2 cup diced celery, 1/2 cup peeled and sliced carrot, 3 cloves garlic, 4 cups low sodium chicken broth, 2 bay leaves, black pepper, 1 cup 1 1/2 oz egg noodles, parsley
steps: season the chicken with salt . press saute and add the oil . add the onion, celery, carrot and garlic and saute until soft, 4 to 5 minutes . add the chicken, broth, bay leaves and 1/8 teaspoon black pepper . cover and cook high pressure 15 minutes . let the pressure release naturally when finished cooking . discard the bay leaves, coarsely shred the chicken with two forks and return to the soup, add the noodles and cook 2 minutes high pressure . quick or natural release . garnish with parsley and serve.

name: laura ingalls wilder's molasses cookies
description: a delicious old fashioned recipe for molasses cookies with coconut and oatmeal from laura ingalls wilder, author of the little house book series.
ner: unsweetened grated or flaked coconut fresh or dried, unsalted butter, room temperature, granulated sugar, egg, room temperature, molasses, rolled oats, flour, allspice, salt, nutmeg, ground cloves, baking powder, baking soda, orange extract or grated orange zest or sub 1 tsp vanilla
ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened grated or flaked coconut fresh or dried, 1/3 cup unsalted butter, room temperature, 1/3 cup granulated sugar, 1 large egg, room temperature, 1/2 cup molasses, 1 1/2 cups rolled oats, 1 cup flour, 1/2 tsp allspice, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1/4 tsp ground cloves, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/4 tsp baking soda, 1 tsp orange extract or grated orange zest or sub 1 tsp vanilla
steps: preheat oven to 325 degrees f and grease two cookie sheets with unsalted butter . if you're using fresh grated coconut, grate it into a bowl and reserve . if using dried coconut, pour the coconut into a small bowl and cover with cold water . let the coconut soak to rehydrate while you're working with the other ingredients . in a medium mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar together . you can cream them by hand the way laura would have or with an electric mixer . beat in the egg . beat in the molasses . drain the water from the coconut and squeeze dry if you used fresh coconut, skip this step . in a large mixing bowl, stir together the dry ingredients . add the wet ingredients to the dry, including the shredded coconut, along with the orange extract/zest and the coconut . stir together until a batter forms . note if you're not a fan of orange flavoring, sub 1 tsp of vanilla for the orange . drop the batter by heaping tablespoonfuls onto the greased cookie sheet . the cookies spread quite a bit, so make sure you leave enough space between them . i was able to fit 12 cookies per sheet . place the cookie sheets in the oven, one on the top rack and one below . let them bake for 8 minutes . switch the sheets, lower to upper and upper to lower, and let them bake for 7 10 minutes longer . cookies are done when an impression made by lightly touching the center of the cookie does not remain . begin checking at 7 minutes, and test them frequently until they are done don't overbake, or the cookies will dry out.remove the cookies from the sheets and cool them on a wire rack . serve . store them in a sealed container like a plastic zipper bag or sealed tupperware this will help them stay fresh.

name: cinnamon raisin baked french toast casserole
description: warm cinnamon and sweet raisins make this french toast casserole almost worthy of dessert . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ner: nonstick cooking spray, cinnamon raisin bread, eggs, brown sugar, whole milk, vanilla extract, salt, powdered sugar, maple syrup
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 1.0 pound cinnamon raisin bread, 8.0 eggs, 0.3 cup brown sugar, 1.8 cup whole milk, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 0.2 teaspoon salt, powdered sugar, maple syrup
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray a 9x13 inch baking dish liberally with nonstick cooking spray . cut bread into 1 inch cubes and transfer to a large mixing bowl . set aside . in a large mixing bowl combine eggs, brown sugar, milk, vanilla extract, and salt and whisk until smooth . add to bread cubes, and fold together with a rubber spatula . transfer bread mixture to prepared baking dish . bake french toast on middle rack of oven until it is golden brown on top and a toothpick inserted in the center of a piece comes out clean, 45 50 minutes . check to see that french toast is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow french toast to cool in dish for at least 10 minutes . prior to serving, plate toast cut as desired, sift powdered sugar over the top, and drizzle with maple syrup . refrigerate leftovers for 2 3 days.

name: slow cooker breakfast tot casserole
description: slow cooker breakfast tot casserole with eggs, heavy cream, egg, potato nuggets, shredded cheddar cheese, breakfast sausage
ner: eggs, heavy cream, egg, potato nuggets, shredded cheddar cheese, breakfast sausage
ingredients: 8.0 eggs, 0.2 cup heavy cream, 1.0 package egg, 32.0 ounce potato nuggets, 2.0 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 8.0 ounce breakfast sausage
steps: spray 6 quart slow cooker with no stick cooking spray . mix eggs, cream and seasoning mix in large bowl with wire whisk until well blended . place 1/2 of the potato nuggets in bottom of slow cooker . pour in egg mixture . sprinkle top with 1/2 cup of the cheese, then cooked sausage . layer with remaining potato nuggets and cheese . cover . cook 2 1/2 hours on high or 5 hours on low.

name: honey and orange mini cakes
description: honey and orange mini cakes with orange juice, honey, i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread, large eggs, orange, all purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, confectioners sugar
ner: orange juice, honey, i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread, large eggs, orange, all purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, confectioners sugar
ingredients: 0.8 cup orange juice, 0.5 cup honey, 0.5 cup i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread, 2.0 large eggs, 1.0 teaspoon orange, 1.7 cup all purpose flour, 0.5 cup granulated sugar, 0.5 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 1.5 cup confectioners sugar
steps: preheat oven to 350deg . grease four 12 cup mini muffin pans or line with paper cupcake liners set aside . blend 2/3 cup orange juice, honey, i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread, egg yolks and orange peel in medium bowl set aside . combine flour, granulated sugar, baking powder and baking soda in large bowl set aside . beat egg whites in small bowl until soft peaks form . stir orange juice mixture into flour mixture just until blended . gently fold in egg whites . evenly spoon batter into prepared pans . bake 11 minutes or until toothpick inserted in centers comes out clean . cool 10 minutes on wire rack remove from pans and cool completely . combine confectioners sugar with remaining orange juice in small bowl evenly spread on mini cakes . garnish, if desired, with orange curls . let glaze thoroughly set before serving.

name: baked fish with coconut
description: i am a great foodie and like multifariousness, this generally appertain to improvements in standard of my cooking . i tried to bake fish that left in freeze adding some fresh ingredients and it comes out real good . when i baked this fish for dinner, cud'nt stopped myself and gorged on this baked fish.
ner: fish, olive oil, grated coconut, red chili flakes, garlic, salt
ingredients: 500.0 gram fish, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 0.5 cup grated coconut, 1.0 tablespoon red chili flakes, 2.0 clove garlic, salt
steps: marinate fish of your choice with olive oil, chili flakes, minced garlic, grated coconut and salt for at least two hours . cover with silver foil and bake in preheated oven at 250 c for 30 minutes . after that open the cover and bake for another 10 minutes at 175 c . serve hot

name: bieflapjes met ratatouille, vleesjus met uitjes en olijven
description: dit franse recept ratatouille met zwarte olijven en een uitje in de jus is een heerlijke maaltijd . dit franse bieflapjes met ratatouilee, vleesjus met uitjes en olijven recept met rundvlees heeft een italiaans tintje gekregen.
ner: aardappelen, ratatouillepakket, olijfolie, tomatensap, knorr vleesjus met uitjes, boter, bieflapjes, knoflookolijven
ingredients: 1.0 kilogram aardappelen, 1.0 ratatouillepakket, 4.0 tablespoon olijfolie, 250.0 milliliter tomatensap, 1.0 bag knorr vleesjus met uitjes, 50.0 gram boter, 400.0 gram bieflapjes, 100.0 gram knoflookolijven
steps: schil de aardappelen en snijd ze in gelijke stukken . kook de aardappelen in ca . 20 min . in een laagje water met wat zout gaar . giet ze af en laat ze uitdampen . maak de groenten schoon en snijd ze in stukjes . verhit 2 el olie in een diepe pan, voeg de groenten, de kruiden uit het pakket, wat zout en wat peper toe . schep de groenten om . voeg het tomatensap en een kopje water toe . stoof de groenten op een matig vuur, met het deksel half op de pan, in 15 min . gaar . maak de knorr vleesjus met uitjes klaar volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . verhit de rest van de olie in een koekenpan en bak hierin de bieflapjes in ca . 3 min . om en om lichtbruin en van binnen rose . voeg de olijven toe en verwarm ze 1 minuut . verdeel de aardappelen en groenten over vier grote borden en leg het vlees met olijven ernaast . schep de jus erover.

name: rosemary orange grilled chicken and veggies
description: rosemary orange grilled chicken and veggies with boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, eggplant, red bell pepper, sliced, yellow squash, i can't believe it's not butter spray original, fresh rosemary, grated orange peel, orange juice
ner: boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, eggplant, red bell pepper, sliced, yellow squash, i can't believe it's not butter spray original, fresh rosemary, grated orange peel, orange juice
ingredients: 1.0 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, 1.0 eggplant, 2.0 red bell pepper, sliced, 1.0 yellow squash, 30.0 i can't believe it's not butter spray original, 1.0 teaspoon fresh rosemary, 1.0 teaspoon grated orange peel, 2.0 tablespoon orange juice
steps: spray chicken and vegetables with 15 sprays i can't believe it's not butter spray original, then toss with with rosemary and orange peel . alternately thread chicken and vegetables on skewers . arrange chicken and vegetables on serving platter . spray with remaining 15 sprays, then drizzle with orange juice . grill or broil chicken and vegetables, turning once, 8 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked and vegetables are just tender.

name: muffin tin chicken pot pies with savory duck fat crust
description: muffin tin chicken pot pies with savory duck fat crust recipe from cooking divine.
ner: pastry flour, flour, unsalted butter, duck fat, fresh thyme, salt, ice water, boneless chicken breast, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, heavy cream, fresh parsley, chicken broth, frozen peas
ingredients: 1.5 cup pastry flour, 1.8 cup flour, 10.0 tablespoon unsalted butter, 0.5 cup duck fat, 2.5 tablespoon fresh thyme, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.5 cup ice water, 1.0 pound boneless chicken breast, 0.8 cup carrots, 0.8 cup celery, 0.7 cup onion, 2.0 clove garlic, 1.0 cup heavy cream, 1.0 tablespoon fresh parsley, 1.5 cup chicken broth, 1.0 cup frozen peas
steps: crust mix both flours, salt, and thyme in a bowl . cube the cold butter and add to bowl . crush together with tips of your finger and mix into the dry ingredients until it resembles coarse meal . add the cold duck fat and mix together with rest of ingredients . slowly add the water and mix with fork . the idea is just to have enough water so that the dough holds together . it will be flaky, you do not want the dough to be smooth . so try and add as little water as possible . next, take the dough and place on a cold surface or pastry stone . working with your hands, gently flatten the dough and fold it over on itself 3 times . assemble into a large disc, wrap tightly with plastic wrap and place in fridge for 30 minutes . after 30 mins, take the dough and flour a cold surface or pastry stone . roll the dough out until it is about 1/8 inch thick . cut the dough into 6 equal parts and place inside muffin tin holes . the dough will be hanging over the sides of the pan, this is okay as you will be folding it over the filling . cover the dough and place in fridge until assembly . cube the chicken and bowl with celery and carrots for 12 minutes set aside . add butter, garlic and onions to a saute pan and cook until the onions are translucent about 3 minutes . add the salt, pepper, parsley and thyme . whisk in the cream and chicken broth . cook on medium low for about 10 minutes until the filling is thick . set aside for assembly . in each muffin tin hole lined with dough layer the chicken/celery/carrots, then pour over the cream based filling and top with peas . fold the access pie crust over each pot pie . leave some space for vents on each . cook at 425 degrees for 25 30 minutes.

name: turkse durum met boerensalade
description: de lekkerste turkse durum maak je vanaf nu zelf met knorr wereldgerechten turkse durum en dit recept . heerlijke variant op dit wereldberoemde gerecht met een zelfgemaakte boerensalade . deze salade maak je o.a . met olijven, feta, tomaat en komkommer . zeer kindvriendelijk, kinderen zijn er dol op maak dus extra veel..
ner: olijfolie, rum, varkensvleesreepjes, yoghurt, paprika, ijsbergsla, komkommer, tomaten, feta, munt, knoflook, olijven, citroensap
ingredients: 4.0 tablespoon olijfolie, 1.0 packet rum, 350.0 gram varkensvleesreepjes, 150.0 milliliter yoghurt, 1.0 paprika, 5.0 ijsbergsla, 1.0 komkommer, 3.0 tomaten, 150.0 gram feta, 2.0 munt, 1.0 clove knoflook, 50.0 gram olijven, 3.0 tablespoon citroensap
steps: meng in een kom 3 eetlepels olijfolie en meng hierdoor de knorr wereldgerecht turkse durum kruidenmix . voeg varkensvleesreepjes toe, roer goed om en laat 10 minuten intrekken . ontdoe de paprika van zaad en zaadlijsten en snijd in blokjes . meng in een schaaltje de sausmix door de yoghurt . snijd de ijsbergsla in reepjes . voor de boerensalade snijd de komkommer en tomaten in niet te kleine stukken . verkruimel de feta . haal de blaadjes munt los van de takjes en hak ze fijn . snijd het teentje knoflook doormidden en wrijf met de twee helften de saladeschaal in . zet een hapjespan op hoog vuur . bak in de verhitte pan de gemarineerde varkensfiletreepjes onder voortdurend omscheppen ongeveer 5 minuten . voeg de paprika en toe en laat nog 2 minuten meebakken . verwarm de broodjes in gesloten verpakking gedurende 30 seconden in de magnetron . neem een durumbroodje en smeer het in met yoghurtsaus . leg er een beetje gesneden sla en wat vlees op en rol het broodje op . serveer er naar smaak nog wat yoghurtsaus bij . doe voor de boerensalade komkommer, tomaat, feta, munt en olijven in de saladeschaal en meng goed . besprenkel het geheel met citroensap en olijfolie . serveer deze heerlijke turkse durum met boerensalade direct.

name: monticello white bean soup
description: learn a colonial recipe from thomas jefferson's family at monticello for white bean soup . vegetarian, healthy, delicious historical recipe.
ner: dried navy, great northern, or cannellini beans, water, salt and pepper, large carrots, trimmed, peeled, and diced, small turnips, trimmed, peeled, and diced, medium parsnip, trimmed, peeled, and diced, large ribs of celery with leafy green tops, chopped, unsalted butter, rustic artisan bread, sliced 1/2 inch thick
ingredients: 1 1/2 lbs dried navy, great northern, or cannellini beans, 16 cups water, salt and pepper, 2 large carrots, trimmed, peeled, and diced, 2 small turnips, trimmed, peeled, and diced, 1 medium parsnip, trimmed, peeled, and diced, 3 large ribs of celery with leafy green tops, chopped, 2 3 tbsp unsalted butter, 4 slices rustic artisan bread, sliced 1/2 inch thick
steps: rinse and sort the beans, removing any stones or impurities . drain the beans and put them in a large bowl, then cover by a few inches of cold water . soak the beans overnight . drain the beans . put the beans in a large pot or 6 quart dutch oven . cover with 4 quarts of water and bring slowly to a simmer over medium heat, skimming any scum that rises to the surface . simmer gently until the beans are tender, about 1 hour . replenish the liquid with additional water as needed . season the mixture with salt and pepper . add the diced carrots and turnips and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes . add the parsnip and continue to simmer until all of the vegetables and beans are quite soft, 15 30 minutes longer . taste the soup and adjust seasoning, adding more salt or pepper to taste, if desired.pass the soup through a food mill to puree, or use an immersion blend to blend the soup till it reaches the desired texture . in jefferson's time it would have been passed through a sieve to make a very smooth and light puree, but it is a very time consuming process for a large batch of soup like this . the food mill will create the most authentic texture in a short amount of time . an immersion blender will make the soup thicker, less silky and less refined, with a texture that is not as authentic . it will still be tasty, though . add the chopped celery ribs to the puree and simmer gently for 15 minutes more . if the soup is too thick, thin it with more simmering water . butter the bread slices and toast them in a skillet on medium heat, turning frequently, until golden . to make the dish pareve or vegan, use a dairy free bread and rub the bread lightly with olive oil instead of butter before browning.cut the toasted slices into bite sized pieces and divide them among 8 warm bowls . ladle the soup over the toasted bread cubes . serve hot . i like to garnish each serving with a few small bread cubes on top . note to make this soup vegan/dairy free, omit butter and use a dairy free bread... not necessarily traditional, but an easy sub to make.
